1a1(dkon brtsegs): dkon cigs klog pam mu ting pa 'azhugs s+ho// /
1b1(dkon brtsegs): / rje sa /
2a1(dkon brtsegs): ar+yA pa ta pu tra sa mag
2a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs
2b1(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/
2b2(dkon brtsegs): yab dang sras 'jal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
2b3(dkon brtsegs): mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang /
2b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la
3a1(dkon brtsegs): / phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos
3a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grol ba/ grol ba'i 'khor
3a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ dul ba dul ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ zhi ba zhi ba'i
3a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang dran pa/ rgal ba rgal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/
3b1(dkon brtsegs): pha rol phyin pa/ pha rol phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ zang la phyin pa/ thang la
3b2(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa dang / dbugs phyin pa'i 'khor dang
3b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ dge slong dge slong gi 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa bcom pa/ nyon mongs pa
3b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dge sbyong / dge sbyong gi 'khor dang ldan pa/ sdig pa bsal ba/
3b5(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ tshangs pa/ tshangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sdig
4a1(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba'i chos can/ sdig pa bsal ba'i chos can gyi 'khor
4a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ rig pa can/ rig pa can gyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ khrus byas pa/ khrus byas pa'i
4a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrogs pa po// sgrogs pa po'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa byang ba/
4a4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa byang ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par bsal ba/ yan lag lnga
4a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa dang rnam par bral ba/ sgrib pa dang rnam par
4b1(dkon brtsegs): bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yid rnam par dag pa/ yid rnam par dag pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yan lag
4b2(dkon brtsegs): drag dang ldan pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bsnyen bsring dang bral ba/ bsnyen pa sring dang
4b3(dkon brtsegs): bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bsrung ba gcig pa/ bsrung ba gcig pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dran pa'i sgo bsrung
4b4(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa/ dran pa'i sgo srungs phun sum tshogs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ rton pa bzhi
4b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyi tse ba'i bden pa bsal ba/ nyi tse ba'i bden pa bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ btsal
4b6(dkon brtsegs): ba spangs pa/ btsal ba spangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ mthar phyin pa/ mthar phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ don gyi
5a1(dkon brtsegs): mthar zhugs pa/ don gyimapar thug pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid bsgoms pa/ bdag nyid
5a2(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ kun tu rtogs pa'i rnyog pa med pa/ kun tu rtog pa'i rnyog pa med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rnam
5a3(dkon brtsegs): par rtog pa yongs su chad pa/ rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ lus kyi 'du byed rab tu bsal ba/ lus kyi
5a4(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed rab tu bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa/ mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa'i 'khor dang /
5a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/
5a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa/ 'phags pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yal ga dang lo ma dad
5b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dab ma dang lcug ma dang shun brags kyi skyon dang bral ba/ dag pa/ snying po la gnas pa/ shag kya'i yul na ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga'
5b2(dkon brtsegs): ra ba na/ lnga sde dang / grags byin dang / 'char ka dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung dang / chu klung 'od srang dang / 'od srang chen po dang /
5b3(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bu dang / me'u dgal gyi bu las stsogs pa dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams
5b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam
5b5(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po// bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba
5b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag
5b7(dkon brtsegs): dang thabs gcig ste/ de'i tshe nam gyi tho rangs res la bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis
6a1(dkon brtsegs): mdun gyis bltas te blug pa med pa na bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar thams cad dang ldan pa
6a2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun cang mi smra ba la gzigs so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la gzigs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/
6a3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag dge slong gang gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu 'ga' zhig tshol cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u 'di r+ya
6a4(dkon brtsegs): stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar
6a5(dkon brtsegs): ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bgyi'o//
6a6(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ke'u 'di rgya la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u 'di n+ya khyod ni bla ma bla mar bya
6a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug shig/ de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / grags sprin dang / steng rgyas 'od srung dang /
6b1(dkon brtsegs): chu klung 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung dang / 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / me'u dgal gyi bu chen pos kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
6b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa me'u
6b3(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// me'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyang bla ma bla mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u
6b4(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed pa'i dge slong gang zhig/ bcom ldan 'das bzhed snyam ste/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa
6b5(dkon brtsegs): me'u dgal gyi bu chen pos ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa tshe dang ldan pa
6b6(dkon brtsegs): 'char ka la gnas shing / dge slong 'char ka la rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do zhes dgongs pa mthong ste/ 'di lta ste dper na khang pa brtsegs pa khang pa
6b7(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa'i khyams sgo byang phyogs su lta ba'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ste/ nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos la shar ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa
6b8(dkon brtsegs): me'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la shar cing dge slong 'char ka 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do zhes
7a1(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa mthong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'tshar ka ga la ba der song
7a2(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das ni khyod la dge slong 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed
7a3(dkon brtsegs): nus shes dgongs shing bzhed do// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de lta yin gyis/ khyod kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya ba dad pa bskyed cig/ de skad ces
7a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sa tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po rigs rnams ni dad
7a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya bar shin tu dka' ste/ rgyal po'i rigs ni lhag par dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka' ste/ tshe dang
7a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste dper na shing khur bcu 'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum cu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ shing khur brgya yang rung ste/ gsher bag
7a7(dkon brtsegs): med cing skams la lo mang du lon pa zhig yod la/ de la la la zhig gis me btang na me'i phung po chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de la yang la la zhig gis mar ram 'bru mar
7a8(dkon brtsegs): gyis gtor na me'i phung po de bas ches che bar 'bar te/ de'i steng ngam drung gi 'khor du 'gro ba ni dka'o// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal rigs
7b1(dkon brtsegs): spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka'o// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste/ dben na glang po che mche ba can kha gdangs pa'i so phrag tu 'gro ba ni
7b2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dka'o// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams kyang mgu bar dka'o// de skad ces smras pa dang /
7b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa 'tshar ka la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ni de lta yin med kyi/ 'on kyang khyod ni dge slong 'char ka
7b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya ba nas so// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs shing bzhed pa yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po/
7b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byed par dgongs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
7b6(dkon brtsegs): 'char ka ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byed do// zhes dgongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsan
7b7(dkon brtsegs): ma dad par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni yang nangs dad par bya'o// yang na khyod kyis dad par bya'o// 'char ka nga'i nyan thos ci snyed cig
7b8(dkon brtsegs): yod pa de dag gi nang na khyod ni 'di lta ste/ rigs dad par byed pa'i mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la tshigs su bcad de bka'
8a1(dkon brtsegs): @stsal pa// 'char ka bzang po nga la mnyan par byos// khyod ni rigs dang byed mchog rab yin gyis// shig kya'i rigs rnams dga' ba skyed pa'i/
8a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i dam pa myur du dad par byos// rgyal po'i rab de dad par byas na ni// rigs su lha dag dang ni mi rnams la// mtha' dpung med pa'i legs pa 'byung 'gyur gyis//
8a3(dkon brtsegs): mi'i dam pa myur du dad par byos// da lta na ni shag kya'i bdag po de// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rtog pas bkrugs shing nyams// ri'i ngos nas dbab 'dril mi bzhin du// brtson
8a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus rtsol ba thams cad btang ste gnas// dbang phyug nyams pa rjes su dran byed pas// yid la gnod 'gyur sems dang yid kyang stor// dper na tshong pa nor dang bral ba
8a5(dkon brtsegs): dag/ rjes su dran zhing nyon mongs gnas pa bzhin// lha'i gnas nas lha dag shi 'phos shing // lha rdzas 'dod pa lha rdzas dran pa bzhin// rgyal ba'i bstan pa mngon par
8a6(dkon brtsegs): mi shes shing // rgyal po bde nyams snying rjes smre sngags 'don// nga'i rin po che ni sna bdun dang // mi'i phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po dang // longs spyod dag ni
8a7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran byed cing // sa bdag de ni snying rjes smre sngags 'don// mdangs 'brog byed po'i srin po stobs can gyis// ci ltar mi zhig yongs su non 'gyur na/
8a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang mi shes gzhan yang mi shes ltar// so'i bdag po de yang de bzhin no// ti tse'i gangs kyi ri bos bsgribs gyur na// ci ltar mi dag blta bya mi mthong ba/
8b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos bsgrib pas na// rgyal pos blta bar bya ba mi mthong ngo // gnyid kyis log gam shi bas myos 'gyur ba'i// mis ni rang gi
8b2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang mi shes te// de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas// rgyal po des kyang dge ba mi shes so// dper na khyim thabs shi bas myos pa
8b3(dkon brtsegs): yi// bud med snying rjer smre sngags 'don byed pa// de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas// rgyal po de yang snying rjer smre sngags 'don// de lta bas
8b4(dkon brtsegs): na 'char ka thabs mkhas pa// khyod kyis 'dir ni rgyal po dad par gyis// nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyal bar byos// chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa
8b5(dkon brtsegs): bslang bar gyis// 'char ka khyod ma gtogs par srid pa'i// 'gro ba dag na skal 'thun spyad med pas// rgyal po'i sems ni rab du dang bya bar/
8b6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis nus pa'i dge slong gang yang med// 'char ka sngon gyis dus na byung ba ni// 'das pa'i dus na sa'i bdag po zhig/ ming ni bden pa 'phel zhes
8b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ste// sa skyong byed par rnam par grags pa 'byung // don chos kyis rgyal po chos dang ldan// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis
8b8(dkon brtsegs): mchod// rgya mtsho'i tha mar thug pa'i sa 'di ni// chos dang ldan pa rgyal po des kyang bskyangs// grong dang grong khyer dag kyang mdapa nye zhing /
9a1(dkon brtsegs): du/ bza' zhing 'bras bu me tog rgyas pas gang // 'phags pa'i skye bo dag kyang shed las skyes/
9a2(dkon brtsegs): sdig dang bral ba rnams kyis rab tu gang // dri za brgya mang dag gis gang ba ste// sdong dum tsher ma rtsa shing ngan pa med// 'jam zhing dge sbyong gnas
9a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshogs kyis spras// chu klung 'bab stegs bde bas rab tu brgyan// drang srong tshegs brgya rjes su rgyu ba ste// skye bo'i dkar chos rnams kyis
9a4(dkon brtsegs): kun tu bsgrubs// ngan song lam ngan rnams ni rab tu gcad// de nas sems can thams cad lha gnas gdeng // rgyal po de la bu dag yod pa ni/
9a5(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba mthong ba ste// dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ni bskyed pa can// yon tan mang pos bsgos pa'i blo gros ldan// ming ni blo gros snying po
9a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod// 'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta ba can// mi bdag khyim na gnas kyang dben
9a7(dkon brtsegs): la dga'/ rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba des/ lnga'i pho brang 'dra ba'i khyim mchog 'dir/ na chung tshogs kyis kun nas mdun
9a8(dkon brtsegs): bdar te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan bzang la spyod ces smras// bu yi dpa pa spyod la nga yis ni// ci ltar 'dod pa'i bya ba gang ma byas// 'dod pa
9b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la khyod yid ci'i phyir// ma mos ngal bu khyod myur du spros// srid pa'i 'gro ba'i yon tan mkhas byis te/ bu khyod rin chen khyim la dga' ba skyed/
9b2(dkon brtsegs): bud med rin chen 'khor dang 'grogs skyes ste// yul na dga' zhing mos pa bskyed par gyis// dka' thub nags na 'khod pa'i drang srong dag/ de btang
9b3(dkon brtsegs): nas ni phyir yang 'di dag na// dka' thub btang zhing 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod// 'dod pa de dag bu cig khyod la bstabs// de lta bas na 'dod pa'i
9b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' la spyod// nga dang rgyal srid thams cad khyod dang 'thun// rnam thos bu'i gnas dang 'dra ba'i// gzhal med khang gis rgyan can khyim 'dir spyod/
9b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag rnams kyang mchog gis gzugs ldan zhing // lha mo 'dra la sgyu rtsal tshar phyin pa/ rol mo'i sgra'i tshul dang glu la mkhas// bsnyen bkur
9b6(dkon brtsegs): sems shing yon tan yid kyang 'phrog mig ni pad ma'i lo ma 'dra ba ste// bim pa'i mdog 'dra mchu mdzes yid du 'ong // so dang bzhin mdog
9b7(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med cing bzang // dpral ba'i smin ma legs shing mgul pa sdug/ brla ni glang po che'i sna yang 'dra// phrag so'i sha rgyas thal gong legs par
9b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan// lag dang rkang pa'i mthil ni zangs kyi mdog/ ser mo byin gyis phra bar legs dang ldan// lce ni zang mdog 'dral srab cing dag tshig ran
10a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam par smra ba'i tshul dang ldan// so ni thags bzangs so rnams rang rong med// mthe ba rab dkar mchog gi
10a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyan dang ldan// lto ba phyang nger 'dag cing lte ba sdug/ sta zur yangs shing rked pa rdo rje 'dra// byin pa glang po che'i so 'dra zhing // mda' rgyu snying pos legs par
10a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa bzhin// drags byed glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros dang ldan// gzhan du mi sems yid kyis khyod la lta// rtse ba 'dod cing dar la bab dang ldan// gzhon
10a4(dkon brtsegs): snying rje ltos la rtse ba byos// bu cig khyod dang bud med 'di dag gi/ mdog bzang ba dang dar la bab pa yang // shing gi rtse mo'i me tog bzhin ltung gis// nga rgyal
10a5(dkon brtsegs): zong la 'dod pa bsten par gyis// blo gros snying po ldan des smra ba yi// pa dang 'khor rnams kun la 'di skad smras// yab cig khyod ni mang por gsung ba lag/
10a6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag tshig gis grags pa ma smad mang // yon tan rnams la mos pa bdag gi tshig/ bsams te gtan la bab pa rgyal po gson// ci ltar rmi lam na yang 'dod
10a7(dkon brtsegs): la bdag/ sems mi dga' zhing ma mos de 'dra gson// sa'i bdag pos bka' stsal 'di dag ni// mkhas pa rnams la mdzes pa ma lags te// mi mkhas
10b1(dkon brtsegs): skye bo dag gis yang dag bsams// mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag rtag tu smad// long ba ma lags ci'i rgyu zhig gis// long ba'i tshig gis lam 'gol 'dzin par
10b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyid// thang la gnas pa su zhig ci ltar na// mgon med chus khyer ba la 'dod pa skyed// grol ba ci lta bur na bcings pa yi// tshig gis btson ra der ni 'jug
10b3(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid// sa mnyam gnas shing ma 'khrul ci ltar na// nyam dang gnas la 'dod pa bskyed par bgyid// sa bdag 'dod pa rnams la chags bcas shing /
10b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag ni chus khyer ba// longs pa chus khyer btson rar gnas pa dang // nyam ngar gnas 'drar ba dag ni de snyam bgyid// mi'i bdag po khyod
10b5(dkon brtsegs): ni long ba bzhin// bdag ni mig can khyad par mthong ba lags// khyod ni 'dod pa'i chu bos khyer ba lags// bdag ni 'dod pa rnams la rnam par smod// 'dod pa
10b6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni drag gi lo ma bzhin// sbrul gyi mgo 'dra sdug bsngal bgyid pa ste// rtse gsum pa dang ral gyi mdung thung 'dra// me'i phung po shin tu 'bar ba bzhin// blo gros
10b7(dkon brtsegs): snying po ldan pas de skad du// smre sngags 'don pa'i pha dang 'khor la smras// rin chen sna bdun dag la ma bltas par// rgyal srid rnam par spangs te rab tu byung // sbrul gyi
11a1(dkon brtsegs): pags snying rjes pa ci 'dra dang // ngar snabs sbas pa'i thal ba bzhin spangs te// blo gros snying po ldan pa chags med par// sdig dang
11a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par bral te rab tu byung // gzho nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas// blon po'i bu zhig rjes su rab tu byung ba// ming ni zla bas byin zhes bya ba ste// blo gros snying po'i rjes su
11a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung // gzhoni de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po bskyed nas ni// grogs dang bcas pas mngon par shes pa lnga// ma lus mtha' dag
11a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par byas par 'gyur// 'dod pa rnams la skyon tu lta bas na// mi'i seng ge de ni 'dod khams 'das// tshad pa yang dag nyid ni thob bya'i phyir// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo
11a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bskor ba byas// de ltar gzhon rab tu byung bas na// pha de bu la ma dad gyur pa dang // zla bas byin pa de'i gan song nas// legs par bshad pa'i tshig gis dga'
11a6(dkon brtsegs): bar byas// 'char ka khyod ni de la tsi snyam sems// de tshe blo gros snying po gzhan snyam 'am// nga nyid de'i tshe na der gyur te// 'dod pa'i longs spyod don du gnyer ba med/
11a7(dkon brtsegs): 'char ka khyod ni de la ci snyam sems// bden pa 'phel ba gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am// mi bdag zas gtsang 'di nyid de'i tshe// rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya bar gyur//
11a8(dkon brtsegs): 'char ka khyod ni de la ci snyam sems// rjes su rab byung zlas byin gzhan snyam 'am// khyod nyid de/ tshe de'i dus na ni// bden pa 'phel dang bar byed pa yin// de lta bas na 'char
11b1(dkon brtsegs): ka khyod kyis 'dir// rgyal po zas gtsang dad pa mngon skyes cig gas skyong byed pa 'di ni dad gyur na// skyid pa chen po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
11b2(dkon brtsegs): 'char kas bcom ldan 'das la mi smra bas khas blangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zhag de 'das nas snga dro dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs lhung bzed thogs te
11b3(dkon brtsegs): ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mdun na shag kya stong tsam zhig dgongs pa zhig gis ched du 'dus shing 'khod
11b4(dkon brtsegs): do// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su byon te ser skya'i gnas 'di nyid na shing na gro ta'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhags so zhes thos nas de 'di
11b5(dkon brtsegs): snyam sems te// gzhon rab tu byung nas bdag ni dbang phyug gi longs spyod chen po las nyams par byas so// gal te gzhon de khyim na gnas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po
11b6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa// chos kyi rgyal po chen po'i rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor
11b7(dkon brtsegs): lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che ste 'di bdun no// de la
11b8(dkon brtsegs): bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa dang / yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'jom pa stong yang tshang bar gyur pa zhig/ des gling chen po
12a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang chad pa med cing mtshon gyis 'da' ba med pa/ mnyam ste mi mnyam pa med cing chos dang
12a2(dkon brtsegs): 'thun pas logs par phab nas bskal pa rdzogs par bskyangs par 'gyur ba zhig ste/ de ltar gyur na bdag cag kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang phyug
12a3(dkon brtsegs): gi dbang dang ldan zhing / rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / sti stang du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa dang / dbang phyug gi dbang chen po yang snyed par
12a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba zhig na/ de ltar bdag cag ni gzho nu de rab tu byung bas de lta bu'i longs spyod kyi dbang chen po dang bral bar gyur to snyam mo// des de snyam du bsams nas shag kya
12a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bsgo ba/ nga'i bu de la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur byed par su yang ma 'gro shig/ la la zhig nga'i bu de blta ba 'am bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro na de'i lus la
12a6(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa'i chad pas bcad do// de'i tshe shag kya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nas byung nas song bar gyur te/ shag kya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis tshe dang ldan pa
12a7(dkon brtsegs): 'char ka rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur sbyin
12a8(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun ring po zhig na byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/
12b1(dkon brtsegs): bde bar bzhags sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms
12b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'o ma brgya la tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shag kya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin la 'di skad ces smras so// dga' ba'i bzhin de bzhin te/
12b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la snyan mi mnga'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhugs so// mi bde ba mi mnga'o// de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba
12b4(dkon brtsegs): med do// bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal med do// shag kya'i bu shin tu legs par sad kyis kyang shag kya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan cig dben pa na
12b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khod pa mthong nas/ 'khor de nas byung ste tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/
12b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig na byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan
12b7(dkon brtsegs): nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/
12b8(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shag kya'i bu shin tu legs par sad
13a1(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so// shin tu legs par sang de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhugs so//
13a2(dkon brtsegs): mi bde ba mi mnga'o// de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do// shag kya'i bu mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral gyis
13a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang / shag kya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin dang // shag kya'i bu shin tu legs par sang gnas dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la
13a4(dkon brtsegs): ba der song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka
13a5(dkon brtsegs): yun kyang ring zhig na byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga
13a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu me mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas
13a7(dkon brtsegs): shag kya'i bu mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral la 'di skad ces smras so// mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhugs so// mi
13a8(dkon brtsegs): bde bar mi mnga'o// de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
13b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par byed do// de skad ces smras pa dang / shag kya'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan
13b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa 'char ka bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bskur bya bar 'dod na bdag cag gis de ltar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir
13b3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas nga'i bu la blta ba 'am bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir su yang ma 'gro shig/ la la zhig gis de la blta ba'am bsnyen bskar bya ba'i phyir song na lus la
13b4(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa'i chad pas gcad do zhes bka' stsal to// de bas na 'phags pa 'char ka de ltar bdag cag rgyal pos 'jigs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bskur byed
13b5(dkon brtsegs): du 'dong bar mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di ni shin tu yang nga rgyal gyis non par gyur na ci ltar bdag gis de'i drang du
13b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar bya snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams so// 'on tam bdag gis nam mkha' la rdzu 'phral gyis shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags la steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas
13b7(dkon brtsegs): te rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la snyam par bzhag ste/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa des nam
13b8(dkon brtsegs): mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas bar snang la dkyil mo dkrung bcas te rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ngo // rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka/
14a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyang ring po nas nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags te rdzu 'phrul gyis bar snang la dkyil mo dkrung bcas shing 'ong ba mthong nas/ de la thal mo
14a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyar te tshigs su bcad nas smras pa/ tshon sbyar gos can khyod ni gang nas 'ongs// khyod la ci dgos myur du smra bar byos// khyod la gang dgos de yang myur du sbyin// brtul zhugs
14a3(dkon brtsegs): grub pa mthong bar shin tu dka'// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad de sbyar smras pa// rgyal po bdag ni khyod kyi sras kyi bu/
14a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag la chos dgos rgyal po gang na bzhugs// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos skyel te// bde bar gshegs pa skyob pa'i bshos bkur ro// yul 'khor bdag po
14a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dpal mnga' ba// khyod la mi mchog sras mnga' legs pa'i rnams// gzi brjid kyis ni phyogs nas kun tu 'bar// ston gyi nyi ma gung gi 'od dang 'dra// ci ltar sprin med
14a6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha'i nyi ma ni// phyogs rnams kun tu 'od byed mngon par 'bar// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// ye shes mnga' bas phyogs rnams kun tu snang // ci ltar ston
14a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi nyi ma shar ba na// srin bu me khyer zil gyis mnan cing snang // de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyisras// mu stegs gzhan rnams kun bcom lam mer bzhugs// ci ltar nyims
14a8(dkon brtsegs): zil gnon skar ma rnams// nyin par 'od stong lam mer mi rung ba// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod sras kyi// zil gyis mnan pas mu stegs gzhan mi snang // ji ltar nyi ma'i zil
14b1(dkon brtsegs): non zla ba ni// nam mkha'i dbyings na 'od stong nyin mi snang // de bzhin khyod sras zil mnan mu stegs rnams// nyi ma'i zil non zla bzhin gsal ba med// seng geng ro thos na phra mo
14b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams// shugs kyis rmongs nas bsam pa ci bzhin du// ri sul gseb tu byer nas 'khra zhing gnas// stag gi nga ro gzhan gyis bzod par dka'// de bzhin rgyal ba drang srong
14b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i gsung // bdag med nga ro mu stegs gzhan thos na// shes rab dman pa srid pa'i rtser phyin kyang // gsung thos pas ni thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i
14b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten long ba la// spyan dang ldan pa des ni mig kyang btsal// snang ba mdzad cing rdul kyang rnam par sbyangs// ye shes snang ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon par shar// bde dang mi bde'i
14b5(dkon brtsegs): lam gnyis rab tu bstan// lam dang 'gol ba'i lam yang rgyal bas bstan// lam stor skye bo rnams ni lam du btsud// 'dam du bying ba rnams kyang thang la bton// ji ltar skom
14b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sa la sprin gyis ni// sgang dang gshong bcas char gyis ngoms par byed// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// 'gro ba lhar bcas chos kyis ngoms par mdzad// ji ltar char
14b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis ngoms pa'i ri lung nags// rtsa dang gel ba nag tshal shing rnams dang // 'khri shing sdong po sman gyi rnam pa dang // me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis sa mdzes pa// de bzhin stobs
14b8(dkon brtsegs): bcu mi 'jigs mnga' ba dang // ma 'dres bcwo brgyad chos mnga'i sdong po la// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes me tog dang // 'bras bus spras pas rgyal po'i sras mdzes so//
15a1(dkon brtsegs): ci ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na lhun po'i ri// lha'i gnas gyur mi skul rnam par mdzes// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// dge sbyong rgya mtsho'i nang na rnam pa
15a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzes// bde stsogs khyim zab brgya byin lha dbang po// lha'i stan la 'dug pa mdzes pa ltar// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes//
15a3(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i stobs can zab mo 'brug bsgrags te// thugs rje chen po'i glog 'phreng rir ldan pas// dran pa nyer bzhag char rgyun 'bab 'khrig ste// rgyal ba klu mchog de ni chos char
15a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bebs// yongs dag dkyil 'khor tshul khrims rab kyi gzer// ting 'dzin nyon mongs lha min rab 'joms zhing // ye shes nyi zer srid pa'i sred pa skems// rgyal po'i nyi chen 'gro ba
15a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mdzes// ting nge 'dzin dang tshul khrims gzings dang grwa chen te// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nor bu rin chen tshogs// byang chub yan lag rin cen 'byung gnas bsam gtan rlabs//
15a6(dkon brtsegs): bar pa 'dod pas sangs rgyas rgya mtsho bsten par bya// tshul khrims rnam dag rtsa ba brtan par zug/ ting 'dzin lo ma dran pa yal ga 'dab// byang chub yan lag me tog stong pa'i sdong /
15a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag med grib ldan rgyal ba'i sdong po sten// tshul khrims nags mtha' sten pa'i stobs chen po// ting 'dzin zhi ba'i ri khrod phug na gnas// stong pa mtshan med smon med spyod yul
15a8(dkon brtsegs): can// rgyal ba stobs can seng ge khyod kyi sras// thub pa mi gnas gnas ni rnam par ston// rgyal ba khyu mchog brjid pa'i stabs bzhud pas// byis pa so so'i mu stegs gzhan/
15b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngags te// khyod kyi sras ni khyu mchog sgra yang 'byin// tshul khrims gter dang yon tan dbyig gis brgyan// bsam gtan dang ba'i zhi gnas nye bar bskyabs// ye shes kyis bsrung
15b2(dkon brtsegs): thar pa'i spyod yul can// rgyal ba mchong dpon gtso bo nor gtong mdzad// dge ba yongs su gzung bas sdig bcom ste// nyon mongs zhi mdzad dge sten bka' stsol pas// lha dang lha min/
15b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog rnam par mdzes// tshul khrims mchog sprin blo gros glog 'byin cing // yan lag brgyad lam char chen rlan gyis srengs// thub pa
15b4(dkon brtsegs): bces pa'i lo tog 'bras bu stsol// khyod kyi sras ni klu chen 'brug sgra sgrog/ rgyal pos smras pa/ zang zag mchog de bde bar 'ongs sam ci// bsod snyoms rgyu bas 'dren pa ma ngal laM/
15b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i lus la ngal bas dub med dam// zang nas ud pa la bzhin ma rnyis saM// 'char kas smras pa/ rdzu 'phrul stobs mnga' bsam gtan spyod yul can// dgyes shing bde bas yan
15b6(dkon brtsegs): lag yongs rgyas te// thub pa zhi ba'i snyoms 'jug gnas bus pas// gser gyi pad ma lta bur rgyal mi rnyis// rgyas pos smras pa/ sngan chad rdza rnga rnga bran sgras skal zhing // gling bu'i
15b7(dkon brtsegs): sgra snyan nga ros bskal byas te// bud med bA'i dbyangs kyis bslang slang na// da ltar sad na sdug bsngal mi myong ngam/ 'char kas smras pa/ bsam gtan dgongs pas ting 'dzin zhi
15b8(dkon brtsegs): yul can// ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'i tshul la mkhas pa ste// mnal tam bzhengs sam bzhud dam bzhugs pa na// sdug bsngal mi mnga' rgyal ba rtag tu dgyes// rgyal pos smras pa/
16a1(dkon brtsegs): che ba'i rkyen 'os mal mchog bshams pa la// me mar sdong pos kun nas mtha' bskor te// bud med tshogs kyis bskor cing nyal nyal na// da ltar mun par
16a2(dkon brtsegs): nyal na cis mi rmongs// 'char kas smras pa/ thub chen 'phags pa gzims mal gzims pa ni// byams pa'i gdan bting thugs rjes bde bar bzhengs// dga' ba'i gan
16a3(dkon brtsegs): bas dgyes dang ldan pas na// srid rgyud btang snyoms can la rmongs mi mnga'// rgyal pos smras pa/ shag kyang dpa' bos de rtag mdun du bdar// bstan chos mkhas dang rtse
16a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing dga' byas te// gzhal med khang 'di'i khyim du dga' byas na// nga'i bu de nags mthar ci ltar dga'// 'char kas smras pa/ chos kyis byung bzhi sems ldan rnams kyis/
16a5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i thugs mnga' de rtag mdun du bdar// zhi ba'i dgon par zhi ba sten mdzad pas// ston pa 'jigs bral de ni der dgyes so// rgyal pos smras pa/ sngan chad gzhon khyim na gnas pa'i
16a6(dkon brtsegs): che// yan lag spos kyi 'bru mar zhim byugs te// rgyal po'i rkyen tu 'os pas khrus byas na// nags kyi mtha' na thub pa su yis bkru/ 'char kas smras pa/ khrims gtsang 'bab stegs
16a7(dkon brtsegs): chos chu rdzing bu ste// thub pa des bkrus gzhan yang bkru ba mdzad// sku la mi gsher sras dang bcas su 'bog/ rang yang rgyal la skye bo phal chen sgrol// rgyal pos smras pa// gser
16a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi skad pa nor bu'i 'phreng bas brgyan// rgyal po'i rkyen 'os gos mchog bzang gyon gyon// tsan dan zhim pos shing 'dab legs par bris// nags chen de bsab thub pa su yis brgyan//
16b1(dkon brtsegs): 'char kas smras pa// tshul khrims spongs phyugs yon tan 'phreng bas brgyan// khrel yod na bza' ting 'dzin bsam gtan brgyan// mngon shes rig pa rnams thar brgyan pa'i sku//
16b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam grol gzi mnga' thub pa nags na mdzes// rgyal pos smras pa// rtse gnyis mtshon dang ral gyi mtshon thogs pa'i// dpa' bo g.yul du mos pas lus bsrangs te// bla re gdugs kyis
16b3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu dga' dgab pa// gcig pu nags na 'dug pa su yis bsrungs// 'char kas smras pa// byams pa'i stobs kyis thub pa yongs bsrungs te// de dpung ye shes nyan thos zham ring
16b4(dkon brtsegs): g.yog/ yon tan tshogs la nges pas 'jigs mi mnga'// stobs bcu dgyes pa mnga' zhing mi 'jigs brnyes// rgyal pos smras pa// nga'i bu'i yon tan khyod kyis smras// chos legs
16b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod cing du ba med brjod pa thos// khyod kyang zan zo bsod snyoms bkur bar gyis// bdag kyang mi yi dbang po ltar 'gro'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas
16b6(dkon brtsegs): gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de ni tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog/ dge sbyong gi tshogs yongs su sdud pa/ drang srong chen po ste/ dge sbyong gi tshe ga
16b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang na bzhugs na/ dge sbyong gi rgyal po lham me lhan ne ljang nge'o// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba yar gyis chos bco lnga la zla ba nya ste yongs su rgyas pa'i tshe/ skar ma'i tshogs kyis
16b8(dkon brtsegs): kun nas bskor ba ni lham mo lhan ne lhang nge ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang du bzhugs na/ lham me ldan ne lhang nge'o// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma ni/
17a1(dkon brtsegs): ston gyi dus na shin tu lham me ldan ni lhang nga'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi dbus na bzhugs na shin tu lham me ldan ne ljang ngo'o//
17a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang na 'dug pa ni lham me ldan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o//
17a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ni chos bzang lha'i 'dun sa na gnas na lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na
17a4(dkon brtsegs): lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na lha'i bu rab 'bab 'bral dang / lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang / lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' byed dang / lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang
17a5(dkon brtsegs): byed lha'i tshogs kyi nang na gnas na lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na mi
17a6(dkon brtsegs): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong gis bskor na lham me lhan ne lhang de'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lham me
17a7(dkon brtsegs): lhan ne lhang nge'o// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan de lta bu brjod pa 'di thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos su
17a8(dkon brtsegs): zad na 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che la 'di ltar dbang che bar grags na/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma bcas pa nyid kyi tshe/ sa chen po 'di rnams pa drag tu g.yos/ rab tu
17b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ 'ur bur/ rab tu 'ur bur/
17b2(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rab tu 'ur bur/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs shing snang ba dpag tu med pa byung ba lta ci smos/ btsas ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten par sa la gom pa
17b3(dkon brtsegs): bdun bor ba dang / steng gi bar snang las chu'i rgyun drang dro rnam pa gnyis byang ste de gnyis kyis khrus byas pa dang // de'i lha'i khri bzang po dbus gser las byas pa byung ba dang /
17b4(dkon brtsegs): steng gi bar snang las lha'i gdugs rnga yab dang bcas pa byung ba lta 'ang ci smos/ btsas ma thag tu lha thams cad phyag 'tshal bar gyur pa gang gi tshe btsas nas gang gi tshe mngon
17b5(dkon brtsegs): par byung ba de'i bar du nam yang 'khrul med pa rtag tu dam bcas pa la brten pa/ ci skad smras pa de ltar byed pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par brtson 'grus brtan pa/ yang dag pa
17b6(dkon brtsegs): smra ba/ slu ba med pa lta ci smos/ gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rgal te bsgral bar bya'o zhes smras pa lta ci
17b7(dkon brtsegs): smos snyam ste/ des de ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'ar gyur pa'i dam bcas pa de dran nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// blo mchog ldan pa gang zhing
17b8(dkon brtsegs): bstan ma thag nor ba med pa'i gsung ni brjod mdzad de// gang zhig la ni bden pa'i gsung mnga' ba// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig bsdam par gyur ma
18a1(dkon brtsegs): zag nyid du// 'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur bar bya'o zhes// mgon pos mnyam pa med pa'i gsung brjod pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// su zhi ba
18a2(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam rmi ba'i dus na yang // brdzun gyi tshig ni nam yang ma gsungs te// ci skad gsungs pa de ltar mdzad mdzad pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// gser gyi phung po
18a3(dkon brtsegs): gangs kyi ri mnyam pa yis// gang zhig chags par bya bar mi nus shing // gang zhig chags las rnam par 'das gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// mtshon rnon 'dra
18a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ngag rtsub tshig rnams kyis// gang zhig khro bar bya bar ma nus shing // zhe sdang dngos po las ni rab 'das pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// chags par 'gyur dang zhe sdang
18a5(dkon brtsegs): rmongs 'gyur bas// gang zhig thul bar nus par ma gyur te// shes rab rgyal po dang ni ldan 'gyur ba// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// 'dod pa'i dga' dang bde rnams du
18a6(dkon brtsegs): ma dang // longs spyod dag la rten pa'i rnam pa yis// gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// rmad du byung ba rnams pa brgyad dag gis/
18a7(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar 'dzin gzhug nam yang ma nus te// dpal sdug ldan zhing rtag tu mi ngam pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// mkhas pa bdag gis brjod pa'i tshig san pa/
18a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i tshig gis kyang // gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa// de la mkhas sa su zhig yid mi ches// don gyi tshul la brtson dang ldan pa dang // chos dang 'dod la
18b1(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i tshig rnams kyis// gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// dri ma med stobs mtha' yas ldan gyur pa// gang zhig grong khyer mchog
18b2(dkon brtsegs): nas 'byung ba'i tshe// dpung rnams kyis ni thub par ma gyur pa// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// byang chub dam pa mngon pa bzhed pa'i phyir// gang zhig 'dod pa'i bde ba spang
18b3(dkon brtsegs): nas su// 'chi med rgyu phyir ri dgas spyod mdzad pa// de'i gsungs la su zhig yid mi ches// byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir// zhan pa ma yin sems can gang
18b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig gis// lo drag bar du dka' thub drag sprad pa// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// 'jig rten la ni phan dang bde ba'i phyir// byang chub dam pa don du gnyer ba na// lo drug
18b5(dkon brtsegs): lon pa'i mtha' mar tshod khu gsol// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang la lo drug bar du bdud kyis ni// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brangs te glags btsal kyang // de la blags
18b6(dkon brtsegs): ni rnyed par ma gyur pa// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang bral gyur cing // su la cung zad tsam yang mi spong la// 'jig rten dag gi don ni mdzad
18b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig gzhan las gsan pa ma mdzad par// rtogs par dka' ba rab tu zhi ba'i// byang chub bla med mngon rdzogs sangs
18b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig tshangs pa nyid kyis gsol btab pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshig bsan te// nyid kyis chos ni rab tu bshad
19a1(dkon brtsegs): pa na// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig bdag la thugs brtse don gyi phyir// shag kya'i grong khyer khyim du byon 'gyur te// shag kya'i tshogs
19a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams grol bar mdzad pa na// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// rgal bar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das gang gis// sngon gyi thugs dam bcas pa dgongs mdzad de// bdag cag
19a3(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i rgyu las sgrol mdzad na// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// de dus dbab de ltar dus mkhyen pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus mkhyen te// 'dren pa dus gsum
19a4(dkon brtsegs): thugs brtse mdzad pa po// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// mi yi 'dren pa yi ni sku mchog la// blta ba'i don du bdag ni 'gro bya zhes// rgyal po des ni rang gis sems kyis su/
19a5(dkon brtsegs): de snyam du ni rjes su bsam pa byas// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas de ltar ring zhig tu rjes su bsams nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa// dge slong khyod la ci zhig dgos//
19a6(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa// rgyal po khyod kyi don tu bsams byas te// khyod nyid dad par bya phyir
19a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'dir 'ongs// stobs bcu mnga' la dad pa'i sems bskyed na// skyes pa bud med rnams kyang mtho ris 'dong // stobs bcu mnga' zhing yon tan tshad med ldan// drang srong chen
19a8(dkon brtsegs): po shag kya dga' mdzad pa// 'dir byon rgyal po thugs dang skyed cig dang // khyod kyi grags pa tshad med 'jig rten 'byung // khyod kyi sras ni mi dbang dam pa ste// stobs bcu thugs
19b1(dkon brtsegs): rje thugs brtse che mnga' ba// chu khrod pad ma zhi bzhin chags med par// stobs bcu chags med thugs mnga' spyod pa mdzad// srid pa'i chu bo bzhi las rgal gyur nas// 'gro ba
19b2(dkon brtsegs): mang po chu bo che las sgrol// rkang gnyis gtso bo mi 'jigs thang 'don gyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// srid pa'i zug rngu bzhi po kun bton te// sman pa'i gtso bo skye
19b3(dkon brtsegs): dgu'i zug rngu 'byin// gsob byed pa mkhas pa dam pa'i mchog/ 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// bdud kyi sde chen dpag med pam mdzad de// nag po'i phyogs rnams
19b4(dkon brtsegs): sder bcas yongs mnan nas// mchog tu zhi ba'i byang chub brnyes gyur gyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// 'gro ba dgrol zhing chos kyang bstan pa dang // 'chi med
19b5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba mi la bshad gsol zhes// mi dbang la ni lha dbang gsol 'debs kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs rnams zil mnan te//
19b6(dkon brtsegs): ston pa dpag yas 'khor lo rab bskor nas// sems can bye ba tshad med 'dul mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// rnam dag spyan mnga' de ni 'gro ba dag/
19b7(dkon brtsegs): mun pa rab rib stug pos bsgrib pa yi// mig sbyong rab rib sel cing gsal mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// rga dang 'tsho ba'i 'jigs pas nye
19b8(dkon brtsegs): mongs la// rga shi med mchog mi la ston mdzad cing // 'chi med gnas su sems can 'don mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad paskyed// me chen gsum gyis
20a1(dkon brtsegs): bsregs pa'i 'jig rten 'di// mes tshig sa la sprin chen char ba bzhin// bzhi gnyis dam pa'i sprin gyis char 'bebs kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog
20a2(dkon brtsegs): la ni dad pa skyed// dri gsum dri ma spangs shing skyon bsal te// dri ma gsum las skye bo 'grol mdzad cing // stobs bcu rnam par snang ba spyod mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la
20a3(dkon brtsegs): ni dad pa skyed// skye dag kun la pa bzhin thugs brtse bas// stobs bcu thugs rje mnga' ba byams par dgongs// thugs rje thugs brtses sems can 'grel mdzad kyis// 'dren pa
20a4(dkon brtsegs): mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// bcom ldan de ni ma dul sems can 'dul// thugs rje mnga' ba ma zhi zhi mdzad cing // rgod pa rnams kyang nyon mongs zhi mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la
20a5(dkon brtsegs): ni dad pa skyed// skye bo rnams kyi srid pa'i rgya mtsho skems// rgya mtsho la ni lha'i bus ci lta ba// stobs bcu thugs rje che mnga' sgrol mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/
20a6(dkon brtsegs): tshad med yon tan tshegs kyis mdzes gyur pa// thugs rje chen po dang ba'i thugs kyis spyod// yun ring 'khrugs pa'i skye bo dad mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/
20a7(dkon brtsegs): nor bu rin chen chu 'dang byed pa bzhin// rgyal ba skye bo 'dang bar spyod mdzad cing // mi'i mtha' rnyog rab tu 'dang mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// nor bu rin chen
20a8(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin yongs dag pa// mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongs su skyed// rgyal ba de bzhin skyon bsal dag pa'i thugs// mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongs su skyed// 'jig
20b1(dkon brtsegs): rten gtso bo de la dad pa thob gyur na// mi dang lha dang sdug bsngal khur yang 'dor// srid pa'i rgyud spangs zhi ba mchog tu 'dod// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// bdag gis
20b2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan phyogs gcig brjed pa ni// nam mkha'i dbyings la mkha' lding rjes bzhin te// bdag ni rgyal ba'i yon tan mthar byin min// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/
20b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka las legs par bshad pa yang thos// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i yon tan de lta bu yang nyid kyis
20b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon tu mthong // sngon bdag rgal nas skyes bu khyu mchog khyod kyang bsgral bar bgyi'o// zhes dam bcas pa yang rjes su dran nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la dad pa thob par
20b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// de ltar dad pa thob pa'i sems kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong khyod ni nga'i bu'i chos las skyes pa'i bu yin na/ khyod bdag zan zos la
20b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bshos khyer te/ song shig/ nga yang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir phyi bzhin 'ong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma
20b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dad par byas nas zan zos te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer nas song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po
20b8(dkon brtsegs): zas btsang ma ni dge slong 'tshar kas dad par byas te deng skye bo bal po che'i don tu 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das kyis bshos khyer te bcom ldan
21a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das ga la ba der song nas bdag gis byas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la
21a2(dkon brtsegs): legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ 'char ka legs so legs so// de ring rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byas pas khyod kyis bsod nams mang du bskyed do// de'i tshe bcom ldan
21a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ring dge slong 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bskyed
21a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de la gal te gzugs yod na ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su yang bsod nams kyi phung po de mi shong ste// bsod
21a5(dkon brtsegs): nams kyi phung po de ni de tsam du dpag tu med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas phyag bcabs lhung bzed bkrus te mtshan ma'i rnam pa 'di lta bu mdzad do// mtshan ma'i
21a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa de mdzad pas rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing bdun du bdar nas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas
21a7(dkon brtsegs): lag pa bskum pa la brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis rgyal po chen po rnams thos kyi bu rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug
21a8(dkon brtsegs): par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogs su brten te steng gi bar snang la gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/
21b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yang dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing
21b2(dkon brtsegs): bdun du bdar nas/ snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs logs su brten
21b3(dkon brtsegs): te steng gi bar snang la dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes
21b4(dkon brtsegs): po yang grul bum bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das
21b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lho phyogs logs su brten te steng gi bar snang la grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mi sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge
21b6(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang yang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du
21b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas nub phyogs logs su brten te steng gi bar snang la klu'i tshogs
21b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba
22a1(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du steng gi bar snang la thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong /
22a2(dkon brtsegs): gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// de bzhin du lha'i dbang po rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i dbang po gzhan 'phrul
22a3(dkon brtsegs): da bang byed dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i rgyal po 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang gnas
22a4(dkon brtsegs): gtsang ma'i lha'i ris nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ steng gi bar snang la
22a5(dkon brtsegs): re re zhing yang g.yog lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dag par gyur to// lha ma yin gyi dbang po zag
22a6(dkon brtsegs): zangs ris kyang lha ma yin bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang pa las bskum
22a7(dkon brtsegs): pa tsam gyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris lha ma yin gyi gnas nas mi ning bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
22a8(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs brgyad khri drug stong yang rang rang gi gnas nas
22b1(dkon brtsegs): mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la
22b2(dkon brtsegs): mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rgyal po'i khams tha dad pa nas lhags pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang 'dus par gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
22b3(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i dbyings dkyil du// ma lus rdzogs 'gyur zla ba nya ba yis// skar ma'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// nam mkha' zla ba bzhin du
22b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mdzes// zla ba dri med dkyil 'khor zhal mnga' ba// mun pa rab rib sel cing dri gsum 'jom// rtog ge can tshogs zil gyis mnan nas ni// mkha' la skar ma'i
22b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag po bzhin du mdzes// nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya'i lus 'dzin pa// ston gyi dus na mun sel rnam mdzes shing // lha min tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas su// nyi ma de ni pad ma'i
22b6(dkon brtsegs): kha yang 'byed// nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya 'dra'i sku mnga' bas// gsum po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni// mi'i nyi ma rnams par mdzes gyur cing // nyan thos pad ma'i tshal mchog kha
22b7(dkon brtsegs): yang 'byed// lha'i rgyal po dbang po brgya byin ni// mdun sar lha'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba// lha'i 'khor rnams zil gyi mnan nas ni// bde stsogs khyim thabs sbyin ldan
22b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mdzes// rkang gnyis dbang po dpal stug stobs bcu yang // dge sbyong tshogs kyis mdun bdar stong gsum na// rtog ge'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni/
23a1(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes// lha'i rgyal po 'bab bral dbang byed pa// 'bab bral bzang po lhas mchod btsun byas pa// 'thab bral
23a2(dkon brtsegs): bzang po lha tshogs nang zhugs te// 'thab bral rnams kyis nang na 'dug pa mdzes// gzi brjid mtha' yas stobs bcu mnga' ba yang // lam ngan ngan 'gror dong pa zil mnan nas/
23a3(dkon brtsegs): yan lag brgyad pa rab tu ston mdzad cing // stobs bcu yon tan rnams kyis rab tu mdzes// lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan de// dga' ldan gnas na lha'i tshegs kyis
23a4(dkon brtsegs): bskor// lha tshegs mang po zil gyis mnan nas ni// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rab tu mdzes// de bzhin lha dang lha min bla ma yang // lha mi lha min tshogs kyis bla mar byas// 'khor
23a5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni// skyes bu seng ge dam pa 'jig rten mdzes// lha'i dbang po bdag po rab 'phral ni// lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas su// rang gi bsod
23a6(dkon brtsegs): nams mthu'i sa lha gnas nas// gnas shing de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes// de bzhin nyon mongs rnams las rnam grol zhing // stobs bcu mnga' ba nyon mongs bral ba po//
23a7(dkon brtsegs): ma dul 'dul mdzad 'dul ba'i rgyal po yang // skye bo zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes// lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur byed pa ni// lhag nas 'dug cing lha tshogs zil mnan te/
23a8(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis// rnam par mdzes par gyur pa ji bzhin du// de ltar rgyal ba stobs bcu'i spyod pa dag/ sngon chad spyad pas lha mi zil mnan te/
23b1(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis// rgyal ba de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na ni tshangs pa yang // tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams rang gi zil mnan te/
23b2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu snyan pa yan lag brgyad ldan dag/ yongs su rjod pa byed cing mngon du mdzes// de ltar rgyal ba tshangs pa 'drar gyur pa// dge sbyong rgyal po dge sbyong tshogs rnams kyis//
23b3(dkon brtsegs): mdun du bdar te dben pa'i gtam gsung zhing // 'jig rten gsum po dag na mngon tu mdzes// nyan par 'dod pa lha dang mi rnams dang // lto 'phye chen po dag ni 'dus mkhyen
23b4(dkon brtsegs): nas// skyes bu khyu mchog yan lag brgyad ldan gyi// gsung rnams kyis ni rab tu ston pa mdzad// bya lam nam mkha' dpag par nus kyang srid// rgya mtsho bum pas gcal du
23b5(dkon brtsegs): rung yang srid// ri rab srang brgyar gcal du rung yang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' rtogs mi nus so// rgyal po mngon par dad par byas pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/
23b6(dkon brtsegs): dang po'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka song nas ring po ma lon par/ rgyal po zas gtsang mas shag kya rnams la bsgo ba/ grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na/
23b7(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma 'char ba'i snga ltas ni gang 'di dmar reng 'char ba'o// dmar rer shar na nyi ma 'char bar shes so// grogs po dag de bzhin du dge slong 'char ka yang bcom ldan 'das
23b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i snga ltas yin te/ dge slong 'char kas yon tan gang brjod pa de dag ni nges par thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yin no// grogs po dag de lta bas na
24a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhon pa'i mchog rnams stod de sta gon gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ring kho na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das mchog tu blta na sdug pa de blta
24a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'dong ngo // lha legs so zhes gsol nas shag kya rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma ltar nyan te/ theg pa'i mchog rnams myur du bstan to// de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang
24a3(dkon brtsegs): mas ser skya'i gnas dang // n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag thams cad rgyal po'i gshegs shul du mnyam par byed du bcug cing // bye ma gtsang ma 'dal du
24a4(dkon brtsegs): bcug ste// nyams dga' ba dang / me tog sil mas gang ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang phreng ba mang pos brgyan te/ skabs skabs su gar mkhan dang / glu mkhan dang /
24a5(dkon brtsegs): byad dang bum rnga thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang / rol mo dang / glu'i cha spyad dang / yo byad thams cad thogs pa dag bkod par gyur to// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma'
24a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhon pa'i mchog dang / chas pa rnams dang / bdag nyid kyang bzhon pa'i mchog la zhen te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra ba
24a7(dkon brtsegs): ba la der song ngo // de'i tshe shag kya la la'i bzhon pa'i mchog ni rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/ 'di ltar shing rta dag kyang thams cad du sngo la/ rta sngon po rnams kyis drangs shing // rgyan
24a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang sngo la dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/ 'khor brgyan sngon po can gyis bskor ba/ gdugs dang ral gyi dang zod dang nor bu can gyi rnga yab dang / lham rgyan can sngon
24b1(dkon brtsegs): po dang ldan pa/ kha tshar ma bcad pa'i ras sngon po gyon cing rgyan sngon po thogs pa'i zhal ta pa rnams zhal ta byed pa/ rgyan sngon po can gyi lcag thogs dang // khrid pa du ma dang
24b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng ba sha stag ste/ shing rta re re zhing yang rgyan sngon po can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor bar gyur to// shag kya la la'i bzhon pa'i rnam pa 'di
24b3(dkon brtsegs): lta bu ste/ 'di ltar shing rta dag kyang thams cad du ser ba nas thams cad du dmar ba dang / thams cad du dkar ba dang / thams cad du bkra ba dang / shing rta re re zhing yang
24b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyan khra bo can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// shing rta de dag re re'i phyi bzhin du yang glang po che brgyad khri gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi rgyal
24b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan can/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa sha stag bshams te/ glang po che brgyad khri po de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa brgyad
24b6(dkon brtsegs): khri bzhag nas 'dong bar gyur to// glang po che brgyad khri po de dag gi phyi bzhin rta gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka brgyus pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi
24b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyan dang ldan pa/ brgyad khri bshams te 'dong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsa ma dang / shag kyi rnams rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba gzigs nas/
24b8(dkon brtsegs): dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed gang dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha bskyed mos tshal du 'dong ba ma mthong ba de dag gis shag kyi ser skya'i gnas
25a1(dkon brtsegs): nas 'dong ba 'di dag la ltos shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag shAg kya rnams ser skya'i gnas nas byung ba ni sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha
25a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed mos tshal du 'dong ba dang rjes su 'thun no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ser skya zhes bya ba'i grong khyer dam pa nos/ rgyal po zas gtsang mi'i khyu mchog de// 'khor
25a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas te ji ltar 'od gyur pa// de ltar bstan gyis khyed cag de nyon cig/ shing rta rgya stong mchog dang bcas pa dag/ legs par brgyan cing mdzes par spras nas
25a4(dkon brtsegs): ni// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam pa nas// mi'i dbang po dam pa byung bar gyur// shing rta sngo zhing rgyan kyang sngo ba dang // rta yang sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'khor dang bcas/
25a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang sngo ba ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang sngo// lhag kyang sngo zhing thag srad rnams kyang sngo// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas//
25a6(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams kying ni sngon po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan sngon na po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta ser zhing rgyan kyang ser ba dang // rta yang ser zhing ser po'i 'khor
25a7(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang ser po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang ser// lhag kyang ser zhing thag srad rnams kyang ser// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba
25a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni ser po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan ser po bsgreng ba mdzes par byas// shing rta dmar zhing rgyan kyang dmar ba dang // rta yang dmar
25b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing dmar po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dmar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dmar po dag kyang dmar// lhag kyang dmar zhing thag srad rnams kyang dmar//
25b2(dkon brtsegs): dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni dmar po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan dmar po bskong bas mdzes par byas// shing rta dkar zhing rgyan yang
25b3(dkon brtsegs): dkar ba dang // rta yang dkar zhing dkar po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dkar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dkar// lcag kyang dkar zhing zag
25b4(dkon brtsegs): srang rnams kyang dkar// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni dkar po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan dkar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta/
25b5(dkon brtsegs): bkra zhing rgyan kyang bkra ba dang // rta yang bkra zhing bkra ba'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang bkra ba ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang bkra// lcag kyang bkra
25b6(dkon brtsegs): shing thag srang rnams kyang bkra// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni bkra ba'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan khra bo bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta
25b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin du// glang po brgyad khrir tshong ba bshams pa ni// gser gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis legs par brgyan// glang chen rnams ni gser gyis chal par
25b8(dkon brtsegs): brgyan// de dag steng du rin chen sna bdun gyi// khang pa rtsegs pa dag ni bzhag nas su// rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yis// shing rta rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'brang bar bshams/
26a1(dkon brtsegs): @#de bzhin rta mchog stong phrag brgyad cu yang // rin chen sna bdun rgyan gyis legs par brgyan// rgyal po'i cha gos rgyal po'i 'tsham stabs nas// rgyal
26a2(dkon brtsegs): po de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'brang // rab tu dri zhim kha dog lnga pa yi// me tog sel ma rgyal po'i lam du bkram// dar gyi lda ldi dag kyang rab tu bris// gdug spos snod rnams
26a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni legs par brgyan// glu mkhan par mkhan rnams dang gyad rnams dang // bum lnga thogs pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas// rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yang // ra
26a4(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' zhing rgyal po'i phyi bzhin 'brang // / rgyal po gshegs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang shag kya rnams
26a5(dkon brtsegs): rta babs sa'i bar du bzhon pa dang dong ste phyin nas/ bzhon pa las bas te/ rkang thang gi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra bar 'dong ngo //
26a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma nga rgyal che bar mkhyen nas/ mi gang lhag tsam gyi steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par
26a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir 'chag cing bzhugs par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'chags pa'i g.yas phyogs nas mi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa zham ring du 'chag cing 'gro'o/
26a8(dkon brtsegs): g.yon phyogs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin zham ring du 'chag cing 'gro'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i zham ring du lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga'
26b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ gdugs 'dzin cing bsil yab kyis g.yob par gyur to// rgyal
26b2(dkon brtsegs): po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang yul 'khor srung gnyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i shar phyogs logs kyi thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas
26b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha nga smad nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// rgyal po chen po 'phags
26b4(dkon brtsegs): skyes po dang mig mi bzang gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i nub phyogs legs kyi thog ma la bA gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad nas/
26b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
26b6(dkon brtsegs): sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i
26b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ steng gi bar snang la gnas te lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / lha'i man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / lha'i spos
26b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi phye ma rab tu 'thor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lho'i rol mo sil snyan dang bla dbyangs dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to//
27a1(dkon brtsegs): ma'i las 'das pa'i glu'i nga ro yang steng gi bar snang las byung bar gyur to// sprin las spos kyi char zam zim yang 'bab par gyur to// lha'i me
27a2(dkon brtsegs): tog ud pa la dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char yang bab par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa gang mngon par mdzad na/ lha dang mi rnams
27a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang gcig gi gcig mthong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad do// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas lha de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa yang mthong /
27a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pas kyang bar snang gang bar mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ci tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par
27a5(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ sngon bcom ldan 'das gzhon nur gyur pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du nga la ni gling chen po bzhi dbang phyug la dbang bar gyur pa ngo mtshar mi che ste/ ngas ni
27a6(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su lha dang mo'i nang du chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi dbang phyug la
27a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang ba de ni 'di yin pa lta ste/ bdag ni ma'i 'khor can du zad do// bcom ldan 'das ni lha dang ma'i 'khor can du gyur to snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bla gos
27a8(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos 'tshal te/ tshig 'di skad smras so// bcom ldan 'das
27b1(dkon brtsegs): kha ltam ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten par sa chen po la gom pa bdun bzhud de phyogs bzhir gzigs nas/ gsung brjod pa nga ni 'jig rten na mchog nga ni 'jig rten na gtso bo//
27b2(dkon brtsegs): nga ni 'jig rten na rab ste/ ngas skye ba dang rga ba dang / na ba dang 'chi ba mthar dbyung ngo // zhes gsungs pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
27b3(dkon brtsegs): gtugs te phyag bgyis so// gong gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhing pa'i grong du bzhud nas/ 'dzam bu'i grib ma ba sil ba la bzhugs pa'i tshe na nyi ma yol yang 'dzam
27b4(dkon brtsegs): bu'i grib ma sa bcom ldan 'das kyi ska ma btang ste/ lha'i bu gzhon drag thal mo sbar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'dra
27b5(dkon brtsegs): la phyag ba gyis so// da yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di dang lan gsum du phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// gang tshe rkang gnyis
27b6(dkon brtsegs): gtso bo khyod bltam nas// sa chen 'di la gom pa bdun bzhud de// nga ni 'jig rten 'di na mchog ces gsungs// de'i tshe mkhas pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// gang tshe
27b7(dkon brtsegs): thub chen zhing pa'i grong bzhud de// 'dzam bu'i grib mes bzhugs pa ma btang zhing // lta bu gzhon drug gis btud gyur pa// de tshe mchod 'os khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/
27b8(dkon brtsegs): da yang khyod la 'di dang lan gsum du// thub pa khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// zugs rjes che mnga' lha mis mchod pa gtso// khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis lhag ci smos/
28a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ni don grub legs shes sngon brjod pa// pha dang ma'i sa bsams te btags pa lags// khyod kyi bsam rdzogs bdud rtsi brnyes pas
28a2(dkon brtsegs): na// don grub legs par bdag gis da gdod 'tshal// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos
28a3(dkon brtsegs): bu bting ba/ rnam pa sna tshogs su spel ba bshams so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra bar yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bus yogs par
28a4(dkon brtsegs): bting ngo // steng du yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i bla re bris so// de nas bcom ldan 'das bar snang gi 'chag sa de nas babs te/ gdan khri bshams pa la
28a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs so// rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i
28a6(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bar snang la 'khod par gyur te/ de la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/
28a7(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya'o// ser skya zhes bya grong khyer dam pa'i// n+ya gro ta'i ra ba nyams dga' bar// rgyal po zas gtsang de dang gang gi tshe// 'jig rten mgon po phrad pa de'i tshe/
28a8(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mang po dag ni 'dus gyur to// lha ma yin dang mkha' lding dbang po dang // klu tshogs rnams dang de bzhin grul bum dang // dri za rgyal po rnams kyang 'dus par gyur//
28b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gsang ba'i bdag po rnams 'dus te// mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang mi rnams dang // de bzhin 'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha// rab tu dga' ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur//
28b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa yi// tshangs pa rnams dang tshangs pa'i ris rnams dang // 'od gsal ba dang dge rgyas pa dag drang // 'bras bu che bar gtogs
28b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas gtsang 'dus// dge sbyong dag dang de bzhin bram ze dang // spyod pa can dang kun tu rgyu dag dang // gcer bu pa dang mu stegs gzhan mang po// log lam rjes su 'brang
28b4(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyang 'dus// sangs rgyas nyid kyi gzi brjid dam pa yis// rgyal po chen po zas gtsang de'i sems// yongs su smin par bya ba'i don gyi phyir// de'i tshe na 'dus pa
28b5(dkon brtsegs): chen por gyur// sngon chad bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par bshad pa'i tshe// tshig gis 'khor rnams yongs su tshim par mdzad// da ni rgyal ba rgyal po zas gtsang la/
28b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i mthu ni rab tu bstan par bzhed// bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po zas gtsang gis// gzhon nu khyod ni sa bdag chen po'i rgyal por gyur zhes mkhas pas lung
28b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan gyis// khab nas ma 'byung shig ces sngon gsol pa/ gling bzhir dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba ste// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod// rin chen sna
28b8(dkon brtsegs): bdun dag dang ldan par 'gyur// 'byor pa bzhi po dang yang ldan par 'gyur// chos la gnasaM shing sa la skyong ba ste/ gling bzhi dbang dang rgyal rigs rgyal chen 'gyur// mi'i
29a1(dkon brtsegs): / bdag dang mi 'is mchod par 'ong // lto 'phye ches mchod 'gyur zhes gsol btab// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' des// bskal pa bye ba
29a2(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig dpag med nas// bdag ni rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smras kyis// rgyal po bdag gi tshig la gson ces gsungs// 'di ltar gling bzhi pa'i rgyal srid kyis// bdag la
29a3(dkon brtsegs): slu ba mdzad par bzhed pas na// de lta'i tshul las rgyal po chen po khyod// bdag la cung zad tsam yang thugs mi re// rgyal po chen po sngon tshe byung ba ni// rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis
29a4(dkon brtsegs): rus sbal gcig cig 'phangs// rgya mtsho'i rlabs ni phyir logs gyur pa dang // rus sbal de ni khron pa'i nang du lhung // de la khron pa'i nang gis rus sbal gyis// rgya mtsho'i rus
29a5(dkon brtsegs): sA la gang nas 'dir 'ongs te// nga ni the tsom skyes pa bshad pa'i phyir// myur du nga la smros shes de skad smras// khron pa'i nang gi rus sbal de nyid la// rgya mtsho'i rus sbal blo chen
29a6(dkon brtsegs): des smras pa// nga ni rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis bkur bkur te// khron pa 'dir ni de ring bar bar gyur// rgya mtsho'i rlabs chen de ni phyir logs song // nga ni slar log 'gro bar ma nus
29a7(dkon brtsegs): te// nga ni rlabs dang bral bar gyur pas na// rus sbal khyod kyi khron par gnas 'cha'o// de la khron pa'i nang gi rus sbal gyis// rgya mtsho de ni khron pa 'di tsam 'am// 'on te khron pa
29a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di bas che ba zhig/ dris lan nga la myur du spros shes smras// rgya mtsho'i rus sbal blo rgya chen po des// khron pa'i rus sbal de la tshig smras pa// khron pa'i rus sbal khyod ni byis pa ste/
29b1(dkon brtsegs): blo rgya chung zhig shes pa rab tu zhan// nga ni lan tsa can gyi chu des btsas// yun ring dus nas de na skye skye yang // rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma shes par ma nus na// dbus lte shes par ga la nus shes
29b2(dkon brtsegs): smras// de ltar ma'i bdag po khyod kyis kyang // bdag gi mthu ni thugs su ma chud do// gling bzhi po'i mchod pa rnams kyis ni// khyod kyis bdag la bsdu bar mdzad par bzhed// bdag ni
29b3(dkon brtsegs): chos can chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur// chad pas mi gcad mtshon cha mda' med par// stong gsum 'jig rten khams 'di bskyang bar bya// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pa thob par 'gyur/
29b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul stobs bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon tshig sbyang bzhed nas// de phyir 'khor chen po ni de dag dang // sems can rnams la thugs kyis dgongs pa
29b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// rgyal po zas gtsang sems ni mgu bya phyir// thugs kyis yongs su bskal ba mdzad pa dang // 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag ma lus par// de'i tshe na der ni 'dus par gyur//
29b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'dun par byas pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzengs ris bcom ldan 'das la mchod
29b7(dkon brtsegs): pa bya ba'i sems thogs mar skye bar gyur pa de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad do// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris lha ma yin khrag khrig phrag drug bcu dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo
29b8(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig phrag drug bcu dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa thog mar byas te/ des rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che rin thang yod pa dang / rin thang med pa ji snyed cig yod pa
30a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir phul lo// rin po che gzhan rgya mtsho chen po de na med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul pa byas te/ mchod par
30a2(dkon brtsegs): pu la lo// rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi shing rta khrag khrig phrag drug bcu yang mngon par sprul to// shing rta de dag re re zhing yang rta cang shes khrag khrig phrag drug bcu drug cu
30a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sprul te/ rta de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba can rka lag gi brgyan gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa dang ldan pa rin po che sna
30a4(dkon brtsegs): bdun las byas pa'i bya med pa can gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go/ rta cang shes de dag rgyan du bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi bya ru dag kyang mngon par sprul to// shing rta de
30a5(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang gser gyi rgyal mtshan can gser gyi rgyan pa sha stag go/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bA re de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur te/ shing rta
30a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'dod na ni rjes su 'dong / shing rta de dag sdod na ni sdod pa sha stag go// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re dag la yang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi phreng ba'i lda ldi
30a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sbyangs so// yid bzhin gyi nor bu bA re de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang ldan par mngon par sprul to// shing rta'i rkyen dang rta'i rgyan dang /
30a8(dkon brtsegs): yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la/ mnyan na bde ba sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na rol mo sil snyan yan lag
30b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad dang ldan pa/ mkhas pas sgra phyung na/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba dang / mnyan na bde ba 'byung ba/ de bzhin du shing rta'i rgyan de dag dang / rta'i rgyan de dag dang / yid bzhin gyi
30b2(dkon brtsegs): nor bu'i bla re'i brgyan de dag rlung gi bskyod na/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stag byung bar gyur to// shing rta de dag gi 'phang gis kyang steng gi bar snang la dpag
30b3(dkon brtsegs): tshad drag cu sgrib te/ 'khod par gyur to// shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin yang rol mo'i sil snyan sna tshogs rjes su 'brang bar gyur to// shing rta de dag thams cad la yang / lha ma yin
30b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu me rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni sil snyan len/ la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed/
30b5(dkon brtsegs): la la ni tsan dan dang / ud pa la'i phye mas 'thor/ la la ni a ga ru dang ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye mas 'thor/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phye mas 'thor/ la la ni gser
30b6(dkon brtsegs): dardul gyi phye mas 'thor/ la la ni man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang pa ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar
