30b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang skya snar chen po dang / skya snar khra bo dang / skya sngar bkra chen gyi me tog mngon par sprul cing / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro//
30b8(dkon brtsegs): la la ni gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / shel gyi me tog dang / bai dUr+ya'i me tog dang / spug gi me tog dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog dang / rdo'i snying po'i me
31a1(dkon brtsegs): @tog gis mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni rin po che sna bdun dang / dbyig gi sa snyim pa bkang zhing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni nam
31a2(dkon brtsegs): bza' dang rgyan dag 'bul lo// la la ni ska rags dang zhabs kyi rgyan dang / phyag gi rgyan dang / sor bad ba dang / gdu bu dang / gdu bu thams cad dang / dbu rgya rtse gsum dang /
31a3(dkon brtsegs): dpung rgyan dang / gser skud dang / mu tig go do shal dang / nor bu'i do shal dang / se mo do dang / bya do dang / 'gul rgyan sna tshogs 'thor bar gyur to// la la ni tshong tshong gshibs pa/
31a4(dkon brtsegs): la la ni mgo rgyan dang / la la ni rna cha gdub 'khor/ la la ni gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches smras pa/ la la ni rin po che'i phreng ba gser gyis spras pa/ la la ni gser gyi dra ba/ la la
31a5(dkon brtsegs): ni gser gyi phreng ba/ nor bu'i phreng ba/ mu tig gi phreng ba thogs so// lA la ni gser gyi gdugs dang / dngul gyi gdugs dang / bai dUr+ya'i gdugs dang / shel gyi gdugs dang /
31a6(dkon brtsegs): smug gi gdugs dang / rdo'i snying po'i gdugs dang / mu tig dmar po'i gdugs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs tha dad pa dang /
31a7(dkon brtsegs): rin po che thams cad kyi ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / tshon sna tshogs can mang po thogs so// la la ni spos chu'i char 'bebs shing 'khod par gyur to// la la ni bcom ldan 'das
31a8(dkon brtsegs): la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par stod par gyur to// mi mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mi phul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rkang gnyis gtso la phyag 'tshal lo//
31b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod la dozla yongs ma mchis// 'jig rten gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i ri la phyag 'tshalo//
31b2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs sel la phyag 'tshal lo// spyod dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems dag khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas pa mi mnga'
31b3(dkon brtsegs): zhum mi mnga'// le lo mi mnga' rgod mi mnga'// brtson 'grus brtsams shing rtul ba nyid// nges par rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal blta na sdug
31b4(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzes pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drag cu yang mngon par sprul te/ rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag re re zhing yang bzhugs sa khrag khrig drug cu
31b5(dkon brtsegs): drag cu mngon par sbal to// bzhugs pa de dag re re zhing yang ba gam bkra ba/ blta na sdug pi rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can brgya phrag drag cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// ba gam
31b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa
31b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag re re zhing yang khyams bkra' ba blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug bcu drug cu mngon par sprul to// de la gser gyi khyams rnams
31b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi gdung phya ma ni dngul/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni bai dur+ya/ them pa dang kha khyer ni she la/ ka ba ni smug/ ka zha ni mu tig dmar po// sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha sta go/
32a1(dkon brtsegs): / dngul gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung bya ma ni gser/ gral bu dang sgo 'bar ni bai dUr+ya/ them pa dang khal khyer ni shel/ ka ba ni sdug/ gzhin mu tig dmar po/
32a2(dkon brtsegs): so gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ bai dUr+ya'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phya ma ni shel/ gral bu dang sgo 'bar ni gser/ bem pa dang kha khyer ni dngul/ ka ba ni spug/
32a3(dkon brtsegs): ka zha ni mu tig dmar po// sa bzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go// shel gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung phya ma ni be durar+ya/ gral bu dang sgo 'bar ni spug/ bem pa dang kha khyer
32a4(dkon brtsegs): ni rdo'i snying po// ka ba ni gser/ ka zhu ni dngul/ sa bzhi ni mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ sdug gi khyams rnams kyi gdung phya ma ni rdo'i snying po// gral bu dang
32a5(dkon brtsegs): sgo 'phar ni mu tig dmar po// bem pa dang khal khyer ni gser/ ka ba ni dngul/ ka zha ni shel/ sa bzhi ni be dar+ya'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ mu tig dmar po'i khyams
32a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi gdang phya ma ni smug/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni rdo'i snying po// them pa dang khal khyer ni dngul/ ka ba ni gser/ ka zhuzhi ni bye dUr+ya/ sa bzhi ni ke ke ru'i rang bzhin can sha
32a7(dkon brtsegs): stag go// rdo'i snying po'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phya ma ni mu tig dmar po// gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni gser/ them pa dang khal khyer ni dngul/ ka ba ni bai dUr+ya/ ka nu ni ke ke ru/
32a8(dkon brtsegs): sa gzhi ni shel gyi rang bzhin can sha stag go// khyams de dag kun tu yang seng ge'i khri chen po sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs bting ba/
32b1(dkon brtsegs): kad tsa lin da'i steng g.yogs can mtha' gnyis su rten ma bzang po bkod pa/ khrag khrig drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// seng ge'i khri de dag gi rkang rten ni rin po che sna bdun
32b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi rang bzhin can dag la ras bcos bu sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ shing bal las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / srin bal las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / zar ma'i shun pa las byas
32b3(dkon brtsegs): pa shin tu phra ba dang / shun phrags las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / ka shi ka las byas pa shin tu phra ba bye ba phrag drug cu drug cu bting bar gyur to// seng ge'i khri de dag la re re'i
32b4(dkon brtsegs): ngos gnyis su yang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i bsil yab thogs pa gnyis gnyis mngon par sprul te/ seng ge'i
32b5(dkon brtsegs): khri de dag la lha ma yin gyi bu bzhon nu 'khod pa dag la g.yob bo// khyams de dag re re zhing yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gdugs khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu
32b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sprul to// khyams de dag re re zhing yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// de la gser gyi khams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan
32b7(dkon brtsegs): sngon po la yu ba ser po shel gyis sbas pa dag btsugs/ dngul gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan ser po yu ba dmar po gser gyis sbas pa dag btsugs/ bai dUr+ya'i khyams
32b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams su ni rgyal mtshan dmar po yu ba ser po shel gyis spras pa dag btsugs/ shel gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan dkar po yu ba bai DUR+Ya gser gyis spras pa dag
33a1(dkon brtsegs): @btsugs/ rin po che sna bdun gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan khra bo gser gyi yu ba bai DUr+yas smras pa dag btsugs so// de la rgyal mtshan
33a2(dkon brtsegs): sngon po rnams ni rtog ser po// rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni tog sngon po// rgyal mtshan dmar po rnams ni rtog dkar po// rgyal mtshan dkar po rnams ni rtog dmar po/
33a3(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan rnams ni rtog rin po che sna bdun sha stag go/ rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag par snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing / bcom ldan 'das
33a4(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum du bskor ba byed par gyur to// de 'di lta ste/ dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che sa srung gi bu ni bar snang gi nam mkha' las 'gro zhing sum
33a5(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bskyed mos tshal yongs su sa brtol du nye bar 'jog go/ de bzhin du pho brang gi rdal de dag kyang bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing / bcom
33a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed do// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag dang / ba gam de dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / khyams de dag dang / seng ge'i
33a7(dkon brtsegs): khri de dag dang gdugs de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de dag dang / ba dan de dag las lha'i tsan dan dang / ud pa la dang / a ka ru'i phye ma'i char 'bab par gyur to/
33a8(dkon brtsegs): me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar
33b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / skya snar dang / skya snar chen po dang / skya snar khra bo dang / skya snar bkra chen gyi char yang mngon par 'bab par gyur to// gser dang dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang /
33b2(dkon brtsegs): she la dang / spug dang rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog dang / dbyig dang gser dang / yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i char
33b3(dkon brtsegs): yang mngon par ba bya gyur to// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag gi mthus lha ma yin gyi bu de dag rin po che gang dang gang gi char dbab par 'dod pa de dang de dag la
33b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'bab par gyur to// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas 'khor yug tu ni dpag tshad drug khri 'phang du yang dpag tshad drug khrir lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de
33b5(dkon brtsegs): lta bus rgyas par gang bar gyur to// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod
33b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po yang mi 'breng bdun tsam du me tog man dar bas rgyas par gang bar gyur to// spos chus kyang rdzab du gyur to// ser skya'i
33b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri des khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rteni gyi khams 'di'i
33b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag gis spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te// byang chub tu
34a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dang po bskyed pa dag ni smos kyang mi dgos so// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/
34a2(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tsan dan gyi phye mas mngon par gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa// byang chub dam pa don
34a3(dkon brtsegs): tu gnyer skad du// skyabs kyi dam pa rab tu mi bskal ba// lhar bcas 'jig rten mi 'jigs stsol ba po// khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi// gang la dga' ba'i yid kyis
34a4(dkon brtsegs): skyabs song na// log ltung dag tu ltung bar mi 'gyur ba// de la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi// dpe med byang chub 'tshal ba'i slad du'o// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag ni gzhig
34a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom zhing // mya ngan las rgal nyon mongs dag gyur la// 'dren pa gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa// khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi// rga dang 'tshe bas nyen par gyur pa'i//
34a6(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi rnams 'dren pa bcom ldan 'das// gang la skyabs song phyis kyang mi skye ba// khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs
34a7(dkon brtsegs): ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe/ rta'i rgyan de dag dang / shing rta'i rgyan de dag dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyan de dag dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
34a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyan de dag dang / bA re dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyam na dga' ba 'di lta bu dag byung
34b1(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur te/ 'di ltar dper na rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgya pa mkhas pas sgra phyung ba bzhin no// de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po zag bzangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das
34b2(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe/ steng gi bar snang la lha'i tsan dan dang / ud pa la dang / a ka ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i char mngon par bab par gyur to// lha ma yin
34b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi spos kyi rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i char mngon par bab par gyur to// lha'i man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka
34b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang / skya snar chen po dang / skya snar khra bo dang / skya snar bkra chen gyi me tog rnams dang / sprul
34b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char mngon par bab po// steng gi bar snang las gser dang dngul dang / bai DAR+Ya dang / shel dang / skrag dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang /
34b6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab po// lha dang lha ma yin gyi spos chu'i char yang mngon par bab po// spos chu'i char de bab pas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong
34b7(dkon brtsegs): khyer chen po khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rngub tu gyur to// spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas
34b8(dkon brtsegs): par gang bar gyur to// sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//
35a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po bag bzangs ris kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe/ bar snang las lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas
35a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sil snyan gyi sgra dag byung ngo // sil snyan de dag gi sgras kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grag par gyur to// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
35a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can gang dag gis sgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po
35a4(dkon brtsegs): zag bzangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya stong dag bcom ldan 'das la mched pa bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang
35a5(dkon brtsegs): po bags bzangs ris kyi 'khor bya ba'i phyir/ la la ni glu len/ la la ni sil snyan byed/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur/ la la ni tsan+da dang / ud pa la dang /
35a6(dkon brtsegs): a ka ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor/ la la ni lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang /
35a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rusha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / sgra snar dang / skya snar chen po dang / sgra sngar khra bo dang / sgra snar bkra chen dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams
35a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog rnams 'bor zhing / bcom
35b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni na bza' dang rkang gdub dang / skra regs dang / phyag gi rgyan dang / sor gdub dang / gdu bu dang / gdu bu bam pa dang / dbu rgyan rtse
35b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa dang / dpung rgyan dang / gser skad dang / mu tig gi do shal dang / nor bu'i do shel dang / se mo to dang / gya do dang / mgul rgyan sna tshogs dang / rna cha dang rna cha gdab
35b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang / tshong tshong gshibs pa dang / mgo rgyan dang 'phreng ba'i lda ldi dang / spos kyi lda ldi dang / nor bu'i lda ldi dag 'thor zhing / me tog gi bA re dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor
35b4(dkon brtsegs): bu'i bla re dag thogs so// la la ni spos chu'i char 'bebs so// la la ni phye ma'i char 'bebs so// la la ni mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon
35b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'thor ro// la la ni rin po ches snyim pa bkang / la la ni gser gyis snyim pa bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'khor ro// tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so//
35b6(dkon brtsegs): gang brten gang la gnas bcas nas// gang zag mchog la mchod 'gyur ba// de 'dra ba'i grog po dang // rtag par rgyun tu phrad par shog/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs kyis ji ltar
35b7(dkon brtsegs): byas de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
35b8(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byed cing / tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// stobs bcu brtson dben khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mi 'jigs 'jigs bral khyod
36a1(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo// chos lam 'dren nges par gyur pa po// 'gro ba'i 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod la phyag 'tshal lo//
36a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rgyud mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mabar phyin zang nas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba bying ba sgrol la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can 'grogs kyang dgod pa mi mnga'
36a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing // 'gro ba kun la thugs ni rnam grol te// pad ma chu yis mi gos 'dra ba po// blo zab bsam mi khyab la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis stong nyid bsten//
36a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa kun tu mtshan ma thams cad bshig/ khyod ni gang du'ang smon pa yong mi mnga'// mi gnas nam mkha' mnyam la phyag 'tshal lo// lha ma yin gyis dbang po rab sim gyis
36a5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
36a6(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byed cing / gser phye dag gis gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// sa dang bar snang dang ni lha'i yul na'ang /
36a7(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs khyod mnyam ma mchis lhag ma mchis// mtshan mar bzung nas phyin ci log zhugs pa'i// 'gro ba'i smig rgyu 'dra bar khyod kyis mkhyen// 'di na byed pa tshor ba
36a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can med// gang zag med cing bdag gir bya ba med// chos kun stong zhing byed pa kun las dben// rang bzhin med cing g.yo med zhi zhes bstan// su zhig bde gshegs
36b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'dir mos te// chos kun byas pa med pa'i rjes 'brang ba// de 'dir 'dren pa'i sras su gyur pa ste// ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin yab ltar spyod// rnam 'dren khyod la bdag
36b2(dkon brtsegs): bstod bsod nams gang skyes te// ji ltar rgyal ba mkhyen pa yis ni mkhyen 'gyur ba// dge ba'i rtsa ba de kun ma lus mnga' bdag 'dir// 'gro ba rtsal gyis thams cad
36b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas grub par shog lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa
36b4(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis
36b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i chu las pha rol rnams rgal ba// rgal nas skye bo rgyun gyis rjes 'gro sgrol mdzad cing // bde gshegs pha rol
36b6(dkon brtsegs): zang bde 'jigs pa med 'jog pa// spyan mdzes bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi zhabs la gtug/ blo mchog khyod kyis 'gro ba thams cad kun tu mkhyen// phyin ci log lta thib
36b7(dkon brtsegs): por rab zhen blo ldan te// 'khrul pa smig rgyu lta bur ma shes gyur rnams la// mtshungs pa med pa'i thugs rje bskyed nas rtogs par mdzad// mi mchog khyod kyis chos rnams
36b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sgyu ma dang // smig rgyu 'dra zhing mi yor mtshungs shes rab tu bstan// thub pa dam pa khyod kyis chos kyi sras mchog bskyed// srid pa gsum po dag mi chags skyed spyod//
37a1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po log pa'i don gyur rang bzhin bral ba dang // gzhan gyi dngos pos stong par mi dbang khyod kyis mkhyen// byis pa rmongs pa'i blo gros rmi lam dga'
37a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bur// mi dbang khyod kyi sras kyis 'tshal nas spyad pa spyod// lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gargyan gyis kyang
37a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhen te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / me tog skya snar khra bo rnams kyis
37a4(dkon brtsegs): gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// mi mchog khyod kyi skra yi ni// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di zil mnan// ri rab kyis ni yungs
37a5(dkon brtsegs): 'bru dang // rgya mtshos pa rjes chu bzhin no// gzugs mdzes mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan// gzugs kyis gzugs kyi dam pa dang // gzugs rnams thams cad zil gyis mnan/
37a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na nyi mas me khyer bzhin// gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid kyis// sems can gzi ldan zil gyis mnan// zil mnan de dag lam me min// nyi mas me khyer bzhin lag
37a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin// ye shes rgya mtsho ye shes kyis// 'jig rten gsum kun zil gyis mnan// zil mnan de dag lam me min/ nyi mas zla 'od zil brlag bzhin// lha ma yin gyi dbang
37a8(dkon brtsegs): po sgra gcan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin por che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/
37b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / me tog skya snar khra bos mngon par gtor nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/
37b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa blo gros zhi ba po// zhi gnas dgyes pas 'gro ba'i// 'dod sdang gti mug rdul zhi mdzad// char pas rdul rnams zhi bgyid bzhin// 'bar zhing chos tshul 'bar bar
37b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// glugs bzhin gyi sa ni me bzhin no// nags btang nags mes shing sreg ltar// de bzhin nyon mongs dra ba sreg/ bskal pa bye ba khrig khrig ni// dpag tu med par
37b4(dkon brtsegs): dge rtsa 'dzin// nyon mongs thams cad 'joms mdzad de// bdud rtsis lus zhags dug bzhin no// mun pa mun nag sel mdzad de// mun khung sgron me 'bar ba bzhin/
37b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyis tshul yang ston mdzad de// nor mkhan rin chen yon tan bzhin// lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul
37b6(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par dga' bas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing /
37b7(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i me tog rnams kyis gtor nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// gdul ka mi bzad sems ni khyod kyis btul/
37b8(dkon brtsegs): g.yul la dpa' bos g.yul ngor dpa' bo bzhin// shin tu tshar bcad rang gis dbang du mdzad// thugs dal mi bsnyengs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis dbang
38a1(dkon brtsegs): po bul cing dgra yang bcom// gang du'ang mi bsnyengs mi bskyod bde ba skyes// khyod ni nyon mongs rnams kyis yongs mi 'khrugs// rnam pa kun
38a2(dkon brtsegs): tu dug ni ma lus bcom// mthu chen khyod kyis byams pa legs bsgom te// khyod kyi thugs ni dgra dang byams la mnyam// thub pa khyod kyis sems can blo gros bshig/
38a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba kun tu khyod ni bzhud mi mnga'// shes rab rnam grol srid pa'i sred pa bskams// shes rab rnam dag khyod kyi thugs kyang dag/ chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags
38a4(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga'// thams cad zil mnan thub mchog khyod 'dra med// lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po
38a5(dkon brtsegs): mig bzangs kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / bcom ldan 'das
38a6(dkon brtsegs): la gter chen po yang phul nas// tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis ni// chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid
38a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang // de ni bdar btags tshig tu zad// chos rnams chos kyi ngo bo yis// rnams pa kun tu mi dmigs so// gang 'di chos shes brjod
38a8(dkon brtsegs): pa yang // de ni ming tsam zad ces gsungs// ming ni ming gi bden pa ste// mtshan nyid kyang ni de bzhin no// chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa ste// ming yang med ces khyod kyis bshad/
38b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bshad ces bgyi ba dang // bshad pa ci yang ma mchis te// gang gis kyang ni ma bshad cing // su la'ang bshad pa ma mchis so// khyod kyi sras po mi mchog rnams// /
38b2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams de ltar 'tshal nas ni// chos rnams la yang mi chags par// rnam par spyod do thub pa che// lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig bzangs kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/
38b3(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnams par gnon pas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das
38b4(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal yang phul nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// dgra zla
38b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis khyod la bdag stod de// tshul khrims dang ni gzugs dang ye shes stobs// des ni 'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis// de phyir khyod ni dgra thul mtshungs ma
38b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis// khyod kyis gzugs ni chos kyis bskyed pas na// gzugs kyi stobs kyis khams gsum zil gyis mnan// sbyin pa'i stobs kyis mtshan ni phun sum tshogs/
38b7(dkon brtsegs): dpe byed phun sum tshogs shing gzugs kyang dag / tshul khrims stobs kyis khyod ni mi bskyod de// skyes bu mkhas pas so sor bsam mi lang // khyod ni tshul khrims
38b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan zhing thugs kyang dag/ mi'i seng ge mdzad pa thams cad 'byor// shes rab stobs kyis khyod mtshungs 'ga' ma mchis// des na mi bsnyengs 'jig rten gsum btul
39a1(dkon brtsegs): @gnas// 'khor du seng ge lta bu sgra bsgrags te// rtog ge'i tshogs kyis blo gros zil gyis mnan// lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par
39a2(dkon brtsegs): gnon gyis/ ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis kyang // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la
39a3(dkon brtsegs): zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / rin po ches snyim pa bkang ste/ gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod
39a4(dkon brtsegs): pa// thub pa chen po skye bo tshogs pa 'di// dang ba'i yid kyis khyod kyi zhal du lta// kun gyis rgyal ba mdun na bzhags pa mthong // de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres
39a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung cig brjod pa la// skye bo bsam pa ji bzhin so sor 'tshal// thub pa khyod kyi gsung de de ltar 'byung // de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas
39a6(dkon brtsegs): ma 'dres mtshan// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung cig brjod pa la// 'khor gyis tha dad gsung du rnam 'tshal cing // 'gro bas rang don ji bzhin du'ang 'tshal// de ni
39a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// gsung cig rab tu brjod pa mdzad pas ni// gcig la 'jog gi gzhan ni bgag pa mdzad// 'dren pa su dag ma bslabs rtogs
39a8(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad// de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po btang bzung gis
39b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang
39b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// rgyags dang nga rgyal sdig pa'i lta ba spyod pa gang // yid dga' rab tu dang bas mi
39b3(dkon brtsegs): dbang bde gshegs kyi// blo la mngon par dga' ba de dag bag mchis te// mtshungs med bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de dag ston pa'i sras// chos rnams 'di dag ngo bo nyid
39b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis ma mchis te// rmi lam dga' ba thams cad tshad ma ma lags 'dra// rmi lam dag na dga' spyod ma mchis 'du shes mchis// de ltar rgyal bas chos rnams thams
39b5(dkon brtsegs): cad rab tu gzigs// ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs shing chu'i zla ba 'dra'o// byis pa'i blo rnams kyi yid ni rmongs par bgyid// gang dag rtag tu bag mchis bde gsheg
39b6(dkon brtsegs): blo dga' ba// mkhas pa'i skye bo dag la 'di ni rmongs mi bgyid// rgyal ba khyod kyi bstan la ji rtag tu bag mchis gang // mi mchog dam pa de dag mi dal yo mi mchi// chos
39b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad rmi lam 'dra bar rnam brtags nas// yang dag mthong ba de dag ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur// de nas zag bzangs ris las stsogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang
39b8(dkon brtsegs): po bye ba phrag drag cu po de dag mchod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu byas nas// byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems kyis tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang yid
40a1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba skyes te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
40a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lha ma yin de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yang thugs su chud nas/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni
40a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas/ 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma
40a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le ba rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i
40a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ phyir logs nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub po// de nas tshe dang
40a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rta thul stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsug te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba
40a7(dkon brtsegs): btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshigs su bcad de nus pa// 'jig rten pan bzhid rgyu zhig ma mchis par// mi'i seng ge 'dzum pa mi mdzad na//
40a8(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po ji skad 'dzum pa mdzad// skyes bu mchog gis 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// lha ma yin gyi mchod pa rgya chen gzigs gyur nas// 'jig rten phan bzhed khyod ni
40b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mdzad na// lha min rnams la lung bstan bka' stsal gsol// de thos bdag cag rnams ni dga' bar gyur// de ring su'i sa dogs med rgya chen sems// 'khor
40b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dir yang dag bskyed par gyur cig gu// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gis bsam mkhyen nas// mi'i seng ge 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// de ring yongs su dag pa'i
40b3(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis su// mi'i mchog la dad pa gang gis bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gis bsam mkhyen te// yid du 'ong ba'i 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// bde gshegs
40b4(dkon brtsegs): zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas// 'di ltar bde gshegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di// su'is dpung bcas bdud ni deng bcom zhes// 'khor 'di de ring the tsom 'tshal bar
40b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// drang srong chen po rgyal ba dgra las rgyal// the tsom 'tshol ba'i som nyid gcad du gsol// mi mchog khyod kyis de ring 'gro ba'i// the tsom sbyar te legs par gcad
40b6(dkon brtsegs): du gsol// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta bul gyis zhu ba zhus pa'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogs su bcad de/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyis
40b7(dkon brtsegs): dri ba legs par dris// 'jig rten pa na phyir 'dzum pa ngas byas pa// de'i 'bras bu ma lus bstan par bya// bstan pa de ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// bla na med pa'i byang
40b8(dkon brtsegs): chub 'dod pa'i phyir// lha mi rnams kyis nga mchod 'di byas te// de dag sems ni ci la'ang chags med pas// nam mkha'i ngos la lag mthil chags med bzhin//
41a1(dkon brtsegs): lha min tshogs kyis dad pa'i yid byas te// de dag ngal mchod pa 'di byas pas// blo can de dag lha min ris bor te// mtho ris dong nas yun ring
41a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar gyur// de dag phyi dus rgyal ba mi seng ge/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba snyed// bsnyen bkur byas nas yid 'ong bskal pa la// de dag thams cad mtshan 'thun
41a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bar 'gyur// de tshe bde gshegs khra khrig drag cu'i rnams// 'jig rten sgron ma phyogs su grags pa ste// de dag mi gnas chos ni ston mdzad cing // lha dang bcas pa'i
41a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'grel par 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag rnams kyi zhing // shin tu yangs shing snyigs ma med par 'gyur// de tshe khrag khrig drug cur tshang ba'i// rgyal po
41a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis stong gsum sbyang bar 'gyur// de dag ngan song thams cad sel bar mdzad// de dag zhing der dga' ba spyod par 'gyur// brtan pa de dag mi khom thams cad
41a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyang // bla na med pa'i theg pa ston par 'gyur// de dag de'i tshad du 'gyur ba ni// bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar yang // rnam par 'dren pa thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur/
41a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa med pa'i chos kyang ston par mdzad// grub pa de dag lnga don 'das gyur te// 'jig rten mkhas pa rab tu ni gyur nas// bskal pa khrag khrig drug rgya chung bar ni/
41a8(dkon brtsegs): rang byung rnams kyi dam chos gnas par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa de dag 'gro ba'i tshogs// gang ga'i bye ma snyed kyi skye bo 'dul// dgra las rgyal ba'i rgyal bar
41b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan 'thun 'gyur// zhing dang tshe dang chos gnas 'byung ba 'thun// bde gshegs de dag khrag khrig drug bcu'i// skyes pa bud med yongs su smin mdzad de// bla na med
41b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i theg par 'deb par gyur// mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i gdang yang 'dzin// rgyal bas lha min de dag lung bstan pa// 'jig rten phan phyir drang srong chen pos
41b3(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten de thos nas// yid rengs gyur cing stobs kyang skyes par 'gyur// / lha ma yin lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
41b4(dkon brtsegs): / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos lha ma yin gyi mchod pa rnams pa de lta bu 'di mthong nas// ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs
41b5(dkon brtsegs): pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig mngon par 'ad mdzad na/ 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa grub snyam nas/ de'i tshe sems
41b6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar mnyam par bzhag pas/ bskal pa grangs med pa yang rjes su dran zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa'i rgyu de dang der 'chi 'pho dang skye ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
41b7(dkon brtsegs): dag mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang de dag
41b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog par bsres par gyur pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan
42a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po rjes su dran par gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen
42a2(dkon brtsegs): po de lta bu mdzad na/ de'i thugs bskyed pa gcig la yang 'jig rten gyis khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad mi'i lus
42a3(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur te/ lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji snyed pa de snyed du sems can re res bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du mchod pa byas kyang / de dag gis thugs bskyed pa cig
42a4(dkon brtsegs): la yang lan lon par mi nus so snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te ngo mtshar dang dad pa thob par gyur nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan
42a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa// thub pa byang chub gzhol ba'i// thugs bskyed pa ni re re la'ang // lha ma yin pa'i mchod pa 'dis// cha tsam mi spyod
42a6(dkon brtsegs): mi seng ge/ de lto'i yon tan mapar phyin te// lha dang mi'i sa mchod gyur pa// tsan dan phur ma ri rab tsam// mi mchog khyod la mchod par 'os// mi'i seng ge khyod la ni//
42a7(dkon brtsegs): gang ga'i bye ma ches mang ba'i// rgya mtsho rab tu bkang ba'i// spos chu dag gis mchod par 'os// yon tan chen po mnga' ba la// gang ga'i bye ma ches mang ba'i// me tog
42a8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs ni ri bo mchog/ 'khor yug chen po mnyam mchod 'os// rgyal ba sgron ma rang byung ba// mar me'i snying po ri rab tsam// 'bru mar rgya mtsho'i chu snyed kyi// mar me rnams
42b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis mchod par 'os// mthu chen mnga' ba de lta bur// yon tan pha rol phyin gyur pa// gang ga'i bye ma ches mang ba'i// me tog mchod rten mchod par 'os// mi dbang
42b2(dkon brtsegs): mchod pas thugs brtse ba// rin chen gdugs ni che rnams kyis// bskal pa khrag khrig rnams su yang // sems can mchog la mchod par 'os// yon tan mtha' yas
42b3(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ba khyod// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bkang ste// bskal pa bsam yas mchod par 'os// mi'i seng ge khyod la ni/ bskal
42b4(dkon brtsegs): pa khrag khrig dpag med par// gang ga'i bye ma ches mang ba'i// ba dan rnams kyis mchod par 'os// drang srong chen po smra ba'i stag/ lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang // gzhan
42b5(dkon brtsegs): yang sems can gang tshogs pa// brtag bzung dpe la gsan tu gsol// gal te gang ga'i bye snyed kyi// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi// sems can thams
42b6(dkon brtsegs): cad sangs rgyas su// mi mchog stobs bcu'i stobs ldan la// de dag re re'i mgo bo yang // gang ga'i bye ma snyed gyur te// mgo bo de dag re re zhing // de snyed kha dang ldan
42b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur la// kha rnams de dag re re zhing // lce dang kha'i grangs mnyam la// gang ba'i klung gi bye snyed kyis// bskal par bstod pa bgyis kyang ni// rgyal ba de dag spobs ma
42b8(dkon brtsegs): bas// khyod kyis yon tan mthar mi phyin// rgyal ba de lta bu'i yon tan gyi// pha rol tu ni phyin par gyur// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/
43a1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag legs so legs so// nga'i nyan thos rnams ni drang por gyur pa/ ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa/ chos su gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/
43a2(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par gyur pa sha stag gnas te/ de dag ni nga'i yon tan gyi tshogs la 'jug pa sha steg ge/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dpag tu
43a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang ldan pa ste/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi
43a4(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams gzugs can
43a5(dkon brtsegs): zhig yin na ni// sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed da shong bar mi 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan
43a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshogs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang gaSh+Ti gri bye ma snyed kyis bskal pa gang ga'i bye ma snyed du gang 'di grangs kyis tshad gzung bar brjod kyang brjod par mi nas/
43a7(dkon brtsegs): bsams kyang bsam par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na// de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa smod pa'i tshe// sems bskyed pa gang yang sems can
43a8(dkon brtsegs): du bsdu bar bsdus pa// sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad la phan pa dang // bde ba'i don tu ma bskyed pa gcig kyang med de/ sems can
43b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams ni tshad med pas sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo // sems can gyi kham
43b2(dkon brtsegs): ni mi zad pa ste/ sems can gyi khams ji ltar mi zad de ltar mi zad pa'i bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo // sems de ni sems
43b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la phan pa'i don tu skyes pas/ sems can thams cad kyis mchod kyang lan lon par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i mchod pa ni zang zing
43b4(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don tu 'byung ba ni/ sems can 'khor ba la
43b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhol ba 'di dag mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar gzhol bar 'gyur zhes te/ zang zing med pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smad pa spyod pa'i tshe//
43b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi don tu zang zing med pa'i sems dpag tu med pa bskyed par gyur to// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med pa grang de med pa/
43b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa brjod du med pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
43b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/
44a1(dkon brtsegs): @sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi sems bskyed
44a2(dkon brtsegs): pa re re zhing gang ba'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la phan par dgongs par gyur te/ don kyang mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i
44a3(dkon brtsegs): tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu gyur te/ yongs su dag cing ngan song dang mi khom pa thams
44a4(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su chad pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ log par nges pa'i sems can gyi skyon yod med par gyur to// lta ba'i rnam pa
44a5(dkon brtsegs): yong med par gyur to// mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yong med par gyur to// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yong med
44a6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// ngan song gi rgyur 'gyur ba nyon mongs pa dang las 'byung ba yod med par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa des yun ring po nas sems can
44a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams dge ba'i chos rnams la bcud cing btams te rjes su bstan cing brlabs pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
44a8(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i tog gi sangs rgyas kyis zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyang bde ba lnga thob par gyur to// 'di ltar la la ni 'dod pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to//
44b1(dkon brtsegs): gal la ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur
44b2(dkon brtsegs): to// ga la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ de dag bde ba de la yang spyod la/ bde ba de dag la yang mngon par zhen pa med par
44b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ bung ba me tog khu bas nye bar 'tsho yang de la mngon par zhen pa med do// de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongs su spyod kyang de la
44b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa med do// 'di lta ste dper na/ bar snang la rgyu ba'i bya ni bar snang la yang rgyu la/ de la mngon par chags pa'ang med do// de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde
44b5(dkon brtsegs): ba de la yongs su spyod kyang / de la mngon par zhen pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rtog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams la yid mi bde bar
44b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i mi dga' ba med/ rmongs par 'gyur ba med de/ gzhan du na yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i dga' ba sha stag yongs su spyod de/ de ni 'di ltar sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu
44b7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ mi dge ba las yod/
44b8(dkon brtsegs): su bzlog ste/ dge ba la btsud pas de dag la las gang gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa dbang med par 'byung ba mi dge ba'i las de lta
45a1(dkon brtsegs): bu yod med de/ de ma bstsags pa'i phyir sdug bsngal tshor bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa mi 'byung ngo // de dag gis rmongs pa'i sems tsam
45a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis kyang las gang gis rmongs pa rnam pa la sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshe rab 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mngon par 'du ma byas te/ de ma
45a3(dkon brtsegs): bstsags pa'i phyir rmongs par 'gyur ba'i tsher ba sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa de mi 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rtog de'i sangs rgyas
45a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing de ni rgyu gang gis sems can de dag dus gyur pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas/ nyams su mi bde ba'i nyi ma mi 'char ro// rlung nyams su mi bde ba mi ldang //
45a5(dkon brtsegs): char nyams su mi bde ba mi 'bab po// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can de dag la lus dang ngag dang yid
45a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi las thams cad shes pa sngon du 'gro zhing shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba bstan cing bshad pas/ sems can de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de las bstan pa de
45a7(dkon brtsegs): thos nas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad shes pa sngon du 'gro zhing shes pa'i rjes su 'brang bar yongs su bsgrubs pas/ las de'i rnam par smin pas de dag
45a8(dkon brtsegs): la rmongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ba med de/ rmongs pa rnams la rgyu gang gis bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba meda'o//
45b1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba med cing bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa yang med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes
45b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can de bzhin gshegs pa des btams pa de dag ni chos la rim gro bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas par gyur to// de dag 'chag na yang chos nyid la sems shing
45b3(dkon brtsegs): chos la mos pas zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag ste/ chos la mos shing zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag pa de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo // de bzhin du 'greng ba dang /
45b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dag pa dang / nyal ba dang / sad pa dang / spyod lam thams cad du yang sdug bsngal mi 'byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can de dag la yang be ma spangs pa
45b5(dkon brtsegs): med de/ de'i phyir yang ba ma spangs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo // yang dag pa'i spong ba yod pas de dag la skyo ba med de/ de'i phyir de dag la yang dag par
45b6(dkon brtsegs): spang bar bya ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do// sems can de dag la 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag chos thams cad la mngon par
45b7(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa'i phyir ro// de dag la mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal yang med de// de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye
45b8(dkon brtsegs): bar gnas pa'i phyir ro// de dge la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i
46a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ni sdug pa las byung ste/ de'i phyir de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do//
46a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag la sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal yang mi 'byung ngo // 'di ltar de na sdig bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro// gzhan du na 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal
46a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig pu yod de/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal nyid do// de bzhin gshegs po'i de ni don dam pa'i chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de bskal pa
46a4(dkon brtsegs): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs pa'i tshe/ des gsungs pa la phyir smra ba'i sems can gang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ma byung ste/ de ni 'di ltar sngon sems can de dag
46a5(dkon brtsegs): legs par yongs su smin par byas pa'i phyir ro// dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang / dma' ba dang / zham pa dang / chung ba dang / sdug bsngal
46a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / nyes par brtsams pa dang /
46a7(dkon brtsegs): nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsabs sems can de snyed cig gi don bye ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsams pa 'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/
46a8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bag gre che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags//
46b1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal ba de la dge sbyong dag ji snyam du sems/ sems zhen pa dang sems dma' ba nas nye bar bsgrubs pa'i bar gyi sems kyis sems can de snyed kyi don bya ba 'am/
46b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde bar bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar thag gra che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems
46b3(dkon brtsegs): de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ ga sol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ dad pa zhan pa nas nyes
46b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bsgrubs pa'i dad pa'i bar dang tshul khrims zhan pa nas nye bar bsgrub pa'i tshul khrims kyi bar dang / zos pa zhan pa nas nye bar bsgrubs pa'i thos pa'i bar dang /
46b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'gres zhan pa nas nye bar zhan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi bar dang / dran pa zhan pa nas nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dran pa'i bar dang / ting nge 'dzin zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i
46b6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dang / shes rab zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyis sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa'am/ bde ba bsgrub
46b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar thag gru che bo'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nas sam/ gsol pa
46b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag legs so legs so// de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang / sems zhen pa dang /
47a1(dkon brtsegs): dad pa dang tshul khrims dang thos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab zhan pa dang / dma' ba dang zhum pa dang /
47a2(dkon brtsegs): chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
47a3(dkon brtsegs): nyes par brtsams pa dang / nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyis sems can de snyed kyi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa dang / bde ba sgrub pa dang / sdug bsngal
47a4(dkon brtsegs): bstsal pa 'am/ de ltar bag bla che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar mi nus so// dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/
47a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do// de'i tshe shar
47a6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
47a7(dkon brtsegs): gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ der 'jam dpal gzhonar gyur pa 'dus shing 'dug par gyur pa des/ bcom
47a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di
47b1(dkon brtsegs): ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa chos ston gyis/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag kyang mchi'o//
47b2(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal pos/ 'jam dpal gzhonar gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam
47b3(dkon brtsegs): dpal de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhonar gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i zhab
47b4(dkon brtsegs): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum gsum bskor ba byas nas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las
47b5(dkon brtsegs): bskam pa tsam gyis 'jam dpal gzhonar gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa de nas/ mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa'i
47b6(dkon brtsegs): spyan sngar 'dir gnas par gyur to// des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dag go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dag nas/ 'jam dpal
47b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhonar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin
47b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam zhes bka' stsal pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das nyid ni de'i tshe de'i des na dbang po'i tog ces
48a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i babs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ste/
48a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la chog pa mi mnga'/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la rgyun chad par bgyi ba ma mchis/ sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa'i
48a3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la dgod pas chog pa mi mnga' ste/ la la zhig yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra na/ rgyal ba gtso bo/ rgyal ba dam pa/ rgyal ba mchog/ rgyal ba rab ces brjod pa de ni bci
48a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das nyid legs par brjod pas yang dag par brjod do// de skad ces smras nas 'jam dpal gzhonar gyur pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dbang po rnams ni thabs
48a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas te// sems can rnams la thugs brtse zhing // lus can yongs su smin mdzad phyir// dpa' bo chen po rnam par 'phral// bye ba brgyad cur rgyal ba nyid// sangs rgyas nyid du bstan
48a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang // da dung chog pa'i 'du shes bstsal// byang chub mchog tu thugs kyang 'jug/ stong gsum drag cu rtsa gcig gi/ sangs rgyas zhing rnams dag mdzad pas/ ji ltar thub pa thabs
48a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa/ rgyal ba khyod ni kun gyis 'tshal// da dung dang po thugs bskyed par// de dang der ni yongs bstan te// da dang du yang 'dren pa khyod// sangs rgyas mang po ston khyod mdzad// rnam
48a8(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyis// gang zag mchog ni spyod pa mdzad// chos kyi dbyings la chags mi mnga'// khyod kyis gang yang mkhyen mdzad med// brgya byin tshangs pa'i cha byad dang /
48b1(dkon brtsegs): la lar bdud kyi cha byad kyis// sems can rnams kyis don mdzad de// 'jig rten rnams kyis rtogs mi nas// bud med cha byad spyod pa mdzad// dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams na'ang gda'/
48b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te// pad ma chus mi chags pa bzhin// 'dren pa sna tshogs khams can gyi// 'jig rten 'di'i rjes 'jug mdzad// des na skye dgu 'di dag rnams// gdugs
48b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan khyod kyi yon tan rjod// la lar bltam pa yongs su bstan// la lar mya ngan 'das pa bstan// la la la ni 'khor lo skor// la lar spyad pa spyod pa mdzad// sems can 'dul
48b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i don slad du// dgyes shing mgur len rol pa mdzad// bshums mo dag kyang 'byin par mdzad// sems can sus kyang yod ma 'tshal// 'dod chags mi mnga' chags pa'i tshul/
48b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa mi mnga' 'jig pa ltar// sems can rnam par 'dul don tu// 'dren pa rnam par 'phral ba mdzad// rmongs med rmongs pa'i tshul bstan te// byis pa ma lags byis tshul
48b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis// sems can rnam par gdul slad du// 'dren pa rnam par 'phrul ba mdzad// smyos pa ma lags smyos pa'i tshul// zha ba ma lags zha ba ltar// rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis//
48b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams ni 'dul ba mdzad// de ltar bsam yas mgon po khyod// dam pa'i chos kyang bsam pa khyab// dpa' chen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// sems can thub ces 'drar
48b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig// sngon byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs brgyad khri drug stong gis/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong //
49a1(dkon brtsegs): @lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gzhal du med pa'i dad pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/ bcom
49a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don tu rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa rtsegs pa shin tu bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul to// lha'i rin por che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/ gser
49a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / sdug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang bdun no// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang rin por che sna bzhi'i lan kan gyi dra ba ris bkra ba/
49a4(dkon brtsegs): blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to// rin po che sna bzhi ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang shel lo// gser gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang / gdang bu rnam
49a5(dkon brtsegs): ni gse re/ shar ba rnams ni dngul/ dngul gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni dngul/ shar ba rnams ni gser/ bai DUR+Ya'i lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni bai DUrA/
49a6(dkon brtsegs): shar ba rnams ni shel/ shel gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang ga dang bu rnams ni shel/ shar ba rnams ni dngul las byas pa'o// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bkra
49a7(dkon brtsegs): ba bstan stug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to// de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar gser dang dngul dang / bai durar+ya dang / shel dang sdug dang /
49a8(dkon brtsegs): mu tig dmar po dang / de'i snying po dang bdun no// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa 'di lta ste/ gser gyi dra ba dang / dngul gyi dra ba dang /
49b1(dkon brtsegs): bai dUr+ya'i dra ba dang / shel gyi dra ba dang / mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dang / sdug gi dra ba dang / rdo'i snying po'i dra bas kun nas bkab par gyur to// gdugs bkra ba blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug
49b2(dkon brtsegs): stong mngon par sprul te/ de dag kyang 'di ltar gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag go/ rgyal mtshan bkra ba blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong
49b3(dkon brtsegs): yang mngon par sprul te/ rgyal mtshan de dag kyang gser dang dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las bsgrubs pa sha stag ste/ rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni tog
49b4(dkon brtsegs): ser po can/ rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni tog sngon po can/ rgyal mtshan dmar po rnams ni tog dkar po can/ sha stag mngon par sprul to// ba dan kha dog sna tshogs can bkra ba blta na sdug
49b5(dkon brtsegs): pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul bar gyur to// bA re bkra ba blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul bar gyur te// bla re de dag kyang gser skad kyi bla re dang / dngul
49b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi skad pa'i bla re dang bai dUr+ya'i bA re dang / shel gyi bla re dang / mu tig dmar po'i bla re dang / spug gi bla re dang / rdo'i snying po'i bla re ste/ rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag go//
49b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bya'i rgyal po mdab bzangs de dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / gdugs brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / rgyal mtshan brgyad khri drug stong po de dag
49b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / ba dan brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / bA re brgyad khri drug stong po de dag bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang / de dag thams cad steng gi bar snang la lding zhing bcom ldan
50a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas so// 'di lta ste/ dper na glang po che rgyal pos srung gi bu ni sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mgo la khyer zhing na mkha'
50a2(dkon brtsegs): las song ste/ yongs 'dus brtol tu gzhog go// de bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / gdugs de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de dag dang / ba dan de dag dang / bla re de dag par
50a3(dkon brtsegs): snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed par gyur to// de nas mdab bzangs brgyad khri drag stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod
50a4(dkon brtsegs): pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
50a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod pa/ rga dang 'chi las rnam par bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can gzhal yas kha lo sgyur la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa
50a6(dkon brtsegs): 'angam mchis so// bdag cag rnams kyang sred med bu'i lus ldan zhing // sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa dang // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus shin tu mdzes byas pa'i
50a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren pa khyod 'drar 'gyur bar shog/ bdag cag 'dom gang 'od kyi gzi ldan zhing // mngon 'phags gzugs kyi dam pas mdzes gyur te// spyod lam mchog
50a8(dkon brtsegs): dang bdag cag ldan gyur cing // 'gro ba rnams sbyong mya ngan zla bar shog/ bdag cag tshul khrims ting 'dzin rab ldan zhing // shes rab ldan pas mchog tu 'gyur bar shog/ da ltar rnam
50b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'dren pa khyod lta bur// skye bo rab 'grel sangs rgyas grub par shog/ 'dren pa 'jig rten mkhas pa khyod lta bur// bdag cag 'dren pa stobs bcu ldan pa dang // ma 'dres bco
50b2(dkon brtsegs): brgyad chos kyi mthar phyin cing // 'jig rten mkhas pa thams cad mkhyen du shog/ bdag cag kun kyang 'gro ba dngos med dang // rmi lam sgyu 'dra gnas pa med pa dang // brag cha nam
50b3(dkon brtsegs): mkha' 'dra bar ston byed cing // ji ltar rnam 'dren khyod ston bzhin du shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya'i rgyal po mad bzangs de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/
50b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// rgyal ba rnam 'dren gtso bo sangs rgyas rnams// rgyu ma mchis par
50b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhad pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum mdzad 'di la rgyu rkyen gang lags pa// 'jig rten pa na mdzad thugs rje mnga' bas gsungs// mad pa bzangs rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod bgyis
50b6(dkon brtsegs): te// bla re nam mkha' rgyas par gang ba bstan// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di la ngo mtshar bskyed// rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol// 'gro ba thams cad thal
50b7(dkon brtsegs): mo rab sbyar cing // dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems kyis khyod// mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur nyan par 'tshal// rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol/
50b8(dkon brtsegs): mi mchog khyod la khong dag mchi ba ni// 'gro ba thams cad the tsom med 'gyur zhing // the tsom med pas 'khor du 'jigs med 'gyur// 'dis ni sangs rgyas mnyes par
51a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyis shes mchis// 'khor 'dir 'jigs med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// yongs su sbyangs shing shin tu skyon bstsal pas// rgyal bas lung bstan
51a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag mngon dga' ste// slob ma mchog la bla mas bstan pa bzhin// tshe tsam 'tshal ba'i the tsom gcad du gsol// rab tu dga' mdzad rjes su sman pa mdzod// dga' ba'i sems
51a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'khor 'di 'das gyur gyis// rang 'byung mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka'
51a4(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa// thams cad zil gnon stobs bcu brtson 'grus bden// rgyal ba dbang po thul ba de bzhin gshegs// 'dren pas yan lag brgyad ldan gsung dbyangs kyis// mdab
51a5(dkon brtsegs): bzangs 'gro ba rta thul bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyed kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum gang ngas bstan pa// de'i 'bras bu dga' ba yid kyis nyon// the
51a6(dkon brtsegs): tsom stsol la rab tu dga' ba skyed// bla na med pa'i byang chub zhi tshol zhing // stobs dang mi 'jigs bzhi po gang rnams kyis// 'dren pa 'jigs med 'gyur ba btsal ba'i
51a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir// mdab chags dbang po song la mchod legs byas// ma 'dres bcwo brgyad chos ni smra ba yi// sred med bu lus shin tu mkhregs pa dang // sum bcu gnyis mtshan dpe
51a8(dkon brtsegs): byed bzang po rnams// yongs su btsal phyir nga la mchod pa byas// rgyal ba'i tshul khrims ting 'dzin btsal ba dang // gzhan yang sangs rgyas spyod yul shes rab dang /
51b1(dkon brtsegs): phun sum zhing dang 'gro ba rnam dgrol ba// 'di dag kun btsal don du mchod pa byas// de dag nga la dga' bas mchod byas pas// dud 'gro gnas nas de dag shi 'phos nas/
51b2(dkon brtsegs): lha dang brtul zhugs 'thun par de dag 'dong // 'di na ngan song srid pa'i mtha' ma yin// bskal pa bye ba gang ga'i bye snyed du// de dag lha mi'i nang du gnas gyur cing // rnam
51b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod byas nas// de dag dbang po thul ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag zhing du ngan song mi 'byung ste// mi khom mi 'byung mtshan dang mi ldan med/
51b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba de dag mtshan gyi kun tu mdzes// ri rab rgyal mtshan bskal la rang 'byung 'gyur// lo ni bye ba brgyad cu bzhi 'grangs par// 'jig rten pa ni phyir 'dren pa de dge bzhugs//
51b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa na phyir rnam 'dren mnyam bzhag pas// lus can rnams la mnyam pa'i don mdzad 'gyur// skyob pa rdul med gyur pa de dag gi/ 'dus pa nga rgyal spangs pa
51b6(dkon brtsegs): brgyad bcur 'gyur// de tshe skyob pa rdul dang bral rnams kyi// shin tu sems dul bye ba brgyad cu 'byung // 'dren pa de dag 'gro ba'i nga bsal phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo rab
51b7(dkon brtsegs): tu bskor bar 'gyur// mi dag de ltar 'di rnams nga rgyal che// mdab bzangs lus su gyur nas stobs po che// 'di dag sngon tshe 'das pa'i dus shig na// drang srong dka' thub
51b8(dkon brtsegs): drag po tshogs chen gyur// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa drag tshang ba ste// dka' thub spyad de rdzu 'phrul phun sum btsal// de dag rdzu 'phrul thob nas nga rgyal gyis// dga' bas dka'
52a1(dkon brtsegs): thub drag dang ldan par gyur// tshul khrims ma zhig de dag nags 'dab tu// tshe zad shi 'phos gyur te lus kyang zhig/ nga rgyal des ni mkha'
52a2(dkon brtsegs): lding mkha' 'gror gyur// rdzu 'phrul sems kyis rdzu 'phrul ldan par skyes// tshul khrims dag pas rgyal ba'i bstan la dad// nga rgyal gyis ni byang chub sems kyang skyed//
52a3(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lding lung bstan pa'i le'u ste drag pa'o// bam po bzhi pa/ de nas klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis lham
52a4(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi dbang po de dag dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang bos nas/ mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te/ de dag dga' mgu
52a5(dkon brtsegs): yid rangs nas/ rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs
52a6(dkon brtsegs): bai dUr+ya'i dra ba lnga ldir bkye ba/ mu tig dmar po'i dra bas bskor ba/ gser gyi yu ba can/ be dUr+ya'i thur ma brgya stong bkye ba/ rin po che'i chun po spangs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu
52a7(dkon brtsegs): rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// ta sngon po kha dog sngon po// sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba/ rgyan sngon pos brgyan pa/ be dUr+ya'i srab kyis bsrabs pa/ bye ba brag
52a8(dkon brtsegs): dgu bcu rtsa drag mngon par sprul to// nor bu skar mdog gi bla re khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu yid la des/ 'khor de dag thams cad yog pa cig kyang steng gi bar snang la
52b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sprul to// de la rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi bkra ba mig tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug bres par sprul to// bA re de'i khor yug rin po che sna
52b2(dkon brtsegs): bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mngon par sprul te bres so// rin po che sna bdun gyi khrung khring rkang dkar mngon par sprul to// kwa'i ro le mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drag
52b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sprul to// de nas kwa'i bu mo de dag rta sngon po dag la zhon nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs steng gi bar snang la bres te/ nam mkha' las 'dong zhing / rol mo'i sgra
52b4(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drag po de dag len cing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed la// lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/
52b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i a ga ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / ud pa la'i phye ma dang / me tog sna tshogs kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ me tog ud pa la dang / tsam pa ka'i phreng
52b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dag kyang 'thor/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/ spos sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang / na bza' dang rgyan dag kyang 'bul te/ lha ma yin gyis ji ltar byas pa
52b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du/ mchod pa rgya chen byas so// de nas de dag gis rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag byas pa'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
52b8(dkon brtsegs): khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sems can gang gis rol mo'i sgra thos pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
53a1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// nor bu skar mdog gi bA re dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi de dag dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag dang / khrung khru ba
53a2(dkon brtsegs): rkang dkar de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa mkhas pas bkrol ba de lta bur snyan la de lta bur yid du
53a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ong zhing mnyan na bde ba'i sgra byang bar gyur to// sgra des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gyur te/ sems can gang gis rgyan gyi sgra de dag
53a4(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs
53a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi char dang spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par bab par gyur te/ me tog gis char de bab pa'i tshe spos kyi dri zhim po'i ngad byung ste/ 'gro zhing ldog go/ spos chu'i char
53a6(dkon brtsegs): de bab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i khor yug tu dpag tshad drug bcu tshun chad spos chus rngub tu gyur to// spos kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
53a7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur to// sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tsher bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
53a8(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis gdugs bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rta bye ba phrag dag bcu rtsa drag dang / rol mo'i sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drag po de dag
53b1(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa de dag par snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal/
53b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
53b3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag kyang smras so// klu'i bu mo mkhas pa de dag yid rangs dga' mgu yid kyis su/ byang chub zhi ba tshol zhing shag kya thub la di ring mchod pa chen po byas// rgyan gyis
53b4(dkon brtsegs): legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu rtsa drug gi gdugs rnams mngon sprul te// bde bar gshegs pa mchod cing rab tu dul ba'i yid kyis chags dang bral// rgyan gyis legs brgyan
53b5(dkon brtsegs): bye ba dbu bcu drug gi rta rnams mngon sprul te// kha dog sngo zhing rgyan kyang sngo ba'i rta la rgyal mtshan sngon pos brgyan// de dag thams cad bar snang 'dong nas thub la rta yis mchod
53b6(dkon brtsegs): pa byed// klu'i bu mo de dag dang ba'i yid kyis thub la mgo bos phyag 'tshal// mchog la mchod pa'i don tu glu'i gnas nas klu'i sil snyan gyis// mchod pa'i 'os gyur
53b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa shig kya thub la der ni mchod pa byas// sil snyan de dag bde bar gshegs la mchod pa'i sgra de khams gsum grag/ sgra de thos pa'i sems can khrag khrig dag ni
53b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yang dag zhugs// de dag rnams kyis der sprul mkha' la bla re chen po gcig tu gyur// phyogs bcur dpag tshad drag cur rgyas shig 'gro ba thams cad khebs
54a1(dkon brtsegs): #par gyur// nor bu rin chen skar ma'i mdog gi gzi brjid phyogs su 'bar zhing gsal// klu'i bu mo dga' nas 'gro ba'i mdun du rgyal la mchod pa
54a2(dkon brtsegs): byas// gzhal du med pa'i sems bskyed dga' nas byang chub zhi pa mo byed cing // 'jig rten don byed bde gshegs sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas pa grub par shog/ ji ltar
54a3(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni sems can sdug bsngal 'grel pa ltar// chos kyang bstan te sems can nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsgribs pa khrag khrig dgrol// chos rnams
54a4(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma rmig rgyu 'dra zhing dbu ba lta bur nyam chung la// char rgyun chu la phog pa'i chu bur lta bur 'jig cing bdag po med// me long nang gi gzugs brnyan 'dra bar 'gro ba thams
54a5(dkon brtsegs): cad brtags na ni// 'gro ba dag la chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag de nyid bstan par bgyi// sgyu ma bkod pa lta bur ma mchis brdzun pa byis pa rmongs bgyid pa// skye bo mi
54a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas ji bzhin ma 'tshal ba dag ma rung bar bgyid pa// byis pa rmongs bgyid chos rnams sdig med khyod kyis de ltar legs par gzigs// de dag ji ltar gzigs pa
54a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin de dag sems can rnams la bstan// ji ltar sa chen 'di la sbyin 'gribs byur na ri ltar gda' ba yang // yang dag tu na ri ltar ngo bo nyid kyis de la gnas ma mchis
54a8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis dbang po rmongs par bgyid// shes pas brtags nas skye bo mkhas pa dag ni rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis// yang dag
54b1(dkon brtsegs): tu ni 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis khyod ston pas// des na 'dren pa rgyal ba khyod la skye bo mkhas pa mi phyed 'gyur// khyod kyis sras rnams chos kyis
54b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshim nas rdzab la zam pa 'dra// 'di ni byis pa'i skye bo'i yul yin 'gro ba 'di ni sgra phyir 'brang // de lta lags pas sdig med yang dag ston pa byis pa'i skye bo'i
54b3(dkon brtsegs): mgon// skyabs dang dpung gnyen gnas dang rten dang rtsa lag khyod la skyabs su mchi// gzhal yas byang chub de btsal slad du rnam par 'dren pa khyod la mchod// sangs
54b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas gyur nas rtogs bgyid sdig bral 'jig rten don rnams bgyid par shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bu mo de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum
54b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rten na ni 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren mchog khyod mdzum mdzad//
54b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal stag 'dzum pa mdzad la rgyu ma mchis pa bdag gis yongs ma mthong // mi'i dbang po'i dam pa 'dzum mdzad pa'i rgyu ni yang dag gsungs// de thos lha mi lha min tshegs
54b7(dkon brtsegs): dang klu'i bu mo gsang ba pa// dri za rnams kyang skyobs pa'i dgongs pa thos nas yid ni dga' bar gyur// 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten rnam 'dren khyod kyis rgyu rnams thams
54b8(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen// rgyal bas chos gang rgyu dang rnam pas mkhyen par ma gyur yongs ma mchis// de ltas bde gshegs rgyal ba khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud 'dzum rgyu gsungs// de thos
55a1(dkon brtsegs): nas ni 'gro ba thams cad yid rangs dogs pa chad par 'gyur// thub pa bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la don kyang thob par mchi// 'khor
55a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'di dag don myong gyur nas yid ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// kun rtogs dbang du mi 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyam 'gyur// bde gshegs khyod kyis 'dzum
55a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad don thos rang 'byung nyid du nges par 'byung // 'khor 'di rgyal ba khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mthong the tsom 'tshal gyur te// sdug bsngal dogs bcas yid mi bde zhing chos la
55a4(dkon brtsegs): som nyi gang 'tshal ba// de dag la ni thub pa ston pas dogs bsal the tsom 'gul du gsol// drang srong khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum bstan myur du bka' stsol the tsom khum/
55a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba gang gis de ring yid ni rnam par srungs shing bdud bcom thul// su zhig yid rab tshim nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis// 'di ni su'i mthu lags
55a6(dkon brtsegs): ston pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'di bka' stsol// thos nas bdag cag yid rangs mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas bde bar 'gyur// khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'dus pa'i 'gro ba 'di
55a7(dkon brtsegs): dag the tsom 'tshal// 'dzum rgyu dga' ba skyed pa bka' stsol thub pa the tsom bsal du gsol// de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tsom ma mchis 'gyur// rgyal da'i
55a8(dkon brtsegs): gsung sgra long dag thos nas de dag yid dga' 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul legs so/
55b1(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'dzum pa 'di ni legs par dris// klu'i bu mos mchod tshe 'jig rten phan phyir ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan// de'i 'bras bu bstan gyis yid gnyis tha ba spangs
55b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis nyon// gang gi don tu ngas ni 'dzum pa 'di mdzad nga'i tshig la nyon// klu'i bu mo 'di dag chags med yid kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs// 'gro ba thams cad
55b3(dkon brtsegs): stong par rnam shig blo ldan dogs med legs par gnas// 'di na byed med tsher med gang zag med cing skye ba po yang med// chos rnams 'di dag brdzun zhing smig rgyu mtshungs
55b4(dkon brtsegs): la me long gzugs brnyan 'dra'// 'di dag rnams kyis mchod byas byas bzo blo gros yang dag ngas shes te// rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang ni 'gro ba stong zhing bdag po med mthong
55b5(dkon brtsegs): legs// mchod pa rnam par phye zhing legs par bkod pa 'di dag sgyu ma 'dra// byang chub gzhal yas khang du smon lam btab pa de yang 'di 'drar stong // gang la gzhal yas
55b6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa de byas pa dang 'gro ba stong shes pas// klu las shi 'phos nis ni lha gnas brgya byin gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// sum bcu rtsa gsum song ste lha'i nang du dga'
55b7(dkon brtsegs): bar me rdzogs nas// ma smad grags dang ldan pa'i lha gnas 'thab bral gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// 'thab bral lha nang gnas te lha'i gnas su dga' ba spyod// lhar gyur
55b8(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs sras rnams de na tshe'i tshad du gnas par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'thab bral dga' ba spyad nas tshe tshad zad pa dang // dga' ldan gnas su lha'i grong
56a1(dkon brtsegs): khyer lha dang brtul zhugs 'dra bar gyur// de dag de na lha'i bu mos bskor nas lha'i dga' ba spyod// pad ma chus mi chags pa bzhin du bde gshegs
56a2(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas blo can gnas// 'gro ba thams cad stong par rtogs rig blo las nyams par yod mi 'gyur// skyob pa rnams kyi dran pa rdo la brkos pa bzhin du yongs mi nyams/
56a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag dga' ldan gnas der gnas te lha'i dga' ba spyad nas ni// tshe zad yongs su zad nas de tshe rab 'phrul dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bde gshegs ma smad grags ldan der
56a4(dkon brtsegs): ni lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod 'gyur te// mi gnas blo gros ldan pa tshe zad par du gnas na gnas par 'gyur// de dag gnas der rab 'phral gyur te lha'i dga' ba spyad nas ni/
56a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa tshe zad blo gros ldan pa chos kyi mthar ni phyin gyur nas// 'dren pa bsam pa thag pa chags med yid ldan chos kyi bsam pa can// chos dang ldan rnams gzhan 'phral
56a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas su lha 'dra bar ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag lha gnas de na gnas shing lha'i dga' ba spyod par 'gyur// bde gshegs ma rmongs blo ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshad gnas par
56a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// mya ngan 'das ltar lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan mnyam nyid zhi bar rtogs// bsam gtan bsam pas tshangs gnas ma smad grags dang ldan par 'gyur// tshangs pa'i
56a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas su bsam gtan 'bras bu spyad gyur nas// der gnas dpe med gyur cing byang chub yid kyis bskal par gnas par gyur// de dag bskal par tshangs gnas 'thun
56b1(dkon brtsegs): par ye shes don gnyer brtul zhugs bzangs// thub pa mkhas pa thabs mkhas de dag 'jig rten don ni mtha' yas byed// mkhas thub de dag de na bsam gtan spyod yul/
56b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan chags pa med// bsam gtan bde ba mnyam nyid 'drar rig byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi// kun tu grol yid drang srong byang chub phyir ni byang chub blo dang ldan// mya ngan
56b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa lta bur bsam gtan blo gcig zhi ba'i mtshan nyid gyur// bde bar gshegs dang bcom ldan sras po byang chub zhi pa yongs tshol ba// tshangs pa'i yid ldan 'jig
56b4(dkon brtsegs): rten don byed de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas// kun kyang tshangs pa'i blo ldan mthar pin sha stag byang chub don gyi phyir// rang 'byung dgongs pa khams gsum lam las 'ongs
56b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nges par 'byung ba ston// tshangs pa la ni gus pa skyed nas 'gro ba byang chub tshol bar 'gyur// tshangs pa'i bsam pa rang 'byung bsam pa nges 'byung mthar thugs shes nas ni//
56b6(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la brtson pa de dag 'gro ba la// ji nas chos tshul 'bras bu myur du shes 'gyur de ltar chos kyang ston// de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas shing
56b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dag la byang chub phyir// phan pa byas nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po byang chub bkod// rgyal ba kun la mchod phyir 'jig rten mkhas mang khrag khrig 'gro bar
56b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// dbang po zhi ba de dag bskal pa skar ma 'dra ba la rgyal bar 'gyur// lha dang mi dang klu dang mdab bzangs dag dang lha min bcas pa dang // dri za bral bum mi 'am/
57a1(dkon brtsegs): @ci tshogs gnod sbyin 'gror bcas dga' zhing mgu// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu ni yongs spangs chos kyis stobs rnyed pa// de dag
57a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yid rangs thal sbyar bde bar gshegs la mgos phyag 'tshal// / kwa'i bu me lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//
57a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos/ yongs su rdzogs par yang rig nas/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' la stsogs pa
