57a4(dkon brtsegs): klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen cing / bcom ldan 'das de la mi mkhyen pa 'am
57a5(dkon brtsegs): mo gzigs pa 'am/ ma gsan pa 'am/ mngon dum mdzad pa gang yang med cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs par gsungs pa/ yang dag par mthong ba nad med pa
57a6(dkon brtsegs): dus chad pa med pa/ nye bar gtod pa/ 'di mthong ba la don yod pa mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya ba ni ngo mtshar rmad du byang ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni rngu
57a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phral che zhing mthu che ba mnga' ba'o// 'di ltar bud med du gyur pa/ rgod pa mi brtan pa/ mi gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa yongs su
57a8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma dge 'dun yang legs par zhugs pa/ drang por zhugs pa/ rigs par zhugs pa/ 'thun par zhugs pa/ 'di ltar bu
57b1(dkon brtsegs): mod du gyur pa/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug mi bzad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la 'jug pa ni/ ngo mtshar che'o snyam ste/
57b2(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar thob pa de dag gi bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ 'dzam bu'i gling rgya mtsho'i ri'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad spos kyi sprin chen pos kun nas yog par byas
57b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di spos kyi dad kyis khyab par byas so// spos kyi dri'i ngad des kyang sangs rgyas kyis zhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/
57b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
57b5(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyang dpag tshad drug cu tshun cad mu tig dmar pos pus mo nub pa tsam du rgyas par gang bar byas so//
57b6(dkon brtsegs): n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra ba de yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches chal par bkang ngo // klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang rgyar dpag tshad drug bcu yod pa rin po ches sna bdun
57b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi ka ba dang ldan pa yang mngon par sprul to// klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul te sgra phyung ngo // klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang de la yang me tog
57b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams pa sna tshogs kyi lda ldi bye ba phrag dbu bcu bres so// rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba de dag kyang bai dUr+ya'i dra bas legs par brgyan to// mdun khang de'i bzhi yang rin thang
58a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i nor bu rin po ches yog par byas par gyur to// 'dun khang de'i gzhi ni 'jam pa sbyar du rung ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sum cu rtsa
58a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rdo leb ar mo lig ltar 'jam pa/ kha dog bai dUr+ya ltar 'dug pa ka tsa lin 'di ka ltar reg ni bde ba nyams dga' ba sems can mthong ba rnams
58a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi mig mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mi dang lha rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba lta bu'o// nor bu rin por che sna tshogs de dag gi nang nas/ nor bu la la las ni mi 'byung /
58a4(dkon brtsegs): la la las ni chu 'byung bar sha stag ste/ de la'ang la la las ni chu kha dog sngon po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog ser po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog dmar pi 'byung /
58a5(dkon brtsegs): la la las ni chu kha dog dkar po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ngo // nor bu la la las ni bde bar bsil ba'i rlung 'byung / nor bu la la las ni de ma
58a6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i yo byad gzhan dag bsam pa bzhin du 'byung / la la las ni snum pa'i bya ba byed/ la la las ni me long gi bya ba byed de/ 'khor de dag thams cad kyang / nor bu rin
58a7(dkon brtsegs): po che de'i nang du snang bar gyur to// ser skya'i gnas na sems can gang ji snyed cig rgyu ba de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang du snang bar gyur te/ thams cad
58a8(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phral de dag rnam par sprul pa mdzad pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang nor bu rin po che de
58b1(dkon brtsegs): dag gi nang na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to// 'dun khang gi gzhi de'i 'og nas kyang kwa'i mthus gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'thon par gyur to// rgyal mtshan
58b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog gis lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / spos kyi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs
58b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / mu tig gi phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog rtseg ma'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rta rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang
58b4(dkon brtsegs): 'bon par gyur to// de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' las stsogs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcus rta de rnams sngon du skri ste/ rkang gis dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das
58b5(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byas te nor bu rin po che tsa ka li 'di ka ltar reg na bde ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to//
58b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dun khang gi gzhi de nas rin po che gang dag mngon par 'thon pa dag de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i steng du char bzhin bab
58b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// klu'i rol mo'i sil snyan dpag tu med pa de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to// de nas klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
58b8(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te cang mi zer bar/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pas rjes su dran par byed cing /
59a1(dkon brtsegs): mig mi 'dzum par lta la/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'dod pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur to//
59a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas de dag gis cung zad cig tu mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byas nas so so nas bla gos phrag pa gcig la bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha
59a3(dkon brtsegs): nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa dag
59a4(dkon brtsegs): gis mngon par bstod pa// mtshan rgya rdzogs pa brtul zhugs legs spyad pa// dka' thub dgyes pa dri med thugs rje can// rin chen 'byung gnas bcas pa sa spangs
59a5(dkon brtsegs): te// bde gshegs khyod ni grong khyer mngon par byang // lo drag bar du dka' thub dka' mdzad de// rgyal ba khyod kyis bdud rtsi ma brnyes kyang // bde gshegs khyod kyi
59a6(dkon brtsegs): thugs ni zham ma gyur// thub pa khyod kyis byang chub thugs kyis spyad// ji ltar 'dren pa lha ma'i bla ma khyod// gro la phan bzhed dka' thub spyad mdzad de// 'jig rten mgon
59a7(dkon brtsegs): po sdug bsngal btar gyur pa// de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'// thub pa dbu dang spyan ni btang ba dang // byang chub sems ni ji ltar bsgrub mdzad pa// bde bar
59a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs kyi dka' spyad thos gyur na// de thos pas kyang bdag cag pa de mi 'gyur// gang tshe ka ling rgyal po bzod smra bas// zhabs dang phyag dang snyan rnams gtubs gyur te/
59b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshengs bcad rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa// de zos pas kyang yid mi dga' bar gyur// phug ron skyabs su mchi ba ma btang ste// gang tshe 'dren khyod srang la gtsal
59b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa// rgyal ba'i de thos nas kyang mi bde ste// bde gshegs byang chub spyod pa sdug bsngal che// bdag cag mi 'tshal ma lags ci zhe na// bde bar gshegs la 'gro/
59b3(dkon brtsegs): ba gnod bgyis pa// ngan song mun par lhung bas bde gshegs kyi// sdug bsngal spyod pa dran nas mi dga' lags// ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa blo 'phags dang // bde
59b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs spyod pa mi 'tshe blor gyur dang // sgrub pa'i tshe na de la mi gnod pa// 'jig rten 'dren pa spyod de bka' stsal gsol// mtha' yas blo mnga' bde gshegs spyod
59b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la// thub pa klu tshogs 'di dag rab tu brtson// ji ltar khyod kyi bka' bzhin spyod 'gyur ba// de ltar bde gshegs byang chub lam bstan gsol// rga shi ma mchis go
59b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phang thob 'tshal zhing // klu tshogs 'di rnams thub pa bsgom par gnas// 'gro ba 'di dag bde bar 'dul gyur pa'i// brtul zhugs spyod bde ba de gshegs bka'
59b7(dkon brtsegs): stsal gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs// lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam btab pa de dag kyang thugs su chud nas// de'i tshe
59b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni chos nyid de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe kha dog sna tshogs dang / kha dog tu ma'i 'od gzer
60a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas// phyir ldog ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
60a2(dkon brtsegs): dbu'i gtsug tu nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ brtul zhugs bzang po dge sbyong thub pa'i rnams/
60a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu med rgyal ba mdzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dren pa bde gshegs thugs rje che mnga' ba// mtshungs med bcom ldan 'dzum rgyu bka' stsal gsol// tshogs kyi slob dpon skye bo 'di
60a4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni// 'dzum rgyu nyan 'tshal khyod kyi zhal du lta// yid ni zhum gyur the tsom 'tshal zhing mchis// mkhas pa the tsom rnam pa bsal du gsol// 'jig rten mkhas pa ston pa
60a5(dkon brtsegs): shag kya thub// de ring su zhig yid ni yongs su dga'// gang gis bdud kyi dbang po mthong gyur te// rmongs par bgyis nas yid ni mi dgar bgyis// tshogs kyi slob dpon
60a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa su zhig gis// bde gshegs chos nyid yab la bsnyen bkur bgyis// bde bar gshegs la mchod pa dam pa bgyis// shag kya seng ge bka' stsol the tsom khum/
60a7(dkon brtsegs): sor bcu thal mo sbyar ba mgor bzhag cing // 'gro ba 'di dag thub pa'i zhal du lta// tshogs kyi slob dpon the tsom bstsal du gsol// 'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu yang
60a8(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// de thos skye bo 'di dag dgar 'gyur te// rgyal bas dgongs pa'i tshul yang rtogs par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa 'khor rnams tshim bgyis na// gzhan du
60b1(dkon brtsegs): mi sems yon tan btas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// thub mkhas 'dren pa tshogs kyi
60b2(dkon brtsegs): slob dpon gyis// tshangs 'dra yan lag brgyad ldan gsung brjod kyis// rta thul skyon med sems kyis dang byos la// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de mnyen par gyis// klu'i dbang
60b3(dkon brtsegs): po de dag dang gyur te// 'gro ba zil gyis mnan nas mchod pa byas// skye bo bde bar yongs smin bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni yongs su tshol// snying rje chen pos
60b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren med pa'i// 'gro ba bltas nas sdug bsngal cis mi bsten// 'gro bas byang chub rgya chen thob bya la// 'dren pa dag ni skye bar yongs mi 'gyur// zhi gnas
60b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar ye shes stobs ldan stobs// mtshan med stong pa de bzhin smon med pa// rnam thar sgo gsum yongs su sgoms nas su// shin tu yongs dag yid can bde bar 'gro
60b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba mtha' dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs te// gang tshe rgyal bas shes rab mtshan thos nas// mnyam pa'i sems dang byams dang snying rje thob// 'gro la snying rje chen po rab bskyed
60b7(dkon brtsegs): nas// snying brtse ldan pa mchog tu snying rje can// 'jig rten mkhas pa bla na med par 'gyur// rgyal ba de dag 'gro 'di mtshungs bsgral nas// de dag dgra bcom rnam par 'dren
60b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// rtag tu bdag med tshig ni nyan byed cing // 'jig rten btam gyi rgyud la mi 'jug ste// de dag bde bar gshegs kyi 'chi med thob// de na bdud med mu stegs tshogs
61a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang med// 'dren pa bde gshegs snying rje ldan pa'i// rgyal ba de dag 'gro ba kun mos byed// bde gshegs bka' dang tshig rnams thams cad dang /
61a2(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs kyi dgongs la mos byed 'gyur// srid par bde gshegs rnams kyis spyad spyod cing // rab 'dir 'gro ba yongs smin byed par 'gyur// mtshungs med thub
61a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bde bar myur du yang // yongs su 'tshang rgya 'chi med thob par 'gyur// thob nas 'gro ba dag kyang mos par 'gyur// skye bo kun kyang gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan// 'gro ba
61a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bde gshegs de dag gi/ dgongs pa'i tshig ni mngon tu shes par 'gyur// phyugs dang bya dang gnod sbyin mi de dag/ rang byung dgos min chung zad byed mi 'gyur//
61a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag kun tu chos rtogs dran dang ldan// bde bar gshegs rnams 'chi med thob par 'gyur// de dag tshig zos sems can gang yang ni// bstan pa de la mi dgar 'gyur
61a6(dkon brtsegs): ba med// bde gshegs de dag gsung la dga' ba'i// 'gro ba 'chi med yang dag 'thob par 'gyur// de tshe 'gro bas rgyal ba'i dgongs legs rtogs// rga ba dang ni na
61a7(dkon brtsegs): dang 'chi ba dang // mya ngan smre sngags 'don las yongs su 'grol// tshig de thos nas ngar 'dzin med par 'gyur// klu'i bsam pa shag kya seng ge la// yongs su zhus nas
61a8(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar de dag rnams// gzhal yas byang chub thob nas thub rnams kyi// ye shes 'jug 'gyur de skad sras la bstan// klu rnams lung bstan yid du 'ong ba'i// rgyal ba'i
61b1(dkon brtsegs): gsung pos 'khor rnams yid dga' ste// de la yid ni rab tu ni gyur nas// dga' ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i skyabs su song // / klu lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/
61b2(dkon brtsegs): brgyad pa'o// / de nas bral bum bye ba phrag bcwa brgyad kyis lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang / klu rnams
61b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/
61b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyis mnga' rgya chen po mnga' zhing / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu byas pas kyang ngo mtshar du mi dgongs
61b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni rgya che zhing yongs su rgyas pa yin pas/ mtho ba 'am dma' bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang chos thams cad
61b6(dkon brtsegs): la the tsom mi mnga' zhing / yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs la// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yangs pa mnga' bas mchod pa 'di lta bu dag pa zhes kyang mtho
61b7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing ngo mtshar du mi dgongs pa ni ngo mtshar shin tu che'o snyam mo// de nas gral bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad po de dag gis bdag cag nyid kyi mchod
61b8(dkon brtsegs): pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir// rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re bye ba phrag bco brgyad mngon par sprul to/ 'di lta ste gser gyi skud pa'i bla re dang / dngul gyi skad
62a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bla re dang / bai dUr+ya'i skud pa'i bla re dang / shel gyi bla re dang / mu tig gi bla re dang / spug gi bla re dang / rdo'i snying po'i bla re sha stag
62a2(dkon brtsegs): go// rin por che'i bla re de dag la yang me tog sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par sprul to// gser gyi skad pa'i bla ri rnams la ni dngul gyi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lnga ldi
62a3(dkon brtsegs): bkye/ dngul gyi skad pa'i bla re rnams la ni gser gyi skud pa'i 'phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ bai dUr+ya'i bla re rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ shel gyi bla re rnams la
62a4(dkon brtsegs): ni bai dUr+ya'i me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ mu tig dmar pe'i bla re rnams la ni spug gi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ spug gi bla re rnams la ni mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi
62a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ rdo'i snying po'i bla re rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lde ldi bkye ba sha stag mngon par sprul to// shing rta bkra ba blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag bco
62a6(dkon brtsegs): brgyad mngon par sprul te/ de dag kyang gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar du'o// shing rta de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thur ma brgya pa gser gyi yu ba can dang / bedur+ya
62a7(dkon brtsegs): yu ba can dang / shel gyi yu ba can bye ba phrag bcwo brgyad mngon par sbrel to// gdugs de dag yang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog gi lnga ldi mngon par sprul te/ 'di lta ste/
62a8(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / dngul gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / bai dUr+ya'i me tog gi lda ldi dang / shel gyi me tog gi lnga ldi dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi lda ldi dang /
62b1(dkon brtsegs): kA'i nor bu'i me tog gi lnga ldi sha stag go// mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dag kyang mngon par sprul to// de dag gis gdugs de dag dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba de dag gis gzungs
62b2(dkon brtsegs): byas so// bral bum gyi rol mo sil snyan dag kyang mngon par sprul to// shing rta de dag re re zhing yang bla re de dag re re rjes su 'brang bar gyur to// de nas bral bram de dag rin po che
62b3(dkon brtsegs): sna bdun gyi shing rta de dag la zhon te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gdags dang / bla re dang / me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te/ mchod pa byed cing bcom
62b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la steng gi bar snang las lan gsum bskor to// bskor nas shing rta de dag las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs
62b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// thams cad du yang mi bsnyengs mnga' dbang can// thub pa chen po mi mtho mi mnga'
62b6(dkon brtsegs): ste// ri'i rgyal po lhun po ri 'dra ba// mchod pa rgya chen 'di dag bzhes su gsol// 'gro ba thams cad ming dang mtshan ma dang // tha snyad tsam mkhyen thub pa chags mi mnga'/
62b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa khyod kyis ting 'dzin zhi bsgrubs pas// shes rab ldan la dregs pa yongs mi mnga'// rgyal ba khyod kyis 'gro ba sgyu 'drar mkhyen// rang bzhin stong ste rmi lam dga'
62b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dra dang // chu zla nam mkha'i smig rgyu lta bur ni// bde bar gshegs pas 'gro ba 'di dag gzigs// dri za'i grong khyer ji ltar snang gyur kyang // grong khyer de ni phyogs bcu kun
63a1(dkon brtsegs): na med// gzhan du grong khyer de ni ming tsam ste// de bzhin bde bar gshegs pas 'gro 'di gzigs// mchod pa 'di kun brag ca ji bzhin te// shing
63a2(dkon brtsegs): rta gdugs dang bla re sil snyan dang // me tog rgyal mtshan thal mo sbyar bgyis pa// brag cha ji bzhin de dag de ltar gda'// 'dren pa mchod pa 'di bgyis bdag cag kyang /
63a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog tu myur 'gyur shog/ rmi lam 'dra bar 'gro ba bdag cag gis// rtogs bgyis rgyal ba khyod bzhin bstan pa bgyi// nad dang rga shis yongs su
63a4(dkon brtsegs): gtses gyur pa'i// skye bo mthong nas bdag cag rnams kyis kyang // byang chub myur thob rga shi med pa'i gnas// gang thos grol 'gyur 'gro la snyan par bgyi// bdag cag byang chub
63a5(dkon brtsegs): lam mchog sangs rgyas nas// sems can blo stor rnams la bstan par bgyi// thub pa 'khrugs med chos rnams rab ston pa// mya ngan 'das mchog sems can bstan par
63a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gral bram de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la
63a7(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de gsol ba// ston pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad de// rnam 'dren 'jig rten mkhas la mtshar mi mnga'// ngo mtshar 'gyur med rgyal bas 'dzum mdzad na// 'dzum
63a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyu legs par bka' stsol nyan par 'tshal// rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum pa mdzad mthong nas// 'gro ba 'di dag the tsom som nyi 'tshal// the tsom 'tshal ba rnams kyis the tsom khum/
63b1(dkon brtsegs): mi'i dbang po 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// gang gis di ring chos la yid bzhag gyur// de ring gang gis chos kyi rgyal yang mthong // deng sus sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod
63b2(dkon brtsegs): pa bgyis// mi'i dam pa bdag ni nyan par 'tshal// de ring 'dus byas sdug bsngal shes gyur nas// gang gis 'ang byed gyur pa'i yid gcig bcom// gang zhig yang dag mthu
63b3(dkon brtsegs): la mi g.yo gnas// rnam dag thugs mnga' bdag ni nyan par 'tshal// di ring su yid 'khor bcas bdud rnams bcom// thub pa ston pa deng sras mnyes par bgyis// 'dren
63b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ring su zhig gting rnyed 'gyur// the tsom mchis te deng bdag de nyan 'tshal// 'dzum mdzad de'i don ni mnyan slad du// 'gro ba kun kyang thal mo sbyar cing gnas// 'dren pa ze
63b5(dkon brtsegs): tsom 'tshal ba'i the tsom stsol// rkang gnyis dam pas lung yang bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta bral la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/
63b6(dkon brtsegs): rta bral khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'dzum pa'i rgyu 'di yongs su dris pas na// 'gro ba'i don yangs khyod kyis byas par 'gyur// de don bstan byes rta thul mnyan par gyis//
63b7(dkon brtsegs): gral bum tshogs kyis nga la mchod byas te// zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag/ mtshar med nga mthong nas ni ngam gyur te// zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag/ de dag
63b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis de ring nga mchod do// zhi ba'i chos la blo gros rnam par btang // lam stor skye bo rnams la snying brtse zhing // bsam pa zag pas snying rje chen po bskyed// snying rje bas na
64a1(dkon brtsegs): nga la mchod pa byas// rab tu lam ston rnams la byams par bsams// mkhas pa de dag las de byas pas na// gral bum skye gnas shi 'phos brtul
64a2(dkon brtsegs): zhags bzung // brgya byin lha'i drang du 'dod par gyur// thugs rje byams don mdzad ston drang du'ang 'dong // des ni cung zad yang dang yang bstan te// phyir zhing chos la the tsom med
64a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// de dag bskal pa gang gi'i bye snyed du// zhing nas zhing du rnams par rgyu byed cing // bdag nyid chen po'i chos la mchod pa byed// go cha chen po rab tu bgos yid kyis//
64a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag skyo ba med par 'jig rten mkhas// khrag khrig mtha' yas rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur// skye bo mang po'i don byed 'dren 'gyur te// ngo mtshar med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/
64a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag zhing rnams gang du 'gro rgyu ba// der ni 'gro bas rgyal ba byung bar shes// de dag thabs kyis ma 'ongs dus dag na// ngo mtshar med par skye bo rna grol byed// rgyal ba ngo mtshar
64a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa zhing sbyong zhing // rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med zhi ba tshol// de dag tshol ba la yang mi gnas te// 'di ltar bla med byang chub gnas phyir ro// de ltar 'dzum rgyu rgyal bas lung
64a7(dkon brtsegs): stan cing // bde bar gshegs pas 'jig rten dogs bstsal to// bral bum mchod pa'i 'bras bu nges thos nas// 'gro ba the tsom bsal te dga' bar gyur//
64a8(dkon brtsegs): gra la bum lung bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas de'i tshe dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu'i
64b1(dkon brtsegs): bu mo rnams dang / kla' rnams dang / bral bum rnams kyi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang
64b2(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba skyes nas ngo mtshar thos par gyur nas/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings 'gyur ba med pa yang / yang dag par bka' stsal/ bya ba rnams kyang yang dag
64b3(dkon brtsegs): par bstan te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba yang bstan la/ chos gang la yang lung bstan pa med par yang yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni/ ngo mtshar smad do snyam nas/ de dag
64b4(dkon brtsegs): gis chos de lta bu khong du chud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba'i sems rgya chen po skyes nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos par gyur te//
64b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srang po sa srang gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug mngon
64b6(dkon brtsegs): par sprul to// glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag re re zhing mgo bo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drag/ mgo bo re re zhing so bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drag so re re la yang rdzing bu brnyan bdon/ rdzing bu
64b7(dkon brtsegs): re re zhing yang pad ma bdun bdun/ pad ma re re zhing yang mdab ma bye ba phrag stong stong / mdab ma re re zhing yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re zhing yang 'khor rgyan
64b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lha'i gdug spos thogs pa bdun bdun/ zhing pad ma'i lo ma'i mtha' mtha' na 'khod pas bskor ba mngon par sprul to// glang po ches srung gi
65a1(dkon brtsegs): bu de dag gi mgo bo re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs nas rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba dag gis bzungs byas pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi bres
65a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar dang ldan pa bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// glang po che'i mgo bo thams cad la yang lha'i spos kyi bla re sna tshogs rin por che sna tshogs kyi lnga ldi bres pa sha
65a3(dkon brtsegs): stag mngon par sprul te/ de nas dri za de dag glang po che sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drag dag la zhon te/ lha'i rol mo'i sil snyan len cing nam mkha' las rgyu ste/ bcom
65a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la len sum cu rtsa drag tu bskor ba byas nas/ lha'i tsan dan gyi phye mas bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor to// lha'i a ga ru'i phye ma
65a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha'i ta ma la'i lo ma dang / ud pa la'i phye ma dang / lha'i gser phye dang / lha'i me tog ma 'da' ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha chen po dang /
65a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gser dang /
65a7(dkon brtsegs): dngul dang / be durar+ya dang / shel dang sdug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po'i me tog rnams dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par
65a8(dkon brtsegs): gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// spos kyi bla re de dag las spos kyi ngad byung ste 'gro zhing ldog go/ lha'i spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char yang steng gi bar snang las mngon par
65b1(dkon brtsegs): bab po// spos chu'i char de mngon par bab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun cad spos chus rdzab tu gyur te/ spos chu'i rdza ba de'i dris
65b2(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/ sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa dang / rol mo sil snyan dag
65b3(dkon brtsegs): gi sgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de ltar dri za re res kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i
65b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir glang po ches srang gi bu'i mgo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug la/ lha mo gla len pa dang / gar byed pa 'khod pa dag gis mchod de/ skye bo thams cad kyang 'dun par byas so// lha'i bu me
65b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag las la la ni lus kyi tshul sgra/ la la ni tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma yang 'thor/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / spos rnam pa sna tshog
65b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi phye ma 'thor/ la la ni me tog man dar ba dang / man da ra ba chen po nas/ skya snar khra bo dang / skya sngar bkra chen gyi bar gyi me tog dang sprul pa'i me tog rnams 'thor/ la la ni gser
65b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi me tog nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi me tog dang / dbyigs dang gser dang / rin po che snyim pas blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ la la ni na bza' dag 'thor
65b8(dkon brtsegs): la la ni zhabs kyi rgyan dang / ska rigs dang / gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches spras pa'i bar dag 'bul lo// la la ni gser gyi dra ba dag 'dzin/ la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi
66a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / tshon sna tshogs can 'dzin/ la la ni lha'i spos chu'i char 'bebs te/ lha ma yin gyi bu
66a2(dkon brtsegs): mos tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// de nas dri za de dag glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu de la zhon nas/
66a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed byed pa las/ glang po ches srang gi bu de dag las babs te/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ zhabs la mgo bos
66a4(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// bcom ldan bde gshegs srid pa'i
66a5(dkon brtsegs): mthar 'byin pa// srid pa'i bcings las 'gro ba rnams grol mdzad// khyod 'dra srid gsum gang na'ang ma mchis te// khyu mchog khyod ni gzugs dang mtshan mchog mnga'// mi mchog
66a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis sa chen 'di snyed du// grags pa mtha' yas mnga' bas ngo mtshar bstan// 'gyur bgyid chos ni gang la yang ma mchis la// dge ba'i tshogs la 'gro ba rab tu bkod//
66a7(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid// brjod pa tsam ste gzhan ni ci ma mchis// tha snyad gdags dang tha snyad 'dogs ma mchis// 'on kyang bde gshegs khyod ni 'gro ba
66a8(dkon brtsegs): sbyong // bde bar gshegs pas song me dang 'ongs med dang // gzhan med rang bzhin gyis ni stong pa dang // chos rnams 'di dag rang bzhin med ces bstan// rgyal ba mchog gis
66b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba rnams kyang bstan// chos rnams gang yang bya ba byed ma mchis// 'jig rten gtso bos bya ba'ang yongs su bstan// bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi dgos la// bcom
66b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bgyi ba kun kyang bstan// shing rta'i yan lag rnam pa sna tshogs dang // bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi sems kyang // shing rta'i bgyi ba dag kyang bgyid par
66b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// de bzhin chos kun bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// chos ni chos la yongs su skal mi bgyid// chos ni chos la dran par bgyid ma mchis// chos rnams chos la nye
66b4(dkon brtsegs): bar mi rten te// chos rnams gang yang ma skyes 'chi ma mchis// 'gro ba 'di dag kun rdzob mngon par gsungs// kun rdzob de yang de na ma mchis te// 'gro ba 'di kun kun rdzob ji
66b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin zhes// tshogs kyi slob dpon khyod kyis yongs dag gsungs// ming gi rang bzhin gang na'ang ma mchis la// bde bar gshegs pas bya ba rnam par bzhag ga chos tshul 'di 'dra
66b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bstan pas na// 'jig rten mkhas pas shin tu ngo mtshar mdzad// de bzhin bdag cag bde gshegs nyid gyur te// nor bu'i 'gro ba blo gros stor pa rnams// chos kyis
66b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi tshul la gzungs bgyis te// zhi ba'i go 'phang ci med thob par bgyi// rnam par 'dren pa khyod ni ci 'dra bar// 'dren pa bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas pa// thugs
66b8(dkon brtsegs): rje ldan pa phan bzhed 'jig rten mkhas// bsod nams brgya'i mtshan dang ldan par shog/ ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis// nga rgyal bsgribs pa'i 'gro
67a1(dkon brtsegs): ba sdug bsngal ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan rgyun gyi rjes 'gro ba// mngon dga' sdug bsngal brgya las yongs su dgrol// ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin
67a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gis// 'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod pa myong gyur la// g.yo'i zhags pas zin cing mu ma mthong // yongs 'thom spre'u ltar rgod pa yongs su dgrol// ji ltar bde gshegs
67a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod bzhin bdag cag gis// 'gro ba mi mkhas mig dang bral ba yis// lha tshogs yongs skyo gnyid kyis log gyur cing // bdag nyid las kyis 'bras bu chud gzon dgrol/
67a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa drag po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom
67a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// bde gshegs mtha' yas gzigs pas 'dzum pa mdzad// 'dren pa rgyu ma mchis par mi 'dzum na// bde gshegs 'dzum pa'i
67a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ni myur du gsungs// nem nur gnod gyur rnams kyi the tsom sol// bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal gyi 'dzum mthong nas// skye bo 'di dag the tsom rnyed par gyur// 'dzum pa'i don ni
67a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag nyan par 'tshal// thub chen 'gro ba'i the tsom bstsal du gsol// bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la su zhig bzhugs// the tsom bral zhing som nyi bstsal bar gyur// bcom
67a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gang gi bsam mkhyen nas// mi'i mchog gi 'dzum pa bstan pa mdzad// su zhig bde gshegs bka' stsal tshul bzhin da// blo gros rtogs pa chos bzhin
67b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas par gyur// gang gi blo gros dran rtogs blo mkhyen nas// bde gshegs 'gro ba'i nang du 'dzum pa mdzad// 'gro ba 'di dag blo gzhan yongs btang ste// bde gshegs
67b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum don zhal nas zos par dga'// sor bcu thal sbyar mgo la bzhag bgyis shing // dga' ba'i yid kyis ston pa'i zhal du lta// nyon mongs bral zhing mya ngan rab spangs pa/
67b3(dkon brtsegs): dgyes pa'i thugs mnga' thub chen 'jig rten mig/ 'gro ba'i yid gnyis som nyi bsal du gsol// rgyal ba'i thugs rje ldan pas 'dzum rgyu gsungs// de nas bcom ldan
67b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// 'gro ba'i don du 'dzum pa ngas mdzad pa// khyod kyis don dris 'thun zhing legs pa ste// 'dzum pa
67b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i don ni lung bstan pas// skye bo'i tshogs kyis don ni de ring 'phel// 'dzum mdzad rgyu de rta thul mnyan par gyis// rnam par 'dren pas 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// de ni ma log par
67b6(dkon brtsegs): yang ngas bstan gyis// bstan pa de la dga' ba'i sems kyis nyon// dri za 'di rnams chos kyis rjes snyegs shing // bde bar gshegs la mchod pa 'di dag byas// chos nyid
67b7(dkon brtsegs): byung bar gyur pa med pa ste// chos nyid zad par 'gyur ba'ang med pa yin// rgyal ba rnams rtogs sgyu ma lta bur gnas// rtog par mi byed de dag rmongs par 'gyur// gang gis chos gang
67b8(dkon brtsegs): rjes su brjod bya ba// des ni de nyid stong zhes bde gshegs gsungs// de dag nga'i tshig de rtogs gyur nas// rta med glang po mchog gis mchod pa byas// byang chub dga' med 'chi
68a1(dkon brtsegs): med tshol byed cing // dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyis nga mchod do// nor ba'i 'gro la snying rje bskyed nas ni// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'di dag mos//
68a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag nga la mchod pa 'di byas pas// dri za'i ris por dga' ba'i yid gyur te// blo gros bzang rnams lha gnas lha yul pa// brgya byin lha 'dus par ni 'gro bar 'gyur/
68a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag sangs rgyas bde gshegs rdul med pa// bye ba khrag khrig mang la mchod byed 'gyur// zhing nas zhing de rjes su rgyu byed cing // de dag la ni mkhas pa chos kyang nyan// de dag
68a4(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs spyod pa yongs su skyong // de dag zhing yang rta pAr yongs dag 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gdungs 'dzin de dag sems can ni// khrag khrig mang po dga' la byang chub
68a5(dkon brtsegs): ston// 'gro ba 'di dag rang bzhin stong rig nas// bde gshegs 'gro ba dag la ston par 'gyur// rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen cing kun gzigs pa// rdul med bskal pa
68a6(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig bzhugs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mtshan ni mtha' yas rtogs pa ste// sangs rgyas re re khrag khrig phrag mang ba'o// bskal pa rnams su rdul med gnas
68a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'di rjes su ston// rgyal ba thub pa nyon mongs bcom pa yis// de ltar ni tshe dri zas mchod lung bstan// rta thul gyi ni 'dzum
68a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don zhus pa// dri za lung bstan pa ni bshad pa mdzad// dri za lung stan yid du 'thad 'gyur ba// de zos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga'// der ni bde bar gshegs kyi
68b1(dkon brtsegs): gsung thos nas// shag kya thub la thams cad skyabs su 'dong // / dri za lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas gnod sbyin bye ba phrag
68b2(dkon brtsegs): brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas dri za'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid
68b3(dkon brtsegs): bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi rnam pa la rim gro chen po bskyed de/ chos nyid la 'jug pa yang thos pas/ ston pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to// bcom ldan
68b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyang blo zad mi shes pa'i 'du shes skyed par gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das blo zad mi shes pa zhes bya bar rig nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par
68b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
68b6(dkon brtsegs): bstod pa// mngon shes stobs ni kun tu mtha' yas te// rgya mtsho chu 'dzin pas ma 'tshal dang 'dra// de bas mtshungs med 'jig rten phan mdzad pa// mi'i seng ge khyod la
68b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar bstod// ri rab srang la btsag par nas kyang gda'// gzi brjid chen po namakha' gzhal rung gda'// shes rab mchog mnga' bde gshegs ye shes stobs/
68b8(dkon brtsegs): tshad gzung dpag par nus pa yongs ma mchis// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa thugs su chud// skye bo drang rung mi dur gdul min pa// de dag las kyis rnam pa mngon par mkhyen/
69a1(dkon brtsegs): de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas// de dag ci 'dra'i khams la sten pa dang // de dag sems rgyu ci 'drar 'byung ba dang // de dag mos bcu
69a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ma lus mkhyen// de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas// 'dod chags spyod dang de bzhin zhe sdang spyod// mi'i gti mug spyod pa de bzhin mkhyen// phra dog rnam pa'ang
69a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin mkhyen pa ste// de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas// 'gro ba 'di dag lam rgyud gar khyams pa// de dag mtshungs med khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// de la ye shes
69a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyun tu rab 'byung bas// de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas// bde bar gshegs pas 'gro kun rab tu gzigs// chud za'i lam rgyud gang du khyams gyur cing // byam
69a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs las rab tu nyams gyur pa// de dag ma lus khyod kyis rab tu gzigs// 'gro ba rnams na ji srid dus gnas shing // ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag reg 'gyur dang /
69a6(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi rnam pa ci'ang 'chang ba rnams// de dag 'dren pa khyod kyis rab tu gzigs// mi'i seng ges lta ba ci 'dra dang // gang gis sdug bsngal rnam par thob gyur par// gang
69a7(dkon brtsegs): la brten cing las rnams bgyid 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung ste// rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni gang zhig gis//
69a8(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dra'i lam la de dag bsten bgyis shing // ci 'dra'i zhi ba 'thob 'gyur khyod kyis mkhyen// byis pa gang rnams bde gshegs bstan pa la// rab tu byung zhing 'jig rten mkhas
69b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yi// bstan pa rab phra ji ltar spong 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs// 'jig rten phan pa'i bstan la brnyas bgyis pas// dmyal ba chen por ji srid gnas
69b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang // ji 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag myong 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs// gang dag rgyal ba rnams la dad bskyed de// rab tu byung nas rgyal ba'i bstan
69b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin cing // chos kun stong pa nyid du yongs brtags nas// mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig bgyis shing // 'gro rgyud kun tu smon pa rnams spangs te// lus 'di sgyu ma 'dra bar
69b4(dkon brtsegs): rab brtags nas// phung po brag ca 'dra bar rtogs gyur te// byang chub sems ldan de dag rab tu gzigs// mgon po khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang // mtshungs med khyod
69b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis ji ltar thugs chud pa// de yis bla med sangs rgyas grub par shog/ 'gro ba kun kyang rang byung thob gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad
69b6(dkon brtsegs): cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// mi'i seng ge 'ja
69b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di mdzad pa// mi'i zla ba rang byung gyur pa ni// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum pa de'i rgyu ni bka' stsal gsol// ston pa'i zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas//
69b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag the tsom 'tshal// mgon pos de dag the tsom bsal du gsol// 'jig rten 'di dag dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur// de ring su zhig rgyal la dad pa bskyed//
70a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis chos rgya chen po rnams par rtogs// gang gi sems ni mi skul gnas par 'gyur// de dag rgyal bas 'gro ba bstan du gsol// de ring 'khor
70a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams the tsom che 'tshal zhing // kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal da lta zhing sdod// ci nas the tsom ma mchis kun 'gyur ba// de ltar dpa' bos the tsom stsal du gsol// de ring 'di ni gang gis
70a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam 'phral lags// gang gis brtson 'grus bzang po 'dir bstan lags// gang zhig khyod dang 'dir 'jam don mchis 'gyur// de ni legs par 'gro la bka' stsal gsol/
70a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba 'gro ba dag la phan bzhed pa// the cim 'tshal ba'i yid gnyis legs bstsal gsol// de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams// dga' zhing mgu ba dag kyang 'thob par
70a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// de ring 'gro ba dag ni don chen byas//
70a6(dkon brtsegs): rang byung 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni dris pas na// ston pa'i dgongs pa'ang khyod kyis legs pa mthong // de dag lung bstan ma lus bstan par bya// gnod sbyin tshogs kyi yid ni gzigs gyur
70a7(dkon brtsegs): nas// 'grol phan pa'i don tu 'dzum mdzad pa// dad pa'i yid kyis rta thul mnyan par gyis// rgyal ba'i byang chub zhi ba shes gyur nas// gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mos pa'i sems
70a8(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de// 'byung po'i tshogs dbus sangs rgyas bstod byas nas// byang chub dam pa mchog tu yid kyang btang // chos rnams stong pa nyid du shes pa dang // mtshan ma thams cad rnam
70b1(dkon brtsegs): par gzhig pa'i phyir// 'gro ba kun tu smon pa rnam spangs shing // byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang // rnal 'byor stobs kyis phung po rnams bshig cing // kun rdzob tsam du rig
70b2(dkon brtsegs): nas mi chags te// srid pa kun tu chu la pad ma bzhin// byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang // de dag srid pa gang du chags 'gyur ba// stong par gshegs te thams cad legs
70b3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa// de nyid rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub ste// byang chub phyir dben pa yi brtul zhugs shes// skye dang rga shi yongs gis stong pa ste// de ni rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub yin// dngos
70b4(dkon brtsegs): po'i rang bzhin stong par shes gyur nas// zhi ba bla med byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// phung po'i rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid// byang chub rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid// gang spyod
70b5(dkon brtsegs): de yang rang bzhin stong pa ste// ye shes ldan pas shes kyi byis pas min// ye shes rang bzhin stong par rig gyur te// shes bya'i rang bzhin stong par rig gyur nas// shes pa po
70b6(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra bar rdzogs gyur nas// byang chub lam la de dag spyod ces bya// stong pa'i rang bzhin stong par shes par bya// mtshan ma med pa'ang rang bzhin nyid kyis stong // smon pa med pa'
70b7(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin stong pa ste// de ltar spyod na gzhan min spyod po yin// de bos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams// dga' zhing de dag stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// rang byung chos
70b8(dkon brtsegs): la de dag yid ches te// zhi ba'i gnas shes byang chub yid ldan 'gyur// gnod sbyin tshogs rnams dang mos yid gyur te// 'di ltar nga la mchod pa rab byas pas// gnod
71a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin rgyud nas shi 'phos blo can rnams// mtho ris dong zhing yun ring dga' bar 'gyur// de dag ma 'ongs dus na rdzu 'phrul gyis// zhing du dong zhing skad
71a2(dkon brtsegs): cig gcig la yang // blo can de dag rgyal ba bye ba mchod// de dag bzod mkhyen rgyal ba gdams ngag ston// de dag 'jig rten phyogs bcur rdzu 'phrul gyis// mtshan ma med par spyod
71a3(dkon brtsegs): cing 'dod gyur te// 'jig rten 'di dag sprul pa 'drar shes nas// 'jig rten chags med mkhas pa spyad pa spyod// de ltar bstan pas rgyal ba rab mchod nas// byang chub bla med
71a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'thob 'gyur te// de dag rnams kyi zhing ni mtha' yas 'gyur// sems can mtha' yas pa dag rnam par 'grel// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas grags pa can//
71a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag ming ni 'jig rten mkhas shes bya// zhi ba'i blo ldan rgyal ba de dag gi/ tshe zad bskal pa stong ni tshang bar 'gyur// de dag nyan thos dge 'dun 'gyur ba ni// rgyal sras mang po
71a6(dkon brtsegs): skar ma'i tshogs rnyed de// kun kyang bde bas bsam pa thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa rnams la sdug bsngal med// de skad thos nas lhar bcas 'jig rten dag/ rab tu
71a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub tshol// ngoms par gyur nas brtson pa brtan brtsams te// kun kyang brtson 'grus stobs kyis brtan par gyur// / gnod sbyin lung
71a8(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa las stsogs pa mi 'am ci bye ba phrag brgyad kyis lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de dag dang /
71b1(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin gyi mchod pa'i bar dag kyang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ shin tu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar sems can yang mi dmigs la/ srog dang skye ba
71b2(dkon brtsegs): po dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / gang zag dang / bdag dang bdag gi yang gang yang med la/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched gang la sems can zhes pa dgas
71b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched de dag kyang mi dmigs/ las gang yod par rnam par smin par gdags par bya ba'i las de yang mi dmigs// byang chub kyang mi dmigs/
71b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs// sangs rgyas kyang mi dmigs la/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa mdzad pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmado//
71b5(dkon brtsegs): ci zhig las dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa mdzad/ ci zhig las dgongs te/ byang chub sems
71b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin pa dang / zhing bkod pa de dang / zhing yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems
71b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams zhing nas zhing du 'dor ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / mchod pa de'i mthu dang / sems can rnam par dgod pa dang / bskal pa 'di snyed cig gis
71b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
72a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi nyan thos 'dus pa ni 'di snyed du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'di snyed gcig
72a2(dkon brtsegs): tu gnas par 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa mdzad/ ci zhig las dgongs te/ sems can rnams nye bar len pa med pas mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro zhes
72a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa mdzad snyam ste/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa de lta bu'i the tsom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
72a4(dkon brtsegs): de bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zha ba zhes pa// rgyal ba'i gsung ni thos gyur nas// shes rab che mnga' ba dag dogs skyes// stong pa nyid dang
72a5(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa// bde gshegs bdag gi de ma 'tshal// gsung ba'i zla ba chos kyi dbyings// 'gyur ma mchis la stong pa dang // rang bzhin med gsung ji lta bu// mchod pa
72a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ci gang zag mchog/ skye ba 'ang ma mchis byang chub tu// sems bskyed pa ni ji lta bu// skyes bu mchog gis bka' stsal pa'i// ldem po'i ngag de bdag ma 'tshal// mi dbang
72a7(dkon brtsegs): stug po ji ltar na// 'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho gsung // de ni yang dag lung bstan pas// thub pa bdag gi the tsom khum// sgyu ma 'dra la lhar skyes zhes// gsungs pa de ni ji
72a8(dkon brtsegs): lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // shag kya seng ge bdag ma 'tshal// gnas pa'ang mchis pa ma lags la// dge bshes brten gsung ji lta bu// ldem por gsung
72b1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag kyang // skyes bu khyu mchog bdag ma 'tshal// g.yo ba'ang ma mchis bgyi ba rnams// rkang gnyis mchog gsung ji lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang /
72b2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal bcom ldan bdag ma 'tshal// rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang // rtogs shes mgon gsungs ji lta bu// the tsom rnam pa 'di 'dra skyes// shes rab dpe med bdag ma
72b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal// zhi ba yod ces bka' stsal pa// chos kun zhi gsungs ji lta bu// mtshungs med 'di 'dra'i ldem po'i ngags pa dag la rnam par bstan du gsol// skra mdzes gyur kyang
72b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnams// nam mkha' 'drar gsungs ji lta bu// chos ni rab tu spangs bgyis na// mi mkhas dmyal ltung ji lta bu// bstan pa mtho ris 'jig rten dang // 'gro ba gzhan
72b5(dkon brtsegs): yang sa gsungs pa dang // las de bgyis pa ma mchis la// rang la can gsung ji lta bu// bka' stsal tshul 'di rnam pa yang // zil gyis mi non bdag ma 'tshal// mgon
72b6(dkon brtsegs): po de la bdag dogs na// bde gshegs bdag gi the tsom stsol// dge ba'i tshogs gyur ma mchis la// byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa'ang gsung // dge slong rgyal po'i
72b7(dkon brtsegs): gsungs gi tshul// de skad bka' bstsal bdag ma 'tshal// chos rnams zad pa med gsungs la// spong byed las ni zad bstan pa// tshad med blo mnga' 'ad la yang /
72b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni yid gnyis the tsom 'tshal// yang dag mtha' yas bka' stsal la// ma nor sbyin pa'ang bstan mdzad pa// 'di yang rab rib bral ba'i// spyan mda' sdig spang
73a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan tu gsol// thams cad gzigs pa ma gtogs par// gzhan gyis bdag gi the tsom 'di// sel nas ma mchis de lta bas// bdag ni
73a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba mchog la dang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas the tsom dris pa/ 'di dag gsan nas de la lan gdeb pa'i phyir/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po
73a3(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa// bdag gis ma 'tshal ces smras pa// gal te 'ga' zhig mi stong na// rgyal bas de lung stan
73a4(dkon brtsegs): mi gsung // ci phyir zhe na 'di lta bur// rang gi rang bzhin gnas gyur na// 'gyur ba med cing ther zug ste// de la 'phel med 'grib pa med// me long bzhin tu yongs dag la/
73a5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar rang bzhin med pa'i// gzugs brnyan snang ba de bzhin du// ljon pa chos rnams shes par gyis// chos kyi dbyings ni 'gyur med na// mchod pa'i yan lag 'gyur gang
73a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes// yan lag rnams la brtag byos la// ljon pa mchod pa 'di la dpyod// chos dbyings rnam pa thams cad du// 'gyur med skye bo mkhas pas rtogs// byis pa rnams
73a7(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di la 'khrul// blo sbyangs pas ni med par shes// skye ba'ang ma mchis sems kyang bskyed// de ni ma 'tshal ces smras pa// bstobs bcu mnga' ba'i ldem po dag/ gzhan
73a8(dkon brtsegs): du ma sems mnyan par gyis// byis pa 'khor bar dga' ba'i rnams// 'khor bar mngon dga' sems zhen pa// log pa'i sems dang 'du shes can// 'khor ba'i sdug
73b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal myong bar gyur// de dag sngon cad ma thos pa'i// sems med chos ni ngas bshad na// byis pa'i blo dang ldan pa'i rnams// 'di la kun tu rmongs par 'gyur// byang chub
73b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhol ba'i sems nyid dang // byang chub phan yon thos gyur nas// zil gyis ma non rang byung sems// rgya chen de ni thob par 'gyur// 'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho ba// de yang
73b3(dkon brtsegs): ma 'tshal ces smras pa// 'chi 'pho yang dag lung bstan gyis// gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis// gang dag rtag 'dzin de dag la// 'di la mi 'gyur ther zug med// dngos po
73b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag mi rtag ces// bde gshegs 'chi 'pho rnam par bstan// sgyu ma 'dra la lhar skye ba// ji lta bu zhes dogs gyur pa// mthar phyin ma gyur slob pa dang // skye bo rnams la mtho ris
73b5(dkon brtsegs): bshad// gnas pa'ang yod pa ma yin la// dge bshes brten ces gang smras pa// gnas dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir// gnas pa med pa'i dge ba shes bstan// g.yo ba ma
73b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis bgyi ba rnams// bstan pa ma 'tshal zhes smras pa// shing rta'i yan lag 'dus pa dang // shing rta'i bya ba bzhin du rtogs// mi gang bdag yod khas len cing // bya ba la
73b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis byas 'dzin pa// de dag la ni bya ba dang // g.yo ba med par bde gshegs bshad// rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang // rtogs shes nga yis gang smras pa// byis pa/
73b8(dkon brtsegs): log pa'i blo can rnams// rang bzhin stong par mi shes pa// de dag rnams la bstan pa'i phyir// rang bzhin stong zhes bde gshegs ston// kun tu rtogs pa'i rtogs
74a1(dkon brtsegs): pas bskyed// yang dag ma yin rtog pas bcings// zhi ba yod cing chos kun kyang // zhi bar mthong zhes smras pa ni// mi shes
74a2(dkon brtsegs): rmongs par gyur rnams kyi// kun tu rtogs las sred pa skye// skom pas ji ltar smig rgyu la// kun tu rtog pas skom pa skye// mi mkhas des ni rtog pa'i rgyu// yod pa
74a3(dkon brtsegs): min la log par brtags// chu yin par ni mthong gyur kyang // smig rgyu la ni chu med do// de bzhin yongs su rtogs pas bkrugs// sdug pa min la sdug par rtog
74a4(dkon brtsegs): byis pa 'dod chags ldan pa dag/ sdug dang ldan pa rang bzhin gyis// sdug med smig rgyu'i chu bzhin te// smig rgyu la ni chu med do// de bzhin gzugs la sdug pa med/
74a5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs de sdug pa ma yin na// byas pa'i log pa'i 'du shes can// sdug par rtog pas bcings par gyur// chos rnams nam mkha' 'dra ba dang // spong ba dmyal
74a6(dkon brtsegs): ltung zhes smras pa// med pa mthong bar ma gyur pa// mi mkhas rnams ni skrag par 'gyur// rang bzhin ngo bo nyid stong na// bdag zhen dus ni mi shes pa// de dag stong
74a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes thos gyur na// bdag med 'gyur zhes skrab pa ste// de dag bdag tu mngon zhen te// nam mkha' la ni mdung bor nas// stong pa gya nom spong byed de// mi mkhas
74a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dmyal chen por ldang // mtho ris 'jig rten ngas bstan dang // skye bo 'gro rgyud gzhan dag dang // las kyang ngas ni bstan byas te// byed pa po ni rab tu bkag
74b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag tu na 'gro ba dag/ mi 'drar bshad par shes par gyis// rmi lam gang la'ang dngos po med// log pa'i blo ldan mngon par zhen// ngas ni las kyi rnam pa
74b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan// byed po phyogs bcu rnams na med// shing rnams rlung gis bskal ba las// me 'byung 'gyur ba ji bzhin no// bdag cag med 'di bskyed bya zhes// rlung dang
74b3(dkon brtsegs): shing la sems pa med// 'on kyang me ni 'byung ba ltar// las kyi byed pa de bzhin no// bsod nams tshogs ni yod min la// byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa dang /
74b4(dkon brtsegs): legs spyod yod ces zer ba ni// de tshul yang dag mnyan par byos// mi'i tshe tshad lo brgya ste// de srid 'tsho zhes brjod mod kyis// lo la phung por spungs pa med// sgrub
74b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang de dang mtshungs// zad pa med ces gang smras dang // las zad ces ni ngas smras pa// stong pa'i tshul du zad pa med// tha snyad tshul du zad par bstan// yang
74b6(dkon brtsegs): dag mtha' ni ngas bshad pa// phyin ci log de'ang yang dag mtha'// log pa'i blo can byis pa rnams// yang dag mtha' ni mi shes so// mtshan nyid thams cad gcig
74b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid de// mtshan nyid med par shes pa ni// ye shes lam du zhugs rnams kyi// nges pa ljon pa khyod nyon cig/ yi ge gcig gis 'jug pa yis// byang chub blo ldan
74b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bstan// chos rnams thams cad ma byas pa// a'i sgo'i gzungs su bstan// de ltar spyod pa byed rnams la// mtshan nyid mtha' yas ngas bstan te/
75a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'dri'i tshul la 'jug pa ni// a'i sgo'i gzungs su bstan// chos rnams thams cad 'gag med pa/
75a2(dkon brtsegs): a'i sa chos la 'jug par bstan// a'i sgo'i gzungs bstan pa// de yang ljon pas shes par gyis// chos rnams rnam par rtog med pa// de yang chos la 'jug
75a3(dkon brtsegs): par gsungs// chos kun 'gyur ba med pa yang // a ni chos kun sgo mor bstan// a'i sgo'i gzungs 'di dag/ ljon pas 'di ltar shes par gyis// mi zad pa dang
75a4(dkon brtsegs): zad smras pa// chos kun mi zad brjod bya ste// stobs bcu mnga' ba thams cad kyis// mi zad sgo'i gzungs su bstan// chos rnams kun la sgo med de// de dag med pas
75a5(dkon brtsegs): sgo mi 'byung // 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a las brten nas 'jug par bya// chos kun bsam gyis mi khyab ces// yang dag ji bzhin bde gshegs bstan/
75a6(dkon brtsegs): a'i sgo'i gzungs bstan pa// 'di yang ljon pas shes par gyis// chos kun lus med byang chub ces// blo ldan rnams la ngas bstan pa// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin/
75a7(dkon brtsegs): te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams 'ongs pa med pa ste// med pas de dag 'ong ba'ang med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas
75a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par bya// chos rnams gdags pa med pa ste// med pas de dag gdags pa med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya/
75b1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams rang bzhin med pa ste/ med pas de dag rang bzhin med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan// gzungs kyi sgo
75b2(dkon brtsegs): mo nga las nyon// chos kun yid la bya ba med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan// med phyir chos kun sgrib med ces/
75b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas bstan mdzad pa// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas shes par bya// chos kun thogs pa med pa ste// thogs par bya ba
75b4(dkon brtsegs): de mi dmigs// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par// mkhas pas mtshan nyid gcig gis bya/
75b5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams gang dag ma skyes pa// de dag ming med shes par bya// chos rnams yang dag ma yin te// de dag ma gus rang bzhin med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo
75b6(dkon brtsegs): yin te// a la sa brten nas shes par bya// gang dag ma skyes ma byung ba// de dag mthong med bstan par bya// lta ba po ni med pa dang // de dag rnams kyang
75b7(dkon brtsegs): med phyir ro// chos kun mnyam med de bas na// mtshan nyid gcig cing mtshan gzhi med// nam mkha' dang ni 'dra ba ste// chos kun yod pa ma yin no// de ltar lhag
75b8(dkon brtsegs): med chad pa med// mnyam bzhag med cing gnyis su med// gdung med bsil med tsha ba'ang med// blta ba'i lam min med phyir ro// drang po ma yin yon po min//
76a1(dkon brtsegs): mun pa ma yin snang ba'ang min// mthong ba med cing thob med de// med pas gzungs su shes par gyis// g.yo med drang po'ang
76a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa ste// chos rnams bsal med g.yo ba med// 'khrugs pa med cing khro ba med// ci yang mi byed nye zhi med// skyel ba med cing gnas kyang med// 'gro med
76a3(dkon brtsegs): ldog med 'gro sems med// nyal ba med cing mi nyal med// sad pa med par shes par gyis// mig can ma yin long ba min// lta ba ma yin mun bsgribs min/
76a4(dkon brtsegs): sbas pa ma yin bzhag pa min// dul ba ma yin mdul min// rgod pa ma yin zhi ba min// 'khor min mya ngan 'das pa min// bden min brdzun min de lta bur// rgyal ba'i
76a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul shes par gyis// 'jig rten gdal ba'i don phyir gyi// 'di la the tsom gang yang med// gang bcad bya ba'i the tsom de// dam pa'i don du byung ba med//
76a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pa dang // gzungs nges par bstan pas yongs su tshim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan
76a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te// khang pa brtsegs pa shing la rten pa dang // pad ma la rten pa dang / ri la rten pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin
76a8(dkon brtsegs): can rin po che'i gdugs kyis mdzes par byas pa// gdugs kyi lda ldi mdzes par byas pa// rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sa brgyan pa/ bla re dang lnga ldis
76b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa bye ba phrag brgyad mngon par sprul te// mi 'am ci'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad kyang mngon par sprul nas// ri spos kyi ngad ldang las skyes pa dang /
76b2(dkon brtsegs): zang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog thams cad kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ de mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu
76b3(dkon brtsegs): khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad po de dag tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog
76b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// de nas khang pa brtsegs pa de dag las babs te/ rkang pas dong nas
76b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ zal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mig mi
76b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum par lta zhing / rnam pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byed cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal
76b7(dkon brtsegs): be ljon pa dang bcas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/
76b8(dkon brtsegs): bder gshegs dri bral spyan mnga' ba// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad// lha mis mchod pa yang dag tu// 'dzum mdzad rgyu de bka' stsal gsol// thams
77a1(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa mdzum mdzad pa// 'khor gyis mthong nas the tsom 'tshal// zla ba tshes la mi bzhin du// smra ba'i
77a2(dkon brtsegs): zla ba zhal du lta// bde gshegs mdzes pa deng su zhig/ gnyis med chos la shes mchog skyes// bdag ni the tsom 'tshal bar gyur// mi mchog dam pa the tsom sol//
77a3(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs gang gis chos nyid la// dad pa thob na bcom ldan 'das// ji ltar mdzum pa mdzad par gyur// smra mchog bdag gi the tsom khum// thams cad ldan pa'i
77a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di yis// bcom ldan bstan thos yid dga' zhing // the tsom ma mchis som nyid bcad// ji ltar bstan bzhin gnas par gyur// de ltar rkang gnyis
77a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi mchog 'gro ba thugs rje mdzad pa dang // the tsom gcad slad ljon pa dang // mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
77a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// skye bo tshigs can rnams nang du/ sangs rgyas yon tan sten gyur pa/ ljon pa'i lung bstan gang dris pa/
77a7(dkon brtsegs): rta thul khyod kyis legs par dris// ye shes mthong ba sgrib med pa// bde gshegs ye shes ngo mtshar can// de khyod dang ba'i yid kyis nyon// skye med yid kyis
77a8(dkon brtsegs): nga la nyon// 'jig rten pa na mdzad bde ba'i phyir// ljon pas the tsom gang dris pa// de'i 'bras bu brjod par byas// the tsom gcad pa nga las nyon// ljon pa
77b1(dkon brtsegs): las stsogs mi 'am ci/ bye ba phrag brgyad 'dir lhags pa// de dag nga la mchod byas nas// 'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris 'dong // bskal pa bye ba dgu bcur der//
77b2(dkon brtsegs): lha min nang du 'khor bar 'gyur// mngon par shes pa lnga bsgoms nas// sems la dbang sgyur dbang ldan 'gyur/ mi'i seng ge de dag gis// sangs rgyas
77b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing phrag khrag khrig tu// sprul bkye rang gi lha gnas na// bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ba myong // bskal pa bye ba dgu bcur yang // de dag lha mir 'khor 'khor
77b4(dkon brtsegs): nas// rang rang zhing rnams sna tshogs su// byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// rtag tu snang ba'i bskal pa la// mi'i seng ge 'jig rten mgon// chags med
77b5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mthong dpag yas// stobs bcu gzi brjid mtha' yas 'gyur// de dag zhing du sems can gang // yongs su ma smin dga' mi skye// nyan thos theg pas gang byung ba//
77b6(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang srid pa zab pa// mi'i seng ge zhing der ni// byang chub sems dpa' gang skye ba// de dag tshe gcig thogs pa ste// mi mchog byang chub thob par 'gyur// gang dag gtso bor
77b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa rnams// bdag cag dpag med sangs rgyas zhing // yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhe// de 'dra'i bsam pas rab tu zhugs// sems can rlabs chen de dag ni// smon lam
77b8(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen yun ring btab// de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas// bsam pas rang bzhin rnam par sbyong // nyon mongs 'jom pa de dag gi/ zhing gi bkod par 'gyur ba ni// dga' ldan
78a1(dkon brtsegs): #gnas kyi longs spyod rnams// ngan song kun kyang yongs su dag/ de dag zhid du rnam kun tu// mi khom gang yang 'byung mi 'gyur// zhing rnams
78a2(dkon brtsegs): longs sbyangs de dag ni// sems can rnams kyang bde bar 'dren// de ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis// mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan bshad// lung bstan de thos 'khor gyi rnams//
78a3(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang yid ni rangs par gyur// / mi 'am ci lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas lha 'phreng ldan glang po can brgyad khris lha ma yin rnams
78a4(dkon brtsegs): nas mi 'am ci'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas// sangs rgyas
78a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos rnams la mos shing / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyi khor yug tu dpag tshad
78a6(dkon brtsegs): drug cu tshun cad me tog man 'da' rabs pus monob tsam du gang bar byas so// de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis
78a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod pa// zhi ba'i dbang po 'dzum pa'i zhal// srog chags kun la thugs brtse ba// bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje can// 'jig rten bdag po mi'i stag
78a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos la mos pa'i// 'khor 'di ji srid 'dir gnas par// zhabs mchog mdzes shing dga' ldan pa// zugs rje can la mgos phyag 'tshal// ji ltar dgung zla
78b1(dkon brtsegs): nya ba'i tshe// mi rnams zla ba phyag 'tshal ba// de bzhin lha tshogs 'di rnams kyang // bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta// dpag tu med pa'i dge spyong pa// dpag yas ye shes bu
78b2(dkon brtsegs): po ldan// gzi brjid dpag yas phung po can// blo mchog khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal// stobs bcu mnga' zhing dpal stag pa// bden bzhi mi bsnyengs dri gsum sel// rgyal
78b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gtso brgyad chos dang ldan// the tsom mi mnga' smra ba'i mchog/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ldan// dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mtshungs med
78b4(dkon brtsegs): thugs// bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// tshul khrims stobs kyi mthar phyin pa// ting 'dzin stobs gnas mi bskyod pa// ye shes stobs kyi mtshon ca can// bdud
78b5(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcom thub rgyal ba lags// ye shes stobs mchog rgyas gyur pa// ser sna mi mnga' nyan thos btul// zhi ba'i thugs kyis spyod mdzad cing // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
78b6(dkon brtsegs): rten 'dul// skyes bu seng ge bde gshegs khyod// gti mug zhi bgyid chos brnyes pa// bdag cag rnams kyang stobs bcu yi// chos rnams 'dir ni thos par shog
78b7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar thub khyod sems can gyi// bsam mkhyen dang mdzad bdag cag kyang // lha mir bcas pa'i 'gro dang bgyi// de ltar 'gro ba'i don slad du// snying brtse nye bar bzung nas
78b8(dkon brtsegs): ni// 'gro ba 'khor ba'i mtshor bying ba// srid pa'i rgyud las bsgral bar bgyi// bdag cag lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi// 'dren dang rab tu 'dren gyur cig 'gro ba sdug
79a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal rgyas nyen par// srid pa'i rgyud las dgrol bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha 'breng ldan glang po can rnams kyi bsam pa
79a2(dkon brtsegs): thugs su chud nas/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ta bral gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// bde gshegs rnam par 'dren pa po//
79a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad// stobs bcu khyod ni 'dzum mdzad pa'i// rgyu gang lags pa bka' stsal gsol// rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa// 'gro ba dang bgyid
79a4(dkon brtsegs): byung mthong nas// 'khor kun the tsom 'tshal gyur te// 'dzum pa'i don ni nyan par 'tshal// don chen 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don// bka' stsal bka' stsol 'dren pa'i mchog/
79a5(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong rnams kyi rgyal po khyed// the tsom chad rgyur bka' bstsal gsol// gang gis rgyal ba mnyes par gyis// gang gis deng mchod bla med bgyis// su zhig de ring gting
79a6(dkon brtsegs): tho ba gyur// bde gshegs bdag gi the tsom khum// de ring gang gis bdud kyi las// dkrugs g.yengs kun tu 'khrugs par gyis// deng sus lha gnas thams cad kyang /
79a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' yid ldan par gyis// rgyal ba thub pa de lung ston// 'gro ba'i be tsem myur du khum// de thos bde gshegs 'khor gyi rnams// kun kyang rab tu yid dga'
79a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de/ tshe dang ldan pa rta zil la slar bka' stsal pa// 'phreng ldan glang po can lha yis// lung bstan rta thul
79b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod dris pas// de na 'gro ba mang po yi// don chen shin tu deng byas 'gyur// stobs bcu rgyal ba ma 'dris par// sras mchog byang chub lung mi ston// de ni 'gro/
79b2(dkon brtsegs): ba mang don tu// de ring khyod kyis rgyal la zhus// 'phreng ldan glang po lha tshogs kyis// nga la sems dngang mchod pas// bskal pa grangs med 'das 'og tu/
79b3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pham byas rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas// 'thun par mi'i nang skyes te// rgyal ba bye ba dpag med la// me tog mchog gis
79b4(dkon brtsegs): mchod par 'gyur// kun tu bde bar gshegs kyi sems// skyed par 'gyur zhing 'phel byed 'gyur ro// rang byung mi'i seng ge la// tshigs su bcad pas bstod
79b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ra 'gyur// ga ma 'ongs dus na 'di kun gyis// rgyal ba khrag khrig dpag yas mang // me tog gis mchod tshig sa bcad kyis// mi mchog rnams la bstod byas te/
79b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag bde gshegs rnams mchod cing // mthu bo che'i sku bstod nas// rab tu dga' ba'i bskal pa la// rnam par 'dren par 'jig rten 'byung // grags pa ma smad
79b7(dkon brtsegs): nags rgyu ba/ brgyad khri bo rnams de dag kun// bskal pa gcig la bde gshegs 'gyur// me tog rgyal mtshan ldan zhes bya// de na dmyal dang dud 'gro dang /
79b8(dkon brtsegs): ngan song shin rje'i 'jig rten med// zhing de na ni lha min med// mi khom thams cad rab tu bcom// 'phreng ldan glang po can lha yi// longs spyod sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi/
80a1(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dra bar ni de 'drar 'gyur// 'gro ba'i tshe tshad dpag tu med// der mi dge sgra mi skrag/ mi dge byed pa
80a2(dkon brtsegs): smos ci dgos// de na rnams 'dren mchog rnams kyi// skye bo rnams kyang chos can 'gyur// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag gang ga'i bye ma rab mang snyed/
80a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar byed 'gyur stobs bcu rnams// gnas pa med pa'i chos kyang ston// grags pa ma smad de dag ni// ring bsrel dag kyang rgyas par 'gyur// de dag rnams kyi
80a4(dkon brtsegs): ring bsrel la'ang // rgyal ba'i sku mnga' 'byung bar 'gyur// grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams kyi// ring bsrel cho 'phrul sku mthong nas// srog chags bye ba
80a5(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig mang // byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 'gyur// 'phreng ldan glang po can rnams kyi// lung bstan 'dren pas bka' stsal pa// zos shing shes nas 'khor
80a6(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang // de tshe sems ni rab tu dga'// / 'phreng ldan glang po can lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//
80a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dbu khris lha ma yin rnams nas/ 'phreng ldan glang po can lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang zos nas/
80a8(dkon brtsegs): tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mos pa drag po
80b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de 'di lta ste/ dper na kham pa'i bru la zhon pa'i mi zhig chu'i dbus su phyin na// gru chag tu 'ong zhes tshu rol nas pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir/ mos pa drag po bskyed
80b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khri bo de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi che ba nyid la dad pa skyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir
80b3(dkon brtsegs): mos pa drag po skyes par gyur nas/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang
80b4(dkon brtsegs): lhan gcig tu rin po che'i bla re bkra' ba blta na sdug pa dgu khri mngon par sprul to// de dag kyang phal cher mu tig dmar po dang skar mdog dang / be dUr+ya dang / gser
80b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rdo rje'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ lho'i rol mo sil snyan dgu khri yang mngon par sprul te/ de dag nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi bA re dgu khri po de dag thogs nas/
80b6(dkon brtsegs): rol mo sil snyan dgu khri po de dag byed cing / steng gi ba ra snang las dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba
80b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / ba ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/
80b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor te/ de dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ tshigs su bcad pa
81a1(dkon brtsegs): dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ rgyal ba'i yon tan mthong ba'i// lha'i dgu khri zab pa dag/ 'dren pa
81a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi spyan snga na// thal mo rab tu sbyar nas mchis// rgod pa ma mchis zhum ma mchis// 'dod pa ma mchis 'gyod ma mchis// mi bla na ngo mtshan ma mchis par/
81a3(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal// khyod ni srid pa'i rgyud rnams bkum// mi shes pa ni rnam par spangs// srid pa'i bur pa rab tu phyung // nga rgyal rgyal mtshan
81a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bskal// khyod ni zug rngu phyung ba ste// rtsal gdug pa khyod kyis spangs// khyod ni bden bzhi spyod pa ste/ 'dren pa khyod kyis rma rnams sos// khyod kyis
81a5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs thams cad spangs// bcing ba dag ni thams cad bcad// sbyor ba kun dang bral ba ste// thub pa chags pa kun las 'das// rgyal ba khyod kyi spyod
81a6(dkon brtsegs): yul ni// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med// bcom ldan khyod la smon pa yang // rnam pa kun tu mi mnga'o// khyod kyis sred pa drungs nas phyung // ma rig pas
81a7(dkon brtsegs): ni thugs kyang byung // rnam pa bzhi po'i phyin ci log/ rnam pa kun tu yongs su spangs// gang du 'jig rten mi chud de/ ri dgas rngon pas ji bzhin du/
81a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur ba'i// yang dag mtha' ni byin gyis gzigs// sems can 'dzeg tshogs ltar lgang ste/ stong pa nyid ni ma 'chal bas/
81b1(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa'i mun pas btibs/ 'khor ba'i btson rar dga' bar bgyid// khyod kyis yang dag ji bzhin du// 'gro de chang ba stong 'dir gzigs// gang gis
81b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag mig 'gyur ba'i// ye shes snang ba rab tu bstan// phung po stong par rnam par bshig/ ming dang gzugs kyang bsog 'dra' zhing // khams rnams
81b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ni skye mched dag bdag med stong par rnam par bshig/ chos gang dang ni ming gang gis// chos gang mngon par brjod bgyi ba// chos de chos des stong pa ste/
81b4(dkon brtsegs): thub pa khyod kyis stong par bstan// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos med pa la// skye bo'i tshogs kyis mngon sprul na// de la sems can gdags ma mchis/ srog dang gang zag
81b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis la// de bzhin phung po khams rnams dang // dbang po dag dang skye mched kyang // yang dag ma yin sgyu ma zhes// skyes bu dam pas bstan pa mdzad//
81b6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar ri mo mkhan zhig gis// bud med gzugs ni rnam bris shing // mnyam pa dang ni mi mnyam dang // lci dang yang ba bstan bgyis kyang // byis pa'i mig ni
81b7(dkon brtsegs): bslus pa ste// de la mi mnyam ci ma mchis// de bzhin chos dbyings mnyam lags na// byis pa rnams ni de la rmongs// gang shes khyod kyi bslab pa la/
81b8(dkon brtsegs): legs bslabs rmongs par mi 'gyur ba// lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhin du// de ni kun mkhyen khyod kyis bstan// shes rab chen po khyod kyis ni// ye shes sgron
82a1(dkon brtsegs): ma rab bus te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas// sems can rnams la
82a2(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan pa// de ltar bdag cag myur du ni// bla med byang chub zhi thob ste// ji ltar 'dren pa khyod bzhin du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi//
82a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i lam log 'di dag tu// 'khyams par gyur pa'i sems can la// ji ltar 'dren pas bstan pa bzhin// bdag cag gis kyang chos myur bstan/
82a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
82a5(dkon brtsegs): thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgyu ma mchis par rdzogs sangs rgyas rgyas// 'dren pa 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum
82a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad pa'i 'dzum gyi rgyu// dpa' bo chen pos lung bstan gsol// skyes bu dam pa 'khor 'di dag/ bde gshegs deng bzhad mthong nas ni// yid
82a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis chen po 'tshal gyur te// kun kyang the tsom 'tshal bar gyur// de ring su yis bdad pa ma bgyis// nem nur gang gis bcad par gyur// su zhig de ring
82a8(dkon brtsegs): chos rtogs gyur/ skyes bu mtshig gis lung bstan gsol// de ring khyod la su yid mchod// ston pa gang gis bsnyen bkur bgyis// 'gro kun
82b1(dkon brtsegs): nem nur 'tshal gyur na// rnam par 'dren pas lung bstan gsol// ji ltar rkang gnyis mchog khyod kyis// lung bstan 'di dag zos gyur na// 'gro ba be
82b2(dkon brtsegs): tsom 'tshal gyur pa// 'dren pas de ltar lung bstan gsol// ci nas rnam pa thams cad du// kun mkhyen lam la gnas pa'i rnams// myur du byang chub
82b3(dkon brtsegs): thob 'gyur ba// de ltar 'dren pas lung bstan gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal po// 'gro
82b4(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgon po la// 'dzum pa'i rgyu rnams dri bya zhes// rta thul khyod kyis dris pa legs/ 'jig rten
82b5(dkon brtsegs): kun la phan pa'i phyir// bstan pa yid du 'ong 'gyur zhing // nyams dga' byed po de bshad kyis/ dran pa mngon byos mnyan par gyis// dbu khri
82b6(dkon brtsegs): zam pa'i lha rnams kyis// mchod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu// de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la// shin tu dad pa'i yid kyis byas// sangs rgyas mngo
82b7(dkon brtsegs): par bstod pa byas// stong pa nyid kyang shes par gyur// chos rnams la ni nges pa rnyed/ nga'i bstan pa rab tu gnas/ sngon yang sangs rgyas bye ba'i phrag
82b8(dkon brtsegs): brgyad cu dag la 'di dag mchod// ma 'ongs dus ni'ang sangs rgyas ni// bye ba mtha' yas mchod par 'gyur// 'dren pa de dag ji srid du// sangs rgyas bye ba ma
83a1(dkon brtsegs): mchod cing // bsnyen bkur byas par ma gyur pa// de srid byang chub 'tshang mi rgya// de bas shin tu 'phyi ba na// kun kyang gang zag mchog
83a2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'gyur// mtshan ni 'od zer 'chang ba ste// 'jig rten kun mkhyen thub par 'gyur// 'jig rten sgron ma de dag gi/ nyan thos 'dus par gyur pa ni// blo'i mchog
83a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa dag/ 'dus pa brgyad bcu 'byung bar 'gyur// sgrib med gzigs pa de dag gi/ mi rnams de'i dus kyi tshe// lo grangs bye ba brgyad cu tham// srog gi dbang po
83a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur// shes rab mtha' yas de dag gis// nyan thos 'dod chags bral ba rnams// lus kyi ba ma 'dzin pa dag/ bye ba tshad med 'byung bar 'gyur// sems
83a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i// 'jig rten mgon po dpal ldan rnams// mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel yang // shin tu rgya chen 'byung bar 'gyur// mi dbang mya ngan 'das gyur nas/
83a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren pa dpal ldan pa// rgyal ba'i mchod rten rnams kyis ni// sangs rgyas zhing rnams legs brgyan 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po skyo ba rnams kyis// 'jig rten de dag
83a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la// srog chags brgya dang stong rnams dang // khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod byas nas// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de// mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur/
83a8(dkon brtsegs): rang byung mya ngan 'das nas kyang // de dag dam chos gnas 'gyur ba// lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig phrag/ brgyad cu chang bar gnas par 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnam
83b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis// bzung zhing yongs su bsrungs par gnas// 'jig rten thugs brtse mdzad pa dang // shag kya yongs su smin mdzad phyir// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams la// 'jig rten sgron
83b2(dkon brtsegs): ma sa lung bstan mdzad// de zos nas ni skye bo kun// kun tu dga' zhing rab dga' ste// sems mgu yid kyang rangs gyur na// ston pa la ni mngon par bstod//
83b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la stsogs pa/ sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag
83b4(dkon brtsegs): brgyad cus lha ma yin dag dang / nam mkha' lding dang / klu'i bu mo dag dang / klu dag dang / grul bum dag dang / dri za dag dang / gnod sbyin dag dang / mi 'am ci dag dang /
83b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bring ldan glang po can dag dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams tshim zhing mag la yid rangs te/
83b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ yid byung ba chen po skyes te/ 'dod pa'i tshul gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin las stsogs pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod
83b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis rin po che khang pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ mu tig dmar po'i 'phreng ba dang / bai dUr+ya'i
83b8(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ gser gyi phreng ba sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che skar mdog gi 'phreng bas brgyan pa// sa gnas rim brgyad dang // ba ga ma dang /
84a1(dkon brtsegs): khang pa brtsegs pa dang // skar khung gis brgyan pa// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis brgyan pa/ lha'i seng ge'i khris
84a2(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa/ bla re chen po dang dril bu g.yer ka de bas brgyan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i rol mo'i sim snyan sgra rab tu 'byung ba bye ba phrag brgyad nus
84a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sprul to// rta cang shes kyis drang ba'i shing rta rdzas kyis legs par brgyan pa gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mdzes par byas pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu
84a4(dkon brtsegs): yang mngon par sprul to// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer thams cad dang ldan pa'i khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad me tog man da ra ba dang / lha'i mchod pa de dag gis rgyas
84a5(dkon brtsegs): par gang bar byas so// gang po che sa srang gis bu bye ba phrag brgyad bcu yang mngon par sprul te/ glang po che sa srang gi bu dag re re zhing yang mgo bya ba phrag brgya cu brgyad nu/
