84a6(dkon brtsegs): glang po che sa srung bu'i mgo de dag re re zhing yang so drag drag/ se de dag re re zhing yang rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu de dag re re zhing yang pad ma stong phrag bdun bdun pad ma
84a7(dkon brtsegs): re re zhing yang pad ma brgyad khri brgyad khri// mdab ma re re zhing yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo de dag re re zhing yang 'khor bdun bdun yod pa/ rgyan thams cad
84a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis brgyan pa sha stag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i khang pa de dag mdun du byas te/ dbus su gang po sa srang gi bu dag btsud nas nas/ phyi bzhin shing rta de ltar
84b1(dkon brtsegs): bshams pa de dag bkye nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas so// rin po che'i khang pa de dag las kyang lha'i tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / ud pal dang / tam
84b2(dkon brtsegs): la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang / gser phye'i char mngon par bab par gyur to// lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba che ba dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang /
84b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog na kar chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog dag gi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to// gser dang dngul
84b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / shel dang mu tig dmar po dang / skrag dang rdo'i snying po dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to// lha'i bu mo de dag las la la ni
84b5(dkon brtsegs): gla len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sbyar zhing lha ma yin gyi mchod pa lta bu dang / glang po che sa srang gi bu de dag dang / rin po che khang
84b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas// de'i 'og tu rta cang shes kyis drang ba'i shing te bye ba phrag brgyad la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ lnga'i
84b7(dkon brtsegs): yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang po yang dul bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo sil snyan bye 'a phrag brgyad cu yang bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to// shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad cu po
84b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag la yang lha'i bu mo gzhan bye ba phrag brgyad cu mngon par sprul te/ lha'i bu mo de dag kyang la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni rol me byed/ la la ni lus
85a1(dkon brtsegs): @/ kyi tshul sbyar zhing lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas so// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag 'di skas
85a2(dkon brtsegs): du sems te/ ji ltar sprul pa'i lha'i bu mo de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa las na chos thams cad kyang sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin du nges so snyam nas/ de dag 'di snyam
85a3(dkon brtsegs): du chos 'di dag thams cad ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa de bzhin te/ sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin no snyam du sems par gyur cing / de dag gis chos thams cad sprul
85a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang 'dra bar shes nas/ chos la the tsom med par thob par gyur to// de dag de ltar the tsomo med cing nem nar med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la len gsum bskor ba
85a5(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de dag chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar rtog cing bdag cag kyang
85a6(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong / mchod pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong / bcom ldan 'das kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang
85a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar yang dag par shes te/ de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o zhes bya bar shes nas/ the tsom med cing nem nur med par
85a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa gang bgyis dang // sprul pa'i mchod pa 'di dag gang
85b1(dkon brtsegs): babyis dang / lha rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas mchod byas pa/ de ltar chos 'di thams cad sprul pa nyid/ 'dren pas chos kun gsungs pa gang lags dang / de bzhin gshegs
85b2(dkon brtsegs): bas lung stan mtha' dag kyang / 'di dag thams cad sprul pa 'dra'o zhes/ de ltar lha tshogs de dag blo gros skyes// bcom ldan sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin du/ ston pa 'ang de bzhin
85b3(dkon brtsegs): sbrul dang 'dra ba ste/ rgyal bas lung bstan bdag cag 'tshal gyur pas// 'di la bdag cag the tsom ma mchis so// rgyal bas so so'i skye bo rnams mkhyen nas/ byis pa'i
85b4(dkon brtsegs): so thob tha snyad gang btags pa/ de dag kun kyang sprul pa ji bzhin te// bde gshegs 'gro ba lung bstan de bzhin no// slob pa rnams dang gang dag mi slob dang / bcom ldan
85b5(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dal ba'i sa thob dang / de dag kun kyang bcom ldan sbrul 'dra ba/ bcom ldan bstan la the tsom ma mchis so// bcom ldan gang rnams mi smra lhur len cing / bse ru
85b6(dkon brtsegs): lta bu ro gnyis med nyon mongs spangs/ de dag rnams kyang sprul pa 'dra bcom ldan 'das// bde gshegs bstan la the tsom ma mchis so// gang rnams 'gro ba kun la bde
85b7(dkon brtsegs): phan phyir// rgyal ba'i byang chub spyad spyod pag yod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs sras dag kyang // khyed par ma mchis sprul pa 'di dang 'dra// bde ga shes
85b8(dkon brtsegs): rang byung rnam par 'dren pa mchog/ stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas thugs rje can// ye shes stobs 'phags 'jig rten gtso bo dag/ sprul pa 'di 'dra de dag rang bzhin
86a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs// 'dren pas 'di la chos rnams gsungs pa// gnas med zhi bsil nyon mongs med gyur cing // sdug bsngal zhi byed mtha' thug
86a2(dkon brtsegs): grangs med pa// de yang sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin no// bcom ldan 'di la chos rnams gang dag kyang // sprul pa'i rang bzhin ma lags de ma mchis// gang tshe ge'u ta ma'i bstan
86a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di// bdag cag rtogs nas the tsom thams cad spangs// sprul pa 'di 'drar chos rnams kun mthong nas// bdag cag rnams kyang 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// bde gsheg
86a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul 'di la spyod pa'i rnams// the tsom ma mchis rang bzhin 'dren par gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba phrag brgya bcu po de
86a5(dkon brtsegs): dog gi lhag pa'i bosam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// gzhal yas grags
86a6(dkon brtsegs): mnga' mtha' yas gzi brjid can// bde gshegs rnams ni rgyu med 'dzum mi mdzad// rnam par 'dren pas 'dir ni 'jam mdzad na// rgyal bas 'jum pa'i tshig gsungs the
86a7(dkon brtsegs): com khum// rang byung bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa 'di// 'byung bar rig nas 'jig rten the tsom 'tshal// 'gro ba'i the tsom thub pas bsal du gsol// 'gro ba 'di dag
86a8(dkon brtsegs): the tsom ma mchis mdzod// lha tshogs 'di rnams rab tu yid dga' bas// rgyal ba bstod de lha rdzas rnams kyis mchod// bde gshegs de dag don tu 'dzum pa mdzad// rgyal ba
86b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dga' mdzad bka' stsal gsol// zla 'drar dri med 'od mnga' mtha' yas gzi// ci nas bde gshegs bka' ni 'di thos pas// mgon po 'gro la thams cad dgar 'gyur bar/
86b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba lha tshogs mchod mkhyen bka' stsal gsol// bde gshegs lnga tshogs 'di yis chos rnams kun// sprul pa lta bur rnam par rtogs gyur na// stobs bcu mnga' bas
86b3(dkon brtsegs): don 'di bka' stsol te// rab rib bral ba lha'i bslab pa gsungs// skye bo 'di dag the tsom bral gyur nas// thub pa de dag byang chub spong rtsom 'gyur// rab tu dpa' ba 'khor
86b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dis thos gyur te// dgongs pa rig nas rgyal chen rtsom par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshogs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/
86b5(dkon brtsegs): lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu dga' shes nas// rta thul khyod kyis dus dang ldan pa'i tshig/ smras pa de ni dus la bab pa ste// 'dzum pa dris pa de ni lung bstan to// lha rnams
86b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam shes 'dzum pa de dris pa// des ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don chen byas// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu dengs bstan gyis// dga' zhing dang ba'i sems kyis nga la nyon//
86b7(dkon brtsegs): lha tshogs rnams kyis chos rnams 'di dag ni// ma lus sprul pa lta bur shes gyur nas// chags med ye shes mthong ba dpag med cing // rab rib bral ba'i 'jig
86b8(dkon brtsegs): rten mgon par 'gyur// srid pa'i rgyun sngon yang 'khor ba'i tshe// me'i gtso bo gang ga'i bye snyed mchod// srid rgyud de na 'di dag thub pa las// chos rnams sprul pa lta bar
87a1(dkon brtsegs): @ma mthong ngo // 'di dgang la mchod mchog 'dir byas pa// chos rnams sprul pa 'dra bar mngon tu mthong // bde gshegs
87a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di la byas pa ni/ chung zos mi 'gyur bar chad yong mi 'gyur// lha tshogs 'di yas ngal mchod byas te/ chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar shes pas/
87a3(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa pad ma zhes 'byung ba'i tshe// sla ba'i zla ba mi'i mchog tu 'gyur// khyu mchog ldan pa'i mi mchog 'gyur ba ni// bde gshegs rab mkhas dbang po'i
87a4(dkon brtsegs): tog rgyal po// chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar ston cing // 'gro ba khrag khrig dpag med 'brel par 'gyur// bde gshegs de dag bstan la bag yod pa/
87a5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams 'di dag sprul pa 'dra bar sems// zhi gnas de la sus bstan bag yod pa// myur du bla na med byang chub mchog zhi thob// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa lung
87a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcwo lnga pa'o// / de nas de'i tshe 'thab 'bral gyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcus lha ma yin rnams nas// sum bcu rtsa
87a7(dkon brtsegs): gsum ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te// rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang // yid
87a8(dkon brtsegs): bde ba skyes nas// bcom ldan 'das kyang lung bstan pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba shes shing // sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams ni nyams dga' ba ste/ de dag thob na ma shes
87b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ ma mthong ba 'am/ martogs pa 'am/ mngon tum byas pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa'am/ las sam/ las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yang med do zhes sangs rgyas
87b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed do// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis thugs su chud de/ shes par bya ba'ang kun rdzob dang don dam pa 'dir
87b3(dkon brtsegs): zad do// de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid rab tu gzigs// rab tu mkhyen/ legs par mngon tu mdzad pas/ de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o//
87b4(dkon brtsegs): de la kun rdzob ni 'jig rten gyi spyod par de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so// don dam pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med pa ste// shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ rnam pa
87b5(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya ba ma yin pa// yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ ma bstan pa rab tu ma bstan pa/ ma thob pa thob par ma byas pa/ ma shes pa rnam par ma shes
87b6(dkon brtsegs): ba/ ma bstan pa/ ma mthong ba/ me brtags pa/ 'dzin tu ma bcug pa/ rtogs par ma byas pa/ thob par ma byas pa/ ma thob pa dang / nye bar ma mnyen pa/
87b7(dkon brtsegs): mabor bam bzhag pa/ ma spangs pa med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rab tu zhi ba med pa ma smad pa ma bstod pa/ thob pa med pa ma thob pa med pa/ bde ba ma yin pa
87b8(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ma yin pa/ snyan pa ma yin pa/ mi snyan pa ma yin/ gzugs ma yin pa/ gzugs med pa ma yin/ grangs med pa/ bgrang ba med pa/ 'jig rten med
88a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jig rten dang bral ba med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rnam par byang ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ ldog pa med pa/
88a2(dkon brtsegs): ma brtags pa/ rnam par ma brtags pa/ ma g.yos pa/ ma bsams pa/ ma bskyod pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ma spros pa/ spros pa dang bral ba ste/ 'di ltar
88a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyis mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig dang / rna ba dang / rna dang /
88a4(dkon brtsegs): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi rnam par shes pa
88a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / snga ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'das te reg pa dang / rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang /
88a6(dkon brtsegs): yid kyi 'das te reg pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
88a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar gyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs su sems
88a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar du sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid la bya ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ sa dang chu dang me dang / rlung dang na mkha' dang /
88b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'das byas dang / 'dus
88b2(dkon brtsegs): ma byas pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ltar chos gang dang gang brjod pa'i rang bzhin gang dang gang gis brjod pa'i chos de dang de brjod pa'i rang bzhin de dang des mi rjo
88b3(dkon brtsegs): ba staM/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de ltar nyams dga' ba yin na/ dbyis pa so so'i skye bo'i blo dang mi ldan pa mi shes pa rnams kyis thos na/ 'jig rten shing
88b4(dkon brtsegs): sdang ba dang / sgrub par 'gyur te/ des 'jigs par gyur pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las nyams par 'gyur te/ de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan
88b5(dkon brtsegs): du bya ste/ 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyan to zhe te/ de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi don
88b6(dkon brtsegs): tu bcom ldan 'das la mched pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to// de dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mchod pa las khyed par du 'phagos pas/ ma bcom ldan 'das mchod de/
88b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/
88b8(dkon brtsegs): 'thab bral gyi lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ rgyal ba khyod kyis phung po dben par gzigs/ khams dang skyes mched rnam/
89a1(dkon brtsegs): ga kyang de bzhin te/ dbang po'i grong ni mtshan mas dben pa dag dkun kyang thub ba khyod kyis rje bani gzigs/ 'jig rten mkhas pa
89a2(dkon brtsegs): dben pa 'di gnyis te/ khyod kyis gzhan las ma bas na rang gis gzigs/ de ni kun rdzob dben dang don dam ste/ dben pa gsum pa gang yang ma mchis so// gang gis dben
89a3(dkon brtsegs): par gshegs la 'gro ba rnams// bde ba'i don dad pa bskyed 'gyur ba// rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du// 'jig rten phan phyir kun rdzob de bstan to// sems can chog
89a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'gro drug gang bstan pa// sems can dmal dang dud 'gro yi dgas dang // lha min ris dang mi dang lha'i rnams// mi'i seng ges kun rdzob btags pa mdzad// rigs dpa'
89a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin mtho ba'i rigs rnams dang / phyug po'i khyim dang dbul ba'i khyim rnams dang // bran gyi tshogs dang de bzhin g.yog gi tshogs// bud med tshogs dang skyes pa ma ning dang /
89a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i khyed par ji snyed gang yang rung // mtshungs med khyod kyis 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa// kun rdzob dben par mkhas pas thugs chud nas/ 'jig rten phan pas mi la de
89a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed to// de la dga' ba'i 'gro ba 'khor ba na// 'gro ba'i chos brgyad de la mi 'byung ste// thob dang ma thob snyan dang ma snyan dang // bstod dang smad dang bde dang sdug bsngal lo//
89a8(dkon brtsegs): thob pa rnyed ni de la chags pa skyed// zlob gyur na des kyang 'khrug par 'gyur// gang gzhan ma bstan tshul 'dis shes par bya// nad rnams brgyad kyis de rgyud gnod par 'gyur/
89b1(dkon brtsegs): kun rdzob de la don dam su smra ba// de dag nor ba'i blo ldan shes par bya// mi sdug sdug dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang // bdag med rang bzhin bdag tu ces sgra bgyid cing // de ltar
89b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ste mtshan par gang gnas pa// de dag bde gshegs gsung ni thos gyur na// 'jigs shing ji bzhin mi rtogs spong bar bgyid// de dag bde gshegs gsung ni spangs
89b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas// sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal mi bzad myong // de dag tshul min bde ba tshol bgyid kyang // sdug bsngal brgya dag byis pas myong bar 'gyur// 'jig
89b4(dkon brtsegs): rten phan pa'i bstan pa su zhig gis// ma log blos ni rnam par rtogs gyur na// sbrul gyis pags pa rnying ltar rab spangs te// srid pa kun las 'das nas zhi bar 'gyur/
89b5(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin dben pa ste// stong pa mtshan ma med pa don dam zhes/ gang gis thos nas dga' ba skyed 'gyur ba// de dag bla med byang chub 'thob par
89b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// ji ltar bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos// de la lha rnams the tsom ma mchis te// 'gro ba thams cad yongasu grol ba'i phyir// de dag bla na med pa'i bya
89b7(dkon brtsegs): chub tshol// byang chub blo can rnam dag blo can rnams// skyes bu mchog gis dga' ba bskyed du gsol// de thos 'gro ba kun la sman slad du// bla na med pa'i byang chub
89b8(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'thab bral ris kyis lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bas pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa
90a1(dkon brtsegs): @mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten pan pas 'dzum pa
90a2(dkon brtsegs): gang mdzad de// khyod kyi 'khor ni the tsom 'tshal bar 'gyur// mi mchog 'dzum pa'i rgyu de bka' stsal gsol// des ni 'khor 'dir rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha rnam
90a3(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan de ni thos byur na// 'khor la 'di shin tu dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur// rigs pa ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la// bde bar nan tan bgyid cing rtsom par 'gyur/
90a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba khyod 'khor 'di ni mchog ldan te// drang srong chen po sangs rgyas yon tan snod// 'gro ba 'di rnams bsdu bar mdzad skad du// bstan pa'i gsung ni legs par
90a5(dkon brtsegs): brjod du gsol// sangs rgyas yon tan mthu dag thos gyur na// skye dgu kun la rab tu sman par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan de thos na// mkhas pa rnams ni
90a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin rtsom par 'gyur// me'i dam pa smra ba'i mchog gi 'dir// the tsom 'tshal ba'i nem nur legs par stsol// 'khor rnams thams cad thos par dga' zhing stong
90a7(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams lung bstan pa ni bka' stsal gsel// kun kyang rim gro dgus par sna blag te/ khyod kyis lung bstan rab tu dga' ba la// sgrib pa rab tu spangs shing de dag nyan// 'jig
90a8(dkon brtsegs): rten phan phyir skyes bu mchog gis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// 'jig rten phan phyir mkhas pas
90b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mdzad pa// rta thul khyod kyis dris pa dus dang ldan// sangs rgyas yon tan mthu ni thos gyur na// skye bo tshogs chen rnams kyi don tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas yon tan chog
90b2(dkon brtsegs): la blo zhen cing // 'dod chags blo dang zhe sdang blo ldan dang // tshe rabs brgyar ni rtsod pa'i blo con dang // gti mug blo can dga' skyer mi 'gyur// gang rnams rgyal bas bstan
90b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dga' ba dang // gang gis rgyal ba rnams ni sngon dris dang // gang rnams snying rje tshe dang ldan pa dag/ de kun sangs rgyas yon tan ldan par 'gyur// gang gis 'gro ba
90b4(dkon brtsegs): gnod zin mthong gyur te// mi'i seng ge snying rje bskyed byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'di thos na// ud dpal 'phreng bzhin mgo la khyer bar 'gyur// nga'i 'khor
90b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di rab tu dga' 'gyur ba// sngon gyi rgyal ba bsnyen bkur sngon byas te// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yid 'ong 'di// me tog 'phreng bzhin de dag yang dag lta// 'thab
90b6(dkon brtsegs): bral lha rnams sngon gyi rgyal kun la// bsnyen bkur byas shing chags pa spangs pa ste// nyon mongs smad cing sangs rgyas blo ldan 'gyur// snying rje ldan zhing nyon mongs med blo ldan/
90b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba mi'i seng ge gang ga'i// bye snyed kun la sngon cad bsnyen bkur byas// byang chub bla na med par smod byed cing // dge pa mtha' yas 'di dag kun gyis byas// sems ca/
91a1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs 'das kying rig gyur nas// sdug bsngal gyur pa rnams la snying rje snyed// de dag mi mchog sems can par mdzad la// chos tus
91a2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas yongs su dris par gyur// gang thos nas ni rnam par 'dren gyur pa// rnam 'dren chos la 'jug pa 'chad par gyur// mi'i nyon mongs spyod pa rab mkhyen nas// de dag
91a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la rgya chen chos kyang mched// rnam 'drer skyes bu dam pa'i mchog de dag/ rang bzhin med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'chad// de dag rgyal ba'i gsung de thos byur nas// 'gro ba
91a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad stong par rab tu rtogs// gcis stong zhi na mtshan ma'i rnam pas stong // rang bzhin med cing mtshan ma med pa smra// rgyal po'i chos rnams de ltar shes gyur nas/
91a5(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la gnas// de dag nga la mchod pa rgya chen byas// bdag gi chos bzhin du ni lung bstan nas// skar tshogs mnyam pa'i bskal pa dam
91a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la// bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// bde gshegs mnyam po med pa bye ba'i phrag/ nyi na nyi shus yongs su gang bar 'gyur// blo gros dag ces bya ba'i
91a7(dkon brtsegs): grangs su 'gro// sems can bsam yas yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur// 'thab 'bral 'khor ba'i lha'i bsam pa rnams// na thul gyis ni yongs su zhus byas pa/
91a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba dgra rgyal drang srong chen po yis// lung bstan lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga'// / 'thab 'bral pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//
91b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas dga' ldan ris kyi lnga bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas// 'thab bral gyis ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bskrad pa yang thos
91b2(dkon brtsegs): nas// 'di snyam du sems te// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de gang zhig/ ci gzugs sam/
91b3(dkon brtsegs): 'on te tshor ba 'am/ 'on te 'du shes sam/ 'on te 'du byed dam/ 'on te rnam par shes pa zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
91b4(dkon brtsegs): snyam nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzugs ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// tshor dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
91b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/
91b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyang ma skyes pa// ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bor bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang
91b7(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma skyes pa ni/ de la ji ltar ma skyes pa ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ gzugs kyang 'gog pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag
91b8(dkon brtsegs): pa mod pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ gzugs kyang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ rnam par
92a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i bar yang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ gzugs kyang gnyis su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis
92a2(dkon brtsegs): su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang gnyis su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ gzugs kyang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ rnam par shes
92a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar yang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ gzugs kyang dmigs su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang dmigs su med
92a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa na/ ji ltar 'gag pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / dmigasu med pas 'gag pa med pa dang /
92a5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med pa'i bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshangs rgya bar bya/ de ltar chos thams cad dmigs na/ 'di la sangs rgyas ni gang / byang chub sems dpa' ni gang / byang chub
92a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni gang / lung bstan pa ni gang / gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong / sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas
92a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / lung bstan pa ni lung bstan pa'i ngo/
92a8(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid kyis stong ste/ de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa la gzugs shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas shes bya ba dang /
92b1(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa'i bar zhes bya ba de dag ni tha snyad tsam/ ming tsam/ brda tsam/ kun rdzob tsam du brjod pa tsam/ bdags pa tsam ste// de la mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen par
92b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i mche'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing rtse rtse ba las de la nyal ba las sad na/ 'dod pa'i yon tan de dag mi mthong
92b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de rjes dran yang mi rnyed cing de ltar ma rnyed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyang byang chub tshol na/ de dag
92b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub pa rnyed cing ro ma mong bas sdug bsngal du 'gyu ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu nor pa ste/ chos de dag
92b5(dkon brtsegs): gi don ni rnam pa gzhan la/ so so'i skye bo de dag kyang rnam po gzhan de zhen to// chos de dag de ltar shes par bya ba yin na/ de la chos gang zhig sangs rgyas yin/ gang zhig bang
92b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' yin/ gang zhig byang chub yin/ gang zhig lung bstan pa yin/ de ltar chos thams cad dmigs med de/ so so'i skye bo yang dmigs su med/ so so'i skye bo
92b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyang dmigs su nyan thos kyang dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmigasasu med/
92b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' yang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang dmigs su med na/ rang sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmigs
93a1(dkon brtsegs): med/ byang chub kyang dmigs med/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang dmigs su med do// bcom ldan 'das de la ni bdag cag the tsom ma mchis/
93a2(dkon brtsegs): yid gnyis ma mchis so zhes gsol pa/ dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu de dag chos de dag the tsom med cing nes nur med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir
93a3(dkon brtsegs): brtson par gyur nas/ de dag gis 'thab bral gyi mchod pa las khyad par tu 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
93a4(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad
93a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas pa// de dag 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// rnam thar sgo gsum po ni rnyed 'gyur bas//
93a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa med pa'i spyod yul spong bar 'gyur// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes ma mchis te// sems dang bsam pa de bzhin ma mchis pa// tshogs med blo ma'i rnam kyi
93a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul lags// mo'i seng ge phung po dben la dgyes// skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa de dag gi// byang chub sems kyang nam yang 'byung ma mchis// phung po dben po'i yon
93a8(dkon brtsegs): ton myong gyur nas// sangs rgyas dgongs la nem nur spang blo ljon// de dag byang chub smon pa ma mchis shing // byang chub sems la'ang de dag mi spod de// dga' dang zhum par
93b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ma mchis pa// bde gshegs sras rnams sprad pa spod pa bgyid// bde gshegs rnams kyis chos rnams mnyam par gzigs// de la rgyal sras 'jig dang bral
93b2(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams// yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas legs spyod cing // mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten 'di na spyod// gzugs kyi mtshan ma rnam par bshig bgyis shing // mtshan pa'i
93b3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa thams cad rab spangs te// srid pa gsum la de dag yong mi smin// dngos po stong par smon lam de dag bgyid// phung po 'di dag mi skyes rtogs gyur cing // lung bstan
93b4(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs nyid kyang ma skyes la// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyang ma skyes// de ltar gang 'tshal de la rmongs ma mchis// skye bo'i chos dang sangs rgyas yon tan rnam/
93b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag kun dang bde gshegs ma skyes te// mi yi seng ge de ltar gang 'tshal pa// de ni khyod sras khyod ni de'i yab// gang zhig phung po 'gag pa ma mchis shing // khams dang
93b6(dkon brtsegs): skye mched de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos// byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan pa// bcom ldan 'di kun 'gag med 'tshal ba dang // gang rnams byang chub 'tshal cing spod bgyid
93b7(dkon brtsegs): po// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag 'gog ma mchis// 'gro ba thams cad 'gag med blor gyur na// 'di 'dri'i blo can byang chub rnyed mi dka'// phung po skye mched dag dang kham
93b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang // byang chub rgyal sras mi g.yo bar// gang gis 'chal pa de dag rgyas sras te// de dag rgyal ba'i chos 'di 'dzin pa lags// phung po som med de bzhin skye mched
94a1(dkon brtsegs): dang // khams dang byang chub rgyal sras dang // lung bstan de bzhin sems pa ma mchis par// gang gis 'tshal pa de dag rgyal ba'i sras// rang byung
94a2(dkon brtsegs): phung po dngos nyid stong pa ste// khams dang skye mched dag dang rgyal ba dang // byang chub dang ni lung bstan rgyal sras rnams// ngo bo nyid kyis stong par gang spong dang // phung po spos 'dred
94a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin khams rnams dang // skye mched rkang gnyis mchog dang byang chub dang // lung bsten spros pa med par gang spyod cing // de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras// gnas pa ma
94a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis mi gnas ma lags te// mchis pa ma lags ma mchis yod ma lags// 'dus byas ma lags 'das ma byas ma lags// de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras//
94a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal dang 'gro ba 'di da ltar yongs mthong zhing // ston pa'i dgongs pa de ltar 'tshal gyur la// de ltar bgyis na gang zag mchog mchod cing // 'dren pa 'khor dang bcas la bsnyen
94a6(dkon brtsegs): bkur lags// rnam par 'dren la bstod pa'i bsod nam gang // ji snyed 'jigs rten phan mdzad mkhyen pa'i// dge ba de yis 'gro ba rang byang ba// rgyal ba mtshan mchog
94a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa grub par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan ris kyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thug su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa nathul
94a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol pa// 'dren pa rgyu'i stobs ni gang zhig gis// stobs chen brnyes pa 'di ltar 'dzum mdzad pa// 'dzum pa'i rgyu de 'dren pas
94b1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal gsol// des ni 'jig rten 'di dag dga' bar 'gyur// shag kya thub pa'i zhal nas 'jum mdzad pa// 'gro ba 'dis mthong the tsom 'tshal gyur te// nyan par
94b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal zhing gzhan du mi sems par// kun kyang 'jig rten phan pa'i zhal du lta// 'di ltar dper na nad pa nad skyob// sman pas dge ba bzhin 'dzin bgyid pa// de bzhin 'khor
94b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lung bstan thos 'tshal zhing // rkang gnyis dbang po bde gshegs zhal du lta// 'khor 'di thams cad rgya chen ldan pa ste// sangs rgyas dgongs la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan//
94b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas lung bstan de dag thos 'tshal te// kun kyang bde gshegs zhal du lta zhing sdod// de la rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing // ci nas 'khor 'di rab tu dga' 'gyur dang /
94b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dgongs la bsam pa gzhog 'gyur bar// ye shes stobs kyis the tsom gcad du gsol// mi'i khyu mchog lung bstan dus la bab// the tsom 'tshal ba'i the
94b6(dkon brtsegs): com bstsal du gsol// sangs rgyas slar sngo'i dgra ni mi mnga' na// rtog ge'i tshogs kyi sde ni gzhig du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la
94b7(dkon brtsegs): tshigasu bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyis 'jig rten sgrol mdzad la// 'dzum pa'i don dris de ni dus dang ldan// de ltar 'jig rten mkhas pas dris pas na/
94b8(dkon brtsegs): de ring 'gro ba 'di'i don chen byas// 'jig rten pan phyir 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// gang gis chos rab 'di dag shes gyur te// nga la mchod pa rgya chen 'di byas pa'i
95a1(dkon brtsegs): @#dag ldan ma'i bsam pa mkhyen nas mkhyed// 'gro ba yang dag rtogs pa bzhin du mthog/ rgyal ba'i dgongs pas chos nyid brnyes par gyur/
95a2(dkon brtsegs): gang la 'gro ba thams cad rmongs gyur pa'i// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rab tu rtogs// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag pa byas// bsam pa gcig gis zhu ba legs
95a3(dkon brtsegs): par zhus// de nyid du ni stong nyid legs par bsgom// sngan cad byas pa de ni 'di yang bstan// de dag de bzhin gshegs dang dong phrad cing // skyes bu mchog dang 'grogs
95a4(dkon brtsegs): ba thob gyur nas// stong pa nyid kyis 'dren pa bstod byas pas// de ring 'gro ba'i don chen shin tu byas// 'gro ba thamasas cad skye med ji bzhin du// byang chub rgyal ba de
95a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin lung bstan dang // gang dag zhi ba thob nas spyod pa dang // byang chub de bzhin de dag skye ba med// 'gro ba kun gyis chos nyid 'di 'dra ba// de shes byang chub thob par
95a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro zhes// lha rnams gang yang de la the tsom med// byang chu sems kyis rtag par de ltar spod// de bzhin 'gro ba 'gag med rdzi bzhin du// lha tshogs 'di dag rtogs
95a7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i blo ldan te// mkhas pa 'di dag nem nar med pas na// de phyir 'di dag rgyal ba rang byung 'byor// gnas pa med pa la ni nges gyur nas// g.yo ba med pa la ni nem nur
95a8(dkon brtsegs): med// 'gro ba kun la sems pa yod min pa// de la 'ang lhan mthe tshom yongs med do// chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med// byang chub sems dang de bzhin byed
95b1(dkon brtsegs): chub kyang // thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med// de la'ang lha rnam the tsom rnam par dag/ blo mchog ldan pa'i dga' ldan lha rnams// kun kyang gnas med de la rab gnas te/
95b2(dkon brtsegs): de phyir lha rnams byang chub rnyed mi dkar// rang byung nyid ni myur du thob par 'gyur// 'dren pa skar ma 'dra ba'i bskal pa la// 'gro ba mtha' yas rnam par 'brel par 'gyur/
95b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba de dag mtshan du 'gyur// rang byung chos la rnam nges rgyal po'o// de ltar rgyal bas dga' ldan lha rnams kyi// bsam pa mkhyen te 'gro la bstan mdzad pa// de thos
95b4(dkon brtsegs): nas ni lha bcas 'jig rten yang // yid rangs gyur cing stobs kyang thob par 'gyur// / dga' ldan pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu bangan pa'o// /
95b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe rab 'phrul las stsogs pa 'phrul dga' ba bye ba phrag bdun cus ma yin rnams nas dga' ldan ris kyi bar gyi lha de dag gis mchod pa yang mthong /
95b6(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgul yid rangs te// rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas shing / de bzhin nyid la
95b7(dkon brtsegs): the tsom med par gyur nas/ stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
95b8(dkon brtsegs): btud de// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag cag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ chos thams cad ni yang dag
96a1(dkon brtsegs): @#pa'i mtha' dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' dang / mtha' yas pa'i mtha' dang / mi gnas pa'i mtha' dang / mi zad pa'i mtha
96a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma gnyis pa'i mtha' ste/ mtha' ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// tshad ma mchis slad du mtha'
96a3(dkon brtsegs): yas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi ba'o// chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du sgrib ma mchis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du mi gnas pa mtha' zhes bgyi'o//
96a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mi zad pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ro gcig pa'i slad du mi gnyis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' ma mchis pa zhes
96a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba lags te/ chos gang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis so//
96a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ byang chub gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis pa ni byang chub lags
96a7(dkon brtsegs): par rig par bya'o// tha na mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub bo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ mtshams med dmas
96a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas/ de'i slad du mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub ces bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
96b1(dkon brtsegs): ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das
96b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbyings te/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das gang su dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal ba de dag ni gnod pa 'byur ba'i chos
96b3(dkon brtsegs): can te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te 'khor bar zhugs pa cig ma mchis na ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa yong btsal bar 'gyur na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'khor bar
96b4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa gang yang ma mchis na/ de mya ngan las 'das pa ci zhig tshol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag ma mchis the tsom ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
96b5(dkon brtsegs): gang la la zhig chos 'dis nem nar dang the tsom ma mchis na/ de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa
96b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul las stsogs pa 'phrul dga' ris
96b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bye ba phrag bdun cu po de dag rang gis rang lung bstan pa bstsal nas/ 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dag bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan
96b8(dkon brtsegs): par+Na thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas ma 'dzum pa mdzad// 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni khyod kyis ma bstan te/ rang byung
97a1(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa gang dag kyang // rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mdzad pa/ mthong nas ldar bcas 'jig rten the ma 'chal
97a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa'i rgyu de gang lags rang byung gsungs// the tsom 'tshal ba'i the tshom bstsal du gsol// khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu de thos gyur na/ 'khor 'di thams cad ngo mtshar
97a3(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur// byang chub mchog ni yongs su bsgrub smad du// de dag lam mchog shin tu rnam par dag la 'gyur// the tsom 'tshal ba dag ni nam du yang // byang chub
97a4(dkon brtsegs): yid bzhin bde bar mi 'grub ste// the tsom som nyi bstsal nas mkhas pa rnams// byang chu mchog gi rgyu dang skal ldan 'gyur// rkang gnyis dbang po khyod kyi 'khor
97a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag/ sdig pa yongs spongs byang chub sem dang ldan// lha rnams lung bstan pa de dag thos gyur na// rgyal ba'i go 'phang / rgya chen thob par 'gyur// de bas rgyal
97a6(dkon brtsegs): bas thugs rje che bskyed cing // the tsom 'tshal ba rnams la thugs brtse bas// lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad lung bstan cing // 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad dga'
97a7(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// ngas ni 'jig rten phan phyir 'jum pa mdzad// rta thul
97a8(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis zhu ba de zhus pa// lung bstan de ni khyod la ma lus par// bstan par ngas byas dang bar kun kyang nyon// 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha tshogs 'di rnams kyis/
97b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen par bdag cag lung bstan te// mu stegs tshogs kyi bsam pa zil mnan nas// 'khor 'dir seng ge'i nga ro chen po bsgrags// gnam du rdo 'bang
97b2(dkon brtsegs): sa la ltung ba ltar// de la the tsom za bar mi 'gyur te// de ltar the tsom med pa'i tshul thob pa// bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes// nyi ma nub gyur nam
97b3(dkon brtsegs): sros gyur pa'i che// myi rnams zla ba myur du 'char bar shes// de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po tshul thob dag// bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes// skar
97b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dbus na zlas pa gnas pa ni// sems can mtshungs par 'di la the tsom med// de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po tshul thob dag/ bdag cag thams cad mkhyen tu 'gyur/
97b5(dkon brtsegs): bar shes// ji ltar nyi ma nub par gyur pa'i che// nyi ma mi mthong sems can de dag shes// de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa// ye shes dam pa thob par 'gyur
97b6(dkon brtsegs): du shes// chu klung ji ltar gzhol bar 'bab 'gyur zhing // rgya mtshor 'bab par mkhas pa rnams kyis shes// de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa// byang chub rgyal
97b7(dkon brtsegs): chen thob par 'gyur bar shes// ji ltaraganam du bong ba 'phangs pa ni// sa la ltung bar 'gyur du the tsom med// de bzhin slas mkhas pa de dag kyang // 'jig rten ma
97b8(dkon brtsegs): par myur 'gyur ye shes 'jug/ gang thos nas ni the tsom med 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas yon tan gnas par bde ga shes la// ring gi sar nye lag stong ma yin par// mkhas
98a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam kyis chos nyid rab tu mthong // gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni bye ba dag// sangs rgyas gzugs bsgyur bar chad smras byas kyang
98a2(dkon brtsegs): chos la mkhas pa chos nyid rab mthong ba// de dag byang chub las ni zlog mi nus// de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas shing // bdag gis bdag nyid lung bstan
98a3(dkon brtsegs): brjod byed pa// de la 'dren pa cho ga tshul mkhyen pa// mi dbang lung bstan de la yi de rang mdzad// ji ltar lha tshogs 'di dag tshul 'di la// gzhan gyi drin la mi 'jog mngon shes
98a4(dkon brtsegs): shing // de bas bde gshegs 'gyur zhes rang sr-i la// 'jig rten mkhas pa rjes su yid rang mdzad// rta thul de bas mkhas pa gang gis rnams// bla med byang chub thob
98a5(dkon brtsegs): par byar sems la// de dag tshul 'di shes par gang gyur pa'i// 'phags pa'i skye bo mkhas la bsten par bya// gang dag tshul la 'jug pa rab mthong zhing // mkhas pa
98a6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag bde gshegs bsnyen bkur ba// de dag byang chub lag mthil 'dra bar gsal// tshul shes de dag rang gis rang 'byung 'gyur// gang gis bskal pa stong du dka'
98a7(dkon brtsegs): thub spad// sha khrag pags la mi lta byas pa bas// gang gis tshul 'di skad cig rtogs gyur na// de ni khyed 'phags dka' thub de lta min// 'das pa'i rang byung gang rnam
98a8(dkon brtsegs): byung ba dang // ma 'ongs sems can phan bzhed gang 'byung dang // de ltar dus na 'dren pa gang bzhugs pa// kun kyang tshul gyis bde bar gshegs pa thob// rab 'phrul/
98b1(dkon brtsegs): lha tshogs thub pa'i tshul shes pa// 'di dag nga la mchod pa mchog byas shing // 'dren pa thams cad bsnyen bkur rab byas nas// tshul gyis su ni rang byung thob par 'gyur/
98b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhas pa'i ting 'dzin gang yin pa// de yis rgyal ba rang byang gnas pa'i rnams// de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul po// tshul tho ba rnams kyis
98b3(dkon brtsegs): sngon bsten myur du thob// de lta rta thul sangs rgyas sras rnams ni// sangs rgyas gnas pa de la nem nar med// sangs rgyas tshul la sems can rnams rtse ba// tshul
98b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dge ston pa'i lam la spyod// de ltas tshul la dang ba'i yid byas te// brtsams par bya yi sdug bsngal spyod la min// rtag tu dge ba'i bshes mkhas bsten
98b5(dkon brtsegs): byas na// bla med byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung mchog thos nas ni// 'kho ra kun rgyal ba'i byang chub yid rang ste// rjes su
98b6(dkon brtsegs): yi rang the tsom med gyur nas// ther phyin blo gros la ni zhags par gyur// / 'phrul dga' ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcwo brgyad pa'o// de nas
98b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur las stsogs pa// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas 'phrul dga'i lha'i bur dag
98b8(dkon brtsegs): gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas// chom zhing mgul yid rangs te// rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang // yid bde ba skyes nas bcom
99a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes gang smras
99a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de la bdag cag gis ni yang dag par yang ma dmigs na// de'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis yang dag
99a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dmigs na ni/ mtha' yang des dmigs par 'gyur te/ de ni gnyis kyis spod pa'o// de lta bu ni theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
99a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la chos ni gnyis su med do zhes mi spod ma mos
99a5(dkon brtsegs): nade 'di snyam du bdog gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems su lags kyang / de ni lam log par zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de ci'i
99a6(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub smon pa de ni lam log par zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i
99a7(dkon brtsegs): ches de gang ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'ga' zhig dmigs par gyur na/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so//
99a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das chos ni 'das pa ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa ma lags// da ltar byung ba ma lags/ 'dus byas ma lags/ 'dus ma byas ma lags/ dngos po ma lag/
99b1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lag/
99b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon tu bgyi ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba de yang chos gang gi gnyen po yang ma lags la/ chos gang yang chos de'i gnyen po ma lags
99b3(dkon brtsegs): so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/ rnam par byang ba ma lags te/ gang gis chos gzhan gyi gnyen por gyur pa'i chos de yang
99b4(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs la/ gang chos de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i chos gzhan de gang yong rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
99b5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba ste/ de dag gi mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar gyi ba ma legs/
99b6(dkon brtsegs): bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags// mngon tu bgyi ba ma lags te// bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /
99b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyi skye ba'i mtshan ma nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba gang lags pa de yang skye ba'i mtshon
99b8(dkon brtsegs): ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyis 'gag pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi 'gog pa gang lags pa de yang 'gag pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// bcom ldan 'das
100a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa da ltar byung ba yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dang bral ba'o// 'dus byas kyang
100a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// 'dus ma byas kyang ma byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ci tsam du phung pos gzung ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/
100a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pas bzung ba 'am/ 'das pas bzung ba 'am/ ma 'ongs pas bzung ba 'am/ da ltar byung bas bzung ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyis bzung ba 'am/ 'dus ma
100a4(dkon brtsegs): byas kyis bzung ba 'am/ de dag ni rnam pa thams cad du mi dmigs te/ de ltar mi dmigs pa de ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi
100a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon tu bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar zhags pa'i rigs
100a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o// de nas gzhan 'phral dbang byed ris kyi lha de dag gis
100a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar shes pa'i chos de ltar lung bstan nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan srid pa mthar 'byin legs
100a8(dkon brtsegs): par gsungs// 'dren pas srid pa'i snying po ma brnyes na// skye bo mi mkhas de dag 'jigs pa yis// 'khor ba'i pha rol bgrod phyir rab tu zhags// phung po rnams
100b1(dkon brtsegs): ni kun tu mi dmigs te// phung po'i mtshan mas phung po'i stong pa nyid// chos gang gis mnyen por 'gyur ba ni// mtshan mas spong ste gang yang ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid
100b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis stong phyir dngos po gang // yongasra bya dang spangs bsgom mngon bya ba// gang yang mi mchis gang du'ang mi dmigs te// dngos po rnams ni dngos med rang 'byung
100b3(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// byang chub gang yang mtshan mar mi dmigs te// byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams de bzhin no// sangs rgyas gang yang mtshan mar mi dmigs te// byang chub
100b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' mtshan mas rtogs mi 'gyur// mi mkhas gang dag mtshan mar mngon zhen pa// de dag byang chub 'tshang rgyar sems bskyed kyang // mtshan mar sbed cing spyod yul log
100b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ste// blo gros ngan pa byang chub lam mi smod// mtshan ma sus spangs sangs rgyas spod yul la// smod pa de dag sangs rgyas bstan la mkhas// mtshan ma de bzhin
100b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med spangs te// stong dang mi stong de bzhin dmigs med pa// mkhas pa de byang chub lam la spyod// de dag byang chub dam pa zhi ba thob// phas kyi rgol ba
100b7(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi spyod yul min// gnas de nyan thos rnams kyis 'grod bya min// rang rgyal rnams kyang de la mi 'gro ste// rnam grol sems ldan zag med tha ba med// dgra bcom
100b8(dkon brtsegs): bstan po 'di la gang brtson dang // de bzhin rang rgyal skyob par gyur pa dag/ mkhas pa'i spyod yul de la spyod yul med// go 'phang de ni mtshan ma sprod pa dang // nyi tshe'i stong
101a1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid la bsgom pa dang // gang rnams stong pas stong zhes stong spu dang // chos kun rang bzhin yod smras 'thob mi nus/
101a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ma smad rnams kyi bslab pa la// slob dang rnam bral slob pa slob pa'i rnams// mkhas te rtogs pa med pas byang chub rtogs// ston pas bstan pa bzhin du
101a3(dkon brtsegs): dgyes byed lags// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo bstod pas na// bdag cag bsod nams mi chung gang thob des// 'gro ba byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya zhing // ma she
101a4(dkon brtsegs): ston mdzad sangs rgyas grub par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sbyar la stsogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha khrag khrig brgyad
101a5(dkon brtsegs): bcu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas// skye bo phal po che de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir// de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan
101a6(dkon brtsegs): parta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol pa// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i bsam mkhyen nas// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad la// thub
101a7(dkon brtsegs): pas 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni ma gsungs na// rgyal ba 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bstan du gsol// 'dren pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad ces// rgyal ba khyu mchog dam pas de skad gsung /
101a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten don slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu// 'dren pa bka' stsol the tsom bsal du gsol// drang srong chen po'i zhal nas 'dzum rig nas// thub chen khyod kyis 'khor nas
101b1(dkon brtsegs): the tsom 'tshal// go'u ta ma rgyal ba 'dren pas de dag la// 'jig rten sman slad 'dzum pa rgyu lung bstan gsol// 'di dag 'khor ba'i rgyu la rgyab phyog te// mya ngan 'das pa'i
101b2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis thal spar sdod// 'khor 'di yangs pa'i sems la the tsom 'tshal// don yod grags mnga' som nyi bsal du gsol// bde gshegs bstan la the tsom
101b3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis te// phyir zhing dad bskyed rim gro cher bgyid de// the tsom mi 'tshal sems ni grol 'gyur bas// rgyal bas skye bo'i the tsom legs par khum// bde gshegs
101b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan la 'di dag bder gnas shing // gang lam rang byung rgyal ba gshegs gyur pa// lam de nas ni the tsom ma mchis mchi// de nas skye bo'i the tsom gcad du gcad du gsol/
101b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan la tshig su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// skye bo tshogs chen don dbang brten byas nas// tshigs su bcad de dus su gang smras
101b6(dkon brtsegs): shing // 'dzum pa'i don gyi rgyu ni yod zhes pa// khyod kyis tshig ni dus dang ldan pa yin// rta thul dri ba de yi don dris pas// skye bo tshogs chen 'di yi don byas gyur// khyod
101b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis de dris skye bo tshogs chen dag/ byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhugs par 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bsam pa ngas mkhyen te// rta thul 'dzum pa 'di ni ngas
101b8(dkon brtsegs): bstan to// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i bstan pa'i lam de nas// don tu gnyer ba 'di dag de bzhin 'dong // gang gis 'gro ba 'di dag mtshan med par// smig rgyu la ni ji ltar
102a1(dkon brtsegs): chu bzhin mthong // byis pa'i rmongs mkhas pa'i tshul bzhin te// de dag rjes su byang chub 'dod pas bslab// mtshan ma'i 'du shes
102a2(dkon brtsegs): spangs phyir mi rnams gang // rtag tu mtshan ma mngon dga' 'jigs 'gyur zhing // mtshan po'i 'du shes log pa'i lam du 'dod// mtshan ma med pas byang chub mchog thob 'gyur//
102a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i rtog ldan mtshan mar rnam rtags nas// ji ltar brtags pa de ltar 'ching ba yin// mtshan ma stong par rnams mthong mkhas pa'i// zhi ba dag ni grags ldan dam
102a4(dkon brtsegs): pa thob// 'du shes mtshan can mi mnyam sems rgyud kyi// sdig pa rgya dag mi mkhas de dag byed// 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mi chud myong // de ltar mi mkhas mtshan mar brtag
102a5(dkon brtsegs): pa byas// mtshon mar 'du shes pa'i phung po dang // sangs rgyas byang chub byang chub sems dpa' mthong // de ltar mtshan ma med cing stong mthong na// byang chub gzhal med bla ni
102a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa 'thob// 'du shes mtshan ma can la nyon mongs 'phel// mtshan ma med pa kun tu sbyor ba spong // mtshan ma las ni kun sbyor gzhan med de// kun tu spor ba de nyid
102a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan med yin// gang rnams byang chub thob par bya rtog pa// rnyog pa de nyid mi mkhas par chad yin// mkhas pa'i longs spyod rnams pa thob byed na// longs spyod de nyid
102a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med par 'gyur// chos rnams gang yang rang bzhin nyid kyis med// rnam par rtog pas chos byung kun kyang stong // rtog pa med pas mtshan ma med par 'gyur/
102b1(dkon brtsegs): de nyid byang chub gzhan du mkhas mi smra// rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag thos gyur nas// mi 'jigs ldan pa'i 'khor ni the tsom bsal// dper na tsam pa'i 'phreng ba 'dzin
102b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ltar// mkhas rnams thub pas gsungs la legs zhes 'dzin// 'jigs pa med pa'i lha tshogs 'di dag gis// mchod pa 'phags pa bla na med byas shing // rgyal
102b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i spyod yul chos kyang rnam shes nas// 'gro ba rnam par 'dren pa kun mkhyen 'gyur// / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/
102b4(dkon brtsegs): bcu dag pa'o// / de nas tshangs ris kyi lce bye ba phrag drug cus lha ma yin rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha'i bar dag gi mchod
102b5(dkon brtsegs): ba yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mag la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyed nas/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngags pa
102b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkar byas pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan la mi 'dod skyes shing / de bzhin gshegs
102b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bstan pa 'di la ni snang ba thob ste/ chos zab mo la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag gis chos thams cad byas pa yang ma yin ma byas pa yang ma yin zhes
102b8(dkon brtsegs): bya bar shes par gyur to// de bzhin du skyes pa yang ma yin ma skyes pa yang ma yin/ byung ba yang ma yin ma byung ba yang ma yin/ grub pa yang ma yin ma grub pa yang
103a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ 'gags pa yang ma yin ma 'gags pa yang ma yin/ gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin//
103a2(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs pa yang ma yin/ rnam par byang ba yang ma yin/ rjes su chags pa yang ma yin/ khong khro ba yang ma yin/ rmongs pa yang ma yin/ ma rmongs pa
103a3(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin/ shes pa po yang ma yin/ mthong ba po yang ma yin/ mthong ba po med pa yang ma yin/ tshor ba po yang ma yin/ tshor ba po med pa yang ma yin/ ston pa
103a4(dkon brtsegs): po yang ma yin/ ston pa po med pa yang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin/ dngos po yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa yang ma yin/ dmigs pa yang
103a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ mi dmigs pa yang ma yin/ 'gro ba yang ma yin 'ong ba'ang ma yin/ song ba yang ma yin/ 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ stong pa yang ma yin/ mi stong pa yang ma yin//
103a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma yod pa yang ma yin/ mtshan ma med yang ma yin/ smon pa yod pa yang ma yin/ smon pa med pa yang ma yin no// zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de dag de ltar
103a7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la yong mi gnas pa'i yid kyis de dag ming la yang mi gnas/ tha snyad la yang mi gnas/ brjod pa la yang mi gnas te/ de dag ni brjod pa'i 'du
103a8(dkon brtsegs): shes can yang ma yin/ brjod du med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye
103b1(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye ba'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi 'du shes can
103b2(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs
103b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/
103b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin//
103b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin//
103b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i ches kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin// mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/
103b7(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las bla ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin te/ de ltar thams cad kyi
103b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du rtog pa med pa'i blo can/ namakha' bzhin du dag cing gos pa med par gyur nas/ de rnams dag pa dang gos pa med pa'i phyir de'i tshe de dag zhi bas bcom ldan
104a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ zhi la zhi ba'i thugs mnga' zhi ba spod cing zhi ba'i pha rol byo//
104a2(dkon brtsegs): zhi bsten par mdzad cing 'gro la zhi ba ston pa rjes su ston/ zhi ba'i spyod yul dgyes shing byang chub zhi la dri bral 'khrugs ma mchis/ khyod kyis 'chi med zhi ba 'gro
104a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyud thams cad zad pa mar du brnyes/ zhi ba thob par bgyid pa'i zhi ba'i lam mchog zhi ba yang dag bsten// yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs klong rnams zhe mdzad 'gro
104a4(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad bton// sngon gyi rgyal bas bsten pa'i byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba de la 'god// de sten sangs rgyas 'phags pas bsten pa'i grong khyer zhi bar bya zhes
104a5(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// 'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bsten pa'i bslab pa bstan// gal te bslab pa de slob 'gro ba 'di dag byang chub gzhal yas thob bslabs na//
104a6(dkon brtsegs): zhi zhing yid zhi zhing lam dong dbang po zhi ba dang // 'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro bzhi byed mthu chen zhi ba shes par 'gyur// 'dren pa khyod kyi sras mchog zhi ba 'gro ba zhi bgyid
104a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gis// 'chi med zhi ba mtshan ma thams cad zad pa rnam par rtogs gyur pa// de dag 'dren pa tshul la mkhas pa mchod pa mchog gis mchod par 'gyur/
104a8(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs zhi zhing mtshan ma kun spangs zhi ba rtag tu ston par 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad zhi zhing mtshan ma bral ba de nyid ma ngan 'das// thub pa gang dag zhi las
104b1(dkon brtsegs): zhi 'dod sems pa de dag nyon mongs 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod kyis byang chub rang ni 'gro kun chos kun bsam mi khyab// thub pa blo ldan 'das las rgal ba de la bdag
104b2(dkon brtsegs): cag dogs ma mchis// gang dag phung po bor te byang chub zhi tshe la de la zhi bar rtogs// phung pos 'jigs pa de dag shag kya thub pa'i bstan la dga' ma lags// dben
104b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i blo gros ldan pa zhi tshol dag blo 'khrugs gyur pa ste// chos kyi mtshan ma spod yul 'di dag byis pa zhes ni ston pas gsungs// thams cad mkhyen pas zhi dang mtshan
104b4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i 'ching bzhi pa 'di dag gsungs// thub pa gang dag phung po rnams la rnam po kun tu mtshan mi rnyed// de dag shag kya thub pa'i bstan pa mdzes byed gang dag mtshan med
104b5(dkon brtsegs): dga'// de dag byang chub skyon bral zhi ba mkhas pa'i spyod yul 'thob par 'gyur// bdud kyi rtsod las rgyal nas nyon mongs zhi ba'i thams cad mkhyen pas thob// rnam
104b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dren zhi ba mdzad la bstod pas bdag cag bsod nams gong rnyed pa// chags med thugs mnga' bde bar gshegs pas 'di tsam zhes ni mkhyen gyur pa// des ni 'gro ba thams
104b7(dkon brtsegs): cad lam mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsten gyur pa// zhi byed bsten nas mkhas pas mchod pa'i rang byung sdig med shog/ de nas mi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pas
104b8(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa rnams dang lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa rig nas/ bdag nyid kyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis// bcom ldan 'das
105a1(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par bstod pa// mi dbang khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad ni// log pa rmongs byed chang ba stong 'dra zhing // ston gyi sprin 'dra
105a2(dkon brtsegs): mig 'phrul 'dra bar mkhyen// rgyal bas 'dod pa'i yon tan med par mkhyen// ji ltar mi zhig rmi lam bkres gyur pas// kha zas ro brgya zos kyang ma 'drangs pa/
105a3(dkon brtsegs): de la bkres med zas med sems can med// rmi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cad gzigs// skom pa'i mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na// chu bsil dang rnyog med 'thungs gyur kyang /
105a4(dkon brtsegs): ngoms med cha ba zhi bar mi 'gyur te// de bzhin khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad gzigs// 'di la byed med tshor med sems can med// byas pa de bzhin med cing rnam smin med// /
105a5(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur ba med ces// 'di 'dra'i chos mkhyen the tsom yong mi mnga'// mi zhig yid du 'ong ba'i tshig smra na// dga' bar 'gyur yang tshig la 'pho ba med// tshig nyid
105a6(dkon brtsegs): med cing dga' 'gyur dngos med kyang // de mkhyen de la the tsom ma yongs mi mnga'// pi bang sgra snyan mnyan na sgra snyan te// sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod pa min// de ltar mkhas
105a7(dkon brtsegs): pas phung po 'di gzigs na// phung po'i rang bzhin gang yang dmigs mi mnga'// nor bu rin chen rang bzhin gsal dag pa// gos kyi drung gzhag sna tshogs chen du 'gyur/
105a8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang // log pa'i rnam par rtog pas de ltar gyur// tsan dan dri med skyon dang bral ba yang // rkyen dang sbar na dri zhim gzhan du gyur// de ltar
105b1(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang // so so rang gis rtogs pa'i rnam pa bzhin// ji ltar mi 'ayi dung gi sgra thos te// sgra 'dig las byung zhes brtags byas kyang // rang bzhi/
105b2(dkon brtsegs): stong pa'i dngos te de mi dmigs// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// ji ltar mi zhig bsod pa'i kha zas la// yan lago srog phan ji ltar 'gyur brtags na//
105b3(dkon brtsegs): dngos med yan lag srog kyang de bzhin te// drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs// ji ltar mi zhig nam mkha'i 'ja' mthong // yan lag gzhigs brtags rang bzhin med
105b4(dkon brtsegs): cing stong // nam mkha'i 'ja' bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong / drang srong chen po de bzhin chos kun gzigs// grong khyer mchog kyang yan lag rnam gzhigs na// grong khyer
105b5(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin de bzhin ming mi dmigs// grong khyer ji bzhin de ltar yan lag stong // mi dbang khyed kyis de bzhin chos kan gzigs// skyes bu dga' bar rnga zhig brdungs bgyis
105b6(dkon brtsegs): na// dga' ba skyed kyang sgra'i rang bzhin stong // ji ltar sgra bzhin de ltar yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs
105b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe// sgra ni phyogs su mi 'gro 'byung ba med// phyogs su de bzhin 'gag par mi 'gyur te// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus
105b8(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar rjed brdungs pa'i tshe// thogs pa med cing snyen pa'i rang bzhin te// khyod kyi yan lag rnga sgra de dang 'dra// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/
106a1(dkon brtsegs): skyes bus ji ltar rje pa rdungs pa'i tshe// sgra de 'jig rten dga' byar rtog pa med// ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyis yan lag
106a2(dkon brtsegs): stong // mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzigaso// skyes bus rdzi ltar rje de brdungs pa'i tshe// g.yo ba med cing zhi ba'i dngos kyang med// ji ltar rnga bzhin khyod kyis yan
106a3(dkon brtsegs): lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigaso// skyes bus rdzi ltar rje de brdungs pa'i tshe// sgra de yan lag ma byung rang dbang min// ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyis
106a4(dkon brtsegs): yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs ris kyi lha de dag dang / mi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa de'i lhag pa'i
106a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa thugs su chud cing / zhi gnas dang ye shes mthong ba'i bstod pa des de ltar bstod pas/ 'khor de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par gyur par gzigs nas de'i tshe 'dzu
106a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// shag kya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad dri med dag mthong nas// lhar
106a7(dkon brtsegs): bcas mir bcas k+Sha dang gnod sbyin bcas pa 'jig rten kun// skyob pa'i 'dzum mthong thams cad ldan pa'i 'gro bathe tsom 'tshal// bde gshegs zhal bzangs de la lta zhing
106a8(dkon brtsegs): zos par dga' ste sdod// rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad legs par bka' stsol the tsom dgum du gsol// rnam par 'dren pa thub mchog kun mkhyen sangs rgyas 'dren pa rnams//
106b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ma mchis par 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad ma mthong na// bde gshegs khyod kyis gang slad 'dzam mdzad the tsom rgyu de gsungs// rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad rgyu zos 'gro ba rnam
106b2(dkon brtsegs): ni dga' bar 'gyur// 'khor 'di the tsom 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te khyod la sems// bde gshegs thub pa'i gsung mchog the tsom gcod pa nyan 'tshal na// rnam 'dren thub
106b3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dzum mdzad rgyu de de dag rnams la gsungs// zos nas 'gro ba dga' zhing the tsom ma mchis 'phel bar 'gyur// 'khor 'di snying po ldan zhing rnyog med sangs rgyas yon
106b4(dkon brtsegs): tan 'tshal// ston pa khyod kyi zhal mdzes zla ba mdzes pa 'dra// 'dren pa chags med rdzogs pa tshangs pa 'dra ba'i gsung ba sgrags gsol// de thos 'khor rnams the tsom
106b5(dkon brtsegs): chad cing chos la gnas par 'gyur// khyod kyis tshangs pa'i gsung mchog don ldan 'jig rten 'das rig nas// skye bo dga' zhing mgu pa'i yid ldan thams cad mkhyen pa sa tshim//
106b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag dogs bstsal sbyangs pa'i yid kyis thams cad mkhyen du bsgrub// brtson 'grus stobs chen bskyed nas 'dun pa stobs ldan rtsom par bgyid// de ltar lags pas
106b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'dren pa phan mdzad gsung sngags gsol// rkang gnyis dam pa'i gsung mchog mi g.yo thos nas de yis ni// dge ba thob pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad mkhyen du
106b8(dkon brtsegs): sems 'gyur bar// stobs bcu mnga' ba 'gro ba kun la phan pa legs par dgongs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka'
107a1(dkon brtsegs): stsal ba// rta thul nga yis phan byed 'dzum pa 'gro ba kun la gang bstan pa// rtse gcig yid kyis snyan cing bsngags pa mdzes pa de ni mnyan
107a2(dkon brtsegs): par byos// de thos 'gro ba yon tan bstsags pa 'jig rten don byed pa// phan dang ldan pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas bka' stsal de la brtson 'grus rtsom// tshangs pa kun 'khor 'di
107a3(dkon brtsegs): dag dga' zhing chos rnams la the tsom med// bskal pa khrag khrig gang ga'i bye ma snyed du dge ba legs par spyad// kun tu rnam pa dag la ma chags yid 'gyur 'du shes mkha' 'dra ste/
107a4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar gyur kyang bde gshegs byang chub rdzogs par 'tshang rgya sems ma skyed// 'di dag ma 'ongs dus na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag gzhal yas pa// gang ga'i bye ma snyed na rdul bstsal thams
107a5(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la gnas// de dag phyi nas bde bar gshegs pa tshe ldan sangs rgyas 'dren che ba// srid pa srel cing 'gro ba bstod par 'thon pa'i bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur/
107a6(dkon brtsegs): skyob pa de dag ji ltar spyod pa sku tshe'i tshad kyang de ltar 'gyur// bde gshegs mtha' yas grags ldan 'jig rten sdug bsngal 'brel cing gnas par 'gyur// de dag rnams kyi sangs
107a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas zhing ni zhing gi 'byor pa gzhal las te// 'dren pa chen po rnams kyis bskal pa khrag khrig rnam pa du mar ni// sangs rgyas mtha' yas rnams kyis gsungs kyang de dag bkon
107a8(dkon brtsegs): pazad mi nus// de tshe de dag ye shes stobs ldan zhes bya ba'i rgyal bar 'thun par 'gyur// g.yo ba med cing sems med mi gnas chos ni 'gro ba ston par 'gyur// de dag zhing
107b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog rnams su skyob pa'i thams cad mkhyen la ma sbyangs pa'i// sems can gcig kyang mi 'byung srid pa de la phal cher mya ngan 'da'// de dag na ni de tshe 'gro ba de dag sdug bsngal
107b2(dkon brtsegs): gcig shes te// mi rtag 'du byed sdug bsngal rab tu 'jigs pa sems can yid 'byung ba'o// de na 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang ni sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yod mi 'gyur// de dag
107b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad blo 'thun 'gyur zhing sla ba'i lam la myur bar 'gyur// de na mi rnams dag gi sgra skad rang bzhin gzhan ni 'byung mi 'gyur// mi sdug mi rtag de bzhin nyid dang sdug bsngal
107b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin bdag med dang // zhi ba stong nyid mtshan med 'chi med mya ngan 'das dang byang chub ni// sgra skad de dag yang dang yang 'byung de dag na mi gnas par 'gyur// sgra gang thos nas de
107b5(dkon brtsegs): dag 'khor ba grol gnas thob par mi 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i sgra de shing ngam rtsig pa dag dang gang na'ang yod mi 'gyur// bla gab med dang mkha' dang gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang
107b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams na med// de'i tshe sangs rgyas mthu yis yan lag brgya dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byung // de tshe 'dres pa'i nyes pa med cing 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang dang // ti mug dag gis
107b7(dkon brtsegs): gzir ba rnams kyi rnar ni dge ba'i sgra grag 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba las ni 'byung zhing mya ngan 'das 'gror 'gyur// de che zhing mchog stong pa thams cad dga' ba'i skye
107b8(dkon brtsegs): bos gang bar 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa de dag bskal pa khrag khrig byang chub brtson byas nas// drang srong chen po de dag smon lam gyis ni 'byor pa 'di bstsags te// zhing mchog
108a1(dkon brtsegs): de na sems can tshogs gang yod pa de kun bde gshegs 'gyur// tshangs pa'i smon lam yangs pa rgya chen zhi ba 'gro bas mthong 'gyur na/
108a2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar sangs rgyas bka' stsal bzhin du tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis bsten gyur pa// de la bslabs nas 'gro ba thams cad thogs med pa'i 'dren par 'gyur// de dag rgyal ba 'thob
108a3(dkon brtsegs): nas 'gro ba 'di kun dngos po med ces ston// de lta bas na tshul kun 'jug la mkhas pa'i spyod pa bsten par gyis// / tshangs pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// /
108a4(dkon brtsegs): / de nas 'od gsal gyi lha bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyis lha ma yin rnams nas/ tshangs pa'i bar gyi lha dag gis mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan
108a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu dgos nas/ pus me
108a6(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
108a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du gang la bslabs pas chos thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ des chos thams cad kyi
108a8(dkon brtsegs): tshul la 'jug pa rtogs par bgyid do// de rtogs pas bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i spobs pa dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa dang /
108b1(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang 'jam pa'i spobs dang dge ba'i spobs pa dang / rig pa'i spobs pa dang / grol ba'i spobs pa dang / nye bar gyur pa'i spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs
108b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / thun mongs ma yin pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge
108b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin de gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa thams cad
108b4(dkon brtsegs): yid la mi bgyid de/ de 'di snyam du chos thams cad rnam par rtog par med de/ rnam par rtogs pa yongs su chad pa'o// gang rnam par mi rtog pa ni/ thams cad du song ste/
108b5(dkon brtsegs): chos gang yang rnam par rtog par nus pa ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de la ji ltar rnam par rtog
108b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur zhes chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog par a la 'jug pa'i spobs pa rab tu thob cing / de dag a'i sgo la zhugs pas/ spobs pa mtha' yas par gyur te/ a zhes
108b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ni mtha' yas pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ ma bgyis pa mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa/ yongs su ma grub pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ mi gnas pa mi g.yo ba
108b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba ma mchis pa/ 'phro ba ma mchis pa/ rtog pa mchis pa/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/ ma bsgrub pa/ yongs su zhugs pa ma mchis pa/ ma brtags pa/ gzugs
109a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa/ bstan du ma mchis pa/ bltar ma mchis pa/ ma mthong ba/ bsam da ma mchis pa/ mi gnas pa/ ma shes pa/ rnam par ma shes
109a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ma smos pa/ ma bstan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam du ma mchis pa/ song ba ma mchis pa/ 'ongs pa ma mchis pa/ nye ba ma lags pa/ ring ba ma lags pa/
109a3(dkon brtsegs): ma btag pa/ gdags pa ma mchis pa'i chos can/ ming ma mchis pa/ tha snyad ma mchis pa/ gnyen po ma mchis pa/ sgrib pa ma mchis pa/ 'pho ba ma mchis pa/ 'khrug pa
109a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa/ brtag tu ma mchis pa/ mi zad pa/ gnyis su ma mchis pa/ ma byung ba/ brdzun pa ma lags pa/ bden pa ma lags pa/ sho bi ma lags pa/ ma skyes pa ma
109a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pa/ sbyangs pa ma lags pa/ spang bar 'os pa ma lags pa/ gdags su ma mchis pa/ mtshan mas ma bskyod pa ma bzung ba/ ma nor pa 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/
109a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/ gtang du ma mchis pa/ yongs su gtang du ma mchis pa/ ma gtang ba yongs su ma btang ba ste/ a zhes bgyi ba ni sus kyang ma bgyis pa chos gang
109a7(dkon brtsegs): gi byed pa po yang ma lags so// a ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos gang yang skye bar bgyid pa ma lags so// a ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos gang gi skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so//
109a8(dkon brtsegs): a ne ma 'gags pa ste/ chos gang gi 'gag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma legs so// a ni ma 'gag pa yang ma legs pa ste/ chos gang gi mi 'gag pa'i rkyen tu 'gyur ba ma
109b1(dkon brtsegs): lags so// a ni gnas pa yang ma lags mi gnas pa yang ma lags/ a ni btags pa yang ma lags/ ma btags pa yang ma lags/ a ni spangs pa yang ma lags/
109b2(dkon brtsegs): ma spangs pa yang ma lags/ a ni shes pa yang ma lags/ ma shes pa yang ma lags/ a ni dmigs pa yang ma lags/ ma dmigs pa yang ma lags/ a ni stong pa
109b3(dkon brtsegs): yang ma lags/ mi stong pa yang ma lags/ a ni dmigs su mchis pa yang ma lags/ dmigs su ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ a ni mtshan ma yang ma lags/ mtshan
109b4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ a ni smon pa yang ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni a'i tshulo//
109b5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni tshul gcig pa ste a'i tshul lo// chos thams cad ni 'gro ba gcig pa ste a'i 'gro ba'o// chos thams cad ni 'jug pa gcig pa ste a la 'jug pa'o//
109b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni gdags pa gcig pa ste as gdags pa'o// chos thams cad ni tha snyad gcig pa ste a'i tha snyad do// chos thams cad ni brjod pa gcig pa ste a sa
109b7(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag ni/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma byung ba de dag ni dngos po ma
109b8(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma grub pa de dag ni ma grub pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma 'gags pa de dag ni 'gags pa ma mchis pa'i
110a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa de dag ni 'das ma bgyis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par
110a2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi tshul lo// bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag gi tha snyad ji ltar rtogs par bgyi zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rmi lam na bya ba sna
110a3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs 'byung ba de bzhin du chos thams cad blta bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rmi lam gyi bya ba ni ma skyes pa ma byang ba dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ 'on kyang
110a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag la gdags par gsungs so// de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi byed pa yang 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na brag ca la tha snyad mchis pa bzhin
110a5(dkon brtsegs): du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad kyang blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gdags pa mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi gdags par blta'o//
110a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ smig rgyu la chab tu gdags pa'i tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
110a7(dkon brtsegs): dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor la bud med kyi gzugs sam skyes pa'i gzugs kyi tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das
110a8(dkon brtsegs): byis pa rnams dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du rmi lam gyi bya ba tha snyad du bgyi yi/ rmi lam gyi bya ba de dag ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byis pa dga' bar bgyi
110b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slad du mig yor dang / sIbar+b+ha dang / brag ci'i bya ba dag kyang tha skad du bgyi ste/ brag cal bya ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan
110b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de skad ces gsol nas 'od gsal gyi lha rnam
110b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa// bde gshegs khyod kyis tshul gcig mkhyen te 'on kyang gzhan dang gzhan du gsungs/
110b4(dkon brtsegs): thub pa 'jig rten mkhas pa'i sras rnams rnam par rol pa'ang de bzhin no// de la 'jig rten blo med bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis yongs mi chud// bdag gi don te phyogs
110b5(dkon brtsegs): bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gro ba stong // sgyu ma gsog dang smig rgyu chu ma mchis la chab kyi 'du shes can// byis pa de dag blo log de bzhin 'khrul te bdag tu sbyor ba
110b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid// de dag yang dag ma 'tshal mi mkhas gnas min dngos la rten kyang 'cha'// de bzhin byis pa skye bo sgrib rgyu 'dra ba'i phung po yongs ma 'tshal// 'khor bar dga' bos
110b7(dkon brtsegs): zug rngus zug cing sdug bsngal de yis dbang po 'das// gang la mi mkhas nges par sdug bsngal myong bas dngos ma mchis// blo ltor yid nor sdug bsngal rnams la bde bar 'du
110b8(dkon brtsegs): shes nor ba la// nyon mongs 'jigs pa che dang ngag gsum rnams kyang rjes su 'gro zhing 'brang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dag chen nyon mongs mtshungs med rjes su 'brang /
111a1(dkon brtsegs): blo stor de dag sdug bsngal gang gis sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sdug bsngal ba// de rnams de dag rjes 'brang byis pa mi mkhas gnod pa'i
111a2(dkon brtsegs): khur yang khyer// de dag rgyal ba'i tshul sgo thar par bgyid pa stong pa 'di thos na// skyes bu ngan pa blo zhan de dag bstan ngag bde ba nyid kyis 'jigs// bde gshegs khyod kyis a'i
111a3(dkon brtsegs): yi ge tshul gcig sgo gcig bstan// de la yang dag blo can sa las shing skye bzhin du yid bskyed cing // bdud rnams bye ba dpung dang bcas btul byang chub zhi ba mngon 'chang rgya/
111a4(dkon brtsegs): yan lag brgyad pa'i grwa bcas skye bo nyon mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol// bde bar gshegs pa cang mkhyen nges pa rnams ni tshul gyi dam pa des// myur du nyon mongs dug bstsal byang
111a5(dkon brtsegs): chub dpag yas zhi ba thob gyur cig/ grol nas dug med gyur pa skye bo gzhan mthong nges pa'i mkhyen bsnyes nas// pha rol myur phyin dug med bde zhing gdug pa thams cad 'jom
111a6(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad// bde gshegs thams cad stong yang bdag tu rtogs rnams tshul dang tshul min rtog/ 'gro ba kun gyi nang nas mkhas pa tshul dang tshul min bslabs pa dag
111a7(dkon brtsegs): grol nas 'gro ba kun la chags med yid kyis ngo bo nyid kyis chos// de'i tshul dang tshul la mkhas pa de dag mthu chen mgon por 'gyur// 'ching dang bcing ba med cing bde bar
