111a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa chos rnams chos nyid med// de bzhin nyid dang ma nor de bzhin nyid zhi mi 'dag nyon mi mongs// nyon mongs mtshan ma med cing zhi byed med la nyon mongs rnams kyang med//
111b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur// grol zhing 'gro la mdzad zhi ba'i chos can zhi mdzad ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'// bcom ldan lhar bcas
111b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dpyid kyi smig rgyu bzhin du 'khrul pa ste// kun rtog bdag nyid zil gnon bdag dang gzhan med skyes pa bud med rtogs// 'gro ba sdug bsngal de na sna tshogs kyis
111b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed sems kyis sems kyang na// las dang 'bras bu med cing de myong gang 'gyur de yang med// bde gshegs de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul tshul ni bdag cag 'tshal// des
111b4(dkon brtsegs): na de ltar bde gshegs zhi thugs dbang po zhi zhing nges pa ste// dge ba'i blo mnga' dag gtsang dri med chos kyis rab tu mchod par gyur// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'phags pa'i gtso la bstod
111b5(dkon brtsegs): pas bsod nams par byung ba// ji snyed dpal stag rkang gnyis gtso bos rnam smin yongasu mkhyen gyur pa'i// bdag cag dag rtsa de yis 'gro ba 'di kun kun mkhyen nyid thob shog
111b6(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams 'di kun 'gro ba kun gyi don bsngo kun kyang rgyal bar shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gsal gyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / tshul gyi
111b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'gro ba'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang thugs su chud la/ 'khor de dag gis kyang khyad par thob par 'gyur bar yang mkhyen nas/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe
111b8(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rten don mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun mkhyen thams cad zil gnon pa// bde gshegs thugs rje
112a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan rnams rgyu ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na// rgyal ba dpal stag rkang gnyis mchog gis 'jig rten thugs brtses bka' stsal gsol// 'jig
112a2(dkon brtsegs): rten 'das khyod ci slad 'dzum mdzad de rgyu bdag cag rnams la gsungs// gtso bo de zos 'gro ba mtha' dag yid ni rab tu dang 'gyur zhing // rnam par 'dren pa des 'brang las dang 'bras
112a3(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhal yas bgyid par 'gyur// des ni lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyam thag 'di// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad bstan srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di nas
112a4(dkon brtsegs): sgril bar 'gyur// drang srong chen po'i gsung mchog yan lag brgyad ldan bzang po 'di thos nas// 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid 'tshal dge la brtson zhing dga' bar 'gyur// the tsom
112a5(dkon brtsegs): bral gyur rnam dag yid kyis brtson 'grus grag po'i stobs skyed cing // bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgyid khyod dang 'thun byung sras su 'gyur// 'khor rnams 'di dag
112a6(dkon brtsegs): brten pa bzhin ma mchis par 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta// 'gro ba'i rtsa lag rtog pa yid gnyis bsal zhing lung bstan bka' stsal gsol// bcom ldan 'das rten 'di dag khyod
112a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi zham ring gnas shing nyan par 'tshal// gsung ba legs brjod bdud rtsi'i char phob gang dag skom pa 'tshal bar 'gyur// 'dren pa chen po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag cing sangs
112a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yon tan 'tshal// ring du song ba'i ma la bu lta bzhin du khyod kyi zhal du lta// bde gshegs lha rnams lung bstan bka' stsol bzhad pa'i don kyang bstan tu gsol/
112b1(dkon brtsegs): skyob pa'i gsung mchog thos na 'jig rten don chen shin tu thob par 'gyur// thub pa de ring su zhig dge ba 'phel zhing grogs po don tu gnyer// su zhig 'dren pa'i yon tan gter
112b2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed 'gyur ba bdag cag de nyan 'tshal// rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams khyod kyis gsungs pa de dag thos shing dgar gyur nas// tshul 'di ston cing ting 'dzin stobs ldan shes rab la
112b3(dkon brtsegs): yang skam par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyi spobs pa legs par dus ldan skyes pa shin
112b4(dkon brtsegs): tu legs// bde gshegs rnam par sprul bzhin de ltar khyod kyis blo gros 'byung 'gyur zhing // spobs pa che 'byung de phyir gang dang gang dag khyod kyis dris gyur pa// de dag lung
112b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan ngas bshad kun kyang dbang po zhi bas mnyan par gyis// 'od gsal ba'i lha rnams blo dge sngon gyi rgyal po mthong ba ste// 'jig rten mgon med yid can 'di dag mthong
112b6(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub yang dag zhugs// byang chub res byung lam mchog yang dag rgyal bas spyad spyod pa// byang chub 'gro 'dod gang tshe ston med lam stor rnams la ston par 'gyur
112b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul gyi dam pa shin tu gsal sgra thun mongs ma yin 'di thos na// sangs rgyas yon tan don gnyer po sbyangs de dag byang chub zhi 'thob 'gyur// de dag stobs skyes tshul
112b8(dkon brtsegs): ngang tshul min mkhas shing byang chub yid des 'gyur// bu skyes ma bzhin dga' bas byang chub mchog tu de dag smon lam btab// 'od gsal lha rnams de dag byang chub
113a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod la tshul gyi sgo bstan te// bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med par phra ba'i tshul 'di bstan byas na// sems can skar ma'i
113a2(dkon brtsegs): grangs pas ches mang ba dag byang chub dga' byas te// de'i 'og tu 'jig rten mkhas pa rang byung skyon bral kun mkhyen 'gyur// de dag zhing mchog brjod du med pa zhing rnam
113a3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba brgya grangs par// yangs shing shin tu dag la mtha' dag bkod pa rnams kyis brgyan pa ste/ kun gyi zhing du ngan song rnams dang de bzhin mi khom yong mi 'byung // bde
113a4(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs rnams thugs bces sems can thams cad rang byung mdzad par 'gyur// zhing rnams de dag gang na'ang nyan thos theg pa ston par mi 'gyur te// sems can thams
113a5(dkon brtsegs): cad rang byung nyid du mngon phyogs phrogs pa med par 'gyur// de nas rang byung sangs rgyas nyid ston mdzad pa 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyi// sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba brgya
113a6(dkon brtsegs): 'grangs gang gi'i bye snyed 'gyur// rta thul 'jig rten khrag khrig khams kyi nyan thos mya ngan 'das pa bas// gang yang skyes pa 'am bud med gcig gcig byang chub yang dag dga'
113a7(dkon brtsegs): byas nas// bsod nams de la snga mas dper yang bya bar mi nus so// de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga' bar gyis// rtathul 'di la 'dren pa thams
113a8(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba rnyed sla min// de ni u dum pa ra'i me tog 'dra zhes sangs rgyas mtha' yas blo mangs gsungs// de phyir bla na med pa'i zhi ba de byang chub mi gang 'dod pa yi//
113b1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu blo bra ston bzangs mkhyen pa tshul mkhas 'dren la bsten par bya// de bzhin gshegs kyis zhal nas don byed gsung dag de 'dra thos gyur nas// 'khor rnams thams
113b2(dkon brtsegs): cad yid rangs mchog tu dga' ba yang dag dga' bar 'gyur// khrag khrig lha rnams nam mkhar 'khor nas gos kyi g.yab myo 'dor bar byed// dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang
113b3(dkon brtsegs): phyag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sgra yang byung // zhi ba zugs ni skye bo nyon mongs rgod pas rgod gyur zhi bar mdzad// bdud rtsi ston cing dug gsum zhi mdzad sems can dug
113b4(dkon brtsegs): ni skyug tu stsol// khyod kyi ye shes thob nas skye dgu dug med 'gyur zhing dgra med 'gyur// sdug bsngal rnams kyis 'dren pas tshul thos mi bzad srid pa'i rgyud las
113b5(dkon brtsegs): 'grol// / 'od gsal ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas dge rgyas ris kyi lha
113b6(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis/ lha ma yin rnams nas 'od gras la lci'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim ning mgu la yid rangs te
113b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bdag cag tshul phun sum tshogs par gyur pa yang brjod cing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
113b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa'i dngos po
114a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la bde 'gro'i tshor ba sha stag myong bar 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags
114a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang mi myong ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar
114a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang / lag pa bcad dam/ rkang pa bcad dam/ rkang lag bcad dam rna ba 'am sna 'am/ rna ba dang sna gdugs kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
114a4(dkon brtsegs): sba lcag gis gzhus sam/ skra lhag phyed tsal lam lcag gis gzhas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / btson rar bcug gam/ lcags sgrog dang shing sgrog
114a5(dkon brtsegs): tu bcug gam/ tshon chad ma po la rgyas btab bam/ byis pa'i btsug pud ltar bcings sam/ dwags kyi snod ltar bdags sam/ bu ram shing brdung ba ltar brdungs sam/
114a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das bu bcom pa ltar bcom 'am 'bru mar gyi mar me ltar 'bar bar byas sam/ mar gyi mar me dang zho bskol ba ltar 'bar bar byas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur
114a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / me'i nang du bor ram/ seng ge'i khar bstabs sam/ stag gi khar bstabs sam/ skam ril bya ba ltar dril tam/ byi bo'i chad pa lta bus bcad dam/ nyes byang
114a8(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pa ltar bsgrags sam/ kar sha pa na tsam du gtubs sam/ 'bras phye bco ba ltar bcos sam/ glang po che rnams kyis bcom yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur
114b1(dkon brtsegs): nga dang / mig phyang ngam gsal shing gi rtse mo la bzhag gam/ gsad pa'i gnas su khrid de rnam pa thams cad du mgo gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ bde ba yang
114b2(dkon brtsegs): ma lags mi bde ba yang ma lags pa'i 'du shes pa thams cad du mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yun ring po spad pa spod
114b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe/ smon lam 'di ltar btab ste/ gang gis bdag la kha zas byin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/ gang gis bdag la skom blud pa de dag dang gis bdag lo rim
114b4(dkon brtsegs): gro byas pa dang / bkur sti byas pa dang / sti stang du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/ gang yang bdag la gshe ba dang
114b5(dkon brtsegs): mi bde bar byed pa dang / rdeg pa dang / mchod gyis 'debs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du srog gcod pa'i bar du byed pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub kyi bde ba thob cing /
114b6(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/ de yid la bya ba de dag dang ldan zhing / de lta bu'i las
114b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i bde ba'i 'du shes la stan cing snyen la/ sgom zhing mang du byed de/ de las de'i rnam par
114b8(dkon brtsegs): smin pas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob po// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin thob par gyur pa de'i tshe//
115a1(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing mi 'khrugs par gyur te/ de'i tshe 'di ltar tshe la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang /
115a2(dkon brtsegs): las la dbang ba dang / rnam par rtog pa la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba ste/ dbang lnga thob par rig par bgyi'o// de 'tshal na che rjes ma thag tu byang chub mngon par rdzogs
115a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya'o// de 'tshal na bskal pa grangs ma mchis par gnas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de theg pa chen po la yang
115a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa zhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad rab tu bstsal ba dang / 'gro ba drag po kun
115a5(dkon brtsegs): tu sems pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la bslabs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan
115a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bdud kyi las las rnam par rgyal ba dang / chos thams cad khong du chud par rig par bgyi ba'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis byang chub sems dpa'
115a7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la nges pa'i rtogs pa thob par 'gyur/ mas cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// de nas dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di brjod nas de'i tshe/
115a8(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad chos la mthar thug gyur pa ste/ ston pa dbang po zhi zhing zhi ba
115b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen la mgo bos skyabs su mchis// de dag mkhas pas mchod pa'i sangs rgyas don mkhyen 'khor ba rgal gyur pa// thub pa 'dren pa tshul mkhas rgyal ba 'dren pa
115b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dren la sdod// 'odi na de bzhin nges pa'i thub chos gnas pa gang na'ang ma mchis te// sgyu ma'i mkhan po sgyu ma ji bzhin khyod kyis thub pa legs par mkhyen// yan lag
115b3(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs sgra bstan ri khrod 'byung ba mkhas pas rtogs pa ltar// de bzhin bde gshegs drang srong khyod kyis lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gzigs// 'di ni sems can
115b4(dkon brtsegs): srog dang shed bu gso ba gang zag ma mchis te// mi mchog khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par bshig cing stong par rnam bzhag la// rkang gnyis dam pa sems can gtso bo
115b5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa gzhal yas sgom pa'ang mdzad// rgyal ba sangs rgyas dgos pa 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyis rtogs par dka'// byams pa dge bsgoms sems can dmigs pa
115b6(dkon brtsegs): yin zhes 'dren pas bka' stsal la// sems can rnam par bshig cing 'gro ba thams cad sems can med par mkhyen// de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rnyog pa mi mnga' the
115b7(dkon brtsegs): com bral thugs ldan// des na bde gshegs rnam brtags blo mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// bde gshegs pa sdug bsngal phyogs bcur gnas pa kun tu
115b8(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs kyang // lha'i lhar gyur khyod kyis sems can rnams la snying rje bgyi ba gsungs// de ltar rgyal mchog bdag cag rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ji bzhin kun tu
116a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal// des na rkang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang ni bstsal
116a2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi sdug bsngal ma gzigs la// dgyes pa skyes nas rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mi dgyes rnam par bstsal// de ltar sangs rgyas tshul ni bsam gyis mi
116a3(dkon brtsegs): khyab tshul 'di ji bzhin 'tshal// des na mi mchog khyod la mchod nas brnyes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi// skyon bral khyod kyis 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mya ngan
116a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das ma dmigs// 'on kyang 'khor bar sems can gzigs shing don mdzad stobs dang ldan pa bskyed// sems can sdug bsngal 'gro dang thub dang mya ngan
116a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das dang gnas ma mchis/ sangs rgyas tshul 'di rtogs nas thub pa mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// 'dren pa tshad med bzhi po gzigs shing de yang
116a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su med par bstan// gang zhig der dul ma gzigs gang yang tshad med gnas pa de ma gzigs// thub pas bag med gang yang ma gzigs bag yod mi
116a7(dkon brtsegs): yang ma gzigs te// sangs tshul 'di 'tshal nas thub pa ston pa khyod la mchod pa bgyis// thub pa sgra ni rnam par spangs pas skra btsal mdzad nam brnyes kyang /
116a8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar 'dren pa dran pa ma gsungs mi lags bsnyel ba yongs mi mnga'// bde bar gshegs pas lus la song ba'i bsgom pa bsgom par gyis shes gsungs/
116b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas tshul 'di rig nas bde bar gshegs pa skyob la mchod pa bgyis// 'dren pas tshor ba'i rang bzhin btsal ba mdzad na brnyes par ma gyur la/
116b2(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba tshor bar bgyid pa'ang thub pas yongs su btsal nam brnyes te// de ltar gang zhig dran pa bsgom pa de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang yongs ma gzigs
116b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas ston pa la ni bdag cag mchod pa bgyis// thub pas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te btsal nas ma brnyes la/
116b4(dkon brtsegs): gang gi nye bar bzhag pa de yang dran pas med par rab mkhyen nas// thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi sems 'dus dran pa bsgom par gyis shes gsungs// bde bar
116b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i dgongs pa 'di 'tshal nas ni ston la mchod pa bgyis// 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas chos dang chos la gang spyod de ma gzigs// bsgom par
116b6(dkon brtsegs): gang gsang sa dran pa de yang 'di na rang bzhin ma mchis la// thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis chos 'dus dran pa bsgom par gyis shes gsungs// sangs rgyas
116b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhi po 'di rab tu 'tshal nas skyob la mchod pa bgyis// gnas gcig mchis pa ma lags gnyis sam gsum 'am bzhi lta ga la mchis// gang gi
116b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas su brjod pa'i dran pa de yang gang na'ang ma mchis te// de bas gang gi bde ba 'am sdug bsngal yang dag gang na'ang de ma mchis// ston pa'i tshul
117a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'tshal nas des na bdag cag khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ ston pa'i tshul
117a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog bzhi po 'di rnams dge slong gang dag 'dzin bgyid na/ 'di dag bar pa nyid kyi lam ste 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar de ni tshul 'di ma
117a3(dkon brtsegs): bcings ma grol byang chub 'dren pa min// bcom ldan 'das kyis btags pa ma bshig des na khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// zar mdzad slad du bcom ldan 'das
117a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis lam ni rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gsungs// 'di dge bsgom na mi rnams dbang po dul zhing mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// yang dag tu na rdzu 'phrul dang ni rkang dang
117a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa mi dmigs te// chad par mi 'gyur bya ba'ang ston cing byed pa po yang mi dmigs pa/ thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan 'dir lha tshogs the tsom gang na'ang ma
117a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis te// de dag de la nem nur ma mchis de bzhin som nyi ma mchis 'gyur// 'di ni mchod pa bzang po mchog ces mchod 'os sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/
117a7(dkon brtsegs): des na bde gshegs dpe med spyod mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ thar bar mdzad smad 'jig rten mkhas pas nges byung dbang po lnga yang gsungs// rtag tu
117a8(dkon brtsegs): bag yod byos la mya ngan 'das 'gro'i lam 'di bsgoms shes bstan// thub pa dbang po dang ni sgom pa po dang thar pa'ang mi dmigs te/ 'di la lha 'khor
117b1(dkon brtsegs): the tsom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i drang lam stobs lnga po// de dag nyon mongs zad bgyid thar par
117b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyid ces ston pa thub pas gsungs// de dag rang bzhin ma mchis nyon mongs ma mchis rgyal ba ma mchis te// thub pa bdag cag gang la the tsom ma mchis de slad
117b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod la mchod// byang chub yan lag bdun po 'di dag dge ba lam gyi dam pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das 'gro'i drang lam mchog ces thub pas gsung/
117b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ba ma mchis ma lags grol ba ma mchis cings pa'ang mchis te// sems can dkon mchog 'di la bdag cag the tsom ma mchis khyod la mchod// rkang gnyis
117b5(dkon brtsegs): gtso bo khyod kyi sa bzhi phrag gnyis lam sems can rnams la bstan// brtson 'bras ldan par 'phags lam sdug bsngal mtha' mar 'byin pa bsgoms shes gsungs/
117b6(dkon brtsegs): mi mchog lam dang de bzhin nyon mongs 'di gnyis g.yo ba ma mchis te// 'di la lha tshogs the tsom ma mchis gyur pas mchod 'os khyod la mchod// 'dod chags gnyen
117b7(dkon brtsegs): por zhi gnas bka' stsal zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsungs// gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong thub pa mchog gis sems can rnams la bstan// 'di dag thams cad
117b8(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba ma mchis skad cig dag min nyon mongs min// 'di la lha tshogs the tsom ma mchis thub pa mchod slad rtag tu brtson// sdug bsngal zhi bya phyir ni zhi gnas lhag mthong
118a1(dkon brtsegs): lam mang snyoms shes gsungs/ bcom ldan gang gis 'gro ba nyon mongs bag chags bcas dri de dag ni/ thub pa
118a2(dkon brtsegs): zhi gnas lhag mthong de bzhin dri ma thams cad stong pa ste// 'di la lha tshogs gang du'ang the tsom ma mchis skyon bral khyod la mchod// stobs bcu sems can rnams la dge
118a3(dkon brtsegs): ba bcu'i las lam bstan mdzad de// gsod dang 'khrig dang ma byin phra ma brdzun dang zhe gcod khyal tshig dang // gnod sems dang ni mi rigs 'dod dang de bzhin log par rtog
118a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams// mi dge ba'i las lam 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams la bstan// sems can mi dmigs gsod pa ga la mchis te lhag ma de dang 'dra//
118a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyen po dge ba ma mchis de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste// bde gshegs thub pa zag pa mi mnga' rnams kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong // rnam 'dren the tsom som nyid ma mchis
118a6(dkon brtsegs): de slad khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// sangs rgyas sras po dge ba'i blo can gang zhig spyod pa 'di ston pa// mkhas pa kun tu dge ba nyid myong sdug bsngal myong bar yong mi
118a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// bcom ldan pade gshegs ye shes des ni tshul 'di bde bar thob par gyis// 'di la lha tshogs the tsom ma mchis mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/
118a8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ cang mi zer bar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge rgyas kyi lha rnams cad
118b1(dkon brtsegs): mi zer bar 'khod pa yang mkhyen/ de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrub pa yang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis
118b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// skye bo 'di kun bcom ldan khyod kyis mkhyen pa'i zil gyis zil mnan nas// bde gshegs rgyal ba mchog khyod kyis
118b3(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dzum pa mdzad 'di 'jig rten bstan// rgyu ma mchis par chos kun mkhas pa rnams ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum rgyu don gnyer mig med rnams la 'jig rten
118b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas bka' stsal stsol// ma lus 'di dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems khyod 'dzum re zhing 'khod// dpal stag khyod la bstod pa bgyid cing nyan par
118b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba'i yid kyis gnas// sangs rgyas gsung gi dbang phyug thos nas yid ni rab tu rangs gyur te// chos rnams kun la nges pa'i blo dge ldan pa'i ston par
118b6(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur// bde gshegs mi mchog dge ba'i thugs can de ring su zhig blo gros bskyed// de ring gang gis 'chi med zhi ba rtogs shing phyogs rnams snang bar bgyis/
118b7(dkon brtsegs): su zhig 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal ba 'dren pa dpag tu med 'gyur ba// de dag bka' stsal drang srong 'khor 'di legs pas gsungs pas tshim par mdzod/
118b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba khyu mchog dge sbyong dam pa deng su btsun la dad pa skyes// bdud kyis mi 'phrogs blo ldan gang zhig chos la yang dag yongs su gnas// sangs rgyas
119a1(dkon brtsegs): sras po tshul mkhas gang zhig de ring nges pa thob par 'gyur// rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag bka' stsol 'gro ba 'di the tsom ma
119a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis mdzod// bde gshegs deng su 'gro la dang bskyed skye dgu rnams la byams gyur cig/ byang chub mthar byin blo gros brtan zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas//
119a3(dkon brtsegs): gang la 'dzum pa deng bstan bde gshegs bstan pa 'dzin pa de gang lags// bsod nams brgya'i mtshan mnga' de dag bka' stsol ba dag gi the tsom khum// 'dren pa
119a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod gsung yan lag brgyad ldan legs par bkra' stsal thos gyur na// bde gshegs gsung gis thog mar bdag cag 'dong zhing 'gro ba gzhan yang 'dren/ de ltar
119a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur na bde gshegs bstan rab 'di ni sras la gnas par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dag yid ni myur du bde gshegs rnams la gnas la gnas par 'gyur// de nas
119a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// nga yis 'jig rten don tu 'dzum mdzad rta thul khyod kyis mthong gyur cing /
119a7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dus su dris te 'gro ba'i don byas pa// khyod kyi bsod nams 'phel ba brjod du med de de ni zad mi 'gyur// de ni khyod la bstan gyis khyod dang
119a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'di dag dga' bas nyon// dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag nga'i chos nyid la ni the tsom med// kun kyang yid rangs rabs ni yid kyis tshigs bcad dag gis
119b1(dkon brtsegs): nga la bsngags// sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong 'grangs mchod 'os mchod byas te// the tsom med pa'i yid kyis tshul dris kun tu som nyi med par gyur//
119b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sngon gyi rgyu des 'dir yang tshigs su bcad pas nga la bstod// bskal pa bzang po'i rgyal ba bstod 'os kun la'ang 'di dag stong par 'gyur// 'di dag bskal
119b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ud pa la lo rgyal ba dag rgyal mthu chen 'gyur// 'di dag sems can khrag khrig bsam yas yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar byed// sangs rgyas drang srong chen
119b4(dkon brtsegs): po de dag yid 'ong mtshan du gang 'gyur ba// de yang bstan gyis dang ba'i yid kyis sems kyi tha ba spongs te nyon// rgyal ba de kun chos kyi rtog ces bya ba'i 'dren
119b5(dkon brtsegs): pa gzhal yas 'gyur// 'di dag re res kyang ni khrag khrig bsam yas mya ngan zlo bar 'gyur// de'i tshe na bde gshegs kun gyi ring bsrel shin tu rgyas 'gyur te/
119b6(dkon brtsegs): de che zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog rgyas par 'gyur// thub pa grags chen de dag yongs su mya ngan 'das par gyur pa na// thub pa skyob pa de dag kun
119b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi ring bsrel rgyal bas don chen 'gyur// sems can khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyis de tshe ring bsrel mchod byas te// ring bsrel de dag mchod nas mya ngan
119b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa zhi ba 'chi med thob// thub pa rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag grags pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur ro// slob pa khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyang de tshe rgyal ba'i drung du 'dra//
120a1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bye ba brgya 'grangs ngal legs par spyad pa byas nas su// byams pa blta phyir rgya chen yid kyis byams
120a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor du 'dod 'gyur ba// de ltar rgyal ba'i nyan thos slob tshogs de dag rgyal nas rgyal 'khor du// rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag kun gyi ring bsrel mchod pa bya phyir
120a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dong // bde gshegs gsung snyan 'gro ba thams cad ngo mtshar gyur pa de zos shing // dge rgyas ris kyi lha yi bdag nyid chen po de tshe thos gyur nas// 'khor rnams
120a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab tu dga' ste phal cher byang chub sems kyang skyed// bdag nyid chen po shes nas thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos rab tu gtugs//
120a5(dkon brtsegs): dge rgyas kyi lha'i ris lung bstan pa'i le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas de'i tshe 'bras bu che ba'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus
120a6(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin rnams nas// dge rgyas kyi lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mag la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
120a7(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba skyes nas tshul gcig la zhugs pa dang / chos re re las kyang chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa 'byung bar yang dag par mthong zhing tshul la 'jug pa thams cad las kyang
120a8(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang / mi chod pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / grol ba'i spobs pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / nye ba'i spobs
120b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dag kyang 'byung bar shes nas/
120b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes te/ chos nyid brjod cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge
120b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin mchis te/ de la brtson par bgyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa thob cing mi cod pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / dmigs pa dang snyom
120b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug pa thams cad la rmongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de la dmigs pa gang yang gzugs lags par ma 'tshal ba'i tshul gyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro// de ni phung po la
120b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ khams la 'jug pa dang / skye mched la 'jug pa dang / dbang po la 'jug pa dang / bden pa la 'jug
120b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / sems can la 'jug pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dngos po la 'jug pa dang / dngos po ma
120b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / bdag la 'jug pa dang / stong pa la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma la 'jug
120b8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / gnas la 'jug pa dang / gnas ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang /
121a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas la 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ thams cad la thogs
121a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang 'di lta ste/ phung po zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ni yongs su ma grub pa'o zhes gzungs rab tu
121a3(dkon brtsegs): 'thob bo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs ni gang yang yongs su grub pa ma mchis te/ sa ni sar yongs su ma grub/ de bzhin du chu dang me dang rlung du yongs su ma grub bo//
121a4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sa ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub po// chu dang me dang rlung ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/
121a5(dkon brtsegs): chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa zhes gdags par mi bgyi/ ma 'ongs pa zhes gdag
121a6(dkon brtsegs): par mi bgyi/ da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba
121a7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa ste/ gang yi skye ba ma mchis pa'i de la 'gag pa ma mchis ste/ gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni bdags su ma ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pas
121a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas gzugs kyi phung po zhes bka' stsal te/ gzugs
121b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin ni dmigs su ma mchis na 'das par lta ga la 'gyur/ ma 'ongs par yang ga la 'gyur/ da ltar byung bar yang ba la 'gyur te/ de bas na gzugs kyi phung
121b2(dkon brtsegs): bo ni gdags su ma mchis pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de ci'i slad du phung po rnams ni dmig
121b3(dkon brtsegs): su ma mchis so// phung po dmigs su ma mchis pas gzugs dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzugs la 'jug par 'gyur ro// gzugs de
121b4(dkon brtsegs): yang ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda' tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam dang / gdags pa tsam ma gtogs par gzungs la 'jug par mi dmigs
121b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'di la phung po yang mi dmigs/ gzungs kyang mi dmigs/ 'jug pa yang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
121b6(dkon brtsegs): gang 'di phung po zhes bgyi ba de ni ma bgyis chos te/ chos gang ma bgyis pa de la spangs pa yang ga la mchis te/ phung po ni spungs pa'i slad du phung po zhes bgyi'o// dper
121b7(dkon brtsegs): na khyim dang khang bzangs dang / bsil khang dang khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khrung khol ma dang / bA ga ma dang dra ba dang / stegs bya dang / khal khyer dang / skar khung dang /
121b8(dkon brtsegs): blta ba dang / ra ba dang shing tags dang / 'obs dang / chos mang po bstsogs pa la grong khyer zhes kyi bzhin du phung po zhes bgyi ba'ang de bzhin te/ gzugs de yang ngo bo nyid
122a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi dmigs na/ de la spung pa lta ga la mchis/ spungs pa ma mchis pas na gzugs kyang ma mchis/ gzugs kyi phung po yang ma mchis
122a2(dkon brtsegs): so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis dmigs su ma mchis na/ de ltar spyad pa lta ba la mchis te/ spangs pa
122a3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa yang ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang ma mchis so// de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob pa
122a4(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa thob par 'gyur ro// de la skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur ba ni/ mig gi skye mched ces bgyi ba ni/ ci'i skye mched ces bgyis na sdug bsngal gyi skye
122a5(dkon brtsegs): mched do// de la mig gang zhe na/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ba ste/ sa'i khams dang chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang ba'o// de la sa'i khams dang
122a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// de bzhin du rgyu'i khams dang ba dang / me'i khams dang ba dang / rlung gi
122a7(dkon brtsegs): khams dang ba ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// de ltar yongasu ma grub pa'i mig gi skye mched de ni 'das pa zhes gdag
122a8(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byang ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar migo gi skye mched ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos
122b1(dkon brtsegs): po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis te/ gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni gdags su ma mchis pa'o//
122b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar mig kyang ma skyes ma 'gags/ skye mched dang sdug bsngal yang ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o// gang ma skyes ma 'gagags pa de ni ming tsam dang tha snyad tsam dang / brda' tsam dang /
122b3(dkon brtsegs): kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par gdags su ma mchis pa ste/ ming de yang ming gise ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos gang la ming ce'am skye mched ce snga/
122b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal zhes gdags par bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang dmigs su mchis te/ ming yang ming du brjod du ma mchis so// rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus dang yid dang / gzugs dang sgra dang
122b5(dkon brtsegs): dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de ci'i slad du skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob/ gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa 'thob po// de la khams la
122b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pas gzungs 'thob pa ni mig gis ma mchis pa/ khams ni khams kyis ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ khams ni khams kyi rang bzhin dang
122b7(dkon brtsegs): bral ba'i slad du ste/ chos gang la yang rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// gang yongs su ma grub pa'o//
122b8(dkon brtsegs): gang yongs su ma grub pa de la ni skye ba ma mchis so// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa don ming tsam dang tha snyad tsam dang / brda' tsam
123a1(dkon brtsegs): @dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung bar gdag par bgyi
123a2(dkon brtsegs): ma lags so// ming de yang ming gis ma mchis pa'i bar de yang brjod pas ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po
123a3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa ste/ yongs su ma grub pa'i slad du skye ba yang ma mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so// gang la ma
123a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes ma 'gag pa de ni 'das shes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i zhes gdogs par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du gdag
123a5(dkon brtsegs): bir bgyi ba ma lags pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma mchis pa/ tha snyad ma mchis pa/ brda' ma mchis pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ 'dris
123a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa// ma bstan pa rab tu ma bstan pa'i mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs su
123a7(dkon brtsegs): shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ dkar po ma lags pa/ nag po ma lags pa/ gnas pa ma lags pa/ rten ma lags pa/ thob pa ma lags pa/ thob par bgyi bam
123a8(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ rtogs par ma lags pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon tu bgyis pa ma lags pa/ mngon tu bgyi ba ma lags pa/ so so'i skye bo'i sa ma lag pa/
123b1(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi sa ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lags pa ste/ sa yang ma lags pa/
123b2(dkon brtsegs): sa ma lags pa yang ma lags so// de ni de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid dang / zhi ba dang mtshan nyid ma mchis pa ste/
123b3(dkon brtsegs): tha snyad tsam du btags pa'o// des tha snyad du de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ste/ don dam par ni ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi
123b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos de mi dmigs so// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
123b5(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi bar du rgya cher khams thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni phung por brtags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dod
123b6(dkon brtsegs): khams dang skye mched dang dbang po dang / bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar btags par chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ chos kyi dbyings de ming gang
123b7(dkon brtsegs): dang gang gis btags kyang de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ sa'i khams ni ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du
123b8(dkon brtsegs): bgyis kyang de dang des sa'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyis pa de dang des chos
124a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang /
124a2(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams ni ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chu dang me dang / rlung dang nam mkha'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom
124a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gris tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ de ltar na khams la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob/
124a4(dkon brtsegs): gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa 'thob po// bcom ldan 'das de dbang po la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas ni dbang po nyi shu gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ mig
124a5(dkon brtsegs): gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang ba dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang /
124a6(dkon brtsegs): po'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po
124a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / dang po'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin
124a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste/
124b1(dkon brtsegs): de la mig ni mig gis ma mchis/ dbang po ni dbang pos ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma
124b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// gang yongs su ma grub pa de ni mi skye ba/ gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gag pa/
124b3(dkon brtsegs): gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// ga da das gsum du
124b4(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs pa de ni mig ma lags/ dbang po ma lags so// gang mig ma lags shing dbang po ma lags pa de'i tha snyad ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ 'di lta ste dper na chang ba
124b5(dkon brtsegs): stong pa ni brdzun pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa ma mchis pa ste/ 'di ltar ming du gdags par bas kyi don dam par ni stong pa yang mi dmigs/ chang pa yang mi dmigs so//
124b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du mig dang / dbang po yang chad pa stong pa ltar brdzun zhing ma mchis la yang dag pa ma lags pa ste/ gso ba gsog log pa/ slu ba'i chos can byis pa 'drid pa/
124b7(dkon brtsegs): glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa ste/ 'di ltar ming dgadags par bas kyi/ don dam par ni mig kyang mi dmigs/ dbang po yang mi dmigs na/ de ni bcom ldan 'das
124b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas ji tsam du phyin ci log la gnas pa'i sems can rnams gzung ba'i slad du dbang po zhes btags kyi/ don dam par mi ma
125a1(dkon brtsegs): lags so// dbang po ni rang bzhin dang bral zhing dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ chos gang
125a2(dkon brtsegs): chos gang gis stong pa de la des tha snyad du bgyi ba ni brdzun pa/ ma mchis pa/ gsob gsog log pa sdu ba'i chos can/ byis pa 'drid pa/ glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa rang
125a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de ni mi skye mi 'big go// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags
125a4(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du ma mchis pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ brdzun pa mtshan nyid ma mchis pa gdags su ma mchis pa/
125a5(dkon brtsegs): gdags pa ma lags pa/ ma shes pa shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par shes pa rnam par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thos pa thos pa thos par bgyi ba ma
125a6(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ rnam par ma rig pa rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rtogs pa rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thos pa thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong /
125a7(dkon brtsegs): ba mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rnyed pa rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ma mchis shing mchis pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// 'di lta ste/
125a8(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ mi zhig rmi lam na dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyod pa dag nyal nyal ba las sad de/ rjes su dran la de dran yang rnyed par mi
125b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ 'thob par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rmi lam na yang mi des dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / ces pa dang / dga' mgur spyad pa dag ma thob ma
125b2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed na/ nyal ba las sad pa'i tshe lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te thob pa dang / rnyed par bgyi ba de ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dbang po rnams ni rmi
125b3(dkon brtsegs): lam lta bu ste/ ji ltar rmi lam na dgod pa dang dga' ba dang rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyad pa de dag dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid
125b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis dmigs su ma mchis pa ste/ de dag ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byang ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so//
125b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dus gsum de dmigs su ma mchis pa de dag ni brjod du ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ dbang po thams cad kyang de bzhin du rig par bgyi ba'o// de ltar na chos kyi dbying
125b6(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pas/ chos thams cad la 'jug par bgyi/ chos thams cad la 'jug pas kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o// de la ji ltar na bden pa la 'jug
125b7(dkon brtsegs): pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni bden pa ste/ sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang
125b8(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa'o// zhes bka' stsal te/ de la bdag
126a1(dkon brtsegs): cag the tsom ma mchis som nyi ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de la sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du sdug bsngal ma mchis par
126a2(dkon brtsegs): rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la sems can ma mchis pa de la sdug bsngal yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ma mchis pa'i slad du kun
126a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'ang ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la 'bras bu ma mchis pa de ni rgyu ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kun 'byung ba ma mchis
126a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du 'gog pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa la spang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'gog pa ma mchis
126a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du lam ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang spong bar mi bgyid pa de ni lam ma lags te/ lam gyi 'bras bu ni 'gog pa lags la/ gang srad
126a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'gog pa'i nyon mongs pa de ni mi dmigs te/ 'gog par dmigs su ma mchis na/ lam du 'thad pa ma lags te/ 'bras bu ma mchis pa'i lam yang ma mchis
126a7(dkon brtsegs): pas/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag ni brtags pa rnam par bslabs pa ste/ gang brtags shing rnam par bsgrubs pa de ni ma mchis pa'o// gang ma mchis
126a8(dkon brtsegs): pa de la ni 'das pa zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so// ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa
126b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni ma skyes ma 'gag pa mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ ma btags pa/ gdags par mi bgyi ba/ ma bstan pa rab tu ma bstan pa/ bstan par/
126b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ma lags pa rab tu bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma brjod pa/ brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon par ma brjod pa/ mngon par brjod par bgyi ba
126b3(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba mthong bar bgyid pa ma lags pa/ ma shes pa shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ khod da ma chud pa/ khong du chud par bgyi ba ma lags pa/
126b4(dkon brtsegs): ma rtogs pa rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rnyed pa rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thob pa thob par bgyi ba ma legs pa/ ma thos pa thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/
126b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mthong ba mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma sgrubs pa bsgrubs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon tu ma bgyis pa mngon tu bgyi ba ma lags pa/ dkar po ma lags
126b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ nag po ma lags pa/ snang ba ma lags pa/ mun pa ma lags pa/ 'gro ba ma lags pa/ 'ong ba ma lags pa/ gsal ba ma lags pa/ zab pa ma
126b7(dkon brtsegs): lpags pa/ 'khrugs pa ma lags pa/ 'dang ba ma lags pa/ 'jig pa ma lags pa/ bde ba ma lags pa/ 'chi ba ma lags pa/ 'gro ba ma
126b8(dkon brtsegs): legs pa/ rjes su chags pa ma lags pa/ khong khro ba ma lags pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/ pa/ rnam par byang ba ma lags pa/
127a1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes ma lags pa/ rnam par shes pa ma lags pa/ lam ma lags pa/ lam gol ba ma lags pa/
127a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa ma lags pa/ rnam par 'jig pa ma lags pa/ bzung ba ma lags pa/ mi gzungs pa ma lags pa/ dor ba ma lags pa/ rab tu dor ba ma lags
127a3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa ma lags pa/ dmigs su ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ sems can ma lags pa/ sems can ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ srog ma lags pa/
127a4(dkon brtsegs): srog ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gang zag ma lags pa/ gang zag ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ bdag ma lags pa/ bdag ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ dngos po
127a5(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ stong pa ma lags pa/ mi stong pa ma lags pa/ mtshan ma ma lags pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa
127a6(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa/ smon pa ma lags pa/ smon pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gnas pa ma lags pa/ gnas pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ 'dus
127a7(dkon brtsegs): byas ma lags pa/ 'dus ma byas ma legs pa/ chad pa ma lags pa/ rtag pa ma lags pa/ log pa ma lags pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa/
127a8(dkon brtsegs): bden pa ma lags pa/ brdzun pa ma lags pa/ mngon par zhen pa ma lags pa/ mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ rten pa ma lags pa/
127b1(dkon brtsegs): rten ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gzhi ma lags pa/ gzhi ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba
127b2(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa/ spang ba ma lags pa/ bsgom pa ma lags pa/ mngon tu bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnyed pa ma lags pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ 'khor
127b3(dkon brtsegs): ba ma lags pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas ma lags pa/ 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ so so'i skye bo'i spyod yul ma lags
127b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'phags pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
127b5(dkon brtsegs): yul ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ spyod yul yang ma lags pa/ spyod yul ma lags pa yang ma lags pa/ bgyi ba ma lags pa/
127b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa ma lags pa/ dag pa ma lags pa/ dag par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste/ de ltar bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur/ chos
127b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob pas spobs pa thob par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pas/
127b8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings la 'jug ce na/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa nas/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'bra' shig
128a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de la ma rig pa ni ma rig pas ma
128a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar ma rig pa ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma
128a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// gang yongs su ma grub pa de ni mi skye ba'o// gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'bag pa'o// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags
128a4(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa
128a5(dkon brtsegs): ni ming ma lags pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma mchis pa/ gdags su ma mchis pa ste/ gzhan du na ming tsam dang / brda' tsam dang / tha snyad tsam
128a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / kan rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam dang / gdags pa tsam du sems can rnams gzud pa'i don tu bgyi ba ma gtogs par ma rig pa de ni don dam par
128a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su mo mchis so// chos gang don dam par dmigs su ma mchis pa de ni gdugs su ma mchis pa/ ba skad du bgyir ma mchis pa brjod du ma mchis
128a8(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang ming tsam zhes bgyi ba nas gdags pa tsam gyi bar de dag kyang yang dag pa ma lags pa/ brdzun pa log pa brtags pa rnam
128b1(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrubs pa/ yongs su brtags pa rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par dpyad pa/ ma zhi ba rab tu spros pa'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams shes bgyi ba yang
128b2(dkon brtsegs): chos gang ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis pa de 'du byed skyed par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ de bas na ma rigs pa ni mchis pa'o// de ltar na ma rig pa ma mchis pas 'du byed rnams kyang ma skyes
128b3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gang ma skyes pa de ni rga bar mi 'gyur/ na bar mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
128b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das chos gang yang ma skyes pa de la rga ba ga las mchi ste/ gang la rga ba ma mchis pa de ni na bar mi 'gyur/ 'chi ba mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur
128b5(dkon brtsegs): ro// 'di ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste ming tsam du bas kyi/ don dam par ni ma lags so// ma rig
128b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang lags pa de nyid byang chub po// de bzhin du srid pa'i yan lag thams cad kyang shes par bgyi ste/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos
128b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos thams cad kyang ma skyes pa'o// de bas na chos thams cad
128b8(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma 'gegs pa ste/ chos thams cad kyang ma 'gags pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
128'a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshan nyid sa mchis pa/ mthun ma mchis pa/ dmigs su mchis ga kun nas son mongs pas ma
128'a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa/ rjes su chags pa ma mchis pa/ khong khro ba ma mchis pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/
128'a3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos gang dang gang gis de bzhin
128'a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mchis pa'i chos de dang de dag gis chos thams cad mchis te/ de'i slad du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di
128'a5(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi na/ de dag thams cad ni
128'a6(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/ byang chub kyang gnyis su ma mchis pa lags pas//
128'a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su ma mchis pas ni gnyis ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas
128'a8(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zho na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni
128'b1(dkon brtsegs): zlog pa 'am/ skor bar mdzad pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas
128'b2(dkon brtsegs): so zhes mchin/ de dag thams cad na lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sems can ma mchis pa ste/ de la yod
128'b3(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang ma mchis so// bcom lda 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa'i don mdzad do zhes mazin/ de dag
128'b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos gang la yang phan pa 'am gnod pa'i rnam pa nye bar
128'b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshe'i 'du byed bor ro zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa
128'b6(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni ci yang 'dod pa 'am len pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad
128'b7(dkon brtsegs): du de bzhin gshegs pa ni phung po'i lhag ma med par mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la
128'b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon pa zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni 'khor ba 'am yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la
129a1(dkon brtsegs): la zhig 'di lta bu'i chos la nges par gyur na de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ste/
129a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das chos kyis dbyings la ni 'gyur ba ma mchis kyang gda'i/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
129a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur/ mi gda'o// de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
129a4(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid la nges par 'gro brjod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ldan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ thal mo sbyar
129a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ phyogs gcig tu khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs
129a6(dkon brtsegs): mthu chen 'dren pa tshul dang tshul min mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba kun la thugs brtse thub pa yang dag ji bzhin ston mdzad pa/ 'dren tshul mkhas khyod
129a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul ni yang dag nyid du yang dag stan/ mtha' bas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal/ khyod kyis byang chub nges par 'byung
129a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dran lam gcig pu 'grod pa bstan/ khyod kyis byang chub dam pa gzhal yas zhi ba shis pa mi g.yo brnyes/ srog chags bye ba khrag 'khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
129b1(dkon brtsegs): nyam thag 'grol mdzad pa/ mtha' yas yon mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal/ phung po rnams ni ngo bo nyid stong shin tu phung po rnams dang
129b2(dkon brtsegs): bral/ byis pa rmongs byed rnams ni rab tu bral bar khyod kyis yongs su brtags/ shes pa mi ldan skye bo phal chen 'dir bcings rnyod la spre'u thogs bzhin/ grol ba
129b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa rnams ni mkhas la rlung bzhin chags pa med par 'dod/ khams rnams khams kyis rnam pa kun tu stong par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/ dper na
129b4(dkon brtsegs): brag cha rnam pa kun tu shin tu sgra dang bral ba 'dra/ des ni mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin mi shes mang po bcings/ grol ba mkhas pa'i yang dag rtogs pa/ rnams
129b5(dkon brtsegs): ni khams gsum chags ma mchis/ skye mched ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong zhes thams cad mkhyen pas bstan/ yang dag ma lags brdzun zhing byis pa sla ba chad pa stod
129b6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dra/ mi mkhas skye bo chos la gcig tu ma nges mang po de la chags/ dper na 'dren pa rgya mtsho chen por 'khyams pa sprin du 'khor bar lhung / 'dren pa dbang
129b7(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag dbang po nyid kyis shin tu stong pa ste/ thub pa me long nang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor lta bur shin tu stong / mi mkhas skye bo yang dge ji bzhin ma 'chal
129b8(dkon brtsegs): mang po dag ni de la chags/ bya dang mtsho'i nya dang sreg chags dag ni rgyal thogs pa bzhin/ sems can sems can nyid stong sems can bral zhing ngo bo nyid kyi stong
130a1(dkon brtsegs): #thub pa sems can ri mo mkhan gyis gzugs bris bzhin du mchis na/ mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin ma 'tshal mang bde
130a2(dkon brtsegs): la chags/ mkhas pa yang dag rtogs rnams sgo nga'i sbubs nas byung ba'i bya bzhin grol/ rten byung chos rnams de dag skad cig pa stong zhing dmigs ma mchis//
130a3(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam dga' ba bzhin du bzung du ma mchis byis pa rmongs bgyid pa/ mi shes rtogs pa'i slad du des kyang mi mkhas skye bo mang po bcings/ mkhas pa yang dag rab
130a4(dkon brtsegs): tu rtogs rnams gzeb nas thar pa'i bye bzhin grol/ thub pos chos nyid bsam yas ji bzhin chos rnams thams cad bas mo mi khyab/ thub pa zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa ji bzhin
130a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kun mtshan nyid bral/ thub pa khams gsum mi chags bzhin du chos kun gnas pa ma mchis te/ de slad tshul gcig 'di 'tshal gyur na 'gro kun bde bar gsheg
130a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ thub pa bdag dang gzhan du mi mkhyen lta bur chos kun g.yo ba med/ thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ji bzhin chos kun bsam mi khyab/ thub pa byis
130a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod yul ma lags ji bzhin chos kun brtags ma lags/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ni rab gsal de bzhin shes par gyis/ mi mkhas gang dag rgyal
130a8(dkon brtsegs): bas gom yas brnyes shes smras pa dang / gang dag rgyal bas 'khor lo dam pa gzhal yos mchog bskor smra ba dang / gang dag bde gshegs skyob pas srog chags
130b1(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig mya ngan 'das smra ba/ de dag thams cad yang dag ma 'tshal lta ba'i thabs por yongs su bkris/ gang dag bde bar gshegs pas tshe'i 'du byed btang bzung
130b2(dkon brtsegs): smra ba dang / gang dag stobs bcu 'gro ba'i don mdzad yongs su mya ngan 'das smra ba/ de dag thams cad lta bar song la yid chags bdud rtsi'i lag tu mchis/ chos kyis
130b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid ma mtshal 'dren pa mkhyen bzhin 'tshal bar bgyi/ gang dag tshul dang tshul min 'di la mkhas pa de dag 'dren pa 'tshal/ de dag rkang gnyis gtso bo dpal
130b4(dkon brtsegs): sdug 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal bar 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid 'di 'gyur ba'i dbang dang ldan te nyid chos lags/ de ltar 'di 'tshal gyur nas tshul la mkhas pa mi'i
130b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu 'gyur/ de ltar 'bras bu tshe ba'i lha tshogs chos rnams nges par rtogs gyur pa/ ston pa'i sman sngar brjod de lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang bstan byas nas
130b6(dkon brtsegs): kha cig yid rangs ngogs med yid kyis sangs rgyas nyid du bdag mthong nas/ 'dren sras de dag tshu lo 'di nyid kyis bdag gis bdag lung bstan par gyur//
130b7(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu che ba'i lha de dag gi lkug pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos rnams nges par gtogs pa thugs chud nas/
130b8(dkon brtsegs): sems cad rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de
131a1(dkon brtsegs): @gsol pa/ dpal stag 'dren pa rnams ni rgyu zhig gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad lags te/ rgyu med mi mdzad bka' stsal bdag gis bde
131a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs mngon sum de skad thos/ 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyis zhi ba bde ba bsil ba'i 'dzum mdzad na/ rgyal ba lha ma'i lha min bla ma 'jam pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de gsung
131a3(dkon brtsegs): de ring 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mdzum bsil mthong nas/ 'gro ba 'di kun the tsom 'tshal te bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal du lta/ mi mchog thugs
131a4(dkon brtsegs): rje ldan pa khyod kyis 'dzum rgyu de ni myur du gsungs/ de thos gyur ni rgyal mchog 'gro ba 'di dag the tsom ma mchis 'gyur/ 'dren pa dam pa lha tshigs gang dag rang la
131a5(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa/ de dag su zhig gong gis 'chi 'thob 'tha' bcas rnam par 'phral pa gsungs/ mi mchog tshangs pa'i gsung spangs sgrogs te the tsom kun tu
131a6(dkon brtsegs): bsal du gsol/ de thos rgyal ba'i 'khor 'di rab tu dga' zhing mchog tu mgu ba 'thob/ bde gshegs rgyal mtshan mthon pa de dag thams cad gzhan du
131a7(dkon brtsegs): sems par/ 'dren pa'i sras rnam byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba rnams pa sems shing mchis/ thub pa 'dren mchog the tsom 'tshal ba de dag rnams kyi the tsom
131a8(dkon brtsegs): khum/ des ni ye shes stobs ldan tshul dang tshul min khams kun rgyal bar 'gyur/ rkang gnyis gtso bo'i yan lags brgyad ldan gsung thos gyur nas rab dga'
131b1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bde gshegs bstan pa bzhin du bgyid cing gsungs pa'i rjes 'jug mkhas par 'gyur/ de dag don gyi dbang la rten nas bde gsheg 'dren pa bka' stsal
131b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ des ni yid rangs gyur te 'gro ba chos kyis mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur/ 'dren pa chen po lha de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa thos gyur cing / rgyal ba'i gsung thos
131b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas brnag pa yongs su rdzogs zhi zhing rab dga' ste/ tshul la zhugs shing tshul la mkhas rnams myur du thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur/ 'gro ba rab tu grol
131b4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad ji bzhin yang dag ston pa mdzad par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ste thul la tshigs su bamad de slar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshogs rnams
131b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi ched du nga yis 'dzum pa 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa/ rta thul khyod kyis dus dang tshod shes nga la dris pa shin tu legs/ gang phyir nga yis 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di
131b6(dkon brtsegs): yi rgyu'i dang rgyu/ de khyod bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ thams cad mkhyen pa rnams ni rgyu'i 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gzigs shing /
131b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu las gzigs nas rkang gnyis dam pa dpal stug rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad/ kha cig blo zhan bdag cag nyan thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang /
131b8(dkon brtsegs): kha cig kha rog 'dug la dga' zhing rang rgyal byang chub 'dod zhugs dang / kha cig bdag cag 'jig rten 'dren pa mthu bo cher ni 'gyur byas te/ skye bo
132a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal lhung ba dgrol zhes zhus pa'i bsam pa mkhyen gyur nas/ 'dzum cung mdzad gang byung nyan thos don tu mdzad par shes par bya/
132a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa 'bring mdzad gang byung rang rgyal don tu mdzad par rig par bya/ 'dzum mchog ngas gang mdzad pa 'di ni 'dren pa'i don tu shes par bya/ rab 'bring tha ma rna pa 'di
132a3(dkon brtsegs): gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur gsungs te/ kha cig thar pa don gnyer las gsum zhugs pa 'jig rten 'di mkhyen nas/ des na 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren pa dam pa
132a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad/ rta thul de la nyan thos don tu 'dzum mdzad zhabs 'og nub par 'gyur/ rang rgyal don tu 'dzum pa gang mdzad sku'i dbus su nub par 'gyur/ 'dren pa stobs
132a5(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i don tu 'dzum pa mdzad pa gtsug tu nub par 'gyur/ de ltar thul khyod kyis mdzum pa'i rgyu ni rnam gsum shes par gyis/ rgyal ba mchog rnams don te gang 'dzum de
132a6(dkon brtsegs): kun nga'i gtsug tu nub/ sdig pa gzhom pa'i tshul du de ltar 'dzum pa mdzad pa ngas bstan shes/ par gyis/ 'dren pa rnams kyi 'dzum pa gang yin de rgyu rnam gsum yang bshad
132a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ dkan kyang rtse gcig yid byos de ni nga las legs par mnyan par gyis/ dang po'i don tu 'dren pa 'dzum pa ngas mdzan myur du thog mar nab/ 'bring gi don ni dus
132a8(dkon brtsegs): tshod cung zad bsdad cing phyi nas nub par 'gyur/ blo mchog ldan phyir 'dzum pa rgyal ba nges mdzad shin tu ring du gnas/ rta thul nyan thos don tu gang nas 'dzum de theg pa'i
132b1(dkon brtsegs): dbang gis mdzad/ gzhan yang 'dzum rgyu rnam gsum bshad kyis rta thul khyod kyis mnyan par gyis/ gang dag rgyal ba drang po stobs bcu po la skor ba byed pa ni/ de dag nga la skyen
132b2(dkon brtsegs): bA bskor nas myur du shin tu mkhas par 'gyur/ 'bring don phyir ni srab cing che la dal gyis skor ba byed par 'gyur/ dal gyis g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas nas rgya chen
132b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing mnan par 'gyur/ gang dag gser rgyan la dkar bzhag pa'i dra ba'i bde gshegs mthong 'gyur na/ de ni rkang gnyis dam pa thub pa'i sku kun khyab par gnas par
132b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzum bstan 'di ni shing gi dbang du shes par bya/ gang tshe gdugs 'dra mtha' yas mig ldan pas ni 'dren de 'gegs pa dang / gang che me tog
132b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'dren pa'i steng gi mkha' la lding ba dang / gang che sgo mo 'dra zhing bde bar gshegs la lan gsum bskor byed pa/ de ni 'jig rten 'das pa de ni dbang du 'dzam mdzad shes pa
132b6(dkon brtsegs): byabade gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni rnam gsum de tsam bstan/ rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu rnam gsum po de dag shes par gyis/ des ni 'jig
132b7(dkon brtsegs): rten don bstan bzhed nas 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'dzum pa mdzad/ de thos gyur nas thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan la the tsom med par gyis/ 'bras bu che ris lce tshogs bye ba brgyad
132b8(dkon brtsegs): cu tham pa 'di dag ni/ zhing rnams dag tu chos tshul shin tu rgya chen smra ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ mkhas pa de dag dpag med che ldan bskal pa mang por gnas par 'gyur/ de phyir
133a1(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa rgya chen mchog gi cha 'di bstan/ de dag sngon gyi bskal pa sum cu drug gi rgyal ba rnams kyang mtho
133a2(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa sum cu drug du thams cad mkhyen pa bsnyen bkur sprad pa spad/ da dung tshul mkhas 'di dag bskal pa grangs med sum cu rtsa drag tu/ gang zag chen
133a3(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag rgyal ba khyu mchog mchod pa byed cing gnas/ thams cad du yang phun sum tshul rtog rgyal ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed/ rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod
133a4(dkon brtsegs): de byang chub zhi ba yongs su btsal byas nas/ de dag de'i 'og tu dpal stag rkang gnyis dam pa skyes bu mchog/ 'dren pa mthu chen yon tan pAr gser gyi
133a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan bskal la 'byung / rgyal ba de dag tshogs zhing na gnas shing rang rang zhing spangs te/ sems can dam pa de kun nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpal
133a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya/ de'i tshe yon tan ldan pa de dag rnams kyi 'dus pa grangs med de/ de tshe thub po re re'i nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ gal te bskal pa khrag
133a7(dkon brtsegs): drig dag tu stobs bcus nyan thos de 'brangs kyang / legs mdzad rnams kyi can thos 'dus pa dag ni mthar byin bgrangs mi 'gyur/ 'dus pa de dag zad
133a8(dkon brtsegs): grangs med 'das pa de ni ci 'dra ba/ de las nyis gyur de tshe byang chub tu ni yang dag zhugs par 'gyur/ de tshe rgyal bar zhags kyi rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
133b1(dkon brtsegs): yin/ de dag thams cad yongs dang zhing du spyad nas kun kyang rgyal bar 'gyur/ bde gshegs de dag spyod pa gang yin de dag rnams kyi'ang de nyid 'gyur/ 'jig rten
133b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa de dag mya ngan 'das par gyur nas dam pa'i chos/ de che sras kyis bzung zhing bskal pa bye bo brgyad cung gnas par 'gyur/ de dag 'das nas ston
133b3(dkon brtsegs): pa' gsungs rab de la byang chub sems bskyed pa/ gang gi'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang shin tu mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ de dag 'das nas ston pa skyob pa rnam
133b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi gsungs rab de la ni/ nyan thos rgya mtsho kun gyi bye snyed dpag yas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ de ltar 'jig rten don rnams mdzad pa rang byung de dag thams cad kyi//
133b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa gang yin de ni chos dang yongasu legs par ldan gyur cing / yang dag shar par 'gyur te de ni bstan pa rnams kyis chos nyid yin/ mi mchog de ni gsung rab de
133b6(dkon brtsegs): thos 'gro ba ma lus dang gyur nas/ rkang gnyis dam pa gzhal yas 'jig rten don byed bdag cag 'gyur zhe te/ thams cad dga' nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal
133b7(dkon brtsegs): skye bor rab tu dga'/ bde bar gshegs la dga' ba gzhal yas bskyed nas chos kyis bstan bkur byas/ de lta bas na dga' bar byos la mgo la 'bar
133b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin spad spod de/ rtag tu shes rab pha rol phyin dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten byos la/ yang dag mthong ba'i spad pa dge ba 'di la kun tu ste byos te/
134a1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong khyed cag rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten thugs brtser 'gyur bar gyis// 'bras bu che ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/
134a2(dkon brtsegs): nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// de nas de'i tshe gnas gtsang ming ris kyi lha rnams kyis de'i tshe/
134a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can dpag tu med pa byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par rig cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la the tsom med par gyur par rig nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/
134a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga'i zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshig su bcad pa dag gis so so nas mngon par bstod do// de la lha'i bu sbyin pa
134a5(dkon brtsegs): la mes pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sdug pa'i sras rnams dang / btsun mo dang ni srog phangs btang / rgyal srid btang ba ci smos te/ sprin mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal//
134a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu tshul khrims la mos pas gsol ba/ khyod kyi tshul khrims rnam spangs pa/ rnam pa kun tu bsnyengs mi mnga'/ shin tu bslabs pas mthar phyin pa/ khrims mthar
134a7(dkon brtsegs): phyen la phyag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu buzod pa bas gsol pa/ khyod kyis bzod pa bstan mdzad pas/ yan lag gtub pa'ang bzod par mdzad/ zab mor sgyid lug ma lag te
134a8(dkon brtsegs): bzod mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu brtson 'grus la mos pas gsol pa/ brtson pa ma btang brtson 'grus te/ stobs chen brtson 'grus ldan gyur pas/ rdzogs
134b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mchog brnyes pa/ brtson mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu bsam gtan la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis bsam gtan bsten mdzad pa/ de la 'jig rten
134b2(dkon brtsegs): gting mi rnyed// dus gsum mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa// bsam gtan mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu gzi brjid dang ldan pas gsol pa/ dpa' bos shes rab pha rol phyin//
134b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dang yin bsgoms pas na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyas pa/ shes rab mthar yin phag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu khams kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa/ sbyin pa dag dang
134b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag snyen dang / don spad 'thun pa'i don dag gis/ 'jig 'arten 'di dag khyod kyis btul/ 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu dge ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/
134b5(dkon brtsegs): byams chen thugs rje chen po dag/ yun rings dras nas bsgom mdzad de/ sems can dpag yas yongs su bsgral/ gdos 'dzin khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu dag pa'i sem
134b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa/ nyon mongs med pa'i mthar phyin cing / thub chen dul ba'i sem mnga' ba/ ma dul thams cad dul mdzad pa/ kha lo sgyur la phyag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu blo gros dri ma med
134b7(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ sems dag mnyen pa'i sems mnga' ba/ sems can kun gyi sems mkhyen pa/ sems mkhyen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu blo gros rnam par dag pas
134b8(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// shes rab ldan pa'i blo gros can/ blo gros mchog rab tu zhugs/ thugs gsal phun sum tshogs pa'i blo// mi mkhas rtogs mdzad phyag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu
135a1(dkon brtsegs): sems brgyan gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi sems ni rnam par sbyangs/ sangs rgyas zhing yang rnam dag mdzad/ sems can blo yang rnam
135a2(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa/ kun dag khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu pham pa med pas gsol pa/ dgongs pa pham pa mi mnga' ba/ khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung yang bcom// khyod kyis
135a3(dkon brtsegs): lho tshogs thams cad kyang // rab tu dga' ba'i yid du bsgyur// lha'i bu myur du med pas gsol pa// khyod kyis chos rnams myur bar mkhyen// sems can myur bar rnam par
135a4(dkon brtsegs): spangs/ zab cing blta dka'i chos dag la/ myur du mdzad la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu brtson 'grus brtan pas gsol pa// bral gyur yongs su bral gyur pa// chu bo rgal
135a5(dkon brtsegs): te zag pa spangs// pha rol phyin cing thang la bzhags// brtson 'gras brtan la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu spod lam dang ldan pas gsol pa// 'dod chags spangs shing
135a6(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang spangs// gti mug spangs pa zag med pa// sbyin gnas bsod nams zhing gyur pa// 'jig rten mchod 'os phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu shin tu brtan pas gsol
135a7(dkon brtsegs): pakhyod kyi dam chos shin tu brtan/ 'jig rten gsum du rab tu mchod// gcig pu bgrod pas bde ba brnyes/ de phyir khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu mi 'khrugs pa
135a8(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// lhan stag gcig tu gyur pa'i tshe/ rlung gis bskyed par mi nus te// de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis/ bde gshegs spod par min so// lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid
135b1(dkon brtsegs): thob pas gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po zab cing mnyam// mtshan ma rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can// shes rab zab mo blo ldan pa/ rgyal ba mdzes la phyag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu za/
135b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ sku chen khyod la sku mi mnga'// de bzhin nyid la rab tu bzhugs// yang dag mtha' yang rab tu ston// khyod mtshungs gang zag yong ma mchis/
135b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu blo gros dang bas gsol pa// gnyis su med pa yang dag ston// dpo'i bos dpa' bas rnam par gnon// gang zag zab la zham mchis// de dag khyod chos pa
135b4(dkon brtsegs): rol phyin// lha'i bu rab tu dga' bas gsol pa/ mchog tu dga' yid brtan pa dag/ khyod kyi sleb la bslabs pa'i rnams// sbrul rnams pags pa rnying 'dor bzhin/
135b5(dkon brtsegs): srid pa gsum po 'di dag 'dor// lha'i bu zhi ba'i yid kyis gsol/ ba// ji ltar mar me mar zad cing // snying po zad pas zhir 'gyur bzhin// khyod kyi bstan pa myur
135b6(dkon brtsegs): thos na// shes rab chen po mya ngan 'da'// lha'i bu zhi gnas la gnas pas gsol pa// gang gis kun mkhyen khyod mdzad pa'i// mi rnams 'dod chags bcings pa yang//
135b7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab mtshon gyis mkhas pa dag/ 'dod chags chags pa gcod par 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi ga nas mang gis gsol ba// zhi ba'i sems mnga' zhi la sprod// cho ga spyod
135b8(dkon brtsegs): yul rab tu zhi// nyon mongs thams cad zhir gyur pa// dgra rnams zhi la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas 'jigs med kyis gsol pa// khyod kyi zhi gnas bsla
136a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' thugs can dag// ni gnas cad kyis 'byung 'gyur zhing // sems ni de bzhin ga shegs par 'gyur/
136a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu zhi gnas zas kyis gsol pa// chos rnams kun gyi zhi ba ni// dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu bstan// shes rab chen pos de 'tshal na// de dag de bzhin gshegs
136a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// lha'i bu rtag tu rnam par lta bas gsol pa// khyod kyis sems can rtag tu gzigs// mkhas pa khyod ltar slob pa rnams// ye shes mchog gi mnyam
136a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhag cing // byang chub mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu snang 'dzin gyis gsel ba// shes rab pha rol phyin gyur pa// thub chen khyod las gang slob pa// de
136a5(dkon brtsegs): dag 'jig rten snang 'dzin cing // sgrib pa med par gzigs par 'gyur// lha'i bu 'od byed kyis gsol pa// 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyis bzung // ye shes rgya mtsho de
136a6(dkon brtsegs): thos na// de dag dri med bde ba thob/ bsam gyis mi khyab 'od kyang 'byung // lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad rnam mi rtog/ thabs
136a7(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pas de dag gsungs// de 'dra'i ye shes bsten bgyid pa// de dag gang zag mchog tu 'gyur// lha'i bu rab tu mi gnas kyis gsol pa// gnas ma mchis
136a8(dkon brtsegs): shing blang ma mchis// chos rnams thams cad sems ma mchis/ bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam 'gyur ba// de dag khyod kyis de bzhin mkhyen// lha'i bu gnas med blo gros
136b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad gzhi med par// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// de dag khyod kyis lugs bzlog ste// sems can rnam la bstan par mdzad/
136b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mi rten blo gros kyis gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad rten ma mchis// sems can ma mchis phan tshun min// lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin// yang dag
136b3(dkon brtsegs): ji bzhin khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu bar snang rgyu bas gsol pa// bde gshegs khyod kyis chos kyi rnams// bar snang lta bur snang ba ste// skye dang 'gogs pa med par
136b4(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// de slad 'jig rten chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu da yir 'dzin pa med pas gsol ba// khyod kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// lus kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni// g.yo ba med cing ngang 'dzin/
136b5(dkon brtsegs): med// skye med rtsol ba med par gzigs// lha'i bu blo gros rnam par bsgoms kyis gsol ba// sgyu ma sna tshogs legs bgyis pa// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos bstan gyur na// de bzhin
136b6(dkon brtsegs): ma lags de bzhin gda'// thub pa de ltar mnyam ma mchis// lha'i bu rab tu sad pa'i ngang tshul gyis gsol pa// gzugs rnyen ji ltar me 'ongs la// gda' yang de ltar ma mchis
136b7(dkon brtsegs): pa// de bzhin chos rnams khyod kyis gzigs// de bas 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'// lha'i bu yid gnyis rnam par 'jig gis gsol pa// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/
136b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams// de bzhin khyod kyis bstan po mdzad// de ltar 'gro ba kun kyang mkhyen// lha'i bu spobs pa thogs med kyis gsol pa// chos nyid la ni khor
137a1(dkon brtsegs): zug tu// spobs pa rab tu 'byung 'gyur zhing // chos nyid de ni brnyes pas na// de slad khyod ni spongs pa ldan// lha'i bu chags med blo gros kyis gsol pa/
137a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis chos 'di thams cad ni// rang bzhin mtshan ma nyid ma mchis par// yang dag ji bzhin rab tu mkhyen// de bas thub pas rab rib bstsal// lha'i bu mya ngan bral gyis gsol pa/
137a3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan med cing nyer len med// spros pa med cing rnyog pa med// chos rnams kun tu nyon mi mongs// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gsol
137a4(dkon brtsegs): pa// chos rnams yang dag ma lags te// 'gro dang 'ongs pa ma mchis pa// de dag khyod kyis yang dag mkhyen// de bzhin rab tu bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu blo gros mchog gi gsol
137a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ lhun gyi grub cing blang med pa// rmongs pa med cing shes pa med// chos rnams ci yang mi bgyid pa// khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud// lha'i bu sgrib med thob kyis gsol
137a6(dkon brtsegs): pa// snang ba ma mchis mun ma mchis// gzugs med ma lags gzugs can min// bzung ba ma mchis grol ma mchis// khyod kyis rang bzhin thubs su chud// lha'i bu
137a7(dkon brtsegs): dmig dpas gsol pa// yul dang phyogs na mi gnas pa// yod dang mid pa ma lags par// rmi lam 'dod pa ji bzhin du// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i
137a8(dkon brtsegs): bu mig mi 'dzums kyis gsol pa// byis pa rnams kyis blo rmongs pa// ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa// bar na'ang gnas pa mchis pa// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzig/
137b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pas gsol pa// gang zag sems can ma mchis pa// ma mchis tha snyed ma mchis pa// bstan pa'i slad du brjod bgyi ba// de dag rang bzhin
137b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la gnas pas gsol pa// gang gis tha snyad gnas pa'i// mtshan ma de dag ma mchis te// chos kun mtshan ma ma mchis pa/
137b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu smon pa med pa la gnas pa gsol pa// ji ltar mtshan ma stong gyur cing // smon pa dmigasu ma mchis dang // su la smon lam mchi
137b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa// de yang de lta'i tshal du mkhyen// lha'i bu ting nge 'dzin la gzhol bas gsol pa// rnam mthar sgo la rten gying shing // gang zhig 'grol 'gyur de ma mchis//
137b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu ma smad pas gsol pa// khyed ni sdig pa kun spangs shing // bsod nam thams cad bsrug
137b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te// bde gshegs khyod la smad mi mnga'// su spod de dag mkhas ma lags// lha'i bu glog gi sprin gyis gsol pa// ji ltar glog bcas sprin gyi tshogs// char gyis sa chen
137b7(dkon brtsegs): ngoms par bgyid// de bzhin 'dren pas chod char gyis// 'jig rten rnams ni ngoms par mdzad// lha'i bu bsam pa don gyis gsol pa// thub khyod gzung ni den mchis te/
137b8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor// shin tu brtags te mdzad pa na// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan// lha'i bu phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad dngos
138a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis// sa skyes 'gag pa ma lags te// de dag pa de gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen// gzhan yang de bzhin rtogs par mdzad// lha'i bu seng ge ros gsol pa/
138a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis stong pa nyid bstan te// seng ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad pas/ mu stegs can kun rab 'jigs pa// seng ges ri dgas phra mo bzhin// lha'i bu bag yod las kyi gsol pa/
