138a3(dkon brtsegs): bag yod sngor tu btang mdzad de// khyod kyis spyod pa sprad bgyis na// sangs rgyas chos la 'dren pa khyod// bag yod pas ni nges par byung // lha'i bu bag yod rab gnas kyis gsol
138a4(dkon brtsegs): pa bag yod pa la rab gnas te// khyod kyis nyid kyis chos kyang spel// stobs bcu gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos// bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu spel// lha'i bu bag yod skyes kyi
138a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// bag yod pa la brtson pas na// byang chub phyogs rnams yang dag skyes// thub chen rang yang grol gyur nas// de dag rnams ni 'jig rten 'grel// lha'i bu bag yod nges pa
138a6(dkon brtsegs): byang gis gsol pa// byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dag/ ji skad thar la rten pa'i rnams// kun kyang khyod la bslabs pa ste// bag yod pas ni nges par byang // lha'i bu bag yod
138a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas gsol pa// bag yod yongs su ma btang bas// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras// 'gro ba 'di la ma chags par// thams cad mkhyen du nges par 'byung // lha'i bu
138a8(dkon brtsegs): bag yod bsrungs kyis gsol pa// byang chub lam la brten mdzad cing // khyod ni bag gis bsrungs pas na// thugs rje chen po mkhas pa yis// byang chub dam pa brnyes par 'gyur/
138b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu bag yod brtson gyis gsol pa// bag yod pa la rab brtson zhing // mtshan nyid gcig pa rtogs bgyis pas// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyi sras// yab kyi bkor yang thob pa
138b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// lha'i bu bag yod mngon par dga' bas gsol pa// bag yod dga' ba'i brten pa rnams// de dag sangs rgyas ye shes kyis// dpa' bo nyon mongs ri 'jig pas/
138b3(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal ri yang de bzhin brnyil// lha'i bu bag yod 'dzin gyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas ye shes tshol mdzad tshe// khyod ni bdag gis bzung bas na// skal pa bye ba grangs med du//
138b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi thugs ni skyor ma gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas brtson gyis gsol pa// chos rnams de dag rang bzhin zhi// de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags// byang chub yang dag gang zhug dang
138b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa der mi 'jigs// lha'i bu zhi gnas la yang dag par gnas pas gsol pa// sangs rgyas zhi gnas bzhogs pa ste// 'on kyang de la chags mi mnga'//
138b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad// rdul 'thul ba la char pa bzhin// lha'i bu zhi gnas la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas zhi la rab tu zhags// sus kyang
138b7(dkon brtsegs): mi bskyod ri bo bzhin// khyod la gnod bgyir mi nus te// sems zhi khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas dul gyis gsol pa// khyod kyis sras rnams ma smad pa// zhi
138b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyis ni yongasu dul// bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs te// 'dod chags kyis ni gnod mi 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas nges par byang gis gsol pa// zhi ba'i yid mnga'
139a1(dkon brtsegs): @#/ zhi gnas la// dpa' bo chen po sgom mdzad pas// ci la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad// sus kyang khyod kyi tshul ma 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas sngon
139a2(dkon brtsegs): da 'gros gsol pa// ston pas sangs rgyas chos rnams kyi// sngon du zhi gnas 'gro zhes gsungs// gang gis byang chub 'brub 'gyur ba'i// chos bzhin de'i rjes su 'brang /
139a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu zhi gnas rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa// 'jig rten sgron ma zhi gnas ni// sems kyi rnyog pa 'dang bar bgyid// zhi ba'i sems ldan rnams kyi 'ching // de khyod mtha'
139a4(dkon brtsegs): ya sa dbang du mdzad// lha'i bu zhi gnas kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa// chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni// zhi gnas yin zhes 'dren pa'i gsungs// de la chags med spyod pa ni/
139a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren pas sangs rgyas 'gyur// lho'i bu zhi gnas brlan gyis gsol pa// bsam gtan gyis ni mngon brlan te// shes rab kyis ni sems bsgoms pas// de phyir
139a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes// de bzhin skye bo rnams kyang 'dren// lha'i bu zhi gnas lhur len gyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas chos rnams gang la yang // lam gzhan bdag
139a7(dkon brtsegs): gis ma mthong ste// zhi gnas ye shes che thob na// rang 'byung nyid du nges par 'byung // lha'i bu lhag mngon dgas gsol pa// dpa' bo chen po lhag mthong ni// chos rnam
139a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ston pa ste// de la khyod kyi sras sprod cing // rang bying nyid ni 'thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong byung gis gsol pa// shes rab pha rol phyin gnas shing /
139b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sman pa'i rgyal po'i ston pa te// de bas lhag mthong dge ba lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong rab gnas kyis gsol pa// chos rnams
139b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bcal begyis te// yang dag ji bzhin mthong gyur na// brtan pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob// byang chub nyid la gnas par 'dod// lha'i bu lhag mthong nges
139b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung gis gsol pa// gang zag mchog rnams ye shes kyis// byang chub mchog tu nges par byung // rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ye shes kyis// brnyes pa'i 'dren pa skye mi
139b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dag gsol pa// yang dag ji bzhin yang dag tu// chos rnam par gzigs pas ni// byang chub gzhal yas brnyes gyur te// de bas rnam
139b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dren/ sangs rgyas lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong la mngon par brtson pas gsol pa// mkhas pa ye shes gang brtson zhing // dka' ba mangs po spod bgyid pa// de dag rgol
139b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs thams cad kyis// pham par bgyi bar yong mi nus// lha'i bu lhag mthong byung gis gsol pa// chos rnams rnam mthong bgyi slad du// rgyal sras gang dag zhags
139b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnams// chos rnams ngo bo nyid 'tshal cing // rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong la sten pas gsol pa// rnam 'dren khyod kyis
139b8(dkon brtsegs): yun ring du// ye shes la ni bsten mdzad pas// thams cad mkhyen pa brnyes nas ni// srog chags bye ba grol bar mdzad// lha'i bu khyed par ldan gyis gsol pa/
140a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mkhyen pas thams cad mkhyen// 'dren pa dam pa mngon par 'phags// srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba yi// 'jig rten de yi sgrol
140a2(dkon brtsegs): ba mdzad// lha'i bu lhag mthong gnas kyis gsol pa// lhag mthong la ni gnas mdzad cing // sangs rgyas chos rnams 'phel gyur te// sa bzang n+ya gro da skyes 'dra/
140a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu lhag mthong dang ma bral bas gsol pa// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras// ye shes kyi ni yongs bzung ste// byang chub mchog ni thob bgyis shing // skyes
140a4(dkon brtsegs): bu mang po 'grel pa bgyid// lha'i bu lhag mthong la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa// sangs rgyas mkhyen la rnam par rol// chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'//
140a5(dkon brtsegs): zhum pa ma mchis sdang mi mnga'// thub pa 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen// lha'i bu lhag mthong la yang dag par 'jug gis gsol pa// dpa' bo chen po chos
140a6(dkon brtsegs): kun ni// lhag mthong nyid du yang dag 'du// rang bzhin med par rnam mthong na// de ni byang chub lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong snying pos gsol pa// sangs rgyas lhag
140a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong snying po ste// chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'// 'jig rten sdug bsngal 'di gzigs shing // thugs rje chen po shin tu bskyed// lha'i bu lhag mthong
140a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gros gsol pa// byang chub phyir ni shes 'gro ba'i// 'jig rten mkhas pa nges par byung // de dag byang chub mchog kyang 'thob// grol nas skye dgu 'di dag 'brel/
140b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu stong pa nyid la sten gyis gsol pa// stong pa nyid kyi chos sten pa'i// mkhas pa byang chub 'tshang rgya ste// sems can bcings las 'grol bgyid cing // 'ching
140b2(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad rnam par gcod// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mos kyis gsol / pa// stong pa nyid la mos gyur pa// 'gro ba 'di dag srog med gzigs// dmigs med dog
140b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid med pa// de ltar srog chags rnams la ston// lha'i bu stong pa nyid spyod yul gyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ni// chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa ste//
140b4(dkon brtsegs): srog chags rnams la thugs rtse ba'i// dpa' bo de la spyad pa mdzad// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi bsam pas gsol ba// skyon dang bral zhing bcings med la// 'jigs
140b5(dkon brtsegs): skrag thams cad rab tu spangs// chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing // nam mkha'i rlung bzhin sprod pa mdzadan/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa//
140b6(dkon brtsegs): stong nyid chos la bsten bgyid cing // sangs rgyas spyod yul gang mos pa// de dag ston pa mchod pa de// mchod pa de ni bla na med// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag
140b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'phags kyi gsol pa// gang gis 'dren pa 'phrogs gyur pa// de ni yang dag 'phags shes gsungs// stong nyid chos la sten bgyis pa// ma skad de dag sangs
140b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis 'dren gyis gsol pa// dpa' bo chen po chos rnams gang // mya ngan 'das min ston ma mchis// kun kyang mya ngan 'das
141a1(dkon brtsegs): @par 'dren// drang srong chen po'i byang chub lags// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag shar gyis gsol pa// stong nyid zhi la brten nas ni// khyod kyi
141a2(dkon brtsegs): slob ma yang dag shar// stong pa nyid la gang bsten pa// de dag rim gro bgyid pa la// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la rten gyis gsol pa// gang rnams stong pa nyid rten pa/
141a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa de dang rmongs mi 'gyur// nyon mongs med cing lta med rnams// byang chub rdul med thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid phun sum tshogs pa gsol pa// gang
141a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams stong nyid sten bgyid pa// sangs rgyas chos rnams phun sum tshogs// rang byung bam pa med par 'gyur// 'jigs rten don kyang bgyid par 'gyur// lce'i
141a5(dkon brtsegs): bu stong pa nyid la yang dag par zhugs pas gsol pa// sangs rgyas chos la zhugs gyur te// stong pa nyid la gang bsten pa// de la bdud rnams bye ba'i phrag/ stong
141a6(dkon brtsegs): gis dgug par mi nus so// lha'i bu mtshan ma med la dga' bas gsol pa// mtshan ma med pa mngon dbyis te// dngos po thams cad rnam bshig nas// sangs rgyas
141a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rnams nas byung // mtshan ma rnams la chags mi mnga'// lnga'i bu mtshan ma med la gnas pas gsol pa// mtshan ma med la spyod gyur cing // zhi ba zhi la spyod pa
141a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams// mtshan ma rnam par bshig rnams kyi// tshul ni bdud kyis shes mi nus// lha'i bu mtshan mi med pa'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi sbrid
141b1(dkon brtsegs): yul la// 'dren pa khyod ni spyod mdzad de// mtshan ma mi mnga' rtogs dka' zhing // zhi spyod khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas// skom gyis gsol ba/
141b2(dkon brtsegs): thub pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad ni// mtshan ma med pas skom byung ste// yab kyi bkor no 'tshal gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs la bkur bsti bgyi// lha'i bu mtshan ma med
141b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la spyod pas gsol pa// mtshan ma med la nyin mtshan du// gang zag mchog ni spyod mdzad pas// lha dang dri za mi dag kyang // khyod kyi tshul ni ma 'tshal to// lha'i bu mtshan
141b4(dkon brtsegs): ma med pas rnam par grol gyis gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad rnam bshig cing // dpa' chen 'jig rten sgron ma khyod// mtshan ma med la gnas pa mdzad// de bas
141b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la rnams par rtse bas gsol pa// thub chen dpa' bo chen po khyod// mtshan ma med la rnam par rol// 'gro rnams
141b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin mdzad cing // sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la bzhags// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas yongs su grub kyi gsol pa// gang gis mtshan ma spangs gyur pa/
141b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag byang chub grub pa ste// yab kyi chos kyis btul zhugs can// de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la dga' bas gsol pa// gang
141b8(dkon brtsegs): gis mtshan ma rnams bshig pa// de dag sangs rgyas chos la dga'// bla ma'i gnas la gnas pa ste// sems can kun gyi mchod rten la// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa
142a1(dkon brtsegs): la rten pas gsol pa// zhi la spyod cing rnam grol ba// sangs rgyas 'jig rten bla na med// 'byung po kun gyi skyabs dang rten// dpung gnyen de bzhin
142a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyang lags// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la mos pas gsol pa// mtshan ma med la mos gyur cing // zhi ba dag las rgyal gyur pa// sangs rgal 'gro sgrol ba/
142a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag tshad ni ga la mchis// lha'i bu smon pa med pa rtogs kyis gsol pa// mgon po gang dag smon lam ni// rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs pa// de dag 'jig rten bral
142a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten nang nas byung // lha'i bu smon pa med pa la sten pas gsol pa// zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan pa khyod// srid pa rnams su smon mi mdzad// sred
142a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yongasu chad pas na// sangs rgyas 'jig rten yongs mi gos// lha'i bu smon pa med pas skyes kyis gsol+la pa// gang gis sred pa yongs bcom pa// de dag gzi mchog
142a6(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa ste// de dag 'jig rten mgon po'i sras// rang gi yab la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med pas kyis gsol pa// khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa// sred pa yongasu
142a7(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa na// srid pa 'jig bgyid srid pa la// de dag smon pa mi bskyed do// lha'i bu smon pa med pas yongs su grol bas gsol pa// gang dag smon pa mi bgyid ga/
142a8(dkon brtsegs): gzi ldan khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// re ba btang zhing bcings grol ba// de dag yongs su grol bar 'gyur// lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung bas gsol pa// gang gis sred pa
142b1(dkon brtsegs): rab bcom pa// de dag mya ngan mgon pa rga la// de dag mi skom zang zing med// dpa' khyod la de phyag 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med pa la nges par gsol pa// gang gis srid/
142b2(dkon brtsegs): dang sdug bsngal dang // bde ba dngos po med bsgoms pa// mgon khyod de dag rnams kyi yab// de dag khyod kyi sras kyang lag/ lha'i bu smon pa med pa'i 'khor gyis gsol pa/
142b3(dkon brtsegs): sred pa sdug bsngal sus mthong ba// de dag khyod kyi bstan la dul// kha lo sgyur zhing srid sel ba// sems dul khyod la phyag 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa/
142b4(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i mgon las byung ba'i rnams// bde ba thob cing zhi gnas te// nyon mongs dgra rnams pham mdzad pa// 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med
142b5(dkon brtsegs): pas ya mtshan du gyur pas gsol pa// g.yul las rgyal bar gyur pa ste// khyod ni rnam rgyal pham mi mnga'// bdud kyi dpung rnams pham mdzad cing // srid pa kun tu smon
142b6(dkon brtsegs): mi mdzad// lha'i bu smon pa med pa stobs ldan gyis gsol pa// thar pa'i chos la stobs ldan pas// bdud kyi zhags pa yongs bcad cing // khyod kyi sras rnams bdud
142b7(dkon brtsegs): dag la// bskyab pa'i 'du shes mi bgyid do// lha'i bu lus rnams par brtags kyis gsol pa// lus med 'chi ba med tshul du// lus 'di gang gis mthong byung po/
142b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag sangs rgyas spyod yul dga'// 'dren pa khyod kyis rjes su zhugs// lha'i bu lus nges par sems pas gsol pa// mi gtsang rul ba'i rnag zag pa// lus 'di mi
143a1(dkon brtsegs): bzang nges bsams te// yang dag ji bzhin 'tshal gyur nas// rnam 'dred khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus rtogs kyis gsol pa/
143a2(dkon brtsegs): pus la mi gtsang brtag bgyis te// lus la dran pa rnam dpyad cing // lus kyi sdug bsngal rnam grol nas// nges pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus yongs
143a3(dkon brtsegs): gtong gis gsol pa// sbrul gyi pags pa rnying bzhin du// rnag can lus 'di spangs nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa sku bo che// mi sku mnga' la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i
143a4(dkon brtsegs): bu lus smon pas gsol pa// mi gtsang dri nga rnag zag cing // rul pa'i lus la rnam smad de// mi gtsang gang ba rnams spangs nas// 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal//
143a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu lus kyis yongs su skyob pas gsol pa// gang dag rul pa'i lus skyo zhing // rgyal sras gtsang ba 'tshal ba rnams// chos kyi rab tu bskyod pa'i sras/
143a6(dkon brtsegs): ngag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal 'gyur// lha'i bu lus kyis skrag pas gsol po// 'byung po chen po sbrul gdug 'drar// gang gis shin tu rtogs gyur pa// de dag lus
143a7(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa ste// rkang gnyis ga co la phyag 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyi skyon mthong bas gsol pa// lus kyi skyon la mngon sum ste// ye shes gzigs pa'i spyan
143a8(dkon brtsegs): mnga' bas// sangs rgyas mkhyen pas mkhas pa dag// srid sum thams cad yongs su gzigs// lha'i bu lus la 'dod chags dang bral bas/ gsol pa// lus
143b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'du shes 'dod chags bral// chos kyi 'dus shes mi gnas pas// kun sbyor lus las 'das pa ste// rnam 'brel sangs rgyas phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa'i
143b2(dkon brtsegs): dgra'i blo gros kyis gsol pa// srid par srid pa 'joms mdzad pa// khyod kyis dgra'i 'du shes mkhyen// khyod kyi sras rnams bsgom bgyid cing // mkhas pa byang
143b3(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon 'tshang rgya// lha'i bu srid pas sel bas gsol pa// srid pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs mthong // mya ngan 'das la 'jigs med mthong // khyod kyi sras rnams
143b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro phan phyir// byang chub sprad pa spyod pa bgyid// lha'i bu srid pa rnam par spangs kyis gsol pa// gang gis srid pa rnams spangs shing // 'jig la mngon par mi dga' ba//
143b5(dkon brtsegs): bral bar gyur cing sems dog pa// khams khyod zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid btsal gyis gsol pa// mi'i dam pa khyod kyi sras// srid par khrid par rab
143b6(dkon brtsegs): bskul te// khyod kyi bslab la bslabs pa dag/ stong gsum 'di na rnams par mdzes// lha'i srid pa las rgal ba yi// 'jig rten mgon mchog skyob rnams la/
143b7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis rgyun tu bgrang ba'i// blangs ni 'jig rten 'di na med// lha'i bu srid pa 'jom gyis gsol pa// srid pa thams cad yongs bcom ste// gang dag rtag tu drang
143b8(dkon brtsegs): smod pa// de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod// srog chags rnams la chos kyang ston// lha'i bu srid pa las rab tu grol bas gsol pa// srid pa'i rgyan las rab tu
144a1(dkon brtsegs): grol// rnam par 'dren pa srid pa rgal// srid pa thar 'byin sangs rgyas te// sred pa sel la byag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi byed
144a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa// srid par khrid pa rab zhi zhing // srid pa pham par mdzad nas gshegs// brten pa srid pa mthar 'byin pa// khyod la ngo zla ma mchis so// lha'i bu srid pa
144a3(dkon brtsegs): mthar 'gro bo gsol ba// srid pa'i mthar phyin rab zhi ba// mgon po khyod kyi srid pa'i mtha'// srid pa phyir rol thams cad mkhyen// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs
144a4(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad// lha'i bu srid pa'i mtha'i lus kyis gsol pa// srid pa'i rgyu ni rnam spangs te// srid pa tha ma 'dzin mdzad pa// gang gis srid pa len 'gyur ba// khyod ni
144a5(dkon brtsegs): kun tu sbyor ba mthong // lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi ba thob kyi gsol pa// khyod kyi srid pa stong mkhyen te// srid pa'i rgyu yang de bzhin no// zhum dang rab tu zhum mi mnga'//
144a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam nyid gyur la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rol tu 'gro bas gsol pa// srid pa'i pha rol rgal pa ste// srid par khrid pa yang dag bskul// rnam par
144a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa thugs rtse bas// skye bo gzhan ni sgrol ba mdzad// lnga'i bu tshor bas mnar byes gsol pa// tshor ba bdag tu bgyi ma mchis// sems pa ma mchis rgol ma
144a8(dkon brtsegs): mchis// bsam gtan pa mdzad pa che khyod kyis// tshor ba chu bur lta bur mkhyen// lha'i bu tshor ba ston pas gsol ba// ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med pa// tshor ba khyod
144b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu mkhyen// rmi lam sdug bu'i dpa' 'dra ba// de la so so skye bo chags// lha'i bu tshor ba la yongs su rtog pas gsol pa// shes rab bcas pas yongs
144b2(dkon brtsegs): brtags na// tshor ba 'gro bar mo song zhing // 'ong ba med la dngos med pa// de ni thub chen khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu tshor ba dang bral bas gsol pa// tshor ba dang
144b3(dkon brtsegs): ni tshor ba po// rang bzhin med par khyod kyi gzigs// zab mo blta dka'i tshig de yang // khyod kyis sems can rnams la bstan// lha'i bu tshor ba'i rgyud la nges pa
144b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// tshor ba de ni kun rdzob tsam// don dam nyid du mi dmigs te// khyod kyis sems can der btul bas// 'gro ba the tsom ma mchis gyur// lha'i bu tshor ba la
144b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas gsol pa// tshor ba'i phung po mkhas pa po// mkha' la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin// byis pa'i blo can rmongs bgyid pa// de ni khyod kyis yang dag
144b6(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// sgra'i bu tshor ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa// tshor ba'i phung po mngon mkhyen pa// rig cing rig pa'i mthar byon pa// mkhas pa rnams kyis
144b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog khyod kyis// tshor ba bdag med rab tu gzigs// lha'i bu tshor ba las rgal bas gsol pa// rkang gnyis gtso bo ngas pa khyod// brgal dka' tshor ba'i
144b8(dkon brtsegs): mtsho las rgal// 'das las rgal cing sdig med pa// byang chub mchog 'di sangs rgyas gyur// lha'i bu tshor ba las 'byung gis gsol ba// rnam par 'dren pas
145a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du// tshor ba rnams ni 'byung mkhyen nas// tshor ba'i phung po rab rgal te// sangs rgyas 'jig rten chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu cho
145a2(dkon brtsegs): ba rig pas gsol pa// mi rnams dag la gang 'ching ba'i// tshor ba thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen// nyon mongs zhags pa 'ching 'gyur ba// de'i rang bzhin khyod kyis
145a3(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// lha'i bu sems la mkhas pas gsol pa// khyod kyi sems kyis nyon mongs pam// bdud rnams kyang ni sra bkong ste// sems de rang bzhin ma mchis par/
145a4(dkon brtsegs): thub pa chen po khyod kyi gzigs// lha'i bu sems yongs su shes pas gsol pa// ji ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan po yis// sgyu ma sna tshogs sprul pa bzhin// sems ni bde
145a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen// de phyir khyod la 'jig rten mchod// lha'i bu sems la yang dag par rtog pas gsol pa// sgyu ma mkhan nas slob ma bzhin// gang gis
145a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'di bcings pa'i// sems de khyod kyis yang dag brtags// de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen// lha'i bu sems kyi spyod yul la spyod pa gsol pa// sems kyi spyod
145a7(dkon brtsegs): yul khyod kyis mkhyen// rnam par 'dren pa rmi lam na// ji ltar tshogs kyi grangs bzhin du// byis pa'i sems rmongs bgyid pa gzigs// lnga'i bu sems kyi dbang phyug
145a8(dkon brtsegs): gis gsol pa// dul gyur las su rung ba'i// sems kyi rang bzhin rtog med pa// gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed// mtshan nyid brtan pa khyod kyi gzigs// lha'i
145b1(dkon brtsegs): bu sems la dpa' bas gsol ba// gang gis sems la sems med shes// mkhas pa sgyid lug mi 'gyur zhing // bdud sde rab tu 'dul bgyid pa// de dag 'dir ni
145b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' zhes bgyi// lha'i bu sems kyis yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa// gang dag sems la sems med shes// de dag sangs rgyas sras lags te// dpa' chen
145b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos rnam la// skyes bu de dag yang dag 'phags// lha'i bu zhi ba'i sems kyis gsol pa// gang gis sems la dbang bgyis pa// sems can de dag
145b4(dkon brtsegs): zhi rab zhi// bdud kyis zhags la rab grol bas// de dag bdud kyi dbang mi mchi// lha'i sems mnyen pas gsol pa// mi rnams gang dag sems mnyen zhing //
145b5(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen par dka' dang dga' ba dang // khyod kyi bstan la gang mos pa// de dag 'dod par zhum mi 'gyur// lha'i bu sems dag pas gsol pa// sems dag las
145b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams gtsang gyur cing // yang dag rtogs pas spyod babyid pa// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan thos na// zab mo'i rnams la zhum mi 'gyur// lha'i bu rnams chos nyid
145b7(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pas gsol pa// gang gis yid ni chos nyid la// rab tu dga' zhing thog med pa na/ de dag mi dbang sra se po ste// zhi ba'i sar ni phyin pa lags//
145b8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu chos la legs pas gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad chos dbyings su// 'dren pa de la bsla chad rnams la// chos nyid la ni gang sems pa/
146a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag spyod yul ma yin med// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la nges par byang gis gsol pa// mi mchog khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// chos kyi dbyings la
146a2(dkon brtsegs): nges byung ste// 'dren pa kyi sra de dag/ mtshan nyid gcig gis nges byung lags// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyi spong yul gyis gsol pa// chos rnams kun gyis spod yul
146a3(dkon brtsegs): ni// chos kyi dbyings shes rgyal bas gsungs// dpa' bo khyod ni gang sprod pa'i// ye shes de ni bsam mi khyab// lha'i bu chos kyis dbyings la zhugs pas gsol pa//
146a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings la gang zhugs pa// de dag ye shes bsam yas te// sangs rgyas chos la the tsom med// sems can bsam la de dag mkhas// lha'i bu chos kyi
146a5(dkon brtsegs): dbyings la bab kyis gsol pa// gang dag chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig/ chos kyis dbying la bab pa rnams// de dag spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa// bsam gyis
146a6(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa// gang la de dag gnas pa'i// 'jigs pa med pas theb med pa// de dag rnam
146a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi spobs dang stobs// de la mtshungs pa med pa 'byung // lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pas gsol pa// khyod ni chos dbyings mkhas pa ste// chos rnams kun la
146a8(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mkhas// lag mthil ska ru ra bzhag bzhin// chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par ston// lha'i bu chos kyis dbying la gnas pas gsol pa// chos rnams rang bzhin
146b1(dkon brtsegs): med gzigs pas// khyod ni chos ni kyi dbyings la bzhugs// mi gnas zhum pa ma mchis te// gzung ba ma mchis btang ma mchis// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyis la spod pas
146b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa'i// chos kyi dbyings la khyod spyod de// bar sdang mkha' dang 'dra ba'i// 'jig rten mngon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i
146b3(dkon brtsegs): bu chos kyi dbyings la rtog pos gsol ba// gang dang gis sgo dag nas// skyes bu dam pa ston mdzad pa// de'i sgo nas chos dbyings ston// de phyir rtags dang gzugs ma
146b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis// lha'i bu chos dbyings brtson pas gsol pa// mngon par brtson pas chos gyis dbyings// skes bu dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen// brtson pas rdzogs pa'i sangs
146b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyus rnams// ye shes pha rol phyin par gyur// lha'i bu chos kyis tshim gyis gsol pa// dpa' bo khyod kyis skye bo 'di// chos kyi rab tu tshim par mdzad// chos kyi dbying
146b6(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam mkhyen pas// 'dren pa byang chub mchog la bzhugs// lha'i bu chos nyid kyi bting rnyed pas gsol pa// gting rnyed gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun// 'dren pa khyod kyis
146b7(dkon brtsegs): zhal du lta// chos dbyings rnam par mkhyen pa'i// 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu gnas shes pa la rab tu gnas pas gsol pa// mi mchog 'dren pa
146b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyis// ye shes gnas 'di chos dbyings te// rnam par 'dren pa stobs bcu po// gang la spod pa de lags so// lha'i bu gnas la gnas pas gsol pa/
147a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings ni gnas chen te// thams cad mkhyen pa bzhud pa'i lam// de ni chos rnams thams cad kyang // mtshan nyid gcig par shes pa
147a2(dkon brtsegs): lags// lha'i bu gnas mngon par shes pa gsol pa// khyod ni chos dbyings mngon par mkhyen// mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa ste// sems can kun gyis bsam
147a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang // rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyi mkhyen// lha'i bu gnas nges par 'byung gis gsol pa// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras// gnas su bya ba chos dbyings shes/
147a4(dkon brtsegs): gsal bar 'tshal ba'i mkhas pa rnams// rang 'byung nyid du nges par byung // lha'i bu gnas la bslab pas gsol pa// chos kyi dbyings la gang bslabs pa'i//
147a5(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu de dag byang chub zhugs// rang byung nyid du gnas rnyed pas// de dag rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// gnas
147a6(dkon brtsegs): mid pa ni gang 'tshal pa// de dag bde gshegs dgongs la mos// bdud rnams bye ba stong gis kyang // de dag rmongs par yongs mi nus// lha'i bu gnas med pa mngon
147a7(dkon brtsegs): par shes pas gsol pa// gnas med gang gis rig gyur pa// de dge bdag cag bdud kyi tshogs// bye bas byang chub mi bskyod cing // mkhas pa de dag shin tu
147a8(dkon brtsegs): dga'// lha'i bu gnas med pa'i dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// gnas med 'du shes mkhas pa ni// chos nyid la ni rab gnas te// sdig can bdud rnams
147b1(dkon brtsegs): bshal ba ni// ji ltar rta'i shing rta bzhin// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol// pa// mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa po// chos kyi dbyings la bgegs bgyid
147b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i// bdud kyi las ni gnas med de// gnas med do zhes rgyal bas gsungs// lha'i bu gnas dang gnas man yin pa rtogs pas gsol pa// gnas dang de
147b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gnas mi pa// byis pa'i blo can rnams la bstan// rang gis de ni thugs chud nas// sems can rnams la khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu sbyin pa la mkhas pas
147b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba// sngon chad rgyu ni gang dag dang // las 'dra 'byung ba ma 'tshal ba'i// rgyu de khyod kyis thugs su chud// las kyi gnas kyang rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu las la mkhas
147b5(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol ba// chags dang zhe sdang gti mug ni// las kyis rgyu zhes khyod kyis mkhyen// gang gis rgyu yis bgyis de yang // gang zag mchog gis cha thugs su chud//
147b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// ma 'ongs pa'i dus dag na// mi rnams las gang bgyid 'gyur ba// de'i rgyu dang len pa dang // gnas dang las kyang khyod
147b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la lta bas gsol pa// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi// sems can rnams dang rgyu dang las// gnas dang las kyi len pa
147b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams// kun kyang 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyi spod yul gyis gsol pa// mi dbang khyod kyis gzigs pa'i// la la dang rgyu dang ma mchis te/
148a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang skye ba'ang ma mchis so// de bas khyod ni gang zag mchog/ lha'i bu stobs la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa// las dang rgyu
148a2(dkon brtsegs): dang de bzhin gnas// dus la rnam smin rnams gsum dang // ji ltar de'i len pa yang // khyod kyis mkhyen pas de slad mchod// lha'i bu stobs kyis blo gros kyis gsol pa/
148a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // rnam par smin dang rkyen dang gnas// rang bzhin bral ba khyod kyis mkhyen// de phyir rgyal ba mnyam pa med// lha'i bu stobs kyis byung gis gsol
148a4(dkon brtsegs): pa// rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud rnams dang // rnam smin so sor yang dag rig/ thams cad stong par rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs la dga' bas/
148a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams// khyod nyid rang bzhin mngon mkhyen te// rang bzhin med par bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu stobs
148a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis rnam par rtse bas gsol pa// rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams// 'pho med dbang phyug med pa ste// rten cing 'byung bar khyod kyis mkhyen/
148a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu stobs kyis 'phags kyis gsol pa// rgyu dang rkyen dang las rnams dang // rnam par smin pa sten pa rnams// de kun rang bzhin stong ngo zhes// seng ge ngo ror khyod
148a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsungs// lha'i bu stobs kyi rjes su 'brang bas gsol pa// 'jig rten las ni zhig gis// khams ni gang zhig spel byur ba// de dag rkang gnyis gtso bos mkhyen/
148b1(dkon brtsegs): de bas khyod ni do zla med// lha'i bu stobs dang ldan gyis gsol pa// khams gang la ni bsten bgyis shing // gang gis mngon par las bgyis dang // de'i rnam smin ci 'dra ba/
148b2(dkon brtsegs): de kun spyan dang ldan pas mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa// khams gang la ni bsten bgyis shing // ci 'dra'i rang bzhin gyur pa yi// sems
148b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen// phyag gi ser mo lnga dang 'dra// lha'i bu stobs la sprod pas gsol pa// khams gang la ni bsten bgyis shing // bshes gnyen ci 'dra rnyed
148b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// 'ad 'dzi ci 'dra bgyid gyur pa// de kun bla na med pas mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas gsol pa// stobs kyi byin gyis rlabs mkhyen
148b5(dkon brtsegs): cing // 'dren pa de'i khams dang ni// 'du 'dzi bo shes gnyen tshogs kyi rnams// de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu khams nges pas gsol pa// khams
148b6(dkon brtsegs): de dang ni de len dang // bshes gnyen de dang de 'grogs pa// de la khyod kyis mkhyen pa des// de phyir the tsom yong mi mnga'// lha'i bu khams la rten pas gsol pa// sem
148b7(dkon brtsegs): can gang na gnas gnas pa'i// 'khor ba de dang khams de dang // sprod dang skad dang 'gro ba rnams// mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu khams la mkhas pas
148b8(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// ye shes gang gis khams de ni// 'dren pas mngon po par mkhyen pa'i// mkhyen te mkhyen pas stong ngo zhes// blo mchog mnga' bas yang dag bstan//
149a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu khams nas nges par byang gis gsol ba// khams gang la ni bsten bgyis na// 'dus byas dag la ji srid gnas// de ni khyod kyis
149a2(dkon brtsegs): ji bzhin mkhyen// khyod la do zla ma mchis so// lha'i bu khams kyi rjes su song bas gsol pa// khams gang la ni brten bgyis na// yon tan ji snyed bskyed pa dang // rnam
149a3(dkon brtsegs): par smin dang 'bras bu dag// de dag ma lus khyod kyis mkhyen// lce'i bu khams la yang dag zhugs pas gsol pa// khams gang la ni sten bgyis pos// 'gro ba ci
149a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dra 'dod bgyis pa// de yang khyod kyis thogs med mkhyen// de phyir khyod ni mkhas pas mchod// lha'i bu lam mngon par shes pas gsol pa// khams gang la ni bste/
149a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa// 'gro ba ci 'drar ma mchis pa'i// sems can rnams kyi lam dag kyang // ye shes mkhas pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu lam la mi 'jigs pas gsol pa//
149a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can log pa nyid nges shing // mya ngan 'das 'gro skal med pa// phung po gsum po de dag la// khyod kyi ye shes nges par 'jug/ lha'i bu lam gyis nges par byung
149a7(dkon brtsegs): gis gsol pa// sems can yang dag nyid nges te// ngan bror 'gro ba'i skal med pa// de la 'jig rten sgron ma khyod// rtogs pa thogs pa med par 'jug/ lha'i bu
149a8(dkon brtsegs): lam la mos pas gsol pa// ma nges phung por gyur pa la// gang zag gang rnams gnas pa rnams// de la ngan song ngan 'gro dang // mya ngan 'das 'ang khyod kyis bstan/
149b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu stobs kyi brdas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas brda' tsam nyid lags te// de bzhin stobs dang ye shes dang // mi 'jigs bzhi yang de bzhin du// kun rdzob ces ni
149b2(dkon brtsegs): thub pas gsungs// lha'i bu yang dag pa mthong bas gsol pa// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas chos rnams med// ye shes gnas pa gzhan yang med// don dam nyid
149b3(dkon brtsegs): du bstan to zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs la gnas kyis gsol ba// sangs rgyas chos la stobs gnas pas// des na de la
149b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs med de// rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs kyi sras// ji ltar 'dod dgur rnam par 'phral// lha'i bu chos la 'jigs med kyis gsol pa// kun rdzob dang ni don dam
149b5(dkon brtsegs): dang // de dag rab tu bstan mchis kyang // kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang // brda' yang dmigs su ma mchis so// lha'i bu ye shes lhur len gyi gsol pa// brjod
149b6(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad rnam pa gzhan// chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa gzhan// mtshan nyid ma mchis brjod ma mchis// khyod kyis chos kyi mtshan nyid gzigs// lha'i bu
149b7(dkon brtsegs): lam la brtson pas gsol pa// nges par gyur pa'i sems can rnams// gzhan gyi rgyud mchi'i gnas ma mchis// log par nges rnams kun tu 'gror// drang srong
149b8(dkon brtsegs): chen po khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs kyis gsol pa// mkhas gang la ni bsten bgyis te// gang rnams ci 'drar mos 'gyur zhing // 'dod
150a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags khams la sdug lta ba// de dag thub cher khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mi sdub pa la nges par byung gis gsol pa// ma mchis yod
150a2(dkon brtsegs): su brtags pas na// 'dod chags khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu byams pas nges par byung gi gsol pa/
150a3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na// zhe sdang khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu rkyen 'dis nges par byung
150a4(dkon brtsegs): gis gsol pa// ma mchis yongs brtags pas na// gti mug khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu gtong ba nges par
150a5(dkon brtsegs): byang gis gsol pa// 'tsho med 'jigs pa rnyed pa dag/ ser sna mngon par 'phel 'gyur te// de la mos pa nges 'byung ba// de dag mthu chen khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu dge ba'i
150a6(dkon brtsegs): beshes gnyen gyis nges par byang gis gsol pa// sdig pa'i grogs dang 'grogs pa na// mthun pa'i khams ni rab tu 'byung // de la mos pa 'thob 'gyur ba// de dag 'dren pas
150a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mkhyen// lha'i bu rnam par shes pa'i snying por 'dzin pas gsol/ pa// 'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyi// ci 'dra'i khams la bsten pa dang // mos pa de mthar byin pa dag /
150a8(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis ma lus rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu nan tan snying por byed pas gsol pa// 'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis// gang gis rgyu 'byung nan tan dang // mos pa de las gyur pa yang /
150b1(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu dbang po la mos pas gsol pa// sems can gang gis khams gang la// sten na ji ltar 'gyur ba'i// rgyu de khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// des
150b2(dkon brtsegs): na khyod ni dga' bar mdzad// lha'i bu dbang po la sprod pas gsol pa// sbyor ba gang gi skye ba dang // gang gis rgya chen skye ba dang // dmigs pa dang ni zhing rnams dang // dbang po khyod
150b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang pos nges par byang gis gsol pa// 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal gnod byung ba// srid par mngon par 'jug pa dang // sred pa zhi bar bgyid pa'i don/
150b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag slu ba'i mchog gis mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang po'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa// dbang po nyam chung rnam dag ni// gzugs kyi 'dod chags dben par 'tshal// sred pa rnam
150b5(dkon brtsegs): par gzhig pa yang // rkang gnyis dam pas bstan pa mdzadado// lha'i bu dbang po rnam par rgyal bas gsol pa// dbang po rtul po dang khrod brten// rang gyi 'dod chags zhi bar
150b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid// rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhal mthong nas// sred dang bcas pas khyod la lta// lha'i bu dbang po rtogs kyis gsol ba// 'dod chags can dang 'dod chags dang // zhi
150b7(dkon brtsegs): dang shes dang mi shes dang // sred pa zhi dang dbang po rnams// rnam par gzigs na sngon ma dmigs// lha'i bu dbang po la gnas pas gsol pa// zhe sdang gnyen por
150b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i// gnod sems med dang dben pa dag/ dbang po rtul po sten pa'i tshe// khyod kyis 'gro ba'i bsam pa gzigs// lha'i bu dbang po la brtson pas gsol
151a1(dkon brtsegs): pa// zhe sdang gnyen po byams par gsung // sems can shes pa rjes su skye// zhes sdang khams ni zhi bar bgyid// de dag mi mchog khyod kyi mkhyen// lha'i bu
151a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po tshal bas gsol pa// gnod sems med dang byams pa dang // zhi ba ngo bo nyid ma gzigs// ngag dang nyon mongs mi dmigs te// des na 'jig rten khyad par 'phags//
151a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dbang po rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa// log par rnam par rtog pa dang // log par nye bar ston pa dang // nyon mongs dam phyir kun sbyor te// bzlog pas thar par 'gyur
151a4(dkon brtsegs): ba gzigs// lha'i bu ye shes yang dag shar gyis gsol pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // dngos la 'dzin pa mun pa ste// bzlog pas snang bas chen por 'gyur// de ni
151a5(dkon brtsegs): brags chen khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu ye shes 'dod chags chad pas gsol pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // mun pa snang ba dngos po rnams// rang bzhin nyid kyis
151a6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis te// de ni rkang gnyis gtso bos gzigs// lha'i bu snang ba 'dzin gyis gsol pa// sems cad gang gi shes pa gang // ci tsam yongs su bsgrub bgyis dang // snod
151a7(dkon brtsegs): du gang rung ci snyed pa// de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang po dang zhe 'bras pas gsol pa// nyon mongs spangs phyir shes gang gis// shes pa de la rtogs bgyid
151a8(dkon brtsegs): pa// de yang ston pa khyod kyis mkhyen// de bas khyod la mngon pa dpa'// lha'i bu dbang po la dga' bas gsol pa// yul dang dus glanas dag dang // spod pa rnam par
151b1(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pa dang // nyon mongs stod spongs rnab dag dang // thub pa khyod kyis stong par gzigs// lha'i bu ye shes rgyal mtshan gsol pa// dbang po rno rtul 'bring dag dang /
151b2(dkon brtsegs): gang zag dag gi bsam pa dang // bcings dang thar dang zad dang shes// g.yo ba med par khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang po'i rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa// dbang po rab 'bring
151b3(dkon brtsegs): rtul ba dang // nyon mongs ye shes tshor ba dang // gdul dang 'dul ba bgyid/ pa dang // khyod kyis mtshan nyid med par gsungs// lha'i bu dbang po rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa/
151b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi bsam gtan dang // rnam par kun nas nyon mongs dang // snyom 'jug ting 'dzin ldan pa dang // rnam pa byang chub khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyi shugs
151b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa// zhi ba'i ting 'dzin brten te// chos kun ngo bo nyid kyis ni// rang bzhin med par khyod kyis mkhyen// des na thams cad mkhyen ces bgyi// lha'i bu stobs kyi go/
151b6(dkon brtsegs): chas gsol pa// chos rnams gang dang rang bzhin gang // chos gang gis ni brjod bgyis pa// yang dag ji bzhin thug su chud// des na dus gsum chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu
151b7(dkon brtsegs): stobs 'dod kyis gsol pa// log par brtags pas kun nyon mongs// rnam pa bzhi ni skye bar 'gyur// las las skyes par de dag mkhyen// des na khyod kyi do zla med// lha'i bu
151b8(dkon brtsegs): stobs shes kyis gsol pa// nyon mongs rnam dang las rnams kyi// gnyen po rnam par bya bo dang // ston pa'ang khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// des na khyod kyi do zla med// lha'i bu stob
152a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'od kyis gsol pa// bsam gtan rnam thar ldang ba dang // stobs par 'jug dang ting 'dzin dang // kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dag/ ming tsam mo zhes
152a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bstan// lnga'i stobs las byung gis gsol ba// bsam gtan rnam thar rnam byang dang // snyoms par 'jug dang ting nge 'dzin// bag yod pa las byung ba ste// de la khyod kyi
152a3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes 'jug// lha'i bu stobs rnam par spel gyis gsol pa// dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni// bsam gtan la stsogs de dag dang // ldang dang rnam par byang la 'jug/ de ni rlung
152a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar chags pa med// lha'i bu sngon gyis mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// srid pa 'di na sngon bzhugs che// srid pa'i skyon dang yong ma 'dres//
152a5(dkon brtsegs): des na khyod la do za med// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la gnas pas gsol pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs med de// byang chub gzhal yas tshol mdzad cing // 'dren pas yongasu sprad
152a6(dkon brtsegs): pas na// des na khyod ni dpa' bo lags// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la rtog pas gsol pa// sngon mthar sbyin pa sna tshogs dang // blo mchog gsungs tshe gsol pas na// spobs pa sna tshogs
152a7(dkon brtsegs): rab mnga' bar// rnam par 'dren pa des nges byung // lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la byung bas bsol pa// sngon chad 'khor bar spyod pa'i tshe// tshul rnams la ni tshul mkhas pa// 'jig rten
152a8(dkon brtsegs): sgron rnams khyod kyis gzigs// des na khyod ni tshul la mkhas// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' tshar phyin pas gsol pa// sngon mthar chos rgyal mang po la// dpa' bos sngon cad smod mdzad
152b1(dkon brtsegs): pas// thams cad mkhyen du nges par byung // sems can khams la phyag 'a tshal lo// lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa// byang chub mchog ni btsal ba'i phyir/
152b2(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa// de la khyod kyis sa bon btab// lce'i bu sngon gyi tshul la nges pas gsol pa// bskal pa bye ba brtag mdzad pa/
152b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kun sems can med pa zhes// chos rnams thams cad nges par mkhyen// 'du 'phrod tsam du rgyal bas gsung // lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la sems pas gsol pa// bskal
152b4(dkon brtsegs): pa bye ba grangs med du// gnas dang gnas min rab mkhyen par// rnam par 'dren pa skrod mdzad po// des 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la spyod pas gsol
152b5(dkon brtsegs): pa// gnas dang gnas min brten bgyis nas// las rgyu rnams dpyad pas na// khams dang dbang po mos pa dang // bsam gtan sngon gyi mtha' yas mkhyen// lha'i bu sngon gyi
152b6(dkon brtsegs): ma la yongasu rtog pas gsol pa// khyod kyis sngon mtho' yongs su brtags pas// stobs kyi ye shes rnam bcu po// dpa' bo chen pos rnam par spel// des ni 'jig rten 'di la
152b7(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa// dpa' bos sems can thad kyi// sngon gyi mtha' spyod pa pa dang // dge dang mi dge rgyab rnams// mkhyen pas 'jig rten
152b8(dkon brtsegs): gso ba mdzad// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' spong ba la so sor rtogs pas gsol pa// thub pas sngon gyis sems can gyi// sngon mtha'i spod par rab mkhyen cing // khams dang mos
153a1(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen pas na// de'i phyir sems can gso ba mdzad// lha'i bu bos pa'i stobs can gyis gsol pa// bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su// sngon gyi mtha' la
153a2(dkon brtsegs): brtags kyis kyang // khyod kyi dgongs pa chags mo mnga'// des na mgon la bdag mos lags// lha'i bu ye shes la mos pas gsol pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// sngon mtha'
153a3(dkon brtsegs): srid pa bsam gyis kyang // rkang gnyis gtso bo'i yon gyi// pha rol phyin nus 'ga' ma mchis// lha'i bu phyin pa'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa// phyogs 'jig rten 'di dag
153a4(dkon brtsegs): gis// ske dag sna tshogs las ldan pa// shi pho'i skye bar gyur pa la dag/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas sman gyis gzigs// lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' las nges par byung gis gsol pa/
153a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu gang gis ni las gang zhig/ bgyis shing rgyud drug mchis gyur pa// de dag thams cad rgyal bas mkhyen// des na thams cad mkhyen ces bgyi// lha'i bu 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mngon
153a6(dkon brtsegs): par shes pas gsol pa// khams gang gis ni sems can gang // bsgoms par gyur cing las bgyid pa'i// bag chags las dang sems can dag/ khyod kyis g.yo ba med pa
153a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// lha'i bu 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rig pas gsol pa// bshes gnyen ci 'dra bstan bgyis shing // lam gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pas// 'gro ba gang du mchi 'gyur ba// thub
153a8(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod kyis de yang mkhyen// lha'i bu dgos pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// las de yi ni bgyi ba gang // dgos pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// gang gi slad du las bgyis pa// de yang
153b1(dkon brtsegs): ma lus rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu dngos po la mkhas pas gsol pa// dngos po gang dag dmigs pa dang // las gang mngon pa par 'dus bgyis pa// thams cad mkhyen pas de
153b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen te// de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags// lha'i bu dngos po rigs pas gsol pa// sems can rnams kyi bsam mkhas pa// dngos de ji ltar gnas pa dang // de ni ji ltar
153b3(dkon brtsegs): grub pa'i// las de khyod kyis mngon par mkhyen// lha'i bu shes pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// shes pa gang gis dngos po de// brtags par gyur pa rab tu mkhyen// de la ji
153b4(dkon brtsegs): ltar chags gyur pa// thub pa khyod kyis shin tu mkhyen// lha'i bu mngon par 'du shes pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa// chags pa gang gis las de rnams// nyon mongs de dag
153b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag mkhyen// de bas khyod ni bdag gi mgo// lha bu 'gro ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa// 'gro ba gang da las gang gis// mchis shing sgrib pa gang rnyed nas// 'bras bu thob pa
153b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba// de kun spun ldan khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu dmigs pa la mkhas pas gsol// 'gro ba gang du skyes rnams kyi// gang gis las rnams smin par 'gyur ba'i//
153b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa khyod kyis rab mkhyen te// de la khyod blo gros 'jug/ lha'i bu bag chags la mkhas kyis gsol ba// 'gro dang 'gro bar mi rnams kyis// sngan chad babyis pa'i sdig
153b8(dkon brtsegs): las dang // de bzhin dge ba'i las rnams kyi// ngag chags khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu las la mkhas pas gsol pa// 'gro bar 'byung po thams cad kyi// rnying dang gsar
154a1(dkon brtsegs): dang srang ma dang // las rnams gsum po khyod kyis mkhyed// de la so so skye bo 'khrul// lha'i bu rnam par smin pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa// chung shing rnam smin gyi
154a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang // che zhing rnam smin chung ba dang // chung ngam che 'am mnyam pa'ang rung // de la mu stegs can rnam rmongs// lha'i bu lam la mkhas kyis gsol pa// tshe 'di las rnams dang
154a3(dkon brtsegs): lags dang // skyes pa'i lam rnams gang lags dang // lan grangs gzhan gyi gang lags pa// de dag spyan ldan khyod kyis mkhyed// lha'i bu tshe 'di la myong bar// 'gyur ba la mkhas
154a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa// tshe 'di la ni gang bgyis pa'i// lam la gyi rnam smin mi gang grwa// myong bar 'gyur ba gang dag la// so so'i skye bo rmongs pa mkhyen// lha'i bu skyes nas myong
154a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba la mkhas pa gsol pa// gang gis las gang bsnyugs gyur te// skyes nas rnam par smin gyur pa// gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed// shes rab chen pos de yang
154a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// lha'i bu lan grangs gzhan myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa// las gang bskal pa bye ba yi// byi dus rnam par smin 'gyur zhing // dus gzhan dag na yang
154a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba// de dag yang dag nyid du mkhyed// lha'i bu yongs su ma srid pa myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas bsol pa// las rnams gang zhig bgyis gyur pa// yongs su smin par ma gyur na/
154a8(dkon brtsegs): de srid 'bras bu mi 'byin pa// rkang gnyis mchog gis de yang mkhyen// lha'i bu yongs su ma smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la rtogs pas gsol pa// las gang dang ni ldan pA na// sems
154b1(dkon brtsegs): can 'di ni skyer 'gyur ba// pham pa med pas de mkhyen te// yongasu brtags nas rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu yongasu smin par gyur pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// las ni ji ltar yongasu
154b2(dkon brtsegs): sminan// 'dres bu dkar bar 'byung ba mkhyen// de la khyod kyis ye shes 'jug/ de dag stong par rnam par mkhyen// lha'i bu yongs su smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la nges pas gsol pa/
154b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pas las kyi rnams// lci dang yang bar rab tu mkhyen// sems can bsam pa thugs su chud// de slad bcom ldan bdag gi bla// lha'i bu lci yang la mkhas kyi gsol
154b4(dkon brtsegs): pa// las gang gis ni sems can rnams// ngan song mchi bar 'gyur ba dang // lci ba dang ni yang ba gzigs// de shes mkhyen pas rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu sems can gyi spyod pa la/
154b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas kyis gsol pa// sems cad spyod pa nyer bzung zhing // las kyis lci dang yang ba dag/ dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// mu stegs can rnams de la rmongs// lha'i bu sems
154b6(dkon brtsegs): can gyi sprod pa la dpyod pas gsol pa// sems can skrod pa spyad mdzad cing // las kyi rnam par smin pa bstan// phor bu'i chu dang gang ga'i tu// lan tsa'i rnam par bstan pa bzhin/
154b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu los kya la mkhas kyis gsol pa// slob dang mi slo bo rnam par smin// rkang gnyis dam pa ston mdzad cing // kun nas nyon mongs las myong nas// las nis zad par 'gyur ba
154b8(dkon brtsegs): bstan// lha'i bu sangs rgyas ye shes la reg par byed pas gsol pa// sangs rgyas spyan gyis khams gsum na// las kyis 'bras bu rten pa'i// byis pa dag dang mkhas pa gzig/
155a1(dkon brtsegs): phra gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i bu las zad par byed pas gsol pa// 'jig rten dag na rnam 'dren khyod// sems can rnams kyi shi 'pho dang // skye ba
155a2(dkon brtsegs): kun la ye shes 'jug/ mkhyen pas 'jig med phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu dmigs pa med pa spyod pas gsol pa// 'chi 'pho ba dang skye dang las// 'gro dang de bzhin sems can
155a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams// rnam smin rmi lam 'drad bstan pa// 'dren pa rkang gnyis mchog gis mkhyen// lha'i bu nyon mongs pa la rtog pas gsol pa// ji ltar rmi lam sgom pa zhig/ shin tu gsil
155a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chu 'thungs bzhin// rkang pachog khyod 'dod chags dang // zhes sdang gti mug rnams kyang zad// lha'i bu yongs su rtog pa dang bral ba rang sol pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti
155a5(dkon brtsegs): mug rnams// yongasu rtog las skyes pa ste// rmi lam dga' bar rtse ba bzhin// smra mchog khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu yongasu rtog pa zhi bar byed pas gsol pa// yongasu
155a6(dkon brtsegs): rtog par rab zhi ba// nyon mongs thod pa rab bstan te// rmi lam na ni sprin med ltar// mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu bstan// lha'i bu zag pa la rtog pas gsol pa// mi laM char chen 'bab
155a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ltar// de bzhin zag pa rnam 'byung bar// zag pa byung ba mkhas pa po// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu rmi lam rtog bris gsol pa// rmi lam char chen 'bab pa
155a8(dkon brtsegs): ltar// de bzhin zag pa rnams 'byung ste// nor ba rnams la zag 'byung bar// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pas gsol pa// ji ltar bu mo'i rmi
155b1(dkon brtsegs): lam na// bu zhig byung nas shi 'phos nas// dga' dang sdug bsngal chor 'gyur ba// de bzhin 'gro ba khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu rmi lam rtogs pas gsol pa// rmi lam dag na mgo
155b2(dkon brtsegs): bcad bzhin// khyod kyis zag pa zad pas gzigs// de ni mkhas pa rnams la brtan// thams cad gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu blo gros nges par brtags kyis gsol
155b3(dkon brtsegs): ba// chos kun mkhyen pa khyod kyis ni// ji ltar mi lam mdzad phrad dang // bral ba yang dag ma mchis gzigs// 'gro ba ji bzhin tshim par mdzad// lnga'i bu ye shes yid kyis gsol pa/
155b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi dam pa'i chos stong pa// thos nas yid ni dgar 'gyur te// rmi lam dag ni rmi bstan bzhin// de ltar rgyal bas bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu yongs su dga' ba'i yid kyis
155b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// me long gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin// 'gro ba mtha' dag gzigs pas na// bsam gtan mnga' ba khyod la ni// lhar bcas 'jig rten yid kyang dga'// lha'i bu blo
155b6(dkon brtsegs): gros nges pas gsol pa// thub pa po bang sgra 'da' ba'i// khyod kyi dam chos thob gyur na// lha'i bu rnams the tshom med/ rgyal ba mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sgyu mas tshim gyis
155b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma dag/ byis pa rmongs byed yongs bstan na// mi mkhas de la rmongs par 'gyur/ sgyu ma bzhin du khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu sprul pa la sems
155b8(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa// ji ltar rmi lam skya mthong ba// de ltar khyod kyis 'gro ba gzigs// mgon po'i bstan pa de thos na// bdag cag the tsom ma mchis so// lha'i bu sku ma la nges par
156a1(dkon brtsegs): byung gis gsol pa// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu sprul kyang // sgyu ma lags par 'tshal bas na// de la rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis// de bzhin khyod kyis 'gro ba
156a2(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// lha'i bu rtog pa'i rje su rtog pas gsol pa// ji ltar brtson pas zil pa 'o// sangs rgyas sku gzugs brtags pa bzhin// de ltar rtogs pas 'jig rten bskyed// rnam par 'dren
156a3(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu kun tu rtogs pa 'jom gyis gsol pa// kun rtog 'dod chags rgyu legs te// 'dod chags dngos pos bskyed ma lags// rtog pa ngan las 'dod chags
156a4(dkon brtsegs): byung // de ni rnam 'dren khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu yongs shes dang ldan pas gsol pa// ri sul dag nas sgra byung ba// brag ca sems can sgra ma lags// de bzhin 'jig rten khyod
156a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis gzigs// de slad 'jig rten chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu ston pa la mkhas pas/ gsol pa// sgra ni gang yang ma mchis te// sgra na brag ca 'dra ba lags// 'on kyang mi dbang khyod kyi
156a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan// byis pa mang po rab tu bcud// lha'i bu nan tan la mkhas pas gsol pa// chos rnams don ni gzhan lags kyang // byis pa rnams kyis gzhan du brtags// nan tan chos las
156a7(dkon brtsegs): shes par bgyi// de la bdag ni the tsam chad// lnga'i bu don gyis rjesu 'brang bas gsol pa// chos don yang dag gang lags pa// de ni sus kyang ma rtogs ning // sus kyang ma bstan/
156a8(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ma 'gyur// de skad thub pa'i mchog gis gsungs// lha'i bu chos kyi brda' rtogs pas gsol pa// zag dang dri ma nyon mongs dang // bag chags dang ni rtog dang rtog/ kun nas
156b1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs rnams dag pa// thub pa brda'i tshig kyang lags// lha'i bu kun tu rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// kun nas nyon mongs rnams dag dang // zag pa dag dang nyon mongs dang /
156b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang bshad dang nye du dang // ston pa 'di kun ming tsam lags// lha'i bu mi gnas pa blo gros kyis gsol pa// khams gsum rnams la ma chags te// na mkha'i 'dra ba'i thug
156b3(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ba// bral bar gyur cing smin pa'i gnas// zhi ba'i sems la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu ma gos pas gsol pa// thub pa khyod kyi thugs yid ni// gzugs dang gzugs med mi
156b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing // 'dod dang mya ngan 'ongs pa la// gnas pa ma mchis par snang 'dra// lha'i bu re ba med pas gsol pa// 'dod pa'i khams la re spangs pa// gzugs dang gzugs min
156b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyi gar min// 'ad 'dzi dag dang bral gyur pa// sred zad khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sred pa byang bas gsol pa// 'byung dag dang 'jig pa dang // khyod kyi srid pa yang dag chad//
156b6(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum kun la chags mi mnga'// rnam par 'dren la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sred pa zil gyis gnon gyis gsol pa// 'jigs rten 'di dag zil mnan nas// khyu mchog
156b7(dkon brtsegs): dam pa spyod mdzad cing // sems can 'jig rten sgrol mdzad pa// thugs brtse khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sred pa dang bral bas gsol pa// kun tu sbyor dang bral ba ste// nga
156b8(dkon brtsegs): srid pas pas zhir gyur pa// dag pa'i bdag nyid dge pa'i sems// lus dang bral phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rigs pas gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad
157a1(dkon brtsegs): dngos med pa// ji bzhin dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen// bcings pa ma mchis grol ma mchis// yang dag gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu 'das las rgal
157a2(dkon brtsegs): bas gsol pa// 'dod pa'i 'dam la rgal ba ste// srid pa'i los de bzhin rga la// gzigs pa mi mnga' len mi mnga'// yang srid rgal la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zang zing spangs kyis
157a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol po// zang zing spangs shing dri ma spangs// rab spang shing sdig pa'ang spangs// sangs rgyas sgrib pa rnam spangs pa// don rtogs khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu re ba spangs pas gsol
157a4(dkon brtsegs): pa// don dang don ma lags pa spangs// chag pa mi mnga' nges rtogs pa// bdud kyi zhags las rnam 'das pa// len med khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu phan par 'dod pas gsol pa//
157a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams kyis// lam gang nyon mongs rim med pa// sgrib pa med par gzigs pa po// dpa' chen khyod kyis de yang gzigs// lha'i bu grags pa thob kyis gsol pa// /
157a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa 'jig rten rnam grags pa// khyod kyis mkhyen la brtson pa rnams// ji skad bstan bzhin rab rtog na// nyon mongs rnam ni nub par 'gyur// lha'i bu 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa/
157a7(dkon brtsegs): chos rnam kun la nges pas// sdom pa gang yang yong ma gzigs// ye shes rgya mtsho mi bsnyengs par// seng ge'i sgra ni sgrog pa mdzad// lha'i bu gang nas kyang 'jigs pa med pa gsol pa/
157a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa kun las yang dag rgal// zug rngu thad kun tu bton// snyengs pa mi mnga' zhus mi mnga'// thad zil gnon phyag 'tshal// lha'i bu gnas med gyis gsol pa// lha
157b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang ni dri za dang // bdud dang tshangs par bcas pa yis// khyod kyi chos la bskal mi nus// de bas khyod la bsnyengs mi mnga'// lha'i bu seng ge rtsal gis gsol pa// chos
157b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad yongs mkhyen pas// sangs rgyas gyur la 'jigs mi mnga'// bdag la chos kyis sus rgol zhes// bde gshegs khyod la dogs mi mnga'// lha'i bu skag
157b3(dkon brtsegs): med kyis gsol pa// seng ge ri sul gnas pa ni// 'jigs pa ma mchis skag ma mchis// ri dgas phra mo yongs btul te// sra bkod nags na nga ro sgrog/ de bzhin thams
157b4(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa yang // mu stegs can rnams yongs bsgrags te// lha klu dri za'i 'jig rten na// mtshungs gzigs nas gsungs yang sgrog/ lha'i bu thams cad zil gnon gyis
157b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'jig rten na// sangs rgyas nyid la sngo bgyid pa// 'jig rten gsum ni ma mchis te// des na rgyal ba bdag gi skyabs// lha'i bu seng ge blo glos
157b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa// thams cad mkhyen pa thar gzigs// chos rnams kun la 'jig mi mnga'// khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis te// cis mi bsnyengs la phyag 'tshal// lha'i bu rjesu
157b7(dkon brtsegs): 'thun par skyes kyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas nyid du dam bcas na// 'di ni khyod la brgal ma mchis// 'jig rten 'dren pa chos kyi ni// khyod la gang rgol de ma mchis// lha'i bu
157b8(dkon brtsegs): mdzod mdzin gyis gsol pa// seng ge nga ro gsung bskrag te// khyod kyis chos kyi mdzod bzung bas// srog chags byi ba stong dag gis// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed// lha'i bu
158a1(dkon brtsegs): brtul zhugs rjes su 'thun gyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas rjes 'thun brtul zhugs can// dpa' chen de dag thob chen thob// byang chub mchog tu sems btud cing /
158a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zag mchog tu de dag 'gyur// lha'i bu rjes su 'thun pa chos la gla stsol pa// khyed kyi bstan pa sus thos te// byang chub mchog tu sems btud pa// de dag 'jig rten sems can che// gang
158a3(dkon brtsegs): zag mchog tu de dag 'gyur// lha'i bu sems dag pas gsol pa// 'jig rten dag na rgal med pa'i// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung thos na// srog chags bye ba stong dag gis// byang
158a4(dkon brtsegs): chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed// lha'i bu sems rgyun yongasu dag pas gsol pa// yun ring dus nas mi dbang gis// sangs rgyas bslab la legs snabs pas// de skad
158a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni thugs rgyud dag/ mtshan rab sum bcu gnyis dang ldan// lha'i bu zag pa med pa'i yid kyis gsol pa// zag pa zad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// seng ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad de/
158a6(dkon brtsegs): dam bcas pa la mngon zhugs na// rgol ba 'din yong ma mchis// lha'i bu de kho na'i rjes su song bas gsol pa// khyod kyi gsung la sgra 'gyur ba'i// lha dang lha'i mi dag ni// 'jig
158a7(dkon brtsegs): rten gsum nam mchis te// des na thub pa stobs dang ldan// lha'i bu zag pa zad pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// dge sbyong dam pa'i theg pa ni// ma lus yongasu bas pa ste// 'dra
158a8(dkon brtsegs): na khyod la rgol ma mchis// des na sangs rgyas bdag gis pa// lha'i bu rtag tu brtson gyis gsol pa// khyod la nyon mongs lus so zhes// mi dbang khyod la gang rgol ba// rnam pa kun
158b1(dkon brtsegs): tu mi dmigs te// des na sangs rgyas bsnyengs mi mnga'// lha'i bu sems zhi bas gsol pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang zhi ba ste// gti mug bag chags byas par zhi// nye sprod las
158b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang zhi bas na// sem zhi khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i bu rnal 'byol la spyod pas gsol pa// rnal 'byor gang gis spyod pa gang // bas par gyur pa'i lta ba'i che// de la khyod kyis
158b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen kun 'jug/ nges na khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu rnal 'byor la mkhas pas gsol pa// 'dren pa gang la bslabs pa yi// rnal 'byor tshogs ni mtha' yas te/
158b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa de skad du// nyon mongs thams cad ma lus pas// lha'i bu rnal 'byor blo gros kyis gsol gyi// 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi blo// rnal 'byor las ni nyams
158b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis// des na khyod kyis nyon mongs kun// bag chags bcas par yongasu brtsal// lha'i bu zhi ba rig pas gsol pa// nyon mod thams cad zhir gyur nas// bag chab
158b6(dkon brtsegs): ma lus yongs su bstsal// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' rgyal sras dang // cis kyang mi bsnyengs spyod pa mdzad// lha'i bu zad pa la rtog pas gsol pa// thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa
158b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod// nyon mongs bgo chags bcas par bas// 'jig rten sgron ma khyod la ni// mtshungs gang yang mi dmigs so// lha'i bu bag la nyal byung gis gsol pa// khyod kyis bag
158b8(dkon brtsegs): chag ma lus bstsal// khyod la skyon dri yongs ma mchis// de slad sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen// lha rnam kun gyi thub pa'i thub// lha'i bu mtha' na gnas pas gsol pa// zag
159a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams ni spangs pas na// skye ba'ang skye ba ma lags te// thub pa khyod skye tha ma pa// des na mgon po bsnyengs mi mnga'// lha'i bu tshad srung gis gsol pa/
159a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ba khyod kyis sa bon spangs// sdug bsngal myu gu tshig par gyur// mya ngan khri shing rnam por skams// gdung ba med la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu shing rtags bton gyis gsol
159a3(dkon brtsegs): pa// thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod// ma rig shing thags rnams kyang bstsal// sangs rgyas spyod pa rnam par spangs// de bas ston pa bsnyengs mi mnga'// lha'i bu srid pa'i
159a4(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu song bas gsol pa// srid pa'i mtsho las yang dag rgal// rnam par 'dren pa bya ba byas// khyod kyis snang ba yang dag byung // 'jigs khyod ni don kyang grub// lha'i bu mya
159a5(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bas gsol ba// thams cad mkhyen pa zhir gyur pa// nyon mongs thad rab tu bshig/ bag chags rdal tsam yong mi mnga'// mgon po khyed la phyag
159a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'tshal// lci bu chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa// khyod kyis chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng // nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyal// chos kyi lam srang mtha' yas pa// dpa'
159a7(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po khyod kyi bstan// lha'i bu chos kyi 'byung gnas kyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas po// thub pa chos rnams kun mkhyen pa// sems can kun gyi dge
159a8(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen// ye shes mtshol phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu chos kyi gos can gyis gsol pa// khyod kyi sras po 'jigs med pa// seng ge'i nga ro rnams sgrogs kyang // rgya ba sras
159b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag chos med cing // sangs rgyas chos kyi don gyis sgom// lha'i bu chos don tu gnyer bas gsol pa// sangs rgyas rnam don khyod gnyer bar// khyod kyi sras rnams sems bskyed
159b2(dkon brtsegs): cing // khyod kyi 'jigs thos gyur nas// mkhas pa de dag byang chub tshol// lha'i bu chos kyi skom gyis gsol pa// khyod kyi mi 'jigs thos gyur nas// sangs rgyas chos rnams
159b3(dkon brtsegs): btsal ba'i phyir// srog chags bye ba skom gyur te// brtson 'bras brtan pa rab tu rtsom// lha'i bu chos kyis 'phags kyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas chos kyis mngon 'phags shing/
159b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs med par 'dul mdzad pa'i// gsung ba'i mchog gyur khyod mthong nas// brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub mtshol// lha'i bu chos 'dzin gyis gsol pa// thub pa zab cing
159b5(dkon brtsegs): blta dka' ba'i// chos ni khyod kyis rab bstan pa// khyod kyi sras kyis thos gyur nas// de dag bla med byang chub tshol// lha'i bu lta ba med pas gsol pa// khyod kyis seng ge'i
159b6(dkon brtsegs): gsung thos nas// khyod kyi sras po dpa' nges pa// lus dang srog la mi lta bar// byang chub don tu gnyer ba bgyid// lha'i bu gzhan du mi sems pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa// thub pa
159b7(dkon brtsegs): bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba// khyod kyi dam chos 'di thos nas// gzhan du sems pa ma mchis par// brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub tshil// lha'i bu gzhan du mi 'gro bas gsol pa//
159b8(dkon brtsegs): mi dbang khyod kyi gsung thos nas// theg pa gnyis po spangs bgyis shing // lam gzhan du ni mi mchi bar// bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol// lha'i bu nye ba dgas kyis gsol pa// seng ge'i ngar
160a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di bsgrags pa// rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos gyur nas// byang chub mchog la nyer 'gyur cing // de dag rkang gnyis dam par gyur// lha'i bu spobs pa nye bar gyur pas
160a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// grags chen khyod kyis gsung brjod pa'i// spobs pa de ni thos gyur nas// sangs rlos la khyod kyi sras// kun kyang dga' ba rab tu skyed// lha'i bu spobs pa thob pas gsol
160a3(dkon brtsegs): pa// 'jigs med khyod kyis gsung bsgrags pa// ma smad sras kyis thos gyur nas// de dag spobs pa nam du yang // sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog/ lha'i bu rtag tu rab dgas
160a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// 'jigs med kyis gsung bsgrags pas// stobs chen khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// rtag tu rab tu dga' 'gyur cing // ma smad de dag byang chub tshol// lha'i bu yid zham pa med pa
160a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// khyod kyis gsung bsgrubs thos gyur nas// rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyi sras// dga' zhing zham pa ma mchis par// byang chub mchog ni tshol ba bgyid// lha'i bu thogs med yid
160a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa// khyod kyis gsung bsgrabs thos pas na// sems rangs gyur cing yid dga' ste// de dag yid ni nam du yang // byang chub nyid du thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu chos la bar chad
160a7(dkon brtsegs): med la mkhas pas gsol pa// chos rnams gang la bsten bgyis kyang // dkar po'i phyogs dag mi 'brib cing // de'i bar chad mi 'gyur ba'i// gnas ni thub pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu
160a8(dkon brtsegs): chos nges par bstan pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// dkar po'i phyogs la spod pa la// bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // gnas kyang med par thub pas mkhyen// des na thub pa bsnyed
160b1(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga'// lha'i bu chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas bsol pa// dge la kun nas nyon mongs pa// nag po'i phyogs kyi rang bzhin te// khyod kyi thugs ni nges mi gos// gnas kyang med par
160b2(dkon brtsegs): thub pas mkhyen// lha'i bu rig pa la mkhyes pas gsol pa// nag po'i chos ni nam du yang // dkar po'i ni chos dang mi 'grogs par// rings par bcom ldan khyod kyis gsungs/
160b3(dkon brtsegs): des na bcom ldan bdag gi bla// lha'i bu dge ba dang mi dge ba rig pas gsol pa// chos rnams tha~Md ma 'dres par// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis mkhyen// kun nas nyon mongs brtags
160b4(dkon brtsegs): pas nas// dkar po'i phyogs las 'grib par 'gyur// lha'i bu lam mkhas pas gsol pa// kun nas nyon mongs spyod pa la// dkar ba'i phyogs ni mi 'byung ste// de ltar
160b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal bar ma gyur la// bar chad du ni 'gyur bar gsungs// lha'i bu thar pa 'dod kyis gsol pa// nag po'i phyogaso la ston bgyis na// thar pa 'dod pa meng pa'i// bar du
160b6(dkon brtsegs): gcad pa la 'gyur zhes gsungs// des na rgyal khyod thams cad mkhyen// lha'i bu dag pa'i sems bla sol// sems grol bgyis par 'tshal/ khas// kun nas nyon mongs shes
160b7(dkon brtsegs): bya zhes// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis gsungs// des khyod 'jig rten mchod rten lags// lha'i bu nyon mongaso mthong gis gsol pa// kun nas nyon mongs spyod bgyid cing // kun nas nyon mongs
160b8(dkon brtsegs): ma 'tshal la// das pa'i chos ni shes mi nus// de skad bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// lha'i bu sdig mthong gis gsol pa// sdig pa rnams la bsten byas kyang // dge ba mi 'grib gang sla ba
161a1(dkon brtsegs): @de ni thar chos skal med ces// rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyi gsungs// lha'i bu gdul bar byas gsol pa// chags pa gdul bar gang 'dod dang // zhe sdang gti mug 'dul
161a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas// thub pa'i spobs pa ci 'dra ba// de lta bur ni nan tan bgyi// lha'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa dag pas gsol pa// dag dang kun nas nyon mongs pa// mi mkhas gang rnams mi shes pa/
161a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag ston pa sangs rgyas min// de skad drang srong mchog gis gsungs// lha'i bu thar pa la brtson pas gsol pa// nyon mongs 'grib par 'gyur ba'i chos// rgyal ba yi ni gang bstan pa// de bstan
161a4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs mi zad ces// khyod la rgol ba yong ma mchis// lha'i bu thar pa la mngon par phyogs gsol pa// chos gang nyon mongs gang gi rnams// zad 'gyur thub pas bstan pa la// gang dag
161a5(dkon brtsegs): brtson byas mi zad ces// rgol ba 'din yong mi dmigs// lha'i bu rnal 'byor la brtson pas gsol pa// rgyal ba khyod kyis nyan thos la// gang gi don tu chos bstan pa// de brtson bgyis
161a6(dkon brtsegs): bas mi thob ces// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu mi 'jigs dpal gyis gsol pa// 'dod chags spang phyir mi sdug pa// bstan la yang dag brtson bgyis na// 'dod chags zad
161a7(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur zhes// khyod la rgol ba yong ma mchis// lha'i bu 'gro ba med pa rab tu shes kyis gsol pa// shin tu bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba// zhe sdang spang phyir byams gsungs pa// de bslabs lnga
161a8(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur zhes// dgra bcoms khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu mig rnam par dag gis gsol pa// shes rab gti mug spang ba'i phyir// gsungs pa de la bsten bgyis kyang // gti
161b1(dkon brtsegs): mug sel bar mi 'gyur zhes// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por ni// dbug 'byung rngub pa dran gsungs pa// de la brtson bgyis mi zhi zhes// 'di la
161b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa lhur len pas gsol pa// nga'o snyam pa spang slad du// stong nyid khyod kyis bkang bsngal te// des ni zhi mi 'gyur zhis// 'di na khyad la
161b3(dkon brtsegs): rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal spangs kyis gsol pa// nga snyam nga rgyal spang slad du// mtshan ma med pa khyod kyis gsungs// bsten kyang zhi bar mi 'gyur zhes// 'di na
161b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu sems rgyun rnam par dag pas gsol pa// lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa'i// nyon mongs thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur// des ni nyon/ mongs mi zad ces/
161b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni khyod la rgol mchis// lha'i bu 'du shes rnam par bshig gis gsol pa// phyogs dang gnyen po'i rnam pa dang // nyon mongs lam dang lam 'jug la// 'jigs par med par rgol
161b6(dkon brtsegs): ba ni// thub pa chen po ma mthong ngo // lha'i bu tha snyad du shes pas gsol pa// bcom ldan chos dang pogs min dang // zad dang ma zad tha snyad du tsam// 'dzags pa ma mchis rgol bgyid
161b7(dkon brtsegs): pa// thub pa de ni ming tsam mo// lha'i bu lus kyi las dul bas gol pa// mkhyen pas yongasu ma khyen gyur nas// khyod kyi sku'i 'phrin las 'jug/ thams cad ma lus mkhyen pa
161b8(dkon brtsegs): na// de na 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen// lha'i bu lus kyi las yongs su shes pas gsol pa// sems cad rnams la thugs brtse bas// dpa' khyod ska'i phrin las ni// mtha' dag
162a1(dkon brtsegs): @#shin tu nges pa lags// 'jig rten mchod ma la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyi las shin tu nges pas gsol pa// sku'i phrin las rab nges par// lus can
162a2(dkon brtsegs): kun la sman slad du// 'jig rten sgron ma khyod mdzad de// des khyod ni gang zag mchog/ lha'i bu lus kyi las kyi mtha' shin tu mthong bas gsol pa// sems can kun la sman slad du/
162a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni// sku'i phrin las dag pa dang // legs par yongs su brtags dang ldan// lha'i bu lus kyi las kyi mtha' shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas gsol// shin tu
162a4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par bzhag sku dang // sku'i phrin las rnam dag dang // ldan par sems can bde don te// gang zag mchog ni skrod pa mdzad// lha'i bu tshig grub kyis gsol pa// snyan cing yon tan ldan
162a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang // rtsub pa yongs su spangs pa'i dasung // mkhyen pas shin tu yongs brtags shing // mgon po ma khyod ni gsung po mdzad// lha'i bu dus su smra bas gsol pa// dus su don dang ldan pa dang /
162a6(dkon brtsegs): don med yongs su spangs pa'i gsung // gzung bar 'os dang glang po dang // 'dren pa khyod ni gsungs pa mdzad// lha'i bu sngams byed bla gas kyis gsol pa// dben du 'gyur ba yongs spa
162a7(dkon brtsegs): te// 'dum par 'gyur dang yid 'ong ba// dben byed 'bras bu rnam par smin// sngon chad khyod kyis gsung du brjod// lha'i bu mi slu bas gsol pa// srog gi don tu'ang khyod kyis ni// srid
162a8(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams su rdzun ma gsungs// de bas khyod grags pa kun// 'jig rten dag ni thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu yang dag par smra bas gsol pa// 'di ltar ngas 'gro ba thams cad kyang /
162b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos rnams btsal slad du// thub pa'i gsung la sdong ba ni// yang dag gsungs pa'i rgyu mthun lags// lha'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' las blar byung gis gsol pa// mi mchog
162b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bden pa yis// rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di bsgrubs te// chos kyi yang dag rang bzhin yang // rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu yang dag la rtul bas gsol pa//
162b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas dag ni chos kyi rnams// yang dag pa ji bzhin blta ba dang // chos rnam yang dag mtshan nyid kyang // mi'i dbang pos rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu las la rtogs pas gsol pa/
162b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes yongs su dag pa yis// bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag gi// tshig gi las kyang rab tu mkhyed// des na rgyal ba mnyam ma mchis// lha'i bu yid la rtog pas gsol pa// mi'i dbang po'i
162b5(dkon brtsegs): thugs kyi las// ji snyed gang dag 'jug pa ni// de dag 'gro la thugs rjes 'jug/ 'gro ba na khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu yid kyi rnam par rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// 'gro la thug
162b6(dkon brtsegs): rje bskyed nas ni// gang la khyod ni spod mdzad pa// de la thugs ni dul bar 'byung // 'gro phan khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu thabs la mkhas pas gsol ba// 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnam dpyid/
162b7(dkon brtsegs): nas// rnam 'dren thub kyi phrin las 'jug/ thub pa ye shes sna tshogs ni// mkhyen bzhin kun tu rab tu 'jug/ lha'i bu yid rnam par bshig gis gsol pa// sangs rgyas dang yi
162b8(dkon brtsegs): las// sems can thugs rjes gzigs pas 'byung // sangs rgyas nyid la ye shes thabs// rang bzhin med par rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu 'dul ba la mkhas pas gsol pa// sprin dang tshul
163a1(dkon brtsegs): khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan+da dag la yang // gang gis gang la sngon spad pa// sngon gyi dus kyang rab tu mkhyen// lnga'i bu 'dras pa la rtog
163a2(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa// byang chub mchog ni chol mdzad cing // gang drang khyod kyis sbed pa// sngon gyis spod pa yongs brtags nas// sangs rgyas bye ba rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun
163a3(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pas gsol pa// skal pa bye ba grangs med du// gang du khyod kyis sprad pa// sngon gyi tshul ni dgongs mdzad kyang // khyod kyi thugs yid thogs mi mnga'// lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la yod
163a4(dkon brtsegs): su rtog pas gsol pa// sangs rgyas mang las byung ba'i// ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrub bye ba// sangs rgyas bye ba grangs med la// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis zhus// lha'i bu sngon gyi sbyor
163a5(dkon brtsegs): ba las nges par byang gis gsol pa// sngon gyi sangs rgyas drang dag tu// grangs med dpag tu med pa yi// ting 'dzin sgo dag 'dren pa yis// zhes shing bsgom pa mdzad par gyur// lha'i
163a6(dkon brtsegs): bu sngon gyi gnas la rtog pas gsol pa// 'khor ba'i nyes pa rab mang dang // bkur sti rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ gzigs nas sems can rnams la ston// sems can long ba rnams
163a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'grel/ lha'i bu sngon gyi dus na 'phrul bas gsol pa// gzhan dang gzhan dag zos shing 'tshal// rtse zhing rab tu dga' bar bgyis// gnod pa mi bzad bgyis pa dang // gzhan dang gzhan
163a8(dkon brtsegs): yang khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sngon gyi sprod pas yang dag par byang bas gsol pa// thams cad mkhyen pa 'gro rtogs pa// khyod kyi ye shes 'das dus kyis// las dang bsam gtan
163b1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms 'jug dang // 'gro ba rnams la thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu pi mi'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa// 'dren pa khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni// ma 'ongs dus kyi 'chi 'pho dang // skye dang las
163b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam smin la// thogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis so// lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa// brtan pa 'gro ba mkhas khyod kyi// mkhyen pa bye dus sems can gyi// bsam
163b3(dkon brtsegs): dang las kyi 'bras bu dang // 'gro ba rnams la thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu srid pa las bskyod kyis gsol pa// khams rnams gsum po 'di dag dang // dus gsum kun la mkhas khyod kyi/
163b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mchog ni ma chags te// srid pa'i spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu tha snyad la spyod pas gsol pa// las dang sems can 'gro ba dang // rnam par smin pa myong ba dag/ de dag
163b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ming tsam du// rkang gnyis dam pas bsten pa mdzad// lha'i bu de ltar byang ba la yang dag par rtogs pas gsol pa// dpa' bo khyod kyi mkhyen/ pa ni// da ltar byung ba'i la thob
163b6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis// grangs med sangs rgyas zhing rnams ni// 'jig rten mgon po rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la rnam par dpyod pas gsol pa// mi'i dbang pos rnam dpyad nas/
163b7(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i blo gros rmongs bgyid pa// dus gsus dngos po ma mchis par// nges par mnyam pa nyid du gzigs// lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros gyis gsol pa// dus gsum
163b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma mchis shing // ngo bo nyid la mi gnas shing // dngos po thams cad dngos med pa// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu dus gsum mngon par skal bas/
164a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba// 'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs dang // da ltar byung ba'i phung po rnams// ngo ma mchis dngos po ma mchis par// skyes bu dam pa bstan mdzad// lha'i bu chags
164a2(dkon brtsegs): med yid kyis gsol pa// dus gsum sems cad thams cad la// snying po mchis par ma bstan te// sgyu ma'i smig rgyu mig yor dang // brag ca lta bur khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu dus gsu
164a3(dkon brtsegs): dpogs kyis gsol ba// 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni// dus gsum po dag kun tu yang // su ma lta bur mkhyen pas na// khyod kyi dbang po chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu mos pa yongs su
164a4(dkon brtsegs): rig par byed kyis gsol pa// gang gi nub mo dpa' khyod kyis// byang chub mngon tu bgyis gyur pa// de dus tshul can mos pa la// bri bar gyur pa yong mi gda'// lha'i bu mos pa yang dag
164a5(dkon brtsegs): thob kyis gsol pa// 'jig rten sgron mo'i mos pa ni// bar du rgyun chad mi 'gyur te// rtag par khyod kyi mos pa des// khyod kyi sras rnams mos pa che// lha'i bu mos pas mngon 'phags kyi
164a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// cha ba las pad ma ji bzhin du// khyod ni mos pas mngon du 'phags// 'jig rten dag gis mi gos te// pad mar chab kyis ji bzhin no// lha'i bu mos pas yongs su grol bas
164a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// 'jig rten mgon dang mos pa ni// chos kyi dbyings shes brjod pa ste// gnyis me gnyis su bgyid ma mchis// sred pa med pa khyod kyis/ gzigs// lha'i bu brtson 'grus
164a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag thob kyis gsol pa// gzi brjid chen po brtson 'grus kyis// byang chub yang dag brnyes pas gyur// mdzad pa mdzad kyang mgon po khyod// brtson 'grus btang ba yong ma mdzad// lha'i
164b1(dkon brtsegs): bu dran pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa// dpa' bo chen po'i dgongs pa ni// thams cad kun tu rjes su 'jug/ mdzad pa kyi mdzad kyang mgon po khyod// dgongs pa bri ba yongs mchis//
164b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sems mnyam par bzhag pas gsol pa// mgon po rtag tu mnyam bzhag ste// sems can rnams kyi spyod pa mkhyen// 'dren pa sprod pa'i dbang gis ni// sems can rnams la
164b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyang ston// lha'i bu shes rab lhur len gyis gsol pa// 'jig rten sgron med gyur khyod kyi// ye shes rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma ni// bskal pa bye bar brjod bgyis kyang // sangs rgyas rnams
