267b8(dkon brtsegs): yod pa ma yin pa 'di la nan gyis chos su 'du shes bskyed par mi bya ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pas/ nan gyis mngon par 'du byed pa ni/ zhe sdang dang mkhon du 'dzin
267b9(dkon brtsegs): pa dag yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi ngo bo la gnas pa la ni zhe sdang dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa yod kyi chos/ rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid mthar stong pa nyid
268a1(dkon brtsegs): la gnas par bya ba'i chos kyi ngo bo gzod ma nyid nas med pas so snyam bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar chos rnams yid la byas par
268a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur// de'i sems rab tu dben par 'gyur bas/ zhe sdang dang mkhon du 'dzin pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de 'gro 'am 'greng ngam 'dug gam/
268a3(dkon brtsegs): nyal lam/ gnyid log gam/ sad pa'i tshe yang rung ste/ 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas spos dri zhim pa 'am/ spos kyi phye ma 'am/ byag spos sam/ me tog mchog dam pa dag
268a4(dkon brtsegs): lus la gtor ram/ yang na spos dang / me tog mchog dam pa dang / se mo de dang / me tog tsam pa ka'i 'breng ba dang / ba shi ka'i 'phreng ba dang / me tog mang po'i 'phreng
268a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dag lus la g.yogs par gyur tam/ yang na gos mchog dam pa shin tu 'phra zhing 'jam pa 'di lta ste/ ka shi ka 'am/ ku sha ba 'am/ ku ma'i b+ha 'am/ ko sha ya 'am/
268a6(dkon brtsegs): chu ma 'am ka ba 'am/ 'di dag las stsogs pa gos 'phra zhing 'jam pa dag gis bdag gi lus g.yogs par gyur tam/ yang na dar gyi lnga ldi'i mchog dam pa dang / gdug
268a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bdag nyid kyi steng du bres par gyur tam// yang na lha'i me tog dang / spros dang / gos mchog dam pa dang / rin po che'i 'phreng ba dag
268a8(dkon brtsegs): gis lus g.yogs par gyur tam/ yang na lha'i kha zas mchog dam pa bdud rtsi ro mchog dang ldan pa dag khyer de 'ongs nas byin par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' mchod
268b1(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogs 'di dag la srid pa'i sems bskyed nas mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// rkyen des gang zag de dag la brten nas yid dang mthun par bya ste/ phan tshun 'dul zhing
268b2(dkon brtsegs): gtam smra bar yang mi bya'o// phyogs gcig po'i sems kyis rjes su chags par mi bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sems snyoms par bya zhing chos thams cad kyi mnyam
268b3(dkon brtsegs): ba nyid rab tu rtogs par byas nas/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can rnams la khong khro bar yang mi bya/ rjes su chags par yang mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams sdang gi dngos
268b4(dkon brtsegs): po gnyi ga yang nyon mongs pa yin pas so// deng bdag gis de dag la srid pa mi bskyed par chos rnams kyis yang dag pa nyid du legs par rtogs par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
268b5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa thams kyi nang na sred pa'i rkyen kyis phrad par gyur pa 'di mchog tu lci bas so// ji ltar nyon mongs pa de ni rus pa dang rkang las kyang thal te 'gro bas kun tu sbyor ba
268b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa'i chos kyi nang na sred pa'i sems kyi sa ni shin tu mngon par zhen par byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags par bya ba'i dngos po gal te yid bzhin tho par ma gyur na//
268b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang skye bar gyur pas so// skye ba rnams ni rang gi lus la 'dod chags kyis bred par byed pas/ gal te 'ga' zhig gis gnod pa byas par gyur na/ zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur
268b8(dkon brtsegs): bas/ de'i phyir zhe sdang ni sred pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yin la mngon par zhen pa ni gti mug gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yin par bya'o// deng bdag ni sred pas gos
269a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems spangs nas chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa med par bya'o// bdag ni 'dod chags kyi phyir slob pa ma yin/ zhe sdang gi phyir slob pa
269a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ gti mug gi phyir slob pa ma yin gyi/ bdag ni chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid rgya cher slob pa yin pas chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bltas
269a3(dkon brtsegs): nas// ji skad bstan pa bzhin du yang dag pa nyid du spyad nas las dang rnam par smin pa'i rgyu rkyen las brten te/ mchod pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi dngos po rnams kyang
269a4(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi las kyi spod pa'i rkyen las gyur pa yin par rig par byas nas/ de'i phyir rjes su mthun par gyur pa'i chos rnams la yang dga' zhing sred pa mi bskyed/ dge ba'i
269a5(dkon brtsegs): chos dang 'gal ba la yang zhe sdang mi bskyed par/ sems yongs su spangs te/ mnar sems med par byas nas/ 'dod chags kyi rjes su 'brang bar yong mi bya//
269a6(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gi rjes su 'brang bar mi bya/ gti mug gi sdig pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar yang mi bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// gang po byang chub sems dpa'
269a7(dkon brtsegs): gang chos dang po 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab
269a8(dkon brtsegs): tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga ni rtags tu shes rab bsngags/ tshul khrims bsrung ba'ang bsngags pa yin/ bzod pa/
269b1(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pa bsngags byed cing / mang du thos pa yang bsngags pa yin/ da ni dge ba'i chos spyod dang / byang chub tshig snyan sgra yang bsngags/ sems can la ni/
269b2(dkon brtsegs): phan gdags phyir/ yon tan mang po ci rigs bsngags// da ni rtag tu 'dod lnga dang / khong khro kho na 'dzin gti mug can// phra dog nga rgyal g.yo sgyu dang // 'khrug
269b3(dkon brtsegs): long sems can gnod byed smod// le lo dang ni snyom las dang // bka' blo me bde smra rka ba/ bya dka' mi bzo lam log can// nyes pa chung la cher khro dang // rnyed pa la ni
269b4(dkon brtsegs): gdu ba dang // bdag ni rnyed par rab dga' zhing // gzhan gyi rnyed la mi dga' ba/ 'di dag la ni nga mi bsngags/ blo chung rnyed pa bdag 'dod cing // gzhan gyi rnyed la phrag
269b5(dkon brtsegs): dog che/ gzhan gyi khyim la ser sna byed// 'di dag la ni nga mi bsngags/ rnyed pa dag ni tshol ba'i phyir// spyod lam dag ni 'chos byed pa/ 'di'i 'tsho ba dag min pas// nga'i
269b6(dkon brtsegs): chos las shin tu ring // las kyi sgom pa bdag la ni// nyes pa 'di dag thams cad yod/ 'di ni ngan 'gre'i rkyen yin pas// dngos po 'ga' yang bsngags su med/ sdig
269b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag lta ma spangs na/ 'dod sred sems ni rab tu mang // 'dod sred sems ni mang ba'i phyir/ rnyed pa dag la gdu bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du/
269b8(dkon brtsegs): bzod bsgoms sems can pan btags shing // khengs pa'i sems can rab btul nas/ myur du 'tshang rgya bya bar sems/ gdag gis byams sems rab bsgoms te/
270a1(dkon brtsegs): bzod pas sems can brtse bar bya// chos rnams stong zhing rkyen las byung // 'brel pa med par shes par bya// rkyen gang gis ni chos rnams/
270a2(dkon brtsegs): yod// chos de sems las byung ba yin// mi bde 'du shes khong khro bskyed// mkhas pas thams cad stong pa yin/ mi bde 'du shes khams sum skyed// lus kyi rgyun ni chad
270a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur// mi bden 'du shes mi rtog na// nyes dmigs 'di dag mi 'gyur// rtag tu chos rnams sems pas na// rkyen las byung bar rab tu shes// rtag tu chos rnams stong lta
270a4(dkon brtsegs): bas// thams cad yongs su zlog par nus// khrims spangs sems can sdug bsngal ba// nga rgyal dag gis smras pa la// sdug bsngal nyer zhi chos ston pas// phan pa mang po rab tu
270a5(dkon brtsegs): byed// gang zhig shar nub lho byang dang // phyogs mtshams bzhi po dag nas ni/ mi gtsang dug gi bum thogs nas// mgo'i steng du blug gyur kyang // sus byin sus ni len byed ces// bdag
270a6(dkon brtsegs): gi khong khro yong mi bskyed// chos gang zhig ni bdag yin ces// btag na brtson 'grus rtsom par byed// nyes pa ci yod gnod byas zhes// ngan sems gzhan la lha mi byed// shin
270a7(dkon brtsegs): tu brtan pa'i bzod bskyed nas// byams sems de la phan 'dogs byed/ sngon gyi las las gyur shes pas// rnam smin 'di mong snyam du sems// dang du blangs ste mi byed pas// byang chub
270a8(dkon brtsegs): lam la gnas par byed// smod dang sdug bsngal dngos po 'di/ gzhan gyis byas pa ma yin gyi/ 'di ni nges par las kyi rkyen// yun rings lon yang chud mi za'// sems can 'jig
270b1(dkon brtsegs): rten gnas pa dag/ rtag tu dge sdig las slongs pas/ deng bdag sdug bsngal 'di myong yang // las rkyen yin par rab tu shes// gal te ngan pas las byas nas/ phyis kyang
270b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'di myong 'gyur/ phyis kyang sdug ci phyir dngos po ngan pa yin/ de dag la ni gnod bya snyam/ bla med pa'i chos gnyer nas/ gzhan dag la ni ston byed pas// sems
270b3(dkon brtsegs): can sdug bsngal ji snyed pa// thams cad las ni thar bar byed// gal te 'ga' zhig me tog spos// phreng ba dag gis badrag mchod kyang // rjes su chags par mi skyed par// mnyam
270b4(dkon brtsegs): par bsgom pa bsgrub bya snyam// byams sdang dag ni las smin pas// rtag tu btang snyoms spyod par byed/ sus byin su ni len byed ces/ chos rnams yang dag rtogs par byed// stong
270b5(dkon brtsegs): pa byin cing stong len na/ phyi nang gnyi ga stong pas na/ stong la byin dang len med pas// thams cad kun la bdag med do// stong la 'dod chags bral ba med// stong la kun nas nyon mong
270b6(dkon brtsegs): med// rnams par byang ba med pas na// dri bral rnam dag stong pa yin// stong la rnam par rtog pa med// stong la ngo bo nyid rnams med// stong ni rtag stong mtshan med// de ni rnam
270b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag lam yin no// gal te 'ga' zhig 'ongs gyur na// lus ni dum bu ra bcad gyur kyang // lus kyi rkyen las byung rig pas// de las zhe sdang yong mi bskyed// sems can dge
270b8(dkon brtsegs): sdig slong ba na// las bzhin rang nyid 'bras bu len// bdag kyang nges par snga ma'i sdig/ sdug bsngal rnam smin 'di mong snyam// sdig pa'i rnam smin 'di myong yang / lus
271a1(dkon brtsegs): brtags gzugs brnyan nu bur dang // sgyu ma sprul pa smyig rgyu 'dra// stong zhing med par mtha' yas stong // kha cig lus kyi yan lag gcod// kha cig
271a2(dkon brtsegs): drin ni dran 'gyur nas/ mchod pa dag ni byas gyur kyang // dga' dang mi dga' yod mi byed// rnyed pa thob kyang dga' ba med// kha ngan byas kyang kho mi khro// 'di gnyis sgrib pa
271a3(dkon brtsegs): yin pas nas// sangs rgyas yang dag lam men sems/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sems// de dag thams can spong bar byed// rtag tu stong dben sgom pas na// sgrib pa rnam
271a4(dkon brtsegs): ni spong bar byed/ bzod pa stobs bcu'i gzhi yin te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gnas// thogs med ye shes snying rje'i/ rtsa ba dag ni bzod pa yin// bden pa'i dran dang
271a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag spong / dbang stobs byang chub lam yan lag/ thams cad bzod pas gzhi byed pas// mkhas pa gang zhig bzod mi sgom// ngas kyang ba ra na ser ni// bla med 'khor
271a6(dkon brtsegs): lo bskor ba yang / bzod pa dag gis gzhi byas pas// sangs rgyas rtag tu bzod pa bsngags/ khyed kyang stong bzod bla med gzhi// yongs sa su sgom par byed pa ni// chos
271a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos nyid de yin pas/ sangs rgyas yon tan thos par 'gyur/ gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni// 'dod pa lnga po dag spangs nas/
271a8(dkon brtsegs): rtag par rab tu byung bar mos pas// sems kyis rab tu byung ba'i rjes su 'brang bar byed/ rab tu byung ba la gzhol bar byed pas/ 'dod pa lnga po dag la mngon par zhen par mi/
271b1(dkon brtsegs): byed do// rab tu byung nas kyang 'du 'dzi rnams spangs nas/ shin tu thag ring ba'i ri dang / nags tshal dben pa dag du gnas shing / dge ba'i chos chud mi za bar byed de/
271b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gnyis po 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon tan phun sum 'tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
271b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// rab tu byung ba rtag mos pas/ rtag tu rab tu byung bar 'gyur// ri dang nags tshal gnas mos pas/ yon tan 'byung gnas
271b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar byed// dben par gnas la sten byed pas// 'dod lnga'i chags pa yongs su spong / de na 'du 'dzi med pas na// dge chos rkyen ni nyams mi 'gyur// phan tshun
271b5(dkon brtsegs): 'drul zhing gtam 'dri ba// tshig gis sla ba med pas na// stong dben nyer zhi bde ba la// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu bsngags// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams//
271b6(dkon brtsegs): rtag par yongs su bsten bya zhing // grong khyer la ni chags mi bya// bsten na rnyed sems skye bar 'gyur// rnyed pa thob nas rab tu dga'// stong par gyur na mya ngan skye// de yis
271b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mchod byas kyang // mchod pa byas zhes mi brjod do// 'di 'dra'i nyes dmigs spong 'dod na/ rnyed pa rnams ni spang bar bya// spangs nas gnas dben rab gnas nas/
271b8(dkon brtsegs): stong pa'i chos ni bsgom par bya// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni/ rtag par chos gnyer ba yongs su slob par bya'o// yongs su gnyer nas kyang / klog cing kha thon
272a1(dkon brtsegs): 'don nas/ 'di ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan shin tu phra ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ 'dod pa mang ba
272a2(dkon brtsegs): dang chog mi shes pa'i chos yongs su tshol bar mi byed do// 'dod chags nye bar zhi ba yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ 'dod chag par mi byed do// zhe sdang gzhom pa yongs su tshol
272a3(dkon brtsegs): bar byed kyi/ zhe sdang 'phel bar mi byed do// gti mug gcod pa yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ gti mug skyed par mi byed do// khengs pa gzhom pa yongs su tshol bar mi byed kyi/
272a4(dkon brtsegs): khengs pa slong ba yongs su tshol bar mi byed do// nga rgyal gzhom pa yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ nga rgyal 'phel ba yongs su tshol bar mi byed do/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i
272a5(dkon brtsegs): chos spong ba yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i chos 'phel bar byed pa yongs su tshol bar mi byed do// bdag med pa'i chos yongs su tshol bar byed
272a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ bdag dang gang zag dang / sems can dang / srog la gnas pa'i chos su tshol bar mi byed do// rtag par shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su tshol
272a7(dkon brtsegs): bar byed kyi/ shes rab chen po nyams par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar mi byed do// rtag par mtshungs pa med pa'i chos rab tu thob par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su chog
272a8(dkon brtsegs): bar byed kyi/ shes rab rgya chung ngu thos par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar mi byed do// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur pa'i chos rnams yongs su tshol
272b1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed kyi/ yon tan rnams phun sum 'tshogs par mi 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar mi byed do// de ltar chos yongs su btsal nas kyang klog par byed/ kha thon du 'do//
272b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ tshul bzhin du yang dag par yid la byed/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du yang dag par sgrub par byed/ gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu ston par byed kyang / 'jig rten
272b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khe yang yongs su tshol bar mi byed la// tha na legs so zhes bya ba'i bsngags pa brjod pa tsam yang yongs su tshol bar mi byed pas/ sems can mang po chos de la dgod
272b4(dkon brtsegs): par byed de/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon tan phun sum 'tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom
272b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rab byung ni/ tshul khrims spangs pa dag la mos// des na shes rab yongs 'phel nas/ ye shes char ni 'beb
272b6(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ rnam dag chos zab de thos nas/ yang dag dran pas don sems byed// ji skad bston pa bzhin du ni// de bzhin yang dag sgrub par byed// rtag tu rnam dag sems
272b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis ni/ gzhan la rgya cher rab bstan nas/ sems can mang po pan 'dogs kyang / sems la re ba cung zad med/ yon tan rnams ni re sked nas/ bdag nyid chos deng rab
272b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing // gzhan yang de la 'gong byed pas// de phyir sangs rgyas chos 'phel 'gyur/ skal ba tshad med rnams su ni// yon tan mang po ci bstsags pa/ thams cad
273a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon tu gyur nas ni/ byang chub lam du sdud mdzad 'gyur// de phyir sangs rgyas bsngags pa yin// chos zab dag ni yongs bcal nas rtag par
273a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can bstan par bya// yon tan rnams ni de las skye// gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing sbyangs pa'i chos la rab tu
273a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas par gyur na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad phun sum 'tshogs pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa tshad med
273a4(dkon brtsegs): cing mtha' yas pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yang ches bsam gyis mi khyab pa byang ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
273a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba/ kha lo skor ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/
273a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das me ro gan nga zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku tsho'i tshad ni tshe lo drug bcu thub par gyur to// 'dus pa re re la chos
273a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i tshe/ nyan thos bye ba phrag brgya cu dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// gang po de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i
273a8(dkon brtsegs): 'og tu/ dam pa'i chos ni lo lnga brgya'i bar du gnas par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu/ gzhag bdun tshun chad nyan
273b1(dkon brtsegs): thos ji snyed pa phal cher de bzhin gshes pa'i rjes su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// gang po de bzhin gshegs pa de yang nga ji lta ba bzhin du snyigs ma ldan
273b2(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi tshe/ 'jig rten du byung bar gyur te/ nyan thos chen po rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu de'i tshe skye bo rnams phal cher 'di snyam du/ dge slong gi chos rab tu
273b3(dkon brtsegs): bde zhing skyid pa yin na/ bdag cag ci'i phyir so so nas rab tu mi 'byung snyam du bsams nas/ so so nas skra dang kha spu bregs ste chos gos ngur smrig bgos nas khyim nas
273b4(dkon brtsegs): khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // rab tu byung nas kyang dngos po gsum po rtag par khyim du 'gro zhing 'dul bar byed pa dang / rnyed pa la mngon par zhen nas bdag nyid tshol bar
273b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / bdag nyid nyam tshag che ba 'ba' shig tu sbyor zhing / bsod nams dang ye shes dang mi ldan pa 'ba' zhig sprod par gyur pas/ dngos po gsum po 'di 'ba' zhig
273b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod par byed kyi las gzhan ni mngon par mi sgrub par gyur to// lo brgya 'das pa'i 'og tu nyan thos chen po thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das te ma lus par gyur pas/
273b7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong mang po de dag khyim pa rnams dang mthun par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi mdo sde zab mo rnams dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyod lam zhib mo gya
273b8(dkon brtsegs): nom pa'i chos rnams ni phal cher spangs nas/ su yang klog cing 'don pa med par gyur to// gang po de'i tshe dge slong mang po rnams 'dod pa mang po la sprod par mos shing / bza'
274a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang btung ba'i ro la chags par gyur pas/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu dar ma shi ri zhes bya ba rgyal po shin tu byams shing gces par byed pa gcig yod de
274a2(dkon brtsegs): des gnas dben pa gcig tu 'dug nas 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa me rog na 'da' chos ji lta bu zhig brnyes nas/ deng de'i nyan thos rnams bag med par spyod cing khyim pa rnams dang /
274a3(dkon brtsegs): bye brag med par gyur ces/ de snyam du sems shing the tsom du gyur pa dang / de'i tshe lha zhig de'i thad du 'ongs nas lus mi snang bar byas nas/ 'di skad du/ kye rgyal bu de bzhin gshegs
274a4(dkon brtsegs): pa me ro ga na 'da' bsnyes pa'i chos ni shin tu zab cing / yongs su dag pa la rnam par nges pa yin no zhes smras so// de nas rgyal bu des lha de skad smras pa thos pa dang // 'di skad du kye de
274a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'das brnyes pa brnyes pa'i chos shin tu zab cing / yongs su dga' la rnam par gyur pa'i dngos po de ji lta bu zhig yin/ lngas smras pa/ rgyal bu chos de ni
274a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyang med/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnams par shes pa yang med/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyang med/ 'dod pa lnga yang med/ 'dod pa'i sems kyang
274a7(dkon brtsegs): med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'das de lta bu'i chos shin tu zab cing yongs su dag la rnams par nges pa brnyes pas/ sems can rnams la yang dag par rab tu bstan to//
274a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal bus lha de la smras pa// bdag gis de lta bu'i chos thos shing khong du chud par gyur nas// ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub du rung ngam/ lhas smras pa/ kye rgyal bu khyod
274b1(dkon brtsegs): sems rtse gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus byos shig dang / thos par rga ba med do// gang po de'i tshe rgyal bu de 'di snyam du nges par lhas kyang bskul te/ bdag gis khong du chud par byas
274b2(dkon brtsegs): pas/ bdag rab tu byung nas/ chos zab mo de yongs su gnyer bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ pha ma ga la ba der song ste/ mgos gtugs ste phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces
274b3(dkon brtsegs): smras so// yab yum deng bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa mye ro gan 'da' de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas lam yongs su gnyer bar 'tshal lo// pha mas smras pa khyod deng nged spangs
274b4(dkon brtsegs): nas rab tu byung ba de ci dgos// da ltar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba rnams ni/ khyim pa rnams dang / bye brag du gyur pa ci yang med do// de nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de
274b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ da ltar dge slong mang po rnams/ bag med 'dod pa lnga yang sprod/ zhing rmed nyo tshong byed pas na// khyim pa rnams dang bye brag med/ dbul po sdig bsngal rab mang zhing //
274b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid gso bar mi nus so// de 'dra'i skye bo mang po rnams/ lus gso phyir rab tu byung / khyod ni rgyal rigs khyim du skyes/ phyug cing 'dod lnga'i bde ba mang/ nor dang rin ce na
274b7(dkon brtsegs): rab mang dang // rab tu byung bas ci zhig bya/ de nas rgyal bu dam shi ris/ be ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bdag ni dbang phyug mi tshol ste/ gal te thob kyang spong bar bgyid/
274b8(dkon brtsegs): deng bdag sangs rgyas chos zab dang // rnam dag tshul khrims 'ba' shig tshol// lha zhig bdag ni go bgyis ste/ rab tu byang bar bskal bas na/ sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i
275a1(dkon brtsegs): 'i zab mo'i chos/ bdag ni rab tu rtogs par 'tshal/ lhas smras bdag gis thos pas na/ sems ni rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas
275a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa nab tu nye/ bdag ni grogs bgyi bsrung bar sems// de nas pha mas tshigs su bcad de dam shi ri la smras pa// mdo snga zab mo zad nus pas// kha thon 'don pa yod
275a3(dkon brtsegs): med na// de ring khyod kyis su la ni/ sangs rgyas chos zab thos par 'gyur/ gal te 'khor ni bzhi po las/ don zab 'don pa yod gyur na/ de la khyod kyis sngar mnyan nas/ de 'og
275a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung bar rigs/ da ma shi ris tshigs su bcad de pha ma la smras pa/ deng bdag nan tan brtson 'grus gyis/ tshul khrims bsrung zhing sbyangs pa spyod/ thog ring ri dang nags
275a5(dkon brtsegs): tshal gnas// sangs rgyas chos zab rnam dgra tshol// gang po da ma shi ris/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras nas// mgo bos phyag byas te// rab tu byang bar gsol ba gdab ba
275a6(dkon brtsegs): dang // pa ma gnyis kyang cang mi smra bar gnang ngo // de nas dge slong rnams kyi thad du song nas/ skra dang kha spu bregs te chos gos ngur smrig bgos nas rab tu byung ste/ bslab
275a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dngos po rnams yang dag par blangs nas// gus pa'i sems kyis dge slong rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'das rjes su bstan pa ci lta bu zhig gis/ slob ma
275a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams la rjes su bstan pa mdzad/ bdag gis thos par gyur na/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub par 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang / gang po dge slong mang po rnams kyis/ dge
275b1(dkon brtsegs): spong ngam shi ri la/ 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las chos zos pa ni med kyi/ mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams kyi rjes su spyod par zad
275b2(dkon brtsegs): pas/ deng khyod kyang 'di lta bu'i chos la spyod cig de nas dge slong nga ma shi ris/ dge slong mang po rnams la smras pa/ khyod ni gdon mi za bar dbul po smad rims las rab tu
275b3(dkon brtsegs): byung ba yin pas de'i phyir/ khyod gos zas 'ba' zhig lhur len pa spyod pa rnams/ khyim bdag dang bye brag du gyur pa ci yang med pas/ deng khyod bdag dang lhan cig tu sangs
275b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos zab mo yongs su dag bya bar bya'o// de nas de'i tshe dge slong mang po rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de/ dge slong nga ma shi re la smras pa/ bdag cag gis ni gang bsgrub
275b5(dkon brtsegs): pa// dngos po de ni thob gyur pas/ gos zas dag ni 'byor cing ldan/ rgyal pos bkol ba las kyang thar/ shin tu bde zhing rab tu skyid/ brnyas shing nga rgyal byed pa med/
275b6(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa/ de dag da ltar gang yang med/ 'di ni mya ngan 'das yin pas/ mchog tu bde bar gyur pa yin/ dngos po 'di las lhag pa ni/ bdag
275b7(dkon brtsegs): cag la ni dgos pa med/ khyim pas rtag tu sngor dbul bas/ bdag cag chos gos lhung zad mang / sman dang nor rdzas shin tu mang // sbyin bdag khyim yang rab tu mang // ga
275b8(dkon brtsegs): pe de'i tshe dge slong mang po rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de de skad smras pa thos pa dang / sems la rab tu gdung ba skyes nas/ mchi ma blags te dus nas/ gtsug lag khang gzhan
276a1(dkon brtsegs): dag tu song ste/ yang dngos po des/ dge slong mang po rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'das rjes su bstan pa ci lta bu zhig gis/ slob ma
276a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la rjes su bstan pa mdzad/ bdag gis thos par gyur na/ ci skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub par 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang / dge slong mang po rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du lan btab
276a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// de nas dge slong nga ma shi ris/ dge slong mang po dag spangs nas/ gcig pu ri dang nags tshal dben pa'i gnas su song nas/ sems rtse gcig tu chos zab mo gnyer
276a4(dkon brtsegs): ba la 'dun par gyur pa dang / de'i tshe sngon de bzhin gshegs pa me ro ga na 'das nyan thos rnams kyi nang na/ nyan thos chen po shin tu brtan pa zhes rab tu brtan pa zhes rab tu dben pa'i
276a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa/ gcig pu gcig pu dben par gnas pa/ 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa/ yongs su spong ba la sems mngon par spro ba bya ba byas pa/ mngon par
276a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa drug dang / rig pa gsum dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom pa chen po zhig byung bar gyur te/ ji ltar da ltar nga'i bstan pa las 'od srung chen po ji lta ba bzhin no// de'i tshe dge slong
276a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu brtan pa nges bdag nyid gnas pa'i ri bug gis brag ngos la/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag yi ger bris par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i ro ni myong ba'i phyir/ 'khor ba dag/
276a8(dkon brtsegs): ni rgyun mi gcod/ dgra ni gsos nas dur khrod 'jug/ don med sdug bsngal mang po myong // lus 'di mi gtsang ro dang 'dra// bu gu nas ni mi gtsang 'dzag/ srin bu mi gtsang mos
276b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin/ blun pos lus sred de dang 'dra// yang dag ma yin kun rtog pa// de ni 'dod lnga'i rtsa ba yin// mkhas pa dag ni mi rtog pas// 'dod lnga dag ni 'gags par 'gyur/
276b2(dkon brtsegs): log rtog las ni 'dod chen skye// 'dod chen las ni nyon mongs skye// yang dag dran la zhen med pas// nyon mongs lhag ma zad par 'gyur//
276b3(dkon brtsegs): bam po bzhi pa'o// // gang po dge slong shin tu brtan pas/ ri bug gi brag gi ngos la// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag yi ger bris pa
276b4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong ngam shris ri phug dben par song bas/ yun ring zhig lon nas/ ri phug gi brag ngos la tshigs su bcad pa bzhi po 'di dag/ yi ger bris pa mthong nas// kha don tu blangs
276b5(dkon brtsegs): ste de'i don gang yin pa yid la byas pa dang / ring po ma lon par mngon par shes pa lnga po thob par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da' sngon zhugs la bzhen pa'i gan
276b6(dkon brtsegs): skabs su phyin nas/ sadakyil mo grangs bcas skye 'dug nas/ 'di skad ces bdag gis gnas 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa yang ma mthong / chos gzhan yang ma thos kyi bar du
276b7(dkon brtsegs): mi ldang ngo zhes yi dam bcas so// gang po de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'das gsungs pa'i mdo sde stong phrag brgya pa zhes bya ba brgya byin lha'i dbang pos mdo sde kha don tu shes
276b8(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin sgra'i dbang gis/ dge slong dam shi ri'i lhag pa'i bsam pa sems kyis rtogs nas/ sum cu rtse gsum pa'i gnas nas babs ste/ de'i drung du phyin nas// de la mdo sde'i ni
276b9(dkon brtsegs): phyag byas te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
277a1(dkon brtsegs): du/ stong phrag brgya pa de yang dag par bshad do// gzhan yang mang du thos pa'i dongs kyi tshig bzhi dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshig bdun dang /
277a2(dkon brtsegs): sgo'i tshig bcu bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang byin no// dge slong dam shi ris zos nas kyang / kha don du 'don te/ yongs su gzung bas/ chos rnams la shes rab kyi
277a3(dkon brtsegs): snang ba thob par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'das bsung pa'i mdo sde yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa/ bral ba'i rjes su mthun pa/
277a4(dkon brtsegs): zab mo shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams kyang rang gi rang gis sems pa snang bar gyur to// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'das/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor
277a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa dang / zhugs pa'i gnas dri gtsang khang dang / gdan khri dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
277a6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi yin pa dang / bcas pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// dge slong da ma shi ris yang chos
277a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la/ shes rab kyi snang ba thob par gyur pa/ 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas mthar gyis/ rang gi yul du song ste/ pha ma'i drung du byin nas pa ma la yongs su dag
277a8(dkon brtsegs): cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'thun pa/ zab mo shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams yang dag par bshad nas/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa rab
277b1(dkon brtsegs): tu brjod pas/ gang po de'i tshe dge slong ma shi ris pha ma dang / nang gi btsun mo dang / blon po chen po dang / 'khor rnams kyis chos de thos nas shin tu mngon par yid ches par gyur
277b2(dkon brtsegs): pas/ gus pa'i sems kyis dge slong dam shi ri la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa bdag cag yongs su bskyab cing / de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da' de'i
277b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa la rab tu dbyung du gsol zhes gang po de'i tshe srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong rgyal po dang / btsun mo rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su dus gcig tu byung bar gyur to//
277b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung nas thams cad kyi ming da ma shi ri tshogs kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur to// gang po dge slong da ma shi ris de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan
277b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i bstan pa slar rgyas par byas nas// sems can mang po de la yang dag par bkod do// sngon gyi tshe rabs kyi byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems kyis/ dam pa'i chos
277b6(dkon brtsegs): bsrung bar smon lam btab pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe dge slong dam shi ri ljong sgra gcig tu/ grong khyer gcig nas gcig tu/ yul gcig nas gcig tu/ rgyu zhing song nas de bzhin
277b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa me ro gan 'da' dang / de'i nyan thos kyi bsngags pa yang brjod/ gzhan yang yongs su dag cing / stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'thun pa/ bral ba'i rjes su 'thun
277b8(dkon brtsegs): ba/ zab mo shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams kyang sems can rnams la rgya chen yang dag par rab tu bstan pas// de'i tshe dge slong ngam shi ri yang skye bo mang po kun gyis mchod
278a1(dkon brtsegs): cing / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar byas shing / bsngags pa brjod cing snyan pa grags pa dang / kun tu grags par gyur to// gang po dge
278a2(dkon brtsegs): srong da ma shi ris de ltar sems can mang po'i don rgya cher byas nas/ de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / de'i slob ma dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma
278a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams lhan cig tu 'dus te/ spos kyi shing thams cad spangs nas mchod pa byas te bsregs nas/ ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chu zheng rgyang grags gnyis yod pa brtsigs ste/ me tog
278a4(dkon brtsegs): dang spos dang / byug pa dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis gus par mchod cing rim mgro dang / bla mar byas nas bsngag
278a5(dkon brtsegs): pa brjod par gyur to// gang po dge slong ngam shi ris 'chi ka'i dus kyi slar 'dzam bu gling 'di nyid du skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas/ smon lam btab pa bzhin du
278a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal rigs su skes dran pa thob pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lo sum brgya lon pa'i bstan pa las//
278a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ste/ sngon gyi smon lam dang / tshe rabs dran pa'i shes pa'i dbang gis/ sgo rnams kyi tshig ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshig kyang rang gi rang gis slar tho bar gyur to// gzung
278a8(dkon brtsegs): thob pa'i dbang gis sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams sems can la rgya cher yang dag par bstan gyi/ tshe rabs snga ma la sngar bshad par gyur pa dag ni ma bstan to// gang po de'i
278b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe da ma shi ri'i dge slong mang po rnams la gang shes rab zab cing gsal la dge ba'i rtsa ba lhan stag pa gang yin pa de dag ni dran pa thob pas bstan pa'i mdo sde rnams thob par
278b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ sems kyis rjes su yi rang nas/ mngon par yid ches shing dang du len par byed// gus pas mchod pa byas nas/ dge slong dran pa thob pa la yang yongs su bsrung ba byed
278b3(dkon brtsegs): do/ dge slong de dag las gang gzi byin dang yon tan med pa/ dbang po rtul zhing dbang po mi gsal ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba de dag ni/ dge slong dran pa thob pas gsur
278b4(dkon brtsegs): du bshad pa'i chos thos par gyur na/ mngon par yid ches par gyur pa yang med/ 'gal ba dag byas nas skon 'byin cing / 'di skad du ci lta bu'i mdo sde 'di dag ni bdag cag gi
278b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po de slob dpon las kyang ma thos sngon slob dpon chen po da ma shi ri las kyang ma thos zhes zer ro// gang po de dag las gang shes rab zab cing yang dag pa'i don la rton
278b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ni tshig gi rjes su mi 'brang bar dran la bston pa'i phyir/ sems kyi kyang 'gal bar mi byed do// 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'di'i
278b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan yang yang dag par bsrung bar byed par gus pas dge slong dran pa thob pa la yang bsrung bar byed do// gang po de'i tshe dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang
278b8(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen mi'i 'khor khrag khrag brgya cu dge slong dran pa thob pas bstan pa'i mdo sde'i chos kyi rjes su zhugs par gyur to// gang po de'i tshe da ma shi ri'i slob ma 'khor rnams
279a1(dkon brtsegs): log shig tu ste/ gnyis su gyes par gyur te/ gcig gi ming ni dge slong dam shi ri dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur to// gcig gi ming ni
279a2(dkon brtsegs): dran pa thob pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur kyang // de'i tshe dge slong dran pa thob pas bdag ni nga ma shi ri yin no zhes ma smras so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe dge slong
279a3(dkon brtsegs): da ma shi ri ni/ mang po kun gyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no// zhes zer bas gal te bdag nyid kyis smras par gyur na/ mang po
279a4(dkon brtsegs): kun the tsom za bar gyur pa dang / dge slong dran pa thob pa ni/ de'i tshe mang po kun gyis 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yin gyi/ dgra bcom pa ma yin no zhes zer bas so// gang po dge
279a5(dkon brtsegs): slong dran pa thob pas de ltar rgya cher sems can rnams la phan btags nas/ de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa dang / de'i slob ma mang po rnams kyis spos kyi shing thams cad
279a6(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas/ mchod pa byas ste bsregs so// 'khor bzhi po rnams 'dus nas ston pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ ring bsrel gyi mchod rten/
279a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing du rgyang grags gcig yod pa brtsigs nas/ spos dang / me tog dang / spos kyi bye ma dang / byug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang // gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna chog
279a8(dkon brtsegs): mchod cing bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// gang po dge slong dran pa thob pa 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe/ bdag slar 'dzam bu gling 'di nyid du skye bar gyur
279b1(dkon brtsegs): cig ces smon lam btab pas/ smon lam btab pa bzhin du/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur skyes par gyur te// de'i ming ni ya sha zhes bya bar gyur te/ sngon gyi smon
279b2(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi dbang gis/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa thob par gyur pas// de bzhin gshegs pa me ro ga na 'da' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ lo brgya pa'i bstan pa
279b3(dkon brtsegs): las lo bdun lon te rab tu byang nas/ gzungs rnams thob par gyur to// gzungs thob pa'i mthus skye bo mang po la/ sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams yang dag par bstan to//
279b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe dge slong dran pa thob pa'i dge slong rnams dang / da ma shi ri'i dge slong rnams la gang dge ba'i rtsa ba lhan stag pa de dag gi ye shes bstan pa'i chos rnams thos nas/ sems rab
279b5(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' zhing thams cad kyis chos kyi bde ba thob par gyur to// gang po dge slong mang po de dag yang dag po'i don la bsten cing / tshig gi rjes su 'brang bar cang mi byed pas/
279b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir dge slong ya shas sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun zhing shin tu zab pa/ don dam pa'i rjes su mthun pa dag yang dag par bstan pa thos par gyur na/
279b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par yid ches shing dang du len par byed// 'gal ba med par yang dag par len cing kha don 'don par byed/ ci skad bstan pa bzhin du rjes su bsgrub par gyur to// gang po/
279b8(dkon brtsegs): dge slong de dag las gang dbang po rtul zhing mi gsal ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun mi sdug pa de dag ni dge slong ya sha las sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde don dam pa'i rjes su 'thun pa/ ston
280a1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyi rjes su 'thun zhing shin tu zab pa dag thob par gyur pa/ mngon par yid ches zhing dang du len par yang mi byed/ 'gal ba byas nas/ 'jig cing
280a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod par byed de/ de skad du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di ni bdag gis mkhan po dang slob dpon las kyang mthos/ sngon ston pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' chen po dran pa thob pa las kyang / ma
280a3(dkon brtsegs): thos so zhes zer ro// gang po de'i tshe dge slong ya sha las cho smra nas rab tu dga' ba dang / sems kyis mngon par yid ches shing dang du blangs pa de dag thams cad ni/ da ma shi ri'i
280a4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong rnams kyis sdang zhing 'phrag dog gis smad nas/ lhag gcig gnas su yang mi ster/ lhan gcig tu klog pa dang / kha thon 'don pa dang / chos bshad du yang mi ster te/
280a5(dkon brtsegs): skur pa btab nas 'di skad du/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma yin// ston pa chen po'i bstan pa yang ma yin no zhes zer ro// gang po de'i dge slong ya shas/ de bzhin gsheg
280a6(dkon brtsegs): baM me ro gan 'da' de'i bstan pa rgya cher yang dag par spel nas grong khyer gcig nas grong khyer gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas/ sems can rnams la chos bstan cing phan pa mang po byas
280a7(dkon brtsegs): pas srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgya cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// dge slong ya shas de ltar phan pa mang po byas nas/ de'i 'og
280a8(dkon brtsegs): tu 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / dge slong ya sha'i rjes su phyogs pa'i skye bo bdun khri yod pa de dag gis dge slong ya sha'i phyir ring bsrel gyi mchod rten/ bdun khri brtsibs nas/ spos
280b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / me tog dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / byug pa dang 'phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang po sna tshogs kyis mchod cing bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas shing
280b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// gang po dge slong ya sha 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe/ slar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu/ smon lam
280b3(dkon brtsegs): btab pa bzhin du yang rgyal rigs su skyes par gyur to// de'i tshe lha mang po rnams kyis/ sgra chen po phyung ste/ 'di skad du kye deng rgyal po la bu btsas pa 'di ni sems can la phan pa
280b4(dkon brtsegs): mang po byed pa yin no zhes bsgrags pas/ sgra de'i rjes su ming yang 'dren pa zhes btags so// de lo bcu bzhi lon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da'/ yongs su mya
280b5(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lo brgya'i bstan pa la rab tu byung bar gyur to// dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de yang / mdo sde dang bstan chos mang po rgya cher kha thon tu 'don pa dang / mang du
280b6(dkon brtsegs): thos shing zab mo la 'jug pa dang / tshig 'bru dang / spos pa yongs su dag pa dang / chos bstan pa'i thabs la rab tu mkhas par gyur to// gang po dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de grong
280b7(dkon brtsegs): rdal gcig nas gcig tu/ grong khyer gcig nas gcig tu/ rgyu zhing song nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'di'i bstan pa rgya cher spel nas phan pa mang po byas so// de'i tshe da ma
280b8(dkon brtsegs): shi re dang / dran pa thob pa dang / ya sha'i dge slong gi tshogs rnams cig tu 'dus nas rab tu 'dren pa'i thad du 'ongs ste/ des bstan pa dag gzhig cing skur pa btab par bsham so//
280b9(dkon brtsegs): yul gcig nas/ gcig
281a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe dge slong rab tu 'dren pas dge slong mang po 'ongs par rigs nas/ 'di skad du kye dge slong mang po khyed dngos po ci zhig gis ni/
281a2(dkon brtsegs): rgol bar sems/ dngos po gang zhig ni 'dri bar sems zhes smras pa dang / dge slong mang po rnams de skad smras pa thos nas mya ngan kyis non cing / mi bde bar gyur pas
281a3(dkon brtsegs): cang mi zer bar gyur te/ dge slong rab tu 'dren pa la bgegs bya bar yang ma nus so// gang po byang chub sems dpa' de ci'i srid du 'jig rten du gnas pa de srid
281a4(dkon brtsegs): du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang rgyas shing rab tu 'phel bar gyur to// de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang nub par gyur to//
281a5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus tha ma dam pa'i chos nub tu nye ba'i phyir/ grong rdal gcig nas gcig tu/ grong khyer gcig nas gcig tu// yul
281a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig nas gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas/ sems can mang po'i chad du yongs su dag cing / stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa'i mdo sde zab mo yang dag par bstan nas/ srog
281a7(dkon brtsegs): chags bye ba phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu thams cad kyang mtho ris
281a8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur to// gang po dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de ltar phan pa byas nas/ de gang gi nub mo 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i phyir/ de nyin par sangs
281b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bstan pa yang nub par gyur to// gang po de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da'i bstan pa nub par gyur pa'i phyir/ mdo sde zab mo yongs sa su dag cing / stong pa nyid
281b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos rnams kyang nub par gyur to// gang po de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni mdo sde zab mo de lta bus sangs rgyas
281b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing bdag nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams kyang phun sum 'tshogs pa byed pa yin no// gang po byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'dren pa de
281b4(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu/ zhing de nyid kyi steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bcu par skyes te/ de'i tshe zhing de'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan ni/ de bzhin gshegs
281b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas legs pa'i spyan zhes bya ste/ de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ tshe rabs snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams kyi
281b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang rkyen kyis shes rab zab cing gsal la/ rno ba dang / spobs pa gtugs pa med cing / myur la thogs pa med par gyur to// dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de/ de bzhin gshes
281b7(dkon brtsegs): ba legs pa'i spyan gyi bstan pa las lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par bsgrubs nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / slar yang de nyid du de bzhin gsheg
281b8(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu 'phel ba'i dpung ba zhes bya ba dang phrad par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa las rab tu byung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par bsgrubs nas/ bla na med
282a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar gyur to// de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu/ slar yang zhing de nyid du skyes nas/ de bzhin
282a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdon mi za ba'i spyod pa dang phrad par gyur te/ sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ lo bdun khri'i bar du
282a3(dkon brtsegs): nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsgrubs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i ming ni shu la zhes bya
282a4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za' ba'i spyod pa des 'di skad du/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i/ dge slong shu la 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
282a5(dkon brtsegs): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/
282a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes lung bstan to// gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gsum po 'di dang ldan par gyur na yon tan phun sum 'tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par gyur to// de nas
282a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' zab mo 'di/ rnam dag nges pa'i
282a8(dkon brtsegs): chos thos nas/ bdag nyid de la gnas byed cing // gzhan dag la yang ston par byed// 'jig rten gting ni mi dbogs kyang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phyir mi 'gyur/
282b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims rnam dag rab gnas nas// rgya cher sems can phan yang 'dogs/ gling gzhi dang ni rtogs pa brjod// sangs rgyas lam zhes 'khor la ston// sangs rgyas
282b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis gsungs pas na/ 'di ni nges pa'i chos yin te// byang chub sems dpa' phan spyod pa// sems can la ni phan yang 'dogs// sangs rgyas chos rnams bsrung
282b3(dkon brtsegs): byed cing // 'khor la byang chub sems dpa' byed/ sems can ngag ni chos bzhin don/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad byed// 'khor la sangs rgyas chos ston pas/
282b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems ni nye bar gyur/ sangs rgyas lam ni bsrung byed cing // sems can rgya chen phan 'dogs pas// lha dang klu dang 'dre srin dang / gang zag chen pos bkur bar
282b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ de phyir rnam par dag pa'i// stong zas gya nom chos thos nas// rtse gcig sems shing gnyer byed na// shes rab dag ni 'phel bar gyur// gzhan yang gang po bang tshab
282b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ spyod pa rnams phun sum tshogs par byed de/ spyod pa rnams phun sum tshogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
282b7(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams phun sum tshogs par byed par 'gyur ra ro// de la spyod pa gang zhe na/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas sbyin pa yongs su
282b8(dkon brtsegs): gtong bar byed// tshul khrims srung bar byed/ bzod pa bsgom par byed// brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/ bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog par byed/ shes rab dang
283a1(dkon brtsegs): thams mkhas pa sgom par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang zhe na// byang chub sems dpa' gang las mdo sde de
283a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bu dang / rjes su ston pa'i thabs mkhas pa thob par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub gnyer bar byed pa'i byang chub sems
283a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thams cad ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bzhi po 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon tan phun sum 'chog
283a4(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad rab tu thob par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal te/ ngas ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyad par bya ba'i chos
283a5(dkon brtsegs): dag ni// sbyin pa btang nas rab dga' zhing // 'gyod pa med pa yin zhes bshad// de la dga' ba gang zhe na/ dpa' bas lus kun khyab pa yin/ rtag tu dga' sems 'di yi
283a6(dkon brtsegs): ni// byang chub lam ni spyad par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sprin btang nas/ byang chub tu ni sde byed cing / sems can rnams la phan 'dogs na/ rab don dpag med thob par
283a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ dge slong ba dag ni mthong 'gyur nas// sangs rgyas 'du shes rab bskyed de/ de ring 'dir ni 'di 'ongs pas// bdag la byang chub lam yang byin/ bdag ni 'di
283a8(dkon brtsegs): dbang gis na// rnam dag zhing ni thob par 'gyur// 'di yis bdag la sangs rgyas bstan/ bdag la sangs rgyas lam ston byed/ deng bdag 'di dang phrad pas na// rnyed
283b1(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po rab rnyed ces// dga' bas lus kun khyab nas ni/ dngos po gzhan la mos mi byed// dga' zhing drung du 'ongs gyur nas// rgyang nas gsong por smra bar byed//
283b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni dngos po ci zhig 'dod/ bdag gis zad par sbyin zhes zer/ gal te dgos pa med zer na/ byang chub sems dpa' rab dga' zhing / 'dis bdag 'dul bar 'dod
283b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ dgos med ces zer bar zad/ 'phags pa 'dis ni gang mongs pa'i// 'dod nyung chog shes chos kyis ni// 'dir 'ongs padag la go byas nas/ byang chub
283b4(dkon brtsegs): rkyen ni thos par byed// deng bdag gang zag 'di yi rgyus// rjes su bstan pa'i chos kyang thob// khyod kyis dgos med gang zer ba/ tshig 'di legs par yin zhes zer/
283b5(dkon brtsegs): dngos po 'di ni 'dod zer zhing // bdag la byin cig zer na yang // byang chub sems dpa' ci bdog pa// dga' bas khyod kyis khyer zhes zer/ gal te sbyin pa btang nas ni//
283b6(dkon brtsegs): phyis kyang 'gyod pa med gyur na/ sangs rgyas lan ni dran pa'i phyir// sems ni rtag tu dga' ba thob// sems can kun la skal yod pas/ thams cad phongs pa med
283b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing // ma lus thams cad tshim byas zhes// sbyin pa gtong tshe bsngo bar byed// byang chub lam ni spyod pa'i tshe// sems can bdag gi ming thos pas/ rang gi rang
283b8(dkon brtsegs): gis chogs shing // ser sna chags sems med par shog/ bad gi yul gyi sems can kun// lam spyod thams cad chog shes shing / 'dod lnga chags pa kun spangs
284a1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ thams cad rab byung mos par shog/ de 'dra'i spyod pa tshad med dang / sbyin pa yongs su bsngos pa yis/ rtag par sbyin pa rab gtong zhing // sems
284a2(dkon brtsegs): can bdag rjes slob par shog/ byang chub sems sems can khyab pas na// 'jig rten dag ni thams cad na/ de 'dra'i bde ba yong med do// dper na khyim bdag phyug po yis/ nor
284a3(dkon brtsegs): dang rin chen shin tu mang // bu ni gcig gcig yod pa las// lo ni mang por lam rings song / khyim bdag bu 'ongs thos gyur nas// dga' bas lus kun khyab gyur cing / yun
284a4(dkon brtsegs): rings lon nas der 'ongs shes/ da gdong bcas bzhin rab tu dga'// byang chub sems dpa' blo mngon na/ de'i sems ni rab tu dga'/ khyim bdag de'i dga' bas ni/ bcu drug char
284a5(dkon brtsegs): yang mi phod do// sbyin pa gtong ba thos 'gyur na// de'i sems ni rab dga' bas// byams sems las 'byung dga' ba yis// dpe zla dag ni yong med do// ji ltar rgyal po nyes
284a6(dkon brtsegs): byang ba// yan lag gtubs shes bsgo bas na/ gsod pas gsad sar khrid nas ni// mtshon gyis gdab pa gzas pa las// rgyal pos longs spyod thabs byin na/ mi de rab tu
284a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bas kyang / byang chub sems dpas 'phongs pa la/ sprin gtong dga' ba tsam mi phod// byang chub sems dpa' lam sgom che// bsod nams zhing ni mi tshol zhing // slong ba yod
284a8(dkon brtsegs): na gtong byed pas// de phyir dga' ba chen po thob// byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang // dgra bcom rang rgyal mthong gyur na// gus sems 'phrad dka' rig pas na//
284b1(dkon brtsegs): de phyir drung 'gro mchod par byed// byang chub sems dpa' gzi byin ldan// gsal rno sems ni dul bas na// yon tan mos shing lam gnyer phyir/ sangs rgyas dge 'dun mchod
284b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / de'i nyan thos ma gtogs pa/ lhag pa'i bsam dang gus sems kyis/ lha klu gzhan ni mchod mi byed// gal te rang rgyal
284b3(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' shig gis/ rang 'byung mya ngan 'das thob pa// de 'dra'i yon tan ldan mthong na// de la yang ni mchod pa byed/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams zhing // dge dang mi dge
284b4(dkon brtsegs): rig pa ni// 'jig rten mkhas pa gang yin pa/ mu stegs sdig can mchod mi byed/ tshul khrims phyogs la rab gnas shing // byams pa sems can kun la khyab/ brtson 'grus
284b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag kyang dpe zla med// bzod shes mang thos rgya yang che// de 'dra'i yon tan ldan pas na/ 'jig rten kun gyi gtsor gyur nas/ sangs rgyas byang chub mngon byas te// bla med 'khor
284b6(dkon brtsegs): lo bskor bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' de 'dra'i/ chos bzhi dag ni sgrub byed na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ci snyed pa/ thams cad kun ni mngon tu gyur// skal pa bye ba grangs med du//
284b7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rnams ni gang bsgrub pa/ de kun byang chub sems dpa'i lam// 'di ni bsdu bar bya ba yin/ de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams// rtog tu byams sems bsgom par bya//
284b8(dkon brtsegs): rang 'byung ri dang tshal gnas shing / dgon pa'i gnas la mos par bya// dag par shin tu rnam dag cing // zab mo nges pa'i chos 'tshal te/ byang chub spyod pa ldan pas na/ de'i sa
285a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid 'phel bar byed// / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i le'u ste// bzhi pa'o// // de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'ad
285a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis// rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sku'i spu'i bu ga kun nas 'od zer bye ba phrag brgya stong du ma bkye'o// gzhan yang spu'i bu ga re re kun nas me rab tu 'bar ba'i phung po ri rab lhun po dang mnyam
285a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dag byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang sgra'i bu ga re re kun nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par mdzad da pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed byung bar gyur to// 'khor 'dus pa
285a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis kyang / de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu bstan pa mthong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rdzu 'phrul gang mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad na/
285a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa gang po la bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu ga nas byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das mthong legs so//
285a6(dkon brtsegs): gang po de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag par 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang ldan pas/ rgyun chad pa med pa yin na/ deng nyan thos rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'di lta bu shig tu zhug
285a7(dkon brtsegs): nas 'chad pa mthong ste/ nga ni yang dag par na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kun du rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad cing / phyogs
285a8(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu de bzhin du chos bstan par mdzad do// gang po gal te 'ga' zhig yang dag pa'i tshig gis 'di skad du mtshungs pa med cing dpe' zla med pa/ rkang/
285b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyi mchog/ bsod nams kyi zhing / shin tu zab cing dpag par dka' ba/ spyod pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ gom pa gcig bor na yang / sems can thams cad kyi
285b2(dkon brtsegs): sems gang dang yang gang gis/ rkang pa bteg cing bzhag pa yang mi 'gyur la/ gzhan la bar mi nus pa de gang yin zhes zer na de ni nga yin no zhes smra bar bya ste/ gang po sems can
285b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa gang dang bsam pa gang dang / spyod pa gang gis zhabs bteg pa dang / gzhag pa gzhal bar mi nus pas so// de nas de'i
285b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// bcom ldan dgongs pa gang dag dang // spyod pa gang gis
285b5(dkon brtsegs): zhabs bteg bzhag/ g.yo mi g.yo sems can gyis ni/ dngos po 'di ni brtag mi rigs// rdzu 'phrul mthu yang tshad med de/ spyod pa dag kyang tshad med do// yon tan dag
285b6(dkon brtsegs): ni tshad med phyir// mchog tu mtho zhing gtso bor gyur// blo gros chen po tshad med pas// sus kyang mthar thug shes mi 'gyur/ gal te sems can thams cad kun/ shes
285b7(dkon brtsegs): rab dang ni rdzu 'phrul stobs// thams cad sha ri bu dang ni/ mo'u 'gal lta bur gyur kyang ni/ nga yis rkang pa bteg bzhag pa'i/ dngos po dag ni reg mi 'gyur/ gal te sems
285b8(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kun/ thams cad rang rgyal grub gyur kyang / de'i gom cig mi reg na// chos za ba gzhal lta smos ci dgos// nyi zla tshad med ci snyed pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
286a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig gyur kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu khung gcig/ 'od gzer tsam yang mi phod do// gal te 'jig rten khams bye ba khrag khrig phrag
286a2(dkon brtsegs): ni bdun khri'i/ nyi ma'i dkyil la 'khor kun tu yang / zhing ni tshad med snang byed pas/ de 'dra nyi ma chen po dag/ phyogs bcu gang 'ga' bye ma snyed/ thams cad nyi ma gcig tu
286a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ 'od zer gcig kyang ri rab tsam// de 'dra'i nyi ma chen po dag/ rtag par phyogs bcur gsal byed pa/ sangs rgyas 'od dang skan gyur nas// stong pa'i tshig bzhin snang mi
286a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ nyi ma chen po de'i 'od/ ljon shing lo ma mi thal zhing / ri dang krung dang brag rnam dal// thams cad du ni thogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od gzer ni/ ri
286a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ni lcags ri dang // rdo rje ri ni thams cad la/ thal bar 'gro zhing thogs pa med/ 'od gzer rdzu 'phrul mthu stobs dang / gzi byin dag ni chad med pa// yid chos sred
286a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ma gtogs par/ mthong ba su zhig sems mi skyed// sems can de 'dra'i 'od gzer dang // rdzu 'phrul mthu chen mthong gyur pa// bdag cag kyang ni mthong 'gyur zhes/
286a7(dkon brtsegs): phal cher bla med sems kyang bskyed/ de tshe bcom ldan 'dzum mdzad nas// kun dga' bos ni 'di skad gsol/ gang srad bcom ldan 'dzum pa mdzad// bogs med mkhyen
286a8(dkon brtsegs): pas bka'as bshad gsol// bcom ldan kun dga' bka' stsal pa/ sems can rnams kyis deng nga'i// rdzu 'phrul mthu bstan mthong bas na/ sems bskyed sangs rgya
286b1(dkon brtsegs): grub par smon/ 'khor 'dir srog chags sum khri yis/ chos 'di bsrung bar dam yang bcas bdag cag sangs rgyas 'das 'og tu/ mdo sde 'di ni gdon bya sems/ de
286b2(dkon brtsegs): dag nga ni 'das pa'i 'og/ mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur nas/ thar dang tha ma'i dus kyi tshe/ ji skad bstan bzhin sgrub par 'gyur/ byang chub sems bskyed shin tu dka'/ sangs rgyas
286b3(dkon brtsegs): chos mos pa yang dka'// tha ma'i dus tshe mdo sde 'di/ 'dzin cing 'don pa de bas dka' skal pa bye ba brgya stong du/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu dkon/ ma 'ongs tha ma
286b4(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi tshe/ mdo sde 'di bshad de bas dkon/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ngas mdo sde 'di khyod la yongs
286b5(dkon brtsegs): su gtad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dzam bu gling na ji srid du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi 'di'i gnas pa de srid du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang gnas par gyur pas so//
286b6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo 'di lta bu'i mdo sde zab mo 'di nub par gyur phyi'i phyir/ ci skad du bstan pa bzhin du/ mngon par bsgrub par byed pa'i chos kyang nub par gyur pa'i byer/ sangs
286b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi bstan pa yang nub par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo sngon deng khyod kyis mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pas nga la mchod pa bya'o// ji ltar nyan thos rnams kyis mchod
286b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yo byad mchog dam pas nga la mchod par 'gyur ro zhe na khyod kyis 'di snyam du/ me tog dang k+She smos kyi phye ma dang / byug spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
287a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dan dang na bza' dang / rol mo sil snyan mchog dam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bsngags pa brjod pa ni/ mchod pa mchog dam pa
287a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no snyam du bsam par mi bya ste/ kun dga' bo de lta bu de dag ni/ mchod pa mchog dam pa zhes mi bya yi/ gang gis mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu thos nas len pa dang /
287a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha don 'don pa dang / ci skad bstan pa bzhin du/ mngon par sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pas// de bzhin
287a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro byas pa dang / bkur sti byas pa dang / bla mar byas pa dang / bsngags pa brjod par byas pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
287a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa thams cad kyang chos la mchod cing rim mgro dang / snyen bkur mdzad kyi/ 'jig rten pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rnams la ni/ btsun par mi mdzad pas so// de
287a6(dkon brtsegs): ltas na kun dga' bo dang mdo sde 'di nan tan brtson 'grus kyis/ khyod la yongs su gtad pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo ngas kyang / mdo sde 'di yang dag par bslabs
287a7(dkon brtsegs): pas/ deng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba yin no// 'das pa'i
287a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ mdo sde 'di yang dag par bslabs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
287b1(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas nas/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor te/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang / mdo sde 'di yang dag par bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
287b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
287b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa thams kyang mdo sde 'di yang dag par bslabs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i
287b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ deng chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor bar mdzad pa yin pas/ de'i phyir kun dga' bo// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di
287b5(dkon brtsegs): ni chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba'i 'khor lo mdo zhes bya bar yongs su gzung bar bya'o// yang yul ba ra na se yi ri dgas rgyu ba'i tshal du yang / nyan thos rnams la 'dis chos
287b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'khor lo bskor to// kun dga' bo ngas deng 'od ma'i tshal 'dir yang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'di yongs su bskor nas/ sems can thams
287b7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi the tsom yongs su bcad do// kun dga' bo 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang / nam mkha'i sa 'tshams 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di yang
287b8(dkon brtsegs): dag par gsungs so// ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang nam mkha'i sa mtshams 'dir/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di yang drug par 'gyur ro// ngas deng bla
287b9(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / nam mkha'i sa mtshams 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di yang dag par
288a1(dkon brtsegs): bshad pas/ de'i phyi sa gzhi 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mchod rten chen po lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod
288a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bya ba'i gnas su gyur par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo sa gzhi 'di 'ba' zhig thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan 'di lta ste/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'di mdo sde
288a3(dkon brtsegs): zab mo 'di yang dag par gsungs pa dang ldan pas/ kun dga' bo 'di dag/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag 'od mi 'tshal 'dir zhugs par gyur
288a4(dkon brtsegs): na/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug slong bar mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug lag khang gzhan na yang bzhugs par gyur mod kyi/ de dag gang la
288a5(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di lta bu'i yon tan med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo ka lan ta ka/ 'od ma'i tshal 'dir dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa dag zhugs par gyur na ni/ 'dod chags ske
288a6(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur la/ bya mang po zhugs par gyur na ni/ dus ma yin par sgra mi 'byin pas so// ci lta zhe na/ yul ma ga ti'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i spyi bo nas/ dbang bskur nas/
288a7(dkon brtsegs): dang po rgyal por zhugs pa'i tshe/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te/ skyed mos tshal 'dir zhugs nas/ lhan cig tu rtse bar byas pa la zhugs ma thag tu/ bdag nyid 'dod chag
288a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi rtsed mo bya ba'i bsam pa med par gyur par tshor bar gyur to// btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyang / so so nas 'dod chags kyi sems kyis/ rtsed mo'i bsam pa med par gyur/ tsher
288b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing bdag gi yul du byung 'dod pa lnga dang ma thal pa dag gi gnas ma yin no//
288b2(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa dang / de'i tshe rgyal po rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ 'di snyam du 'jig rten tu sangs rgyas 'byung bar gyur nas/ bdag gi mthong bar gyur cig/ mthong nas kyang sems
288b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis mngon par yid ches par gyur cig/ mngon par yid ches par gyur nas kyang / mchod pa byed par gyur la/ skyed mos tshal 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la phul te/ de bzhin gshegs
288b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang 'dir bzhugs par gyur nas// bdag chos thos par gyur cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyed mos tshal 'di ni mchod gnas su gyur pa dag gi gnas yin no// snyam du sems pas so//
288b5(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo rgyal po gzug can snying po skyed mos tshal 'dir zhugs pa dang / de lta bu'i sems bskyed pa yang 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed mos tshal 'dir
288b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems pa'i sde snod kyis mdo 'di gsungs pas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal 'di'i yon tan ji snyed yod pa de dag ni gzhan dag dang thun mong du gyur pas/
288b7(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis gus par phyag byas pa yin no// kun dga' bo skyed mos tshal 'di ni/ sbrul gdug pa dang / rtsangs pa dang /
288b8(dkon brtsegs): sbrang bu dang / sbrang bu chu rings la stsogs pa med do// gal te gnas par gyur na yang / gdug pa'i sems med do// 'di yang 'od ma'i tshal gyi mthun mong ma yin pa'i yon
288b9(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ gal te lo brgya'i bar du tsha la 'di'i yon tan brjod na yang / mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'od me'i tshal gyi dri gtsang khang 'di/
289a1(dkon brtsegs): yon tan tshad med pa snyed dang ldan gyi/ gzhan ni de ltar ma yin paso// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
289a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sngon 'od ma'i tshal 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan par ma 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngar bcom ldan 'das kyi zha 'bring bgyi bar ma mos pa'i
289a3(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa gang lags de bdag bshags par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis dang po chos rnams las/ chos kyi mig rnam par
289a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa thob par gyur pa de nyid kyi tshe/ sdig pa de dag byang bar gyur to// / rdzu 'phral gyi stobs kyi le'u ste/ lnga pa'o//
289a5(dkon brtsegs): bam po lnga pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'di ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan
289a6(dkon brtsegs): bas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams lags par bstan par mdzad pas/ bcom ldan 'das ni shin tu ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni
289a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum 'tshogs par sgrub cing skye 'gag med pa'i don sems can khong du chud par byed pas so snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa me'u dag
289a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen po'i sems kyi bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ me'u dag la de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshes
289b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa yin no// gal te nga'i nyan thos gang thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i don thos par gyur na sems myo myo bor 'gyur zhing / mos par yang mi
289b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// me'u dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po lta re shig zhog gi/ ngas gal te sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe snying rje chen po ji snyed cig dang
289b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan par gyur na yang / khyod kyis sems myo myo bor 'gyur zhing mos par yang mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dga'
289b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// legs so bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ thugs rje chen po las phyogs cung zad cig bshad du
289b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dag la shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / khyod la sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe snying
289b6(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po las phyogs cung zad cig dpes bstan par bya'o// sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na snying rje chen po ji snyed cig spyad pa brjod kyis mi lang mod kyi/ snying
289b7(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po de ni dngos po rnam pa bzhi la gnas par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po ni// byang chub sems dpas ci tsam du snying rje chen po la gan
289b8(dkon brtsegs): ba de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon par sgrub par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// mo'u dag la nga ni sngon sems can rnams la 'di lta bu'i snying rje chen po
290a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ 'di lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang ldan pas/ sems can ji snyed cig/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa na sdug bsngal rnams myong bar
290a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dang / sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag dang / bsdus 'jom dang / yang sos dang / ngu 'bod dang / du 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dag sdug bsngal
290a3(dkon brtsegs): myong bar 'gyur ba dag la yang ngas rtag tu sems can de dag gi ched du sems can dmyal ba chen po na sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa dag sdig pa'i las ma byang ba de srid du sdug bsngal rnam
290a4(dkon brtsegs): myong bar gyur kyang / sems la 'gyod pa med par gyur to// mo'u dag la gal te sems can gyi don tu gyur pa'i rgya dang rkyen cig yod par gyur na/ ngas de dag thams cad dang du blangs
290a5(dkon brtsegs): nas sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po las thar par byas nas nga nyid sdug bsngal dang du len par byed pas/ sems can gcig gi sems can dmyal ba yang sems can
290a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sdig pa'i las mthar thug gi bar du dang du blangs kyang de'i tshe nga'i sems la 'gyod pa ci yang med do// mo'u dag la ngas ni 'di lta bu'i smon lam dang / brtson 'grus chen
290a7(dkon brtsegs): po bskyed nas/ blo dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang de'i nyan thos dag la 'di ltar rig pa'i tshul 'dri ba'i rgyu dang rkyen yod par gyur na/ sdug bsngal dang du blangs nas/ sems
290a8(dkon brtsegs): can rnams sems can dmyal ba las thar par byed pas/ mo'u dag la mkhas pa dag gis thos par gyur na/ nga'i mang du thos pa'i bsngags pa brjod de/ byang chub tu sems bskyed
290b1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ sbyin pa gtong bar byed/ tshul khrims srung bar byed/ bzod pa sgom par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/ dge ba'i bshes nyen la sten pa'i bsngags pa brjod par byed do//
290b2(dkon brtsegs): mo'u dgal ngas de lta bu thos nas brtson 'grus chen po bskyed do// chos yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam bskyed nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa chen po
290b3(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i ched du brtson 'grus brtsams so// pha rol du phyin pa rnams phun sum 'tshogs par bya ba'i ched du bzod pa yongs su bsgom mo// mo'u dag la ngas sngon ji lta bur bzod
290b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su bsgoms zhe na/ sngon byang chub sems dpa' gyur pa na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed de phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i sems can ji snyed pa gzugs can nas/
290b5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa 'am/ 'du shes can nam 'du shes med pa 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes min yang rung ste/ sems can de dag thams cad ma lus pa/ mi lus thob par gyur nas
290b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bdag gis drung du 'ongs nas 'di skad du/ kye khyod ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yin la/ bdag cag ni 'dod pa lnga'i bde
290b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis mang du phongs pa yin te/ khyod gal te bdag cag la sbyin pa mi nus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ro//
290b8(dkon brtsegs): zhes/ sems can de dag gis de'i tshe cheg brlang pos brgyad bkag gam/ mi bden pas skyon smos sam/ yid dang mi 'thun pa'i phyir ral gri dang / dbyig pa dang / gyo me dag gis
291a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi lus la gnod pa byas kyang bdag de'i tshe zhe sdang dang / 'gyod pa mi skyed par bdag gis 'di ltar sems rab tu gdul bar bya'o// sems
291a2(dkon brtsegs): can 'di dag ni glen zhing gti mug pa dang / shes pa med pas gti mug gi las byed pa yin na/ gal te bdag gis kyang sems can glen zhing gti mug pa 'di dag la zhe sdang dang /
291a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khon du 'dzin pa skyed par gyur na/ 'o na ni bdag 'di dag dang tha dad pa yang ci yod/ 'di dag ni lam du ma zhugs pa yin la/ bdag ni dge ba'i lam du zhugs pa yin pas/
291a4(dkon brtsegs): deng bdag gis sems can 'di dag las sdug bsngal dang blangs ste/ zhe sdang gi bsam pa bskyed par sa chen po bzhin du bzang po dang ngan pa shong bar bya'o snyam nas/ mo'u
291a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gal ngas sngon bzod pa 'di lta bu yongs su bsgoms so// gzhan yang mo'u dag la nga ni yun ring po nas rtag tu sems can thams cad la bu cig pa bzhin du bltas so// /
291a6(dkon brtsegs): yun ring po nas rtag tu sems can thams cad la bu cig pa bzhin du/ 'di lta ste/ dper na khyim bdag shin tu phyug cing nor mang la/ rin po che rab tu mang ba/ bran po dang /
291a7(dkon brtsegs): bran mo dang / las byed pa dang ldan pa brtul shugs rnam pa brgyad spyad de// bu cig rnyed par gyur nas/ sems la sdug cing blta bas mi ngoms par gyur na/ mo'u dag la
291a8(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag de ni rtag par bu de'i legs pa'i dngos po tshol bar byed/ rtag par legs pa'i dngos po sbyin par byed/ rtag par phan pa'i sbyin par byed kyi/ gnod pa dang phan
291b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa sbyin par mi byed do// de bzhin du mo'u dag la nga'i yun ring po nas rtag par sems can rnams la bu cig pa bzhin du lta bar byed pas/ ngas yun ring po nas rtag
291b2(dkon brtsegs): par sems can rnams la legs pa'i dngos po yongs su btsal nas/ phan 'dogs par byed kyi/ gnod pa dang phan pa ma yin pa sbyin par mi byed do// mo 'u dag la nga ni
291b3(dkon brtsegs): yun ring po nas lam nor ba'i sems can rnams dang / lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la yang dag par lam bstan nas/ yang dag pa'i lam la yang dag par rab
291b4(dkon brtsegs): tu bkod do// mo'u dag la rgyu dang rkyen des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni yun ring po nas sems can rnams la shin tu dang ba'i bsams pas bu cig brtse zhing phangs pa la lta bzhin
291b5(dkon brtsegs): du gzhin du gzigs pa yin par rig par bya'o// mo'u dag la sngon 'das pa'i dus na tshong ba phal mo che zhig lam du zhugs ste 'dongs pa las lam stor nas lam gol par zhug
291b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mtshan mo mun nag tu gyur pa'i phyir gar 'gro bar mi shes nas/ thams cad kyis 'di skad du bdag cag ni lam stor te mgon byed pa yang med/ skyabs byed pa yang med
291b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas byed pa yang med na/ sems can rnams las su zhig lha 'am klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa gang zhig/ bdag cag la lam bstan nas lam ma nor ba thob
291b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ su zhig bdag cag la snying brtse bas phan 'dogs shing mtshan mo nun nag lam gol zhing nyam nga ba 'dir zhug pa 'dir snang ba sbyin par 'gyur zhes smras so// mo'u dga'
292a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe dgon pa'i nags tshal zhig na/ mu stegs can gyi drang srong zhig rtsa'i spyil bu'i nang na 'dug pa las/ mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na tshong pa mang po
292a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams snying rje rje skad du 'bod pa'i sgra thos nas de 'di skad du/ deng tshong pa mang po rnams mtshan mo mun nag tu gyur pas// dgon pa'i nags tshal 'dir lam stor bar gyur te/ gal te
292a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis skyabs ma byas na/ tshul yang ma yin la tshong ba mang po rnams kyang / stag dang seng ge 'am/ spyang ki 'am/ glang po ce 'am/ wa 'am/ gcan zan ma rungs pa rnams kyis gces
292a4(dkon brtsegs): shing srog 'phrog par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ mo'u dag la de'i tshe drang srong des sgra chen po phyung ste/ tshong pa rnams la smras pa/ kye tshong pa rnams khyed ma 'jigs shig/ deng bdag gis khyed
292a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi skyabs bya zhing snang bas khyed la lam yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes de'i tshe drang srong des tshong pa rnams kyi spro ba bskyed de/ ras kyis lag pa gnyis bsgris nas 'bru mar gyis kun
292a6(dkon brtsegs): khyab par byugs te me sbar nas sgron ma byas te/ tshong pa rnams lam bstan to// mo'u dag la de'i tshong pa rnams so so nas 'di snyam du drang srong 'di shin tu ngo mtshar che ba yin te/ bdag cag
292a7(dkon brtsegs): gi phyir lus dang srog la yang phangs pa med par gyur to snyam mo// mo'u dag la de'i tshe drang srong des lag pa bsregs pa'i snang bas tshong ba rnams la lam bstan nas kyang / sems can
292a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams la snying rje cher skyes par gyur nas/ 'di skam du nam bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i che/ lam log par zhugs pa'i
292b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la chos kyi snang ba byas nas yang dag pa'i lam ston par gyur cig snyam mo// mo'u dag la de'i tshe de'i dus na/ lag pa gnyis bsregs par gyur kyang lus dang sems
292b2(dkon brtsegs): la 'gyur ba cung zad kyang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gyi don yongs su gnyer ba na lus dang srog la yang mngon par
292b3(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa med pas so// bsam pa rnam par dag pas sbyin pa yongs su gtang ba'i rgyu dang rkyen kyis de'i lag pa yang snga ma bzhin du gyur cing rma yang med par gyur to// tshong pa rnams kyang
292b4(dkon brtsegs): lam rnyed par gyur te/ nam nangs nas drang srong gyi lag pa gnyis la rma yang med par mthong ba dang / ngo mtshar gyi bsam pa skyes nas 'di snyam du drang srong 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen
292b5(dkon brtsegs): po dang ldan pas mtshan mo thog thag lag pa gnyis sbar nas/ bdag cag gi snang ba byas ste lam yang dag par bstan kyang / de'i lag pa cig pa cung zad med pas gdon mi za bar 'di
292b6(dkon brtsegs): ni spyod pa chen po sgrub cing yon tan chen po dang ldan pa yin no snyam nas/ mo'u dag la de'i tshe tshong pa rnams kyis drang srong de la 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong khyod kyis mchog tu dka' ba
292b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod par gyur pa ni shin tu legs so// deng spyod pa 'dis dngos po gang zhig thob par smon lags/ drang srong gis smras pa/ kye tshong pa rnams bdag ni dngos po des bla na med pa yang dag
292b8(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas/ khyed la stsogs pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bzlas ste/ lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i lam bstan par smon
293a1(dkon brtsegs): to// de'i mchong pa rnams sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ thams cad kyis 'di skad du bdag cag dngos po ji lta bu zhig gis drang srong 'di
293a2(dkon brtsegs): la lan glan par bya zhes smras pa dang / drang srong gis smras pa/ khyed rnams rtse gcig tu dge ba'i chos spyod pa la bag med pa ma byed cig/ tshong ba rnams kyis ji skad
293a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/ tshong ba rnams rab tu dga' zhing gus par phyag byas te de nas gyes par gyur to// mo'u dag la khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na
293a4(dkon brtsegs): mu stegs can gyi drang srong tshong ba rnams kyi ched du lag pa sbar nas lam par byas pa de bzhin zhig yin snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta ste/ de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i
293a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe de'i dus kyi tshong pa rnams ni da ltar gyi dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu po 'di dag nyid yin no// mo'u dag la de bzhin gshegs pa ni yun ring po nas 'jigs shing skrag
293a6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa'i sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa byin pa dang / lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i lam bstan pa dang / mig med pa'i sems
293a7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams yongs su dag pa'i mig thob par byas pa dang / nad tshabs che ba'i sems can rnams gsos nas/ sos par byas pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des na de bzhin gshegs
293a8(dkon brtsegs): pa ni yun ring po nas sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po rab tu mnga' ba yin par rig par bya'o// gzhan yang mo'u dag la sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ 'jam
293b1(dkon brtsegs): bu gling 'dir nad kyi skal ba chen po byung bas sems can rnams la nad kyis nyon mongs par gyur te/ de'i tshe 'dzam bu gling gi rgyal po dbang phyug gi sde zhes bya ba/ grong khyer
293b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed pa mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig byung bar gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po de'i btsun mo dam pa sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i yan lag
293b3(dkon brtsegs): gam/ lag pas sems can rnams la reg pa tsam gyis nad thams cad sos par gyur to// zla ba tshang nas bu khye'u zhig btsas pa dang / btsas ma thag tu 'di skad du bang
293b4(dkon brtsegs): ni nad pa rnams gso bar nus so zhes smras so// gzhan yang btsas pa'i tshe 'dzam bu gling gi lha klu rnams kyis mthun par 'di skad du/ deng rgyal po'i bu btsas pa 'di
293b5(dkon brtsegs): ni mi'i sman yin no zhes smras pas/ de skad smras pa'i sgra de kun tu grags pa'i phyir ming yang mi'i sman zhes btags so// de'i tshe mi rnams kyang nad kyis btab pa rnams
293b6(dkon brtsegs): khrid nas rgyal bu de la bstan pa dang / nad pa gang rgyal bu'i drung du phyin pa de dag/ rgyal bu'i lag pas reg par gyur tam/ lus kyis reg par gyur kyang rung ste/ thams
