319a6(dkon brtsegs): ni tha chags mi mnga'/ phyag 'tshal ba ye shes mtsho khyod la// khyod dang mtshungs mnyam ma mchis ga la lhag/ skar ma rnams kyis nam mkha' spras pa ltar/ mtshan rnams
319a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang skra ni rab spras pa// mi mchog thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// gzungs kyang mtshungs pa ma mchis yid du mchi// lhar bcas 'gro ba zil du rlag par
319a8(dkon brtsegs): bgyid// tshangs pa brgya byin 'og min lha'i rnams/ khyod kyi spyan sngar de dag mdzes ma lags/ khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar dri mi mnga'/ pu snum 'jam zhing g.yas su 'khyil
319b1(dkon brtsegs): par gnas// lhun po rgyal po lta bur spyi gtsug 'phags// bsod nams rgya chen byung ba lam mer bzhugs/ 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig rab 'gyed cing // khyod kyi smin mi'i mtshams
319b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi mdzod spu mdzes// 'gro la thugs rje dgongs pas gang gzigs pa/ spyan ni ud dpal 'dra zhing yid du mchi/ zla nyi dri med mkha' la ji lta bar// rnam 'dren khyod kyi zhal
319b3(dkon brtsegs): ni lam me ste// lta ba'i skye bo ngoms par mi 'gyur ba// zhal bzangs mi'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// ngang pa rma bya ri dgas rgyal gyi stabs/ glang po dregs pa dal gyis mchi stab
319b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis// sa rnams g.yo bar mdzad cing rab gshegs pa/ stobs bcu brtul zhugs brtan la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag gi sen mo ring zhing zlum la mdzes// sen mo zangs mdog
319b5(dkon brtsegs): dag cing dra bas spras/ bzhengs kyang pus mo'i lha ngar reg cing slebs/ sku mdog gser mdog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor lo dra bas khyab pa'i zhabs 'dor bas// sa steng
319b6(dkon brtsegs): ri mor mdzad cing rab tu gshegs/ zhabs kyi 'od zer gyis ni yongs smin pa'i/ mi rnams gum nas lha'i 'jig rten mchi/ chos kyi rgyal po nor bdun sbyin pa po// chos kyi sbyin ba dag
319b7(dkon brtsegs): dul ba'i thugs mnga' ba// chos kyis spyod pas 'gro ba rjes ston pa// 'dren pa chos kyi rje la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa'i go ca dra ba'i ral gyi mchog/ tshul khrims gzhu dang shes
319b8(dkon brtsegs): rab thabs kyi mnga'/ de yis skye 'chi srid sred 'bel bgyid pa/ nyon mongs dgra dag rnam par bcom par gyur/ rgal nas sems can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol/ grol nas
320a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ba las ni 'gro ba 'grel/ bde gshegs gang gis zhi ba'i gnas mchi ba// bde ba rims nad ma mchis lam yang ston/ gang na skye dang 'chi ba ma
320a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis shing // bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba// gnas mchog zhi ba 'dus ma bgyis pa de/ thugs rje brnyas nas khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad// chos kun dbang gi
320a3(dkon brtsegs): pha rol gshegs pa'i rgyal// thub pa chen po 'jig rten mchog bstod pas// bdag gis 'dir ni bsod nams gang bstsags des/ 'grol ba byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgyar
320a4(dkon brtsegs): sho ga// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ stan las langs nas blo gos
320a5(dkon brtsegs): brag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
320a6(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs bye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
320a7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka'
320a8(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// yul 'khor skyong khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang
320b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/ chos thams cad kyi yon
320b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi khyad par 'thob par 'gyur/ gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pa thob/ myur ba'i shes rab 'thob/ spros pa rnam par nges pa 'thob/ snang ba 'thob/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
320b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / yid gnyis spong ba dang / so nyid spong ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rnam par nges pa 'thob/ sems
320b4(dkon brtsegs): can 'dzud pa la mkhas pa dang ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang / ldem po ngag yang dag pa dang / sems can gyi khams la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob
320b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / zhu ba thams cad zhu ba dang / chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang / myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de'i tshe tshigs
320b6(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab nges pa/ yang dag nyid du ji ltar de 'byung dang // ye shes rgya mtsho'i bka' mchid rnam nges pa/ mi mchog rgyal ba
320b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag la bshad du gsol// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi gzugs lta bu// sems can dam pa bsod nams mchog bstsags pa/ khyod ni skyabs dang gnas dang dpung nyen lag/
320b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub spyod mchog dri med de bdag gsungs/ gzungs dang bdud rtsi byang chub 'byung ba yi/ ye shes mi zad ji ltar thob par 'gyur/ gong gis skye ba'i dogs pa gcon
321a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'gyur ba// shes rab rgya mtsho ji ltar rnam par dag/ 'khor bar bskal pa bye ba mang por ni/ 'jig rten sdug bsngal nyen la lha bgyid
321a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang / skye ba'i blo ni nam yang mi skyed cing / de dag don dge ston par 'gyur ba dang / dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum 'khor dang // tshe mchog dang ni phun sum tshogs zhing
321a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can ched kyi bka' mchid bla med dang / byang chub spyod pa dri med bshad du gsol/ bdud 'joms mdzad pa lta ngan sbyong ba po// sred pa skoms pa rnam
321a4(dkon brtsegs): grol reg mdzad pa// chos kyi tshul yang bskyed par mi 'gyur par// sems can rin cen spyod mchog bstan du gsol/ gzungs dang longs spyod spobs pa phun sum
321a5(dkon brtsegs): cho gas/ snum pa'i gsung gis 'khor rnams tshi ma mdzad pa/ bde gshegs sprin ltar 'gro ba tshim mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul legs par bstan tu gsol/
321a6(dkon brtsegs): ka la bing ki'i sgra snyan gsung 'byin pa/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis blo ngan rab 'jig pa/ chos 'tshal gyur pa'i 'khor rnams lhags kyis/ btso bo bdud rtsi ro yis
321a7(dkon brtsegs): tshim par mdzod/ byang chub dam pa mchog la 'dun pa mchis chos la 'dun pa bzlog pa'i mi rigs te/ 'dren pa bstan pa mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags// rin chen dam pa/
321a8(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pa'i dus la bab/ thub pa bdag ni byang chub re ba mchis/ bdag gi bsam pa rgyal bas rab tu mkhyen/ rgyal bco bri ma lags don du gnyer/ spyod pa dam pa/
321b1(dkon brtsegs): legs par bshed du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa/ yul 'khor skyong legs so legs so// yul 'khor skyong khyod skye
321b2(dkon brtsegs): bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / yul 'khor skyong khyod skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub
321b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so// yul 'khor skyong khyod de'i phyir
321b4(dkon brtsegs): legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol to// tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bco
321b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi
321b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na/ yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob bo// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas nan tan byed pa dang / sems can thams cad
321b7(dkon brtsegs): le sems mnyam pa dang / stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag
321b8(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob bo// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o// bsam pa thag pas rtag tu mngon brtson pa// byang chub lam
322a1(dkon brtsegs): las mi ldog yid ldan pa// g.yo mad 'thab pa med cing sgyu med pa// ye shes mtha' yas ldan pa de dag yod// skye dang na dang rga dang 'chis gzir ba/ se
322a2(dkon brtsegs): can mgon med sdug bsngal mthong nas ni/ srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba bsgral ba'i phyir/ de dag chos kyi gru ni yang dag sbyor/ nges pa sems can kun la sems mnyam pa/ bu cig pa bzhi/
322a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba rnams la lta/ 'di dag thams cad bdag gis grol lo zhes/ gang zag mchog gi bsam pa de 'dra'o// stong nyid rtogs par khong du chud/ bdag yod ma yin sems can yod ma
322a4(dkon brtsegs): yin/ 'dus byas sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra ba la/ byis pa mi mkhas 'di la rnam par rmongs mkhas pa de dag ji skad tshig smras pa/ de la nan tan byed cing kun tu gnas/ dul zhing zhi la rtag tu skyon
322a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams spangs/ rgyal ba'i sras rnams byang chub lam la dga'/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa te/ bzhi gang zhe
322a6(dkon brtsegs): na/ gzungs 'thob pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa 'thob pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yang dag par spyod pa ste/ yul 'khor
322a7(dkon brtsegs): skyong bzhi po dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gang gis sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs
322a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos mchog 'dzin 'gyur ba/ gzungs rnams grag pa chen po de dag gis ni rtag tu thos/ nam yang chud zar mi 'gyur phyir zhing blo gros rab tu 'phel/ de dag ye shes chags pa
322b1(dkon brtsegs): med cing chos kun pha rol phyin/ byang chub yan lag 'bel bar byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed// de dag 'dren pa rnams ni grang nas bzhud pa'i lam mchog ston/ de dag sdig pa'i
322b2(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag la bsten pa ma yin te// tshig byed bdag nyid med ltar de dag ring du rnam par spong // dpa' bo stong pa nyid dang ldan pa zab me'i chos thos nas/ de dag bdag dang sems can
322b3(dkon brtsegs): srog tu lta ba kun mi 'byung / de dag tshul khrims skyon med dul zhing zhi ba'i yid dang ldan/ sangs rgyas tshul khrims bla na med la sems can rnams kyang sbyor/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di
322b4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong sangs rgyas mthong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod
322b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong rjes su mthun pa'i chos thos pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor
322b6(dkon brtsegs): skyong bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong dmigs su med pa'i chos la bzod pa/
322b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub se mas dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar
322b8(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i chos so// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gzi brjid kyis ni 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang mdzad pa'i// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi mchog
323a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe rabs kun tu de dag mthong / byang chub dam pa mchog tshol chen sems can dgrol ba'i phyir/ dga' zhing gus par gnas nas de ltar mi dbang rgyal po
323a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod/ 'dren pa rnams las zhi ba rjes su 'thun pa'i chos kyang nyan/ thos nas bsam pa thag pas brtan pa tshul bzhin rab tu sbyar/ dmigs med chos thos chos 'di thams cad sems
323a3(dkon brtsegs): can med pa dang / 'di la bdag med par ni chos la som nyi de mi skye/ de ni bdog pa thams cad yongs tong rtag tu kun 'dzin med/ slong ba nye bar 'ongs pa mthong na sems ni rab tu
323a4(dkon brtsegs): dga'// grong dang yul 'khor sa dang srog dang bu dang chung ma dang / thams cad gtong zhing de'i sems ni gang du'ang g.yo ba med/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas chos
323a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi la blta bar mi bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byang
323a6(dkon brtsegs): nas rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' khyim la 'dris par bya ba la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems
323a7(dkon brtsegs): dpas lus dang srog la blta bar mi bya ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag la blta bar mi bya'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces
323a8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// skyon gyi gzings pa mtha' yas ldan pa'i khyim yang rtag tu nor mi lta/ yon tan ldan pa nges pa de dag dgon par dga' zhing dbang po dul/ de dag gang du'ang bud med rnams
323b1(dkon brtsegs): dang skyes pa dag dang 'dris mi byed// bse ltar gcig pu gnas shing bsam pa dri med dag la dri ma bral/ de dag rnyed pa rnams kyis dga' bar mi 'gyur ma thob yid zhum med/ 'dod
323b2(dkon brtsegs): pa chung ste ngan ngon tsam la dga' zhing sgra dang tshul 'chos spangs// sems can don phyir brtson 'grus yid ldan sbyin dang dul la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas ye shes don gnyer bsam gtan
323b3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus yon tan pha rol phyin// lus dang de bzhin srog la mi lta sdug pa'i rtsa lag rnam spangs te/ bsam pa rdo rje lta bur rab brtan rtag tu byang chub la ma la sbyor// lus ni
323b4(dkon brtsegs): dum bu dum bur bcad kyang de dag sems la g.yo ba med/ thams cad mkhyen nyid re ba phyir zhing brtson 'grus shin tu brtan 'dir rtsom/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
323b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na yul 'khor skyong tshul khrims skyon med pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i
323b6(dkon brtsegs): chos dang / yul 'khor skyong dgon pa la gnas pa mi 'dor ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi dang
323b7(dkon brtsegs): mthun par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong mang du thos pa thob par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung
323b8(dkon brtsegs): ba med par byed par byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos so// de la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di
324a1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa 'di la 'dod byed cing / tshul khrims dri med nor bu rin cen 'dra ba srung / de dag nga ni khrims ldan
324a2(dkon brtsegs): legs sdom yin mi sems/ tshul khrims de nyid la ni rtag tu sems can sbyor// de dag stong pa dgon par rtag tu gnas par byed/ de dag bdag gi 'du shes srog gi 'du shes
324a3(dkon brtsegs): med/ gzugs kun rtsa dang shing dang rtsig pa 'dra bar mthong / 'di la skyes pa bud med bdag gi med par mthong / 'phags rigs bzhi la dga' zhing g.yo med tshul 'chos
324a4(dkon brtsegs): med/ ba ga yod de dag bsam pa thag pas rab tu sbyor/ thos dang yon tan rnams la rtag tu brtson par byed/ bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan mthu chen don tu gnyer skye na
324a5(dkon brtsegs): 'chi bas gzir zhir nad gzir ba// 'gro ba mgon med srid pa'i btson ra 'dir bltas nas/ zhi ba dam pa mchog gi chos kyi gra sbyar te/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu las skye bo sgrol
324a6(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ 'dus byas gyur par 'jig rten 'khyam pas skyabs mgon dang / dpung nyen byed pa gzhan ni gang yang yod min gyis/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams
324a7(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs dgrol zhes/ de phyir byang chub mchog tu bdag gis smon lam btab// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag ni cang shes kyi 'gros su
324a8(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bde 'gro 'thob ste/ de yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'phrad pa dang / bla ma la sri zhu byed de/ de yang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis sten pa dang /
324b1(dkon brtsegs): bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' ste/ de yang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba dang / spobs pa thob ste de yang zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong
324b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag ni cang shes kyi 'gros shes par bya'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o// brtan pa nags dang sul na rtag tu gnas par
324b3(dkon brtsegs): byed/ de dag rtag tu khor mor rnyed pa don gnyer min// chags med blo can rtag tu spobs dang ldan pa yin/ zab mo'i chos la mkhas shing spros pa rnams dang bral/ rtag tu khor mor bla ma
324b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la sri zhu byed/ de dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin de dag sbyor/ bde gshegs dpag tu med pa mang po mnyes pas byed/ rgyal ba'i ye shes ched du mchod pa rgya chen byed/ grags pa
324b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams kyi 'gro ba gtso bor 'gyur/ lha mi rnams kyi nang na spyi bor phyin pa yin/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la rtag tu sems can 'dzud/ dge ba bcu po dag la'ang yang dag sbyor
324b6(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ sangs rgyas yon tan thos nas de dag dga' 'gyur te/ de dag ring por mi thogs dang nye bar 'gyur/ de dag byang chub rdul bral dam pa sangs rgyas nas// sems can khrag khrig
324b7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnams las 'grel/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos te/ gzhi gang zhe na/ khong khro ba pa'i sems
324b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / thob kyis 'jal ba yongs su spangs te/ dgon par gnas pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rnam
325a1(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa la re ba med pa dang / nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cing chos smra ba rnams la 'khrul pa mi tshol ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam
325a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su spyod pa'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa na/ tha ba dri ma med
325a3(dkon brtsegs): cing khro sems med/ de ni su la'ang skyon tshol byed ma yin/ g.yo med tshul 'chos med cing spros sems med/ khyim gyi blo gros yang mya ngan rtsa/ skye bo ngan 'grogs tshul bzhin ring 'gyur ba/
325a4(dkon brtsegs): spangs te de la mi ltar ba byung nas/ thar pa 'dod pa ri khrod gnas par byed/ dgon pa bas mtha'i rnam pa sten pa na/ shes khe 'thob pa kun la mi rten cing / lus dang srog la'ang lta bar
325a5(dkon brtsegs): mi byed la/ seng ge lta bur gnas shing dgra las rgyal/ byang chub lam phyir ye shes tshol ba na/ ngan ngon tsam gyis chog par 'dzin byed cing / rtag tu bya ltar stsogs pa spangs nas ni/
325a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten kun la gnas pa ma yin no// dper na ba se ltar gcig pu gnas byed cing / seng ge lta bur 'jig pa yod ma yin/ ri dgas lta bur sar 'jigs yid mi rton/ de ni mchod pas
325a7(dkon brtsegs): khengs pas 'gyur ba med/ g.yang sar lhung ba'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas/ rab tu thar bar bya phyir 'bad par byed// gal te bag yod dge ba'i chos spyod na/ bdag kyang 'gro ba 'di'i dpung
325a8(dkon brtsegs): nyen 'gyur/ mi mchog spyod pa 'di dag 'dod pa na/ 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rab snyan tshig smra zhing // sdug dang mi sdug rtag tu rnyog sems med/ rlung dang 'dra bar chags pa med par gnas/
325b1(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med la mos/ 'dus byas kun la sgyu ma lta bur rtog/ yangs pa'i blo tsan zhi dang dul la dga'/ de ni rtag tu bdud rtsi'i ro yis mgu/ ci nas byang chub lam ni sgrub byed
325b2(dkon brtsegs): cing / de ni rtag tu bsam pa yongs su sbyong gzungs dang spobs pa tshol bar byed pa na/ yon tan 'dod pa sdug bsngal brgya dag bzod/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'di bltas nas/
325b3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig don tu gnyer ba de dgar 'gyur gang zhig byang chub 'di la ma mos pa/ blo chud de ni nyes pa brgya yang skyed/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yangs sa
325b4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong byas pa mi gzo zhing g.yol sten pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa byang chub sems
325b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag gis rnyed pa dang / bkur sti sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa ste// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag
325b6(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'phags pa bla ma rnams dang pha ma la/ de dag rtag tu
325b7(dkon brtsegs): gus pa med pa yin/ de dag byas pa mi gzo g.yon can te/ rtag tu kun tu ma bsdams spyod cing rmongs/ rnyed la rtag tu chags shing zhen pa ste// de dag tshul 'chos pa dang g.ye
325b8(dkon brtsegs): dga'/ kha cig tshul khrims brtul zhugs ji ltar kyang / 'di na bdag dang mtshungs pa med ces smra/ de dag phan tshun sdang bar sems pa ste/ glags tshol ba la rtag tu brtson pa yin/
326a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag zhing gi las dang tshong la dga'/ de dag dge sbyong yon tan shin du ring // phyi ma'i dus na 'di ltar ma bsdams pa'i// dge slong tshul khrims yon tan rab
326a2(dkon brtsegs): ring ba/ de dag 'tshang 'dru ba dang 'thab pa dang / phrag dog dbang gis chos 'di nub par byed// byang chub lam las rtag par shin tu ring // 'phags pa'i nor las de dag shin tu ring / 'phags
326a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nar las da dag shin tu rang / 'phags lam gya nom rnam par spangs nas ni/ de dag 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyam par 'gyur/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
326a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong le lo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong ma dad pa
326a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong nga rgyal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yal 'khor
326a6(dkon brtsegs): skong nga rgyal bang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bang tshab la bgags byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong pha rol gyi mchod pa la phrag dog dang / ser sna'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub sems
326a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i tshe te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
326a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ma dad le lo rtag tu rmongs pa'i sems// de dag mngon pa'i nga can rtag tu khro// bzod ldan rtag brtson dge slong mthong nas
326b1(dkon brtsegs): ni/ gtsug lag khang nas 'gro tshe dbyig pas rdeg/ pha rol mchod phyir 'dir ni phrag dog skye// de dag sems ni gnas pa yod ma yin/ glags lta byed cing 'khrul pa tshol ba tsan/
326b2(dkon brtsegs): su la 'khrul yod gang la gleng bya snyam/ de dag nga'i bstan pa 'di las ring / de dag yon tan sdang zhing ngan song gzhol/ de dag rgyal ba'i bstan pa bor nas ni/ ngan song shin tu mi
326b3(dkon brtsegs): bzad 'bar bar 'gro// de dag rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod pa dang / chos min ldan 'gro rab sdigs 'dir thos nas/ rtag tu khor mor byang chub lam la sbyor/ ngan 'gror skyes shing gdung
326b4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur ta re/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa drang srong che/ bskal pa bye mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ da ltar dal ba dam pa rnyed pa la/ gal te thar 'dod bag med spangs par gyis/
326b5(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par mi bya ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i bshes nyen gyi gang
326b6(dkon brtsegs): zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dmigs par lta ba can gyi gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dam
326b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' zang zing la brkam pa'i gang zag bsten par mi bya ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po
326b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par mi bya ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang gi sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rnams spong
327a1(dkon brtsegs): @zhing // gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten byed pa// de dag rtag tu byang chub lam la 'phel// dper na mkha' la zla ba yang ngo bzhin/ dmigs par
327a2(dkon brtsegs): lta la rtag tu zhen pa dang / bdag dang srog dang gso bar zhen pa dang / de dag dug phyi bzhin du rtag tu spangs/ gang dag sangs rgyas ye shes don mi gnyer/ gang dag mi mchog rnams kyi
327a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i chos// 'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi 'thung spong ba/ de dag dper ngan skyugs rdza bzhin spang / gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod/ zang zing dag dang chos gos lhung bzed
327a4(dkon brtsegs): chags// rtag tu khyim la 'dris par byed brtson pa/ de dag rnams dang 'dris par mi bya ste/ de dag me'i 'obs bzhin spang bar bya/ gang zhig bdud ni gdul bar bya ba dang / 'khor lo dam pa
327a5(dkon brtsegs): bla med bskor ba dang / de ltar sems can don yangs byed 'dod pa// des ni sdig pa'i bshes gnyen spang bar bya/ gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod// de yis rnyed dang sdug dang
327a6(dkon brtsegs): mi sdug dang // grag gas dang 'tshang 'dra phrag dog nga spangs te/ sangs rgyas ye shes rtag tu btsal bar bya/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug
327a7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong shes pas mngon par rlom sems byed pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang /
327a8(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong ma mos pa byang chub sems dpa'
327b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong yongs su ma dag pa'i shes pa dang / bzod pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal
327b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
327b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// gang dag sa la chos ni 'dzin 'gyur zhing / 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod 'gyur ba/ de la mi shes pas ni brnyas byed na/ des na de ni sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnyed/ yang ba
327b4(dkon brtsegs): ni gang zhig long spyod tshol/ shes pa ma dag rtag tu 'dun cing 'dod/ gang zhig rtag tu nga rgyal khengs gyur la/ bla ma 'phags pa'i skye bo mi 'dud cing / sangs rgyas la yang mos pa yod min
327b5(dkon brtsegs): ba/ chos dang tshogs la de ni mos pa med/ bslab dang sbyangs pa rnams la de mi mos/ sdig pa'i blo can ngan song gsum phyogs pa// de ni mi nang 'di nas 'chi 'phos nas// las kyi dbang gis mi
327b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas rnam par rmongs/ dmyal ba 'am 'on te dud 'gro'i 'gro rnams sam/ yi dgas 'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal rnyed/ gang zhig 'jig rten sgrom 'gyur blo ldan zhing / mi'i dpa' bo sdug
327b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal mthor 'byin pa// de yis ngan song lam rnams rab spangs te/ byang chub lam ni rtag tu brten par bya/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching
327b8(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol la brnyas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i thabs kyis bsgo ba'i lam la sbyor ba dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes byang chub
328a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / kun 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / ye shes dang bral ba dang / bag med pa la bsten pa byang chub
328a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / phyir 'brang ba'i sems kyis khyim la 'dris par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de
328a3(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// rtag tu gzhan dag la ni brnyas
328a4(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / rtag tu 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan sgom/ lha gyur 'di dag gis ni de bcings te/ glang po lus ring 'dam du song ba bzhin khyim la 'dris byed 'ching dang ldan pa
328a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang zhig bag med rtag tu kun 'dzin sems/ ye shes spangs shing blo gros rmongs gyur pa/ mi rigs spyod pa 'di dag rnams kyis cings gang zhig sdug bsngal 'jig pa
328a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag dang // skye rga 'chi la smog pas grol 'dod pas// brnyas par byed dang rlom sems bor nas ni/ byang chub lam la rtag tu brtson par 'gyur// sdug bsngal mtha' yas
328a7(dkon brtsegs): ma lus bzod byas te// bde ba kun la chags pa med gyur nas/ sdug dang mi sdug gnyen pa ma lus btang brtan pa dag ni sdig bral sangs rgyas 'gyur/ pha rol phyin drug
328a8(dkon brtsegs): sa dang yon tan dang // stobs dang dbang po dag dang shes la sbyod// yon tan kun dang rtag tu ldan gyur nas// dge ba'i dra ba grol ba'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ bskal pa bsam mi
328b1(dkon brtsegs): khyab par spyod spyad tshe// sems can phan phyir byang chub mchog don tu/ sbyin dang dul dang des la rtag tu spyad/ gnyen pa spangs nas bde bar gnas par gyur/ bas mtha'
328b2(dkon brtsegs): nags su rtag pa nga dga' ste/ byang chub ched du bsam pa rnam par sbyangs/ brgya lam na yang brtson 'grus nyams ma gyur/ skyes chen rnam kyi ye shes de 'dra'o// srid pa'i
328b3(dkon brtsegs): btson rar 'gro ba lnga 'khyams pas/ sems can 'khyams pa'i 'gro ba mthong nas ni/ sngon cad 'dir ni snying rje rgya chen bskyed/ 'gro ba'i don tu byang chub dam pa bsgrubs/ bskal
328b4(dkon brtsegs): ba mang por byang chub mchog tshol zhing / rang gi bu bo bu mo chung ma sdug/ bangs pa'i srog dang shin tu sbyor sa dang / grong khyer nor dang 'bru rnams mang po btang // me tog 'dra
328b5(dkon brtsegs): bu chu 'byor nyams dga' ba'i// nags su thub pa nga ni bzod dgar gyur/ su mtshan rgyal pos lag pa rkang pa bcad/ de'i tshe nga ni sdang ba'i yid ma gyur/ nags dang sul na/
328b6(dkon brtsegs): sngo bslangs zhes bya ba'i// thub pas bla ma rgas pa gso ba na/ mi'i dbang pos sra ba'i mangs bsnun kyang / yid ni yongs su gnon par sems ma gyur/ legs par gsungs pa'i
328b7(dkon brtsegs): ched du g.yangs nas// lus la ma bltas rab tu mchongs par gyur/ da ni byang chub mchog gi rgyu'i phyir// lus dang srog la bltas par ma gyur to// stag mo bu dang bcas pa'i
328b8(dkon brtsegs): srog gi phyir// lus gtang nas ni stag mo tshim par byas// nam mkha' las ni lha'i tshogs rnams kyis// skyes chen brtson 'grus btang pa lags zhes bsgrags// gang
329a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe sngon chad srid par spyod pa na// sbyin la rang dga' bram ze khyera'u gyur te// rin can chang du rgya mtsho bskams nas ni// nor bu rnyed nas sems can bde bar byas
329a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po zla ba'i bu zhes bya gyur te/ brjod pa grags shing nga ni spyod pa'i tshe/ de'i bden pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po brgya/ gsang bar byas pa myur du thar par byas// dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba'i mi
329a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas// de'i phangs pa'i lus ni btang byas te// nga yis nor rnyed de ni phyug por byas/ de ched ni kun sbyin rgyal por gyur gang 'di mi'i rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/ skyabs su 'ongs pa'i bug
329a4(dkon brtsegs): ron mthong nas ni// rang gi lus las sha yang bcang byas te// reng lus ngas btang 'jigs pas phongs ma bting / rgyal po ral pa can zhes sngon gyur te// sman pa mchog gis de'i
329a5(dkon brtsegs): ched du ni/ mtshungs med sman rnams ma lus sbyar ba yang / srog btang nas ni de dag gzhan la sbyin/ 'gro ba'i don phyir bsngon chad spyod pa na// rgyal po mche ba bzang zhes bya gyur te// chung
329a6(dkon brtsegs): ma ma dri khyo las mi 'phyo ba// bur bcas bu mo ma chags ma bltas btang / gang tshe brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya gyur te// nga sngon lon stong du chang bar yang // bya dka' brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi
329a7(dkon brtsegs): bdod par byas// nor dang dpal yang sngon cad ngas btang ngo // rgyal bu gzi brjid dri ma med gyur tshe// nga yis rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod rten bdun/ mchog tu gus pas lus la bye
329a8(dkon brtsegs): btang ste/ bcu mnga' ba rnams la mchod pa byas// nga ni rgyal po zla 'od gyur pa'i tshe/ mi bzang mig can khros par gyur nas ni/ de yis nga yi mgo bo bslangs pas na// de che nga yi mgo nga
329a9(dkon brtsegs): phog du/
329b1(dkon brtsegs): bcad de byin/ nga ni bsod nams mnyam zhes bya gyur te/ grong dang grong khyer dag dang lam srang sgo// thams cad du yang rgya che sman gyi rnams// de dag sems can don phyir ngas bzhag go//
329b2(dkon brtsegs): srid pa rnams na spyod pa gang gi tshe/ nga sngon rgyal po dge bar gyur pa na/ bud med gzugs bzang gser dang mu tig gis/ lus brgyan stong dag ngas ni btang ba byas/ gang che
329b3(dkon brtsegs): sngon mi'i rgyal po ni// rin cen gtsug pud gyur che me tog dang / spos mchog rnams dang gser gyis brgyan pa'i/ cod pan dpal ldan dam pa ngas btang ngo // nga sngon rgyal po mos
329b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan gyur pa'i che// shing bal 'da' ba 'jam pa ltar bu dang / pad ma'i 'dab gnyan lta bur 'jam gzhon pa'i// lag pa rkang pa dag kyang ngas btang ngo // ded dpon seng ge 'dzin
329b5(dkon brtsegs): du gyur pa na// snying rje med cing mi bzad rab gtum pa/ srin mo rgya dag shin tu tshar bcad nas rgya shug gling du mi rnams bkod par 'gyur/ gang che mig bzangs shes byar gyur pa na/
329b6(dkon brtsegs): byis pa 'dod dang ldan zhing yid rmongs pa/ srin mo dag la na cung 'du shes pa/ tshong pa lnga brgya de dag thar bar byas/ gang che bsod nams 'od zer gyur pa na/ lha'i bu mo lta bu'i
329b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ldan pa/ bud med bye ba phrag bzhi spangs nas su/ rgyal ba'i bstan pa la ni rab tu byung / sems can don byir nga ni spyod pa na/ dri med dag pa'i gser gyi mdog can gyi
329b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po gang tshe nga ni gyur pa na/ sor mo dra bas 'bral ba rgya chen btang / rgyal po ud bal mig ces bya gyur tshe/ pad ma sngon po bzang po'i mdog 'dra'i mig/ yid du 'ong zhing snying
330a1(dkon brtsegs): du sdug gyur pa/ 'gro ba'i don tu nga yis btang ba byas/ sman pa'i rgyal po sgra 'drar gyur pa'i tshe/ sdug dang bral bas zhen pa mthong nas ni// bud med cha byed gzug
330a2(dkon brtsegs): dang blo gnyis pa// ngas ni snying rjes yongs su thar bar byas/ sngon gyi srid par kun mthong gyur pa na/ nad kyis btab pa nad pa'i mi mthong nas/ nga yis rang gi khrag kyang byin gyur te/ mi de
330a3(dkon brtsegs): ngas ni nad dang bral bar byas/ rgyal po me tog bzang zhes bya 'gyur tshe/ nga yis lus las rus pa byung nas ni/ nad kyis ring bar gyur la rkang byin te// ngas ni nam yang sems can ma btang /
330a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po don grub ces byar sngon gyur tshe/ gang gi mdzod rnams thams cad ngas btang zhing / phangs shing yid du 'ongs pa'i srog btang ste/ phongs par gyur pa'i mi ni thar bar byas/ rgyal
330a5(dkon brtsegs): po phyogs kyi tog tu gyur pa'i tshe/ byang chub 'dod nas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir/ 'khor lo'i mtshan can pad ma lta bu'i// lag pa thugs kyang ma bltas rab tu byin/ rgyal po thams cad mthong
330a6(dkon brtsegs): du gyur pa'i tshe/ snying rje ldan zhing 'gro don pan 'dod de/ skyes pa bud med dag gis rgyas pa'i/ gling bzhi pa yang ngas ni btang ba byas/ rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan gyur tshe/ 'jam zhing ma
330a7(dkon brtsegs): la dri med dka' ba'i brlal/ dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis bcad nas ni/ rang gi sha dang khrag kyang ngas byin no// bud med gzugs ldan zhes ni bya gyur che/ bud med bkres skom nyams thag
330a8(dkon brtsegs): ngas mthong nas/ gser ltar ser zhing shin tu bzhon pa'i/ num snying du sdug pa gnyi ga btang // rgyal po dpal grags zhes byar gyur pa na// shin tu nyams dga' ba'i rgya mchog dang / rin
330b1(dkon brtsegs): cen du ma gos dang shing rta bzhon/ gtang bar dka' ba rnam pa du ma btang rgyal bu byas pa gzo bar gyur pa'i tshe/ rgya mtsho las ni byas pa mi gzo bsgral/ rin cen byir ni de yis dmig byung
330b2(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang ngal khros pa'i sems med do// srog chags go d+har sngon srid pa'i \u0f7f// grog sbur dag ni 'chi bar gyur dogs nas// lus kyi dam pa ma bltas btang bar byas/ de menga'i sems
330b3(dkon brtsegs): ni g.yo ba med/ sprad pa spyod che bya sreg gyur pa na/ rgan la snyen bkur bya bar rtag dga' ste/ nga ni rim gro gus la rab tu dga' nga rgyal ldan pa ma yin khengs pa med/ skyabs su 'ongs pa'i
330b4(dkon brtsegs): don phyir nga yis ni/ snying rje bskyed pa byas nas lus btang ste/ gdol pa mi yis mda' rnams bsnun kyang ni/ spre'u gyur ngas ni mi de ma btang ngo // rgyal po dbang du gyur tshe nga yis ni/ glang po
330b5(dkon brtsegs): ba po bla ma rgan dran lus bskyabs te/ shin tu yid 'ong zas kyang ngas ma zos// de tshe glang po bdag nyid thar par gyur// bgrod dka' gangs can ri la dred dbang gyur// nga yis
330b6(dkon brtsegs): zhag bdun bar du bsrungs pa'i mi/ de yis gsod pa nga la btang byas kyang / nga ni de tshe khong khro byas pa med// kha ba kun 'da' 'dra' ba'i glang por gyur// byang chub mchog brten sang
330b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yon tan tshol/ dug dang bcas pa'i mda' yis bsnun kyang ni/ mche ba dam pa byin gyi khros pa med/ 'dzam bu'i gling du nags tshal spyod yul pa/ sreg pa'i phru gu byams la gnas
330b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur te// mthong ba tsam gyis mi ni zhi gyur nas// lha tshogs dag gis me tog rnams kyang gtor// ri dgas gyur tshe gang ga'i rlabs shugs kyis/ khyer ba zhig ni nga yis bsgral byas
331a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de yis gsod par khrid de 'ongs// 'on kyang de la nga ni yid ma khros// rgya mtsho'i dbus su son te mgon med pa// tshong pa lnga brgya dag ni bsgral byas
331a2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bkres pa de dag rnams kyis gsang gyur che// ru sbrul skye gnas gyur kyang byams dang ldan// da ni byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na// sngon cad chun rgyu ba'i 'gyur che/ sems can phan
331a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir nga yis lus btang ste// srog chags brgya stong dag gis zos par gyur/ srog chags nges par gang che gyur pa na/ nad brgyas gzir ba'i 'gro ba mthong nas su lus ni sman lta bur
331a4(dkon brtsegs): yang bsgyur bya ste// sems can bde zhing nad kyang med par byas/ ri dgas rgyal po seng ger gyur pa'i tshe// mthu stobs ldan par gyur cing snying rje ldan// mda' yis bsnan kyang khros pa'i
331a5(dkon brtsegs): sems med de/ de tshe gsod la nga yis byams pa byas/ dung dang ba mo'i lta bu'i rta rgyal du/ nga sngon rgya mtsho'i dogs su gyur pa'i tshe// srin mo'i nang du son pa'i tshong pa rnams// nga yis
331a6(dkon brtsegs): snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas bsgral// 'gro ba'i don tu byang chub spyad spyod che/ mdab chags kun lar ni nga gyur che// 'dod pa'i yon tan nyes pa ma spangs nas/ bud med du nga ni song
331a7(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur// gel ba nags gnas ri bong gyur pa'i tshe// legs spyod ri bong tshogs gyur de la bstan// thub pa nags la gnas pa bkres 'phongs pa// de'i ched du ngas ni gnas
331a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang btang / sdong po me tog 'bras rgyas ne tso'i tshe// sdong po skams kyang ngas ni de ma btang // de tshe brgya byin bya gzongs mthong nas// sdong po de ni lo 'bras rgyas par byas/
331b1(dkon brtsegs): nga ni spu'i rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe// mi'i rgyal po klu yis yul bcom ste/ spu'i tshogs la gnas pa byung mthong nas/ rgyal po'i 'jigs las de dag ngas bton to// nga sngon ne cor gyur te ba/
331b2(dkon brtsegs): ma'i phyir// sa lu blangs tshe mi'i yis bzung nas ni/ ne tso ci phyir nga'i sa lu len/ lo tog smin 'di ma rung byar sems sam/ ne tse des smras bzang po gsan du gsol/ bdag ni rku bas khyod kyi
331b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras myi len/ pha ma rgan rgon gnyis ni gso ba'i phyir// de la snying rje bdag gis sa lu blangs/ gang tse thog ma sa bon 'debs pa'i tshe/ 'gro ba kun la shas shas byin no zhes/ de skad tshig
331b4(dkon brtsegs): smras de ni bdag thos te// des na bdag ni rku bar gzhan mi 'gyur// ne co legs so sa lu ci dgar khyer// srid zhu 'di ni mi'i nang na dkon/ khyod ni mi'i nang 'dir dud 'gro yin// legs so//
331b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni dul zhing yang dag bsdams// byang chub rdul bral dam pa tshol ba na// sngon cad spyod pa de las stsogs pa rnams// spyod pa'i tshe na dka' ba brgya la yang // nga yi yid ni skyo bar gyur pa med//
331b6(dkon brtsegs): nang gi dag gam 'on te phyi yang rung // nga yis dngos po ma btang gang yang med// tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan thabs dang shes rab nges spyad do//
331b7(dkon brtsegs): dang pags pa de bzhin rkang dang khrag/ de dag rang gi lus las sbyin pa byas pas mtha' dag dang bug na brgyu ba'i tshe// ngas ni de tshe lus ni skams par byas/ gang la sbyar na rgyal bar 'gyur ba'i
331b8(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa gang dag rgyal bas bstan mdzad pa/ sbyangs pa de la rtag tu rab brtson te// sngon spyod tshe na nga ni rtag tu 'jug/ spyod pa'i tshe na nga yis gang bsten pa// brtul zhugs rgya chen de 'dra de dag dang /
332a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa 'di thos nas ni de dag rnams// tshig gcig la yang 'dun par mi 'gyur ro// 'di thos gyur nas de'i tshen no// bstan pa 'di nyid la ni 'phya bar 'gyur/ de dag
332a2(dkon brtsegs): zas dang 'khrig pa lhur len cing // rtag tu gnyid non kha ltar g.yo ngan 'gyur// rtag tu 'phags pa ma yin chos la sdang / bstan pa sun par byed cing yon tan nyams// zhi ba'i chos 'di thos
332a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa na/ 'di ni rgyal bas gsungs pa min zhes 'dzer// nga'i slob dpon thos pa rgya mtshor gyur/ mang du thos pa smra ba'i gtso bo yin// des ni 'di'i rnam pa ji ltar yang // sangs rgyas bka'
332a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin zhes gdags pa byas/ pha rol las kyang rgan par gyur de'i/ bla ma de ni dpag med yon tan chung // des kyang 'di ni blang ba ma byas kyis// 'di la ma 'jug 'di ni nor ma yin/ gang la
332a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag yod ma yin srog med dang // rnam pa cis kyang gang zag med bstan pa// tshul khrims sbyor dang sdom pa'i bya ba la// gang 'bad de'i nga la ba don med 'gyur// gal te theg pa chen po yin
332a6(dkon brtsegs): na ni// 'di la bdag dang sems can shed skyes med// gang la bdag dang sems can mi dmigs pa// de la bdag gis ngal byas don med 'gyur// sdig pa'i blo dang mu stegs ngan mtshungs
332a7(dkon brtsegs): bas// rang gi blo yis rang bzo byed pa ste// dge slong 'khor gyi nang du rgyal ba'i// tshig 'di gsung bar nam yang mi 'gyur ro// ngo tsha khrel dang 'dzem dang bral ba dang // kha ltar spyi rdol
332a8(dkon brtsegs): che ma rgod gtum zhing / phrag dog nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig pa'i/ dge slong dag ni nga'i bstan la 'byung // lag pa dang ni rkang pa rdob byed cing // chos gos gru rnams kyang ni dkyog por byed/
332b1(dkon brtsegs): chos gos thogs shing chang dang rgyags myos nas// grong dang khyim dag du ni rnam par rgyud/ de dag sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni/ khyim na gnas pa'i skye bo sten par byed// bstan pa
332b2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan phung po 'di spangs nas// de dag rtag tu phrin yig khyer bar byed// de dag ba lang rta dang bong bu dang // de dag phyugs dang bran po bran mo srel// zhing gi las dang tshong gi sbyor ba la/
332b3(dkon brtsegs): brtson yid ldan zhing rtag tu 'phags ma yin/ de dag 'phags min tshig kyang mi smra med// bya ba ma yin pa yang gang yang med// de dag rnams la mchod rten nor dang ni// dge 'dun gyi dang
332b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zag nor de mtshungs// dge slong yon tan 'byor pa mthong nas ni// de dag la yang mi snyan brjod byed de// tshul khrims 'chal ba slu ba zhugs nas ni/ bud med 'jigs byed mi bzad rab
332b5(dkon brtsegs): ces brjod// rab tu byung ba de dag brkam pa ltar/ khyim pa 'dod pas brkam pa de ltar min/ khyim par mtshungs par de dag chung ma dang // bu dang bu mo dag kyang yod par 'gyur/ gang gi
332b6(dkon brtsegs): khyim du de dag chos gos dang // las dang longs spyod dag gis bsnyen bkur ba// de'i chung ma la ni yongs chags shing // nyon mongs dbang 'gro rtag tu 'phags ma yin/ 'dod pa 'di dag
332b7(dkon brtsegs): bsten bya ma yin te// dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal bar ltung byed ces// de dag khyim pa rnams la rtag smra zhing / de dag bdag cid ma dul nye zhi min// ji ltar de dag bdag nyid ma dul ba// de
332b8(dkon brtsegs): dag slob ma tshogs kyang rab ma dul// kha zas dag dang 'khrig pa'i gtam rnams la// de dag nyin dang mtshan du 'gro bar byed// bsten pa'i phyir gyi yon tan phyir min te// de dag la ni de dag
333a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro las nag 'dir mchod pa tho snyam nas/
333a2(dkon brtsegs): bsdub sbyin/ rang gi slob ma'i tshogs kyis bdag kyang bskor// de dag skye bo rnams la smra ba ni// bdag gis snying rje 'di dag sdud byed kyi/ slob ma'i tshogs de
333a3(dkon brtsegs): dag las nam yang ni// rim gro don du gnyer ba med ces smra// de la nad kyis non tang mdzen can mang // lus la sha bkra can dang gzugs mi sdug/ rtag tu 'phags min mi dag kha cig kyang
333a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs shing lhags pa rab tu 'byin par 'gyur// lung nod pa dang sdom pa rnam par nyams// de dag dge slong yon tan rtag mi brtson// de dag khyim pa ma yin dge slong min/ de dag spangs pa du
333a5(dkon brtsegs): khrod shing dang mtshungs// de drag so sor thar dang bslab pa dang // 'dul ba la yang gus par byed mi 'gyur/ de dag rang nyam rang dbang 'gro ba ste/ lcags kyu btang ba'i glang po'i dbang po 'dra//
333a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag nags su gnas par gyur kyang ni// sems ni grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste/ nyon mongs me'i rtag tu rab gdungs la// de dag sems kyang gnas pa med par 'gyur// de dag sangs rgyas
333a7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan thams cad dang // bslab dang sbyangs dang thabs kyang brjed nas ni/ rgyags dang nga rgyal dregs pa yongs rgyas te// de dag mi bzad mnar med ltung bar 'gyur// de dag rgyal po gtam
333a8(dkon brtsegs): la rtag dga' zhing // rgyal ba'i gtam brjod pa la'ang rab tu dga'// rke du bsnyen la yang rab tu dga' ba ste// de dag nyin dang mtshan du sems par byed// bsam gtan dang ni kha don btang
333a9(dkon brtsegs): nas su/ rtag tu gtsug lag khang gi las la brtson// gnas la brkam zhing khro gnyer 'byin par byed// de dag slob ma 'khor yang ma dul ba// nga ni gtsug lag khang gi bla// bdag gi ched
333b1(dkon brtsegs): du 'di ni ngas byas te// dge slong gang dag nga'i rjes mthun pa/ gtsug lag khang 'dir de dag gnas yod do// gang dag tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan// chos 'dzin skye bo'i don la mngon
333b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom su gnas la brkam zhing khro gnyer 'byin par byed// de dag slob ma 'khor yang ma dul ba// nga ni gtsug lag khang gi glas bdag gi ched du 'di ni ngas byas te/ ka dge slong ga dag
333b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i rjes mthun pa/ gtsug lag khang 'dir de dag gnas yod do// gang dag tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan// chos 'dzin skye bo'i don la mngon brtson la// dul zhing yang dag sdom
333b4(dkon brtsegs): la rtag brtson pa// de dag rnams ni sdud par mi byed do// 'di ni nga'i gnas su bskos pa ste// 'di ni nga'i lhan cig gnas pa yin// khyod kyi gnas ni gang yang med kyis song / 'dir ni
333b5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag kyang mang bkod de// mal cha rnams kyang ma lus bgos zin la// 'di ni rnyed pa 'byung ba yod ma yin/ 'di ni ci zhig spyad kyis dge slong song // de dag la ni mal stan bgo bya
333b6(dkon brtsegs): ba// nam du'ang srid par 'gyur ba ma yin te// de dag khyim pa lta bur stsogs 'gyur zhing // 'tshog ces rnams dang g.yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus na nga'i bu de dag/ kun tu
333b7(dkon brtsegs): smad pa byas par gyur nas ni/ de dag nga'i tshig ni dran 'gyur te// bas mtha' dag dang nags su de che gnas// kyi hud rnyed pas zil non yon tan snga pa// dge slong mang po gang du byung gyur
333b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rgyal ba dam pa yi ni bstan pa dag/ ring por mi thogs par yang 'jig par 'gyur// phyi dus tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dag/ rtag par yongs su brnyes par 'gyur ba ste/ de
334a1(dkon brtsegs): @dag grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer rnams// spangs nas dgon pa nags su gnas par 'gyur// 'byed dang zug zer zab mo dgar ba dang // yon tanam
334a2(dkon brtsegs): la rtag tu sti stang byed// de dag skye bo yi ston par grags 'gyur te// de dag nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig par 'gyur// 'dir ni nga'i bstan pa yon tan gter/ yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas
334a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog dga' ba/ 'dir ni tshul khrims nyams dang phrag dog dang / rgyags pa'i skyon rnams kyis ni 'jig par 'gyur// ji ltar rin cen 'byung gnas brus pa dang // pad ma'i rdzing bu yod
334a4(dkon brtsegs): su bskams pa dang // rin ce na mchod sdong chag par gnas pa ltar// phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na dam pa'i tshes// rnam par 'jig 'gyur shin tu
334a5(dkon brtsegs): mi bzad tshe// dge slong dul ba ma yin de 'dra ba// de dag nga'i bstan 'di 'jig pa yin/ spyod pa 'di la sten par dga' ba rnams// de dag bzang 'gro ga la yod de ring // 'di nas
334a6(dkon brtsegs): shi 'phos yi dgas 'gro ba dang // dud 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas// lo brgya du mar sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa// mi bzad drag po nyams su myong bar 'gyur/
334a7(dkon brtsegs): ci sde de yis mi'i lus rnyed kyang / rtag tu sdug bsngal mya ngan ldan par 'gyur// sdig pa'i spyod pa 'di la rtag bsten pa// long ba 'am 'on pa 'am zhar bar skye bar 'gyur/ lus la rtag
334a8(dkon brtsegs): tu sha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mthong na 'jigs par 'gyur// gang zhig ya nga'i spyod pa sten pa ni/ de la su yang yid rton mi 'gyur ro// de'i tshig la yid
334b1(dkon brtsegs): ces mi 'gyur zhing de ni rtag tu sma 'bab par yang 'gyur/ de dag nad dang sdug bsngal brgya'i sa gdungs// mtshon dang shing dang bong ba rnams kyis bsnun// bkres dang skom pa'i 'jigs
334b2(dkon brtsegs): bas yongs su gdungs// yang na de ni rtag par rab tu brnyas// sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dag thos nas ni/ nges pa rnams kyis sdig pa'i spyod 'or la/ legs pa'i spyod la rtag tu bsten
334b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyis/ 'di nas phyin cad 'gyod par gyur ta re/ gang zhig sangs rgyas dang ni 'phags tshogs dang / bslab dang sbyangs pa'i chos la dga' 'gyur ba/ gnyen dang rnyed dang grags
334b4(dkon brtsegs): brjod spyong byos la/ de ltar rtag tu mngon par brtson par gyis/ 'dus byas 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu dang / 'jig par 'gyur dang rmi lam lta bu dang // sdug pa kun dang mi ring 'bral 'gyur zhing /
334b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di la rtag pa gang yang med rtogs la/ pha rol phyin dang sa dang stobs rnams la/ rtag tu rab tu sbyor zhing 'bad par gyis// ji srid byang chub mchog sangs rgyas pa/ de srid brtson
334b6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus nam yang nyams ma bya// / gling gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o//
334b7(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i gang zag bal cher skyon de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te// mi brtson pa dag ni mi brtson pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/ g.yo dang
334b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dag ni g.yo dang ldan pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/ mi shes pa dag ni mi shes pa dag la sti stang byed par sems par 'gyur la/ zang zing la dga' bar 'gyur zhing chag
335a1(dkon brtsegs): bamang ba dang / khyim las su byed 'das gus dang ldan pa dpa rgya khyA ga co pa dang / rgyal 'tsham pa dang du gyur ldan
335a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur phan tshun pa smra bas rnyed pa sgrub par 'gyur/ rnyed pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir de dag grong du 'jug gi/ de dag sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ma yin// sems
335a3(dkon brtsegs): can la snying brtse ba'i phyir ma yin par 'gyur// de dag shes bzhin du ji ltar bdag la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang / dge ba'i chos dang ldan par shes par 'gyur snyam du// bdag
335a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang ldan par khas 'che bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'dir mi brtson pa de bzhin du/ zhes med par 'gyur/ snod chag pa bzhin du 'gyur/ gcig la gcig 'khrul pa tshol ba dang //
335a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba nyams pa dang / mi shes pa dang / le lo can dang / phan tshun mi mthun pa'i chos bgro ba byed pas ye shes la mi rtog pa mang ba dang / rang dgar byed pa dang // shar gnyer ba dam
335a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang // gnod sems kyis rgyas pa dang / rigs pa ma yin pa'i 'khor kyi skye bo dang bgro ba byed pas bstan pa 'di la spyod par 'gyur// yongs su mi 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can dang //
335a7(dkon brtsegs): chos mnyan pa don du mi gnyer bar 'gyur/ mi rigs pa'i spyod pas dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de dag dbul po'i khyim nas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa
335a8(dkon brtsegs): tsam gyis bstan pa 'di la dga' ba skyed par 'gyur ro// de dag la nyes pa bshags pa yang med par 'gyur na/ ye shes mngon par rtogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de dag ni
335b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams bor nas/ shes kyi khe dang / rnyed pa tsam gyis bdag dge sbyong ngo // zhes bdag nyid khas 'che bar 'gyur te/ yul 'khor skyong ni gang zag de lta bu
335b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod par yang mi smra na/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes lta ga la zhig/ de dag la ni bde 'gro yang ring na/ byang chub lta smos kyang ci dgos/ yul 'khor skyong
335b3(dkon brtsegs): gang zag de lta bu de dag byang chub kyi bar chad byed pa'i chos brgyad yod par smra ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ ngan song gsum du skye ba dang / mtha' 'khob pa'i mi'i nang du skye ba dang / dbul
335b4(dkon brtsegs): be'i khyim du skye ba dang / darigs dma' bar skye ba dang / mdog ngan cing rtogs pa zhan pa dang / sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / nad mang ba dang / yang ba ma spangs pas
335b5(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong chos brgyad po de dag ni byang chub kyi bar chad byed par brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong tshig gis khas 'che ba la
335b6(dkon brtsegs): nga byang chub ces mi smra'o// tshul 'chos pa la spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes mi smra'o// g.yo byed pa la byang chub kyi spyod pa zhes mi smra'o// zang zing lhur len pa la sangs rgyas la mchod
335b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhes mi smra'o// mngon pa'i nga rgyas can la shes rab yongs su dag pa zhes mi smra'o// shes rab 'tshal ba la the tsam gcod pa zhes ngami smra'o/ mi brtson pa mang ba la gzungs 'thor
335b8(dkon brtsegs): ces nga mi spo'o// khyim la ser sna byed pa la lus yongs su dag pa zhes ngami smra'o// spyod pa bcos ma can la sangs rgyas dang phrad pa zhes ngami smra'o// khyim la chags pa la ngag yong
335b9(dkon brtsegs): ser sna can la bsam pa yongs su dag pa zhis nga mi smra'o//
335b10(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i nan tan ma yin pa yongs su tshom pa la 'di 'gro 'thob ces pa po smre'o//
336a1(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// ma gus pa la sems yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa la chos yongs su tshol ba zhes
336a2(dkon brtsegs): nga mi smra'o// yul 'khor skyong ji ltar skyes bu blun po de dag la smang ba ltar// ston pa drug la de ltar nga mi smod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni gzhan du spru la gzhan du byed pa'o// lha
336a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// yang dag ma bsdams rgod cing khengs pa can/ mgus pa
336a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ldan zhing chags shas che/ nyon mongs zil non tha ba nyon mongs bcas/ dri 'dra dag la byang chub mchog rab ring / chags pas zil kyis non na le lo 'phel/ le lo zil kyis
336a5(dkon brtsegs): non dad pa nyams/ dad pa nyams na tshul khrims 'chal par 'gyur/ tshul khrims 'tshal par gyur na bzang 'gro nyams/ dbul por gyur pas rab tu byung gyur te/ mchod pa rnyed nas dbul
336a6(dkon brtsegs): las grol bar 'gyur/ de dag ser gyi khur ni bor nas su/ gso ma'i khur ni len par byed dang mtshungs/ rnyed pa don du gnyer bas thar par 'gro// der song nas kyang gos dang nye du tsho la/
336a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon shes rig dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs/ bor nas de ni phyir yang nye du 'dzin/ slongs nas nga rgyal dbang gis ngan song la/ mi khom 'gro ba rnams dang dbul po dang / dam pa'i rigs
336a8(dkon brtsegs): su skye dang long ba dang / mdog ngan pa dang mthu chung de dag 'dzin// de dag tshul dang spyod pa yongs nyams dngos/ bag med rnyed nas dran pa rab tu nyams/ g.yang sa chen po mi bzang
336b1(dkon brtsegs): ltung bar 'gyur/ de nas bskal ba bye bar thar pa med// gal te 'dir ni 'thob pas byang chub na/ de pyir lha sbyin gyis kyang byang chub 'thob/ rnam par 'thor rlung gis ni bya ltung ltag/
336b2(dkon brtsegs): chags pas kyang ni de ltar mi rigs so// bsod nams nyam shing gzhan gyi chung ma chags/ tshul khrims ma dag dge ba rnams las nyams/ byang chub sems kyis ye shes gang
336b3(dkon brtsegs): ma thob// de dag bstan la mi dgos dur shing bzhin/ byang chub don gnyer sangs rgyas chos tshol ba/ dper na thar pa de bzhin mi gnas so// de ni rnyong gis spre'u la dam byas ltar
336b4(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal zil non byang chub de 'dra'o// byang chub don tu gnyer bas chos tshig phyir// nga'i rang gis srog ni bangs pa'ang btang / chos de btang nas brtson dang mi ldan pa/ don med
336b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas bstan las ltung bar 'gyur/ nga ni sngon chad legs par bshad don phyir/ g.yang se chen por me lce 'bar bar mchongs// de thos nas ni sdug dang mi sdug pa/ thams cad
336b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par spangs te nan tan gnas/ bstan pa sna tshogs yon tan 'byor thos la/ de dag nam yang 'dod pa mi skye na/ chos min 'dod la byang chub ga la yod// dper na long ba lam
336b7(dkon brtsegs): gsal med dang mtshungs/ yul 'khor skyong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med
336b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dpag tu med pa/ tshad med par gyur pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan te bde
337a1(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ gangang sangs rgyas bcom
337a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das don grub blo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na// rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan ni 'jam
337a3(dkon brtsegs): bu'i gling dpag tshad khri drug stong la rgyal srid byed do// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling de na grong khyer dang khyim bye ba phrag stong yod do// yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer
337a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan de rgyal po'i pho brang gang na gnas pa rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i grong khyer rin po che snang ba zhes bya ba shar nub du chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ lho byang du rgyar dpag tshad bdun yod pa/
337a5(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir rim pa bdun dang / mig mangs rigs su bris pas mdzes par byas pa yod do// de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni/ lo bye ba phrag bcu thub par gyur to// yul
337a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyi bu bsod nams kyis 'od zer zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhi yod do// de bcas
337a7(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gter stong byung bar gyur to// rgyal por khang bzangs kyi nang na yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gter mi bcu'i chad tsam byung bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu
337a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od zer de btsas ma thag tu 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad yid rangs par gyur to// sems can gang dag btson ra na 'khod pa de dag kyang btson ra
337b1(dkon brtsegs): nas thar bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong / rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer nges nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig rten pa'i sbyar rtsal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rtogs par gyur
337b2(dkon brtsegs): to// yul 'khor skyong de na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis nam gyi gung gi dus la bab pa dang / rgyal bu gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od zer la gzhon khyod bag yod par gyis
337b3(dkon brtsegs): shig/ mi rtag par so sor brtag pa mkhas par gyis shig/ gzho nu mi rnams kyi srog ni chen po med pa ste/ che 'pho bar 'gro ba yin gyis 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par blta
337b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya zhing / las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal bar gyis shig ces bskul te/ de'i tshe lha'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// gzho nu bag med par ni gyur ta re//
337b5(dkon brtsegs): bag med dbang du song bar gyur ta re/ bde bar gshegs pas bag yod rab bstod cing / bder gshegs rnams kyis bag med rnams kyang smad// nges pa gang dag 'di na bag yod
337b6(dkon brtsegs): cing // legs sdom dga' la ser sna med pa dang // sems can kun la snying rje byams yid ldan// de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa gang dag
337b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang // 'di na da ltar dag dang gang ma byon// de dag thams cad dge ba rnams kyis 'phags// bag yod lam nyid la yang shin tu gnas// bza' dang btu dang gos dang
337b8(dkon brtsegs): kha zas dang // gser dang dngul dang nor bu mu gtig rgyan// brtul pa bye bar de dag rnams kyis btang // byang chub dam pa 'dir ni don tu gnyer// lag pa rkang pa de bzhin rna dang sna/
338a1(dkon brtsegs): slong ba rnams la rab tu dga' byinan// byang chub yon tan kun gyis bsam rdzogs nas// de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur// rgyal srid
338a2(dkon brtsegs): bde dang sdug pa'i bud med dang // nor rnams thams cad du yang rnam spangs te// 'dus byas gar la lha dang sgyu ma 'dra// 'dod pa med par dgon par gnas par gyis// srog
338a3(dkon brtsegs): ni brtan pa med de rtag tu g.yo// 'jim pa'i bum pa lta bur 'jig pa can// brnyan ma 'dra zhing rtag tu zhing rtag ther zug min// gzhon 'di la rtag med dge ma yin// ngan
338a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gror lhung ba'i che na 'di na ni// pha ma yang 'dzin par byed pa med// de yis dge dang mi dge gang byas pa// de ni rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rgyu yis bskal
338a5(dkon brtsegs): mang rgya mtshor ni// don med par yang gcig gis gcig bsad de// khyod kyis mi phan ma byas ci yang med// don med nyid du ngal ba bstan par gyur// da ltar khyod kyi
338a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro phan byang chub zhi/ mtshungs med go 'phang dam btsal ba'i phyir// rkang dang sho dang pags pa de bskams kyang // de lta na yang khyod ni ngal ma sems// bde bar gshegs pa
338a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba rnyed par dka'// zhi ba'i chos thos pa yang shin tu dka'// bsgrim pa byas te bdud kyi phyogs bstsal dan// sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi thogs 'thob// bshe
338a8(dkon brtsegs): gnyen bzang la rtag tu yongs sten cing // sdig pa'i bshes gnyen yongs su spang bar gyis/ de dag rtag tu bzang lam khrid par byed/ lam gol las kyang rtag tu zlog par byed/
338b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa legs byos te// lus dang srog la 'dod pa rnam spangs nas// rdo rje lta bu snying gi bsam gtan par// sangs rgyas lam nyid 'di la gnas par
338b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis// sngon gyi mi mchog dam pa 'ong byed pa// kun kyang go 'phang dam pa bla med pa// tshol ba'i che na spyod yul dgon par dga'// khyod kying de dag spyod pa'i lam du phyogs//
338b3(dkon brtsegs): dgon par gnas la rtag tu dga' bar gyis// pa dang ma dang bu dang sdug pa'i gnyen// skye bo snying du sdug pa kun spangs la// lus dang srog la sten par ma byed par// ba der
338b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs ye shes rgya chen btsal bar gyis// yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gyis// de nas bzung ste/ lo bcu'i bar du nam yang rmug
338b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ nam yang rgod par ma gyur// rtses par ma gyur/ dga' ba byed par ma gyur/ yongs su spyod par ma gyur/ nam yang skyed mos tshal du ma
338b6(dkon brtsegs): so/ nam yang grogs po mthong nas ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin// nam yang glu la dga' bar ma gyur/ rgyal srid dang nor dang khyim dang grong khyer rnams la 'dod pa skyed par ma gyur te/
338b7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar gcig pu sems shing gnas par gyur to// nang du yang dag 'jog lhur len cing 'jig rten la snying po med pa dang / 'jigs pa dang dbug
338b8(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa med pa dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / byis pa 'drid pa dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba dang / ro bro ba med pa dang / rgyal srid kyi bde bslu ba'i
339a1(dkon brtsegs): chos can dang / srid pa la mngon par dga' bas cho ga mi shes pa dang / so so'i skye bo nyid rtag tu mi mthun par rnam par sems shing bdag ni byis pa'i skye bo
339a2(dkon brtsegs): mi brtson pa'i nang na gnas kyis/ bdag gis cang mi smra bas 'da' bar bya'o snyam nas de phyogs cig tu cang mi smra bar gyur te/ bag yod pa la sems shing sdug pa dang bral bar gcig
339a3(dkon brtsegs): bu gnas par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong/ de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzho nu'i long spyod kyi phyir/ sa phyogs shig tu grong khyer dga' mchog ces bya ba byas te/ lho dang byang
339a4(dkon brtsegs): gi ngos su lam srang bdun brgya byas so// rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bo bres pa/ mu tig gi dra ba dang rin po che'i srog shing dang / bla re dang ldan pa rim pa bdun
339a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis kun nas bskor to// lam srang thams cad kyi sgor yang rin po che'i srog shing stong btsugs so// rin po che'i srog shing thams cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa drug khris sbrel to// rin
339a6(dkon brtsegs): po che'i skud pa thams cad kyang phyogs bzhi nas shing rta'i 'phreng bye bas sbrel to// de dag rlung gis bskyod de bskul na 'di lta ste/ dper na rol mo sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra snyan pa lta bu'i
339a7(dkon brtsegs): sgra yang 'byung ngo // lam srang gi sgo thams cad na bu mo glu mkhas pa/ gar mkhas pa/ dang po dar la bab la/ skye bo thams cad kyis spyad pa'i 'os su gyur pa lnga brgya bkod do//
339a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad la rgyal po 'od gzer ldan gyis nyin mtshan nyid du glu dang gar dang rol mo'i sgras gang dag phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par dga' bar
339b1(dkon brtsegs): bya zhing / ci nas gzho nu dga' bar bya ba'i sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par/ gtam gzhan ma byed cig/ sems can gang la yang yid du mi 'ong ba ma smra shig ces bsgo'o// las
339b2(dkon brtsegs): srang de dag thams cad kyi sgor yang bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la ni bza' ba/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams la ni btung ba/ gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa nas/ gos dang spos
339b3(dkon brtsegs): dang 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mal dang rgyab rten dang / 'tshe ba'i yo byad dang / gser dang / rdul dang nor bu dang / mu tig dang bye dur+ya dang / dung dang man shal dang / byi ru dang /
339b4(dkon brtsegs): sa le sbram dang / dngul sil ma dang / glang po ce dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / ba lang dang / nor dang / rgyan thams cad byin zhing / skye bo thams cad kyis yongs su spyad pa'i phyir/
339b5(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i phung po yang bzhag par gyur to// de'i tshe grong khyer dbus su gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ khor yug du dpag tsad tsam yod pa// rin po che sna bdun mog mangs ris
339b6(dkon brtsegs): su bres pa/ rta babs brgyas rab tu brgyan pa byas so// de'i nang du khang bzangs gcig byas te/ der gzho nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir ma la bye ba phrag bzhi bshams so// de'i dbus
339b7(dkon brtsegs): su bskyed mos chal byas te/ dror gzho nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir ma la bye ba phrag bzhi pashams so// de'i dbus su bskyed mos chal byas te/ me tog gi shing ljon pa thams cad dang
339b8(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa thams cad dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyis khyab par bkang ngo // yul 'khor skod mos tshal de'i dbus su rin po che thams cad kyi rdzing /
340a1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bzhi'i them skas dang ldan pa byas pa la 'di lta ste/ gser dang dngul dang be dur+ya dang shel lo// gang nas spos chu 'bab pa'i seng ge'i khri brgya
340a2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa brgyad btsugs so// rdzing de'i seng ge'i khri brgya rtsa brgyad po nganas kyang chu 'bab bo// me tog ud pal dang / ku mu dang / pad ma dkar po rnams rtag par rgyun tu rgyas so//
340a3(dkon brtsegs): ra yug tu yang rin po che'i shing ljon pas yongs su bskor to// dus thams cad pa'i me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang yongs su rgyas so// rdzing de'i 'gram du rin
340a4(dkon brtsegs): po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad rgya bskyed de// rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa rnams kyis sbrel cing thams cad du yang shing ta la'i 'phreng ba bye bas sbrel to//
340a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod cing rlung gis bsgral na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rol me'i sil snyan brgya stong blangs pa lta bu'i sgra byung ngo // gzho nu'i lus las dang rdul gyis reg du 'ong
340a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes/ rdzing de'i steng rin po che'i dra bas bka' bar gyur to// de'i tshe khang bzangs der rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bye ba phrag bzhi bshams te/ khri thams cad kyi steng du yang ras bco
340a7(dkon brtsegs): bu lnga rgya bting bar gyur to// gang du rgyal bu gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'dug par gyur pa'i khri rin po sna bdun las byas pa/ 'phangs du mi bdun tsam yod pa bshams pa
340a8(dkon brtsegs): dbus ma dang / ras bcos bu bye ba phrag brgya cu rtsa bdun bting bar gyur to// khri thams cad kyi drung du yang bog nas a gdus gdugs shing / kaun lan gsum mtshan lan gsuM
340b1(dkon brtsegs): du me tog 'grems par byed do// gser gyi lnga ldi bres so// gser gyi pad ma rab tu sbyangs so// mu tig dang nor bu'i dra ba bres so// nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis snang bar byas
340b2(dkon brtsegs): so// rin po che'i dra ba brgyad khri rab tu spungs so// rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad la yang ba ngan brgya brgya sbyangs so// bskyed mos tshal kun tu yang nor bu rin po che 'od
340b3(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad tsam yod pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bzhag par gyur to// yul 'khor skyed mos tshal de ni bya'i cho gas mi'i skad du smra ba// ne co dang / ri skegs dang / khrung khrung dang /
340b4(dkon brtsegs): khu byug dang / rma bya dang / ngang pa dang / dur pa dang / kun pa dang / ka la bing ka dang / shang shang te'u 'khod do// de dag skad 'byin cing / sgra sgrogs na dga' tshal gyi lha rnams rgyag
340b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo // gzho nu'i longs spyod kyi phyi rol gyi rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa ro rnam pa lnga brgya' ba'i kha zas rnams rtag par rgyun tu bshams par gyur to//
340b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe gzho nu lo bcu drug lon na lo nyi shu lon pa'i sred pa dang ldan pa ngag grong khyer thams cad nas bsdus nas grong khyer dor btsud de/ thams cad kyang bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas
340b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bya ba shes pa/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog chas kyi bya ba shes pa bye ba phrag brgyad bcu grong khyer der btsung par gyur to// pha ma gnyis kyis de la bu mo bye ba
340b8(dkon brtsegs): byin no// nye du'i tshogs kyis bye ba dang / grong rdal ba'i mis bye ba dang / rgyal po thams cad kyis bu mo bye ba byin par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug
341a1(dkon brtsegs): pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang na tshod lo bcu drug lon pa glu mkhas/ pa/ rol mo'i sgra mkhas pa/ gar mkhas pa dgod mkhas pa/ drang ba gzhon pa/ mnyen
341a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yan lag 'jam pa/ gsong bor smra ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ tshul mkhas pa/ sgyur rtsal thams cad kyi bya ba la mkhas pa/ ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha cang yang mi thung ba/ ha cang yang
341a3(dkon brtsegs): mi skem pa/ ha cang yang mi sbom pa/ ha cang yang mi dkar ba/ ha cang yang mi sngo ba/ kha nas me tog ud pa la'i gsung 'byung ba/ lus rnams las tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ba/ lha'i bu mo
341a4(dkon brtsegs): daltar gsal ba/ shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i tshul dang ldan pa/ glu dbyangs len pa de dag gi nang na rgyal bu gzhonu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gnas so// glu dbyangs dang rol mo'i sgra de la
341a5(dkon brtsegs): kye mu'o bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i tshogs chen po// bdag gi dge ba'i chos yongs su nyams par byed pa byung ste/ blta bar mi bya'i snyam pa'i sems bskyed do// de de'i tshe 'di lta ste/
341a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ gsad par bya ba'i mis mthong na/ ngo mtshar gyi sems mi skyed pa de bzhin du/ rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer yang bud med de dag mthong na/ ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin
341a7(dkon brtsegs): to// grong khyer de la yang grogs dang lhan cig ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to// lo bcu po de dag gi bar du bdag nam zhig ni mi mdza' ba'i tshogs rnams pa 'di lta bu'i nang nas thar par
341a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur snyam pa dang / bdag nam zhig na bag yod pa'i spyad pa spyod cing des bdag par bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa de lta bu'i sems 'jug pa ma gtogs par/ nam yang gzugs
341b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur te/ sgra'i mtshan ma dang / dri'i mtshan ma dang / ro'i mtshan ma dang / reg gi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to// de nas bu mo de dag gis rgyal po 'od gzer
341b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan la smras pa/ lha gzho nu ni mi rol to// dgyes par mi mdzad do// dgyes dgur mi spyod do zhes smras so// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od gzer ldan/ rgyal po brgyad khri
341b3(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyis 'od gzer ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ gdong las mchi ma 'dzag cing lus 'dar te/ mya ngan gyis sa la sgyel to// de sa las lang
341b4(dkon brtsegs): nas rgyal bu gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od gzer la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bu cig rin chen dam dam pa nga la ltos shig smros// nga ni mya ngan gzer te khyim ngan sa la skyel/ su
341b5(dkon brtsegs): yis khyod mi dga' byas myur du nga la smos// de 'dir de'u re chad pa chen pos bcad par bya// khyod kyis ched du ngas 'dir yid kyis gang smras pa// lha'i khyim ltar nyams dga' grong
341b6(dkon brtsegs): khyer deng ltos shig/ 'di la yan lag ma tsang ci yod de myur smros// brgya byin lha'i bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod la bstan// pad ma'i mig can mig mdzes mya ngan nyam tha ga pa// lha'i
341b7(dkon brtsegs): bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshogs smra ltos// mya ngan thul te de dag rnams dang de ring rtses// ci'i phyir zug rngus zug bzhin lus dman sems shing 'dug/ de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas
341b8(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs kyi yan lag skan// glu dbyangs pheg rdo dus kyi rnam par nges pa shes// khyod dga' dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cig/ pad ma rnyings pa lta bur ci phyir deng lus dman// me tog
342a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu yal ga mdab rgyas bskyed mos tshal// sna tshogs steng bzhag lnga'i sna tshogs shing rta 'dra// soms shig khyod kyin chod 'di ni thog ma yin// dag
342a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus la bab kyis deng 'dir bu dga' gyis// khyod kyi khrus chen rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra// ung ba la dang pad ma dag gi tshal gyis gang // pad ma rnams kyang bung ba rgyags
342a3(dkon brtsegs): pa mchog gis brgyan// de la bu soms su zhig 'di la dga' mi byed// ngang ba rma bya ne tso khu byug ri skegs dang // ka la bid ka shang shang te'u dang kun la// yid 'ong sgra ldan gangs nye
342a4(dkon brtsegs): spos dang ldang 'dra ba// thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba 'thob mi 'gyur// gzhal med khang dag mu tig drar bcas nor bu gtsug/ gser dang bye du rus spras rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra/
342a5(dkon brtsegs): rin cen khri mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba// gser dril g.yer ka ta la'i 'phreng ba sgra snyan pa// zab cing brtan pa mchod kyi sman sgra bsgrags pa// khyod kyi ched du srang rnam
342a6(dkon brtsegs): su yang sbyin rgya che// bu mo stong dag gru mchog snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa// dga' tshal lha'i bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba sgron// mtho ris 'dra' ba'i gnas yid 'ong la ci'i phyir// rnam par
342a7(dkon brtsegs): g.yeng ba'i sems kyis dga' mi byed// gzhon khyod kyi rtsed grogs lha'i bu 'dra ba// bu bo de dag rnams dang ldan gcig rtsed mo gyis// khyod kyi pha dang ma yang mchi mas brnangs
342a8(dkon brtsegs): shing 'dug/ skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci// 'dus byas yid byung 'dod pa'i longs spyod don mi gnyer// yon tan bstsags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong des smras
342b1(dkon brtsegs): pa// 'khor ba'i dra bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// thar pa don gnyer ba la smras pa yab gson cig/ lha cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' bgyis ma mchis// bdag
342b2(dkon brtsegs): ni da ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags// nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g.yang sar ltung byed pa// sdug pa thams cad dgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi srung // mi mkhas bus
342b3(dkon brtsegs): pa skye bo bud med de dag dgal/ bdud kyi zhags pa yon tan 'ching ba g.yangs sa che// rtag tu 'phags pa'i skye bos de dag de ltar smad// sems dmyal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ci
342b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir bsten// bud med 'di dag 'phags pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam// bdag ni rus rgyus 'khrul 'khor mi gtsang don mi gnyer// khrag dang gcin dang mi gtsang ba dang dri
342b5(dkon brtsegs): ma 'dzag/ gsal bar dur khrod 'dra la ci ltar dga' bar bgyi// glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gzung mi bgyi// dga' ba rmi lam 'dra ba mi mkhas rmongs par bgyid/
342b6(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rtog pa sred gyur mi mkhas 'dir brlag gis// ci phyir byis pa'i skye bo lta bur nyon mongs khol// shing lcug 'di dag thams cad dgun gyi dus byung na// dgon tung shing ltar
342b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ste dga' bar 'gyur ma lags// mi rtag 'di yis dpal rnams thams cad bshig gyur te// srog g.yor gyur kyang gti mug gis ni bag med 'gyur// sems ni rgya mtsho
342b8(dkon brtsegs): tshim pa lta bur byed mi nus// sred pa rab tu phel la dga' bas byir zhing 'dod// 'dod rgyus phan tsun gsod pa'i 'gro la bltas nas su// 'dir ni ji ltar lhun po klung gis mi bskyod bzhin
343a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po khyod dang pa dang lhan cig skyes pa dang // gnyen gyi sde bo chung ma ngan song bdag skyabs min// bdag cag thams cad tsartse'i zil pa 'dra ba ste/
343a2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi dbang du 'gro ba sa gyur bag sod mdzod/ mi dbang dang la bab pa mi rtag cir mi ru srog kyang ri'i chu ste myur 'gro thar mi rub/ 'dus byas 'di zang zlog sbyin rje
343a3(dkon brtsegs): ste cir mi rung // rgyal po mkhas la srid gsum 'dod la chags pa ngan// lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' yul la chags pa mi
343a4(dkon brtsegs): bas bskul// 'jig rten phan pa snying brtse sangs rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi// rgyal po bag med spyod la byang chub yod ma lags// rgyal po gang zhig 'dod pas g.yen spyo sems
343a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khol ba// de ni bsod nams chung za dga' zhing mtho ris ldog/ 'tshe ba shin tu rgyas pa nam yang spyad mi bgyi// khams rnams sbal dang 'ang zhing / skon par bcug pa'i bya ltar
343a6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar dbugs byin 'gyur// khams rnams sbrul dang 'dra zhing phung po gshed ma 'dra// zag dang bcas pa'i sems ni don med grong stong mtshungs// rgyal po 'di na dug sdong me
343a7(dkon brtsegs): tog rgyas 'dra lus// chu bo rnams kyis gsad na bdag 'dir ji ltar dgal/ rab tu gsal nas 'bar ba nam ka lta bu dang // 'gro ba ngan zhugs 'gro ba 'di la bdag bltas
343a8(dkon brtsegs): nas// rgyal po de ring 'dir ni de dag dgrol ba dang // gnyid log sad par bgyid dang nad pa gso ba dang // zug rngu rtsa nas gdon dang lam log bzlog pa'i phyir// bdag gis/
343b1(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i chos kyi su ni rab tu sbyar// stong chen du ni bcings pa rnam grol rab bsgrags nas// legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul ba tshim par bgyi// ngan 'gro'i lam du ltung ba dag
343b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang gdon par bgyi// long ba mig sbyin sred pa'i khri shing bskam par bgyi// rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar mer byas// de yis srid gsum gar la lta ba 'drang mthong
343b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// byams dang snying rtse snying rje ba rol phyin pa sprin// sems pa klu 'brug lhag mthong grog gi 'phreng ba dang // byang chub yan lag bde bsil char rgyun 'dra ba yis// 'gro ba yu/
343b4(dkon brtsegs): ring dus nas gsungs pa bsil bar gyi// rgyal po bdag ni de dran gyur nas 'dir mchis te// bdag ni 'dus byas 'dod pa kun la smon ma mchis// byang chub don gnyer sems can ched
343b5(dkon brtsegs): du 'dir spyad bgyi// gcig tu nges te bdag ni srid la dga' ma mchis// rgyal po 'di na shes bzhin su zhig dgra khrod gnas// blo dang ldan pa su zhig 'jigs bcas lam du 'gro/
343b6(dkon brtsegs): mig dang ldan pa su zhig 'di na g.yang sar ltung // byang chub lam shes nas ni su zhig bag med 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad rgyan 'gro ba dag ni rgyun bzlog pa// rgyal po tshig tsam
343b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis ni byang chu thob mi nus// lhun po'i rtse nas rgya mtsho'i nang du mchod spro zhing // bdag 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis yid dga' de lta min// rgyal po dam pa rang gnyen thabs gcig myur du
343b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhud// yul 'khor dga' ba thams cad 'jig rten kun la stsol// gang dag bsam pa ji bzhin blangs nas mchi bar 'gyur// yab bdag bag med rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma lags/
344a1(dkon brtsegs): bud med tshogs kyi nang du gnas pas byang chub dang // grub bde zhi ba bla med gnas ni thob mi nus// dgon par dgyes pa rgyal bas byang chub
344a2(dkon brtsegs): brnyes pas na// bdag ni ri dang nags khrod mchis te gnas par bgyi// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer khang bzangs kyi nang na
344a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dug bzhin du// yid byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bud med de dag dang // lhan cig 'chag cing de spyod lam gsum gyis gnas so// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di
344a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ste 'greng ba dang // 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa ste/ rmugs pa dang / gnyid yongs su spangs so// khang pa'i steng du song ste// sa brgyad la gnas nas// de nam gyi gung
344a5(dkon brtsegs): la bab pa'i dus kyi tshe// gnas gtsang ma'i rig kyis lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing // bar snang las 'gro ba dang / chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags
344a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rgya cher brjod cing 'gro ba zos so// thos nas kyang yul 'khor skyong // rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas mchi ma zag cing skyob
344a7(dkon brtsegs): skyes te// thal mo sbyar nas/ lha rnams la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// lha rnams sdug bsngal ba dag la thugs rje bskyed nas ni// gal te skyo mi mdzad na chung zhig
