344a8(dkon brtsegs): zhu bar bgyi// su yi yon tan brjod cing bar snang 'di nas bzhud// tshig de thos nas bdag 'dir yid ni bde bar gyur// yul 'khor spyod/ de nas lha de dag gis/
344b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa// gzhonu khyod kyis sangs rgyas thos par ma gyur tam ngon grub blo zhes bya ste skyabs
344b2(dkon brtsegs): med rnams kyi skyabs// de gzhan spyod mkhas bsod nams shes rab yon tan mchog/ de'i dge 'dun khrag khrig stong bcu bsam gtan pa/ bsod nams kyi 'od
344b3(dkon brtsegs): gzer gyis smras pa// bdag ni rgyal ba blta 'tshal de'i gzugs ci 'dra// de'i kha dog ci 'dra thams cad bka' stsol cig/ ji ltar spyad na sems can kun mgon gcig
344b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba// byang chub spyod pa ji 'dra ba dag ni yongs su 'dri// de nas lha de dag gis rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/
344b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i gtsug tor ri'i rtsel gser mdzes bzhin// dbu skra 'jam zhing mdzes la g.yas su 'khyil pa ste// de'i mdzod spu mkha' la nyi ma lam ma ltar// nor bu shes ltar
344b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag cing g.yas su 'khyil// spyan dag bung ba'i tshogs dang ud dpal sngon po 'dra// mi dbang seng ge'i 'gram pa rang 'byung ba'i spros// sems can lhan cig
344b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od gzer bye ba mtha' yas 'gyed// stong gsum rgyas par 'gengs shing ngan 'gro rnams kyang skems// de'i tshems ni rab dkar kha ba dngul ltar dag/ zhing bcu
344b8(dkon brtsegs): mnyam zhing thag bzangs rmad byung legs par grub// rgyal ba dam pa mchog de tshems kyi mche ba bzhi// de'i ljags ni rab yangs rang gi zhal gdong khe bas// rgyal
345a1(dkon brtsegs): ba de'i gsung ni ri mchog 'dra ba'i don// shin tu tshim byed 'brel cing gya gyu med pa ste// tshangs dbyangs shin tu rigs pa sil snyan stong 'dra ba// yid
345a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis 'joms pa 'dod pa rnams ni tshi mas byed pa// rgyal ba'i gsung ni lha'i sgra skad tshims byed pa// yon tan sna tshogs tshang ba byang chub yan lag mthun// chos kyi 'phreng ba yid
345a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od brgya stong rab rgyas pa// sil snyan dga' ba bsgrags pa lha klu nyams dga' ba// mi tsi ka la bing ka khyu byug ngur pa dang // rma bya dang ba sgra snyan ku na la ka'i sgra// tshangs pa'i sgra
345a4(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs mi cis dbyangs kyi yan lag 'dra// mi khrul sdig med don rnams thams cad rtogs byed pa// rmad byung shel ltar 'jam zhing mkhas pa'i yid 'ong ba// ska las 'dul
345a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba sbyong ba dgar 'gyur ba// gzhan gyi spyod dang 'thun pa zhus nas tshim byed pa/ chos kyi dbang phyug de'i gsung gi yon tan 'di// ston pa'i mgul mdzes drung dang 'dra zhing
345a6(dkon brtsegs): dpung mgo zlum// dbyug pa lta bur phyag ring de'i bdun yang mtho// phyag mdzes sna tshogs sor mo rnams ni ring zhing zlum// rgyal ba de'i sku ni btso ma'i gser gyi mdog/ ba spu ga
345a7(dkon brtsegs): su 'khyil cing gyen tu re re skyes// lte ba mthara' dag zab cing gsang sbubs rta'i 'dra// rang byung en ye'i byin pa glang po sna 'dra'i brla zhabs mthil mdzes par bris pa bkra shis
345a8(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo'i mtshan// glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros thabs seng ge'i rtsal gyi thabs// khyu mchog bsgyings pa'i bstabs can dbang po mchod sdong rgyas/ mkha' las me tog char
345b1(dkon brtsegs): 'bab me tog gdugs su 'gyur// gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro 'di dag de'i rmad byung chos// rgyas pa rnyed dang ma rnyed bde dang sdug bsngal dang // grags dang ma grags de bzhin bstod
345b2(dkon brtsegs): dang smad pa yis// pad ma chu ltar thams cad du yang gos pa med// mi yi seng ge de 'dra mtshungs pa'i sems can med// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nam
345b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'od gzer gyis// sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa thos shing chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste// dga' ba dang bde
345b4(dkon brtsegs): ba skyes par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong // de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer 'di snyams du sems te// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ci 'dra ba dang / de'i
345b5(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang // des mngon sum du byas pa'i chos ci 'dra ba dang // de'i slob ma phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang // ji ltar 'khor ba yang ba dang
345b6(dkon brtsegs): phrad pa dang byas pa mi gzo ba dang // ji ltar 'khor ba na byis pa so so'i skye bo dag byas pa mi gzo ba dang // ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang ba dang // ji ltar khyim gyi gnas
345b7(dkon brtsegs): nyes dmigs mang ba dang // ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa mang ba dang // ji ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis bag med pa smad pa dang // ji ltar ma rig pa'i mun nag rmongs pa dang /
345b8(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'du byed rnams rtogs par dka' ba dang // ji ltar sems gdul dka' ba dang // ji ltar ming dang gzugs zab pa dang // ji ltar skye mched drug dbugs 'byin pa med pa/
346a1(dkon brtsegs): dang // ji ltar reg pa yongs su ma shes te// sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa dang/ ji ltar tshor ba nyes dmigs mang ba dang // ji ltar sred pa'i 'ching
346a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dam pa dang // ji ltar nye bar len pa las 'byung bar dka' ba dang // ji ltar srid pa'i sred pa 'phags pa ma yin pa dang // ji ltar srid pa yod na skye ba rgyun gca dka' ba dang // ji ltar
346a3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa dang // ji ltar nad kyis rnam par 'jig par byed pa dang / ji ltar 'chi ba rjes su mi srung ba dang // ji ltar 'jug pa ro bro ba chung ba dang // ji ltar srid
346a4(dkon brtsegs): pa mngon par 'grub pa nyes dmigs mang ba dang // ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyams dga' ba ltar 'di mi nus te// 'dod pa'i khol po nyon mongs pas rmongs pa/
346a5(dkon brtsegs): sems tha ba can bag med pa la dga' ba byis pa'i nang na 'dug pa tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa// 'khor ba la chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa// skye bo ma rungs pa'i nang
346a6(dkon brtsegs): na 'dug pas ni// bde 'gro'i lam yang sbyang bar mi nus na// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par lta ga la 'gyur snyam mo//
346a7(dkon brtsegs): de yang 'di snyam du sems te// bdag sgo nas byung na ni nye du'i tshogs kyis bar chad byas su 'ong gis bdag khang steng 'di nas thur du mchod ngo snyam mo// yul 'khor skyong // de na
346a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od gzer// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de gal ba de logs su phyogs te// khang pa de nas mchongs nas// tshi ga 'di skad
346b1(dkon brtsegs): du// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs shes na// de bzhin gshegs pa de bdag la dgongs su gsol zhes kyang smras so// yul 'khor
346b2(dkon brtsegs): skyong // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blos phyag g.yas pa brgyad ste// 'od phyung nas/ 'od des rgyal bu gzho na bsod
346b3(dkon brtsegs): nams kyi 'od gzer la reg go// 'od de las kyang pad ma mdab ma brgya stong yod pa shing rta'i pang lo tsam byung bar gyur to// pad ma de las kyang 'od gzer brgya stong byung ste/ sde ba
346b4(dkon brtsegs): chen par gyur nas/ snang ba chen por gyur nas/ sna ba des rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer khyam par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu gzhonu bsod nams kyi
346b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od gzer pad ma de la 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo de ga la ba de logs su thal mo
346b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba bdud te// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// yul 'khor skyong // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des/
346b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od de brtul ba dang gzhonu de sdong po bcad pa 'gyel pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du babs te// de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan brgya stong du phyag 'tshal
346b8(dkon brtsegs): to// yul 'khor skyong // de nas rgyal bu gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don gru blo la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// bdag ni ri/
347a1(dkon brtsegs): / nas na ste ring nas gdod/ tshegs ches sman pa'i rgyal po khyod rnyed do// ji ltar bde gshegs bstan las langs nas ni// bdag gis thob 'gyur
347a2(dkon brtsegs): mgon po bstan du gsol// 'dren pa bdag gis bag mchis thos pa ni// mtshan mo bar snang lha las thos lags te// thos nas skyo ste bdag ni 'dir mchis na// mi rnams
347a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ga mchis 'gyur ba ji lta bu// lam nyams pa la de ring ston gyur cig/ ldongs par gyur pa'i mig tu deng gyur cig/ dad pa'i 'byung gnas gso mdzad thugs rje ldan// g.yangs
347a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di las bdag phyung shig/ dbul por gyur pa dag ni bsdu bar mdzod// mgon po bcing ba dag ni deng grol mdzod/ som nyi bcas pa'i yid gnyis gcad du gsol// byang
347a5(dkon brtsegs): chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung ston// chus khyer bdag la 'gram ni bstan du gsol// mun pa bdag la sgron ma mdzad du gsol// rmad gyur pa dag la rma med mdzad du gsol/ sman pa'i
347a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po bdag ni zug rngu phyung // khyod kyis ngan 'gro dog las bdag thar mdzod// srid par dmigs pa 'dzin pa gcad du gsol// yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi lam chen gyis/ mya
347a7(dkon brtsegs): ngan chu chen pha rol bsgral du gsol// srog gis zad pa'i chos can tshe yang thung // dge ba bar chad mang po 'byung ba ste// bsod nams rnam smin ring por mi thogs 'grub// bdag gis
347a8(dkon brtsegs): dal ba gdod rnyed gcig nges gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bag mchis 'gyur// ji ltar byang chub spyod pa mchog spyod na// 'gro ba srid pa'i 'ching las thar 'gyur ba/
347b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon po de dag bdag lung ston/ yul 'khor skyong // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blos rgyal bu gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen
347b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba rgya cher yang dag par bstan to// rgyal bu gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gyis de thos nas rnams par thar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo// mngon
347b3(dkon brtsegs): bar shes pa lnga yang thob ste/ de nam kA la gnas nas me tog rnams mngon par sprul te// de bzhin gshegs pa de la gtor// mngon par gtor to// yul 'khor skyong // de nas rgyal
347b4(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od gzer bar snang de las thabs te// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa// mtshan mchog
347b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dri med zla ba'i zhal/ gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul bral khyod 'dra srid pa gsum ma mchis// mnyam med mkhyen cen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba
347b6(dkon brtsegs): dbu skra 'jam mdzes snum zhing bzang // khyod kyi gtsug tor 'di ni ri rgyal bzhin// gtsug tor mi mthong khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// thub pa khyod kyi smin mtshams mdzod spu
347b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzes// kun da zla ba kha ba dung ltar dkar thugs rje gang gis 'gro ba 'di gzigs pa spyan mchog bzang po ud pa la sngon po 'dra// rgyal ba dri med spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// lhag
347b8(dkon brtsegs): yangs srab la zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba// de yis rang gi zhal gyi gdong yang khebs chos gsungs pas ni 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// 'jam snam gsung ldan khyed la phyag 'tshal lo//
348a1(dkon brtsegs): / tshems ldan shin tu brtan pa rdo rje 'dra// bcu dang sum cu snyoms shing thags bzang ba// 'dzum pa mdzad na 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// bden gtam snyan pa
348a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis// 'od kyis zhing brgya dag kyang snang bar bgyid// 'jig rten na ni tshangs dbang skyod de dag/ bcom ldan khyod
348a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'od kyis zil kyis rlag/ e ne'i byin pas mnyam byed bcom ldan 'das// glang po'i rgyal po rma bya seng ge'i stabs/ bcom ldan gnya shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs// sa dang
348a4(dkon brtsegs): ri dang dam pa g.yo bar mdzad// bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan gyis rgyas pa ste// khyod kyi bags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog 'dra/ 'gro ba gzugs 'di lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur
348a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs dang ldan// khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni dka' thub spyad// khyod gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes// sems can kun la thugs rje byams
348a6(dkon brtsegs): thugs ldan// mchog tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni sprin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes// khyod ni bzod dang brtson 'grus dgyes rab brtan// khyod ni bsam gtan she
348a7(dkon brtsegs): rab 'od gzi mnga'// mtshungs med ye shes mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni smra ba ngan pa'i tshogs can 'jom// khyod ni seng ge lta bur 'khor du sgrogs// khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal po
348a8(dkon brtsegs): dri gsum sel// mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa sku gsung thugs ni rnam par dag/ pad ma chu ltar srid pa gsum mi gos// khyod ni tshangs dbyangs ka la bing ka'i
348b1(dkon brtsegs): skad// srid gsum pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang // gar la lta dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang // bdag med sems can med cing srog 'gro med//
348b2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams smig rgyu chu zla 'dra bar mkhyen// stong pa zhi ba skye ba med pa'i tshul// mi shes pas na 'gro ba 'khyam gyur te// thugs rje thabs tshul rig pa brgya dag gis// de dag rnams
348b3(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dzud par mdzud pa lags// 'dod chags la stsogs nad mang brgya dag gis// skrag par gyur pa'i 'gro la rtag gzigs te// bde gshegs sems can brgya dag yongs
348b4(dkon brtsegs): 'grel cing // zla med sman pa lta bur rnam par rgyu// skye dang rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan non// sdug dang bral dang smre sngags 'don pa brgyas// rtag tu na ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni//
348b5(dkon brtsegs): thub pa thugs rjes yongs su 'grel cing rgyu// dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal ba'i 'gro rnams su// 'gro kun shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor// glen pa dmigs bu ma mchis 'gon
348b6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis// de la lam gyi dam pa ston pa mdzad// gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa// 'phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon cad kyi// chos kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad
348b7(dkon brtsegs): ga brgyal ba de dag rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// 'jam zhing mnyen la yid du 'ong ba'i mchog/ tshangs las lhag par mchog tu dga' bgyid pa// dri za mi ci lha yi bu mo
348b8(dkon brtsegs): mchog/ sgra de zil gyis mnan nas gsung ba mdzad// bden dang drang ba mi zad thabs tshul gyis// yongs sbyangs yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung // de thos sems
349a1(dkon brtsegs): / can khrag khrig phrag brgya dag/ theg pa gsum gyis zhi bar mchi bar bgyid// khyod la mchod pas lha'i bde ba'i// rnam pa mang dang de bzhin
349a2(dkon brtsegs): mi yis thob// mi'i bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa/ phyug cing nor che 'byor pa chen por 'gyur// mtshungs med khyod la dad pa skyed pa ni// gling bzhi'i bdag po 'khor los
349a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur ba mchog/ 'gro la dge ba bcu po kun 'byed pa// rin cen rab bzang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod la mchod pa bgyis pas ni// tshangs pa brgya byin 'jig rten
349a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag po dang // yongs su dga' ldan lha'i bdag po dang gzhan 'phrul pa dang 'thab bral rab dga' 'gyur// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnam mang sel mdzad pa// mnyam med khyod la mchod
349a5(dkon brtsegs): dang mthong ba dang / thos pa'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis lags te// gnas mchog rga shi med pa 'thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan lam la mkhas shing lam mkhyen pa// 'jig rten 'di
349a6(dkon brtsegs): ni ngan pa'i lam las zlog/ bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam// bde bzhi pa rdul bral la 'god pa// bsod nams gter khyod bsod nams don gnyer ba'i// bsod
349a7(dkon brtsegs): nams bgyi ba rtag tu mi bas te// byang chub dam pa ma thob bar du ni// bskal pa bye ba mang por bas mi 'gyur gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga' ba gyid pa// yongs su dga'
349a8(dkon brtsegs): zhing mdzes pa 'thob par 'gyur// dam pa'i zhing du lus dang ngag yid kyis// sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// rgyal ba mchod pa'i mi yis 'di las stsogs// yon tan
349b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa du ma 'thob par 'gyur mtho ris thar pa mi'i bde ba dang // 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gter thob 'gyur// khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen po// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing
349b2(dkon brtsegs): mang brgyar yang mchis// rgyal ba khyod kyi bsngags pa'i 'phreng ba ni// bde bar gshegs rnams 'khor du rtag par sgrogs// rims nang bral zhing 'gro ba thar bar mdzad/ mthong na dga'
349b3(dkon brtsegs): ba thugs rje mchog ldan pa// bcom ldan dbang po zhi bzhi dgyes pa/ mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis rgyal ba khyod kyi gsung thos nas// mngon par shes pa lnga
349b4(dkon brtsegs): thob mkha' la gnas// dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag gyur te// dri med chos ni 'gro la rnam par dbye// lha dang mi dang klus mchod bde bar gshegs// yon tan kun gyi mtha
349b5(dkon brtsegs): phyin deng bstod pas// bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs gyur pa 'dis// 'gro ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par shog/ yul 'khor skyong / de nas mtshan me de'i nam nangs pa dang // rgyal po
349b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od gzer ldan gyis gzho na'i bud med kyi 'khor du ma'i sgra thos so// thos nas kyang myar ba myar bar rings pa'i gzugs kyis// grong khyer dga' mchog ga la ba der song ste byin nas// 'di skad
349b7(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// khyed ci'i phyir du de dag gis smras pa// rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer mi me gda' ba'i slad du'o// yul 'khor skyong// de nas rgyal po 'od ni gzer ldan
349b8(dkon brtsegs): gzho nu'i phyir shing bcad pa bsgyel ba ltar sa la 'gyel to// langs nas ngu zhing grong khyer der lan stong du yongs su btsal to// yul 'khor skyong de nas grong khyer de na grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa
350a1(dkon brtsegs): des// rgyal po 'od gzer ldan la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po gzhon ni de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la blta ba dang // phyag bya ba dang /
350a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa dang // bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir shar phyogs logs su song ngo // yul 'khor skyong/ de nas rgyal po 'od gzer ldan gzho nu btsal ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor dang // srog chags
350a3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu/ shar phyogs kyi phyogs cha ga la ba der srong ste// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas don
350a4(dkon brtsegs): grub blo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs cig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis/
350a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa// srid gsum khyod ma mtshungs ma mchis// sems can dam pa lha dbang lha min rgyal por bkur// skye bo khyod kyi gzugs la
350a6(dkon brtsegs): lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba khyod skra sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan rab dag/ lhun po rin cen mchog gis spras ltar yongs su dag/
350a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba sdug cing 'jam pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra// blta sdug gzugs mngar thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bskal pa bye ba brgya bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs spyad// bskum
350a8(dkon brtsegs): pa bye ba brgya mang sangs rgyas sti stang mdzad// sngon chad mchod sbyin brgya phrag bsam gyi mi khyab mdzad// des na khyod sku bzang zhing shin tu mdzes pa lags// sbyin dang tshul khrims ting
350b1(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang / bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan thabs kyis khong gzugs sbyangs// khyod kyi spyan sngar brgya byin tshangs 'od gsal ma lags// chu shel nor bu klog gi 'od
350b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang mdzes ma lags// 'gro ba'i don du yid du mchi ba'i gzugs kyang ston// chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma 'dra bar gda' ba lags// rang gi phyogs rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i sku yang gda'// bde
350b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs rnams kyi sku'i chad ni gda' ma lags// khyod ni dga' ldan 'ga' zhig na yang bzhugs par gda'// 'chi 'bo mdzad cing rab dkar glang por gyur nas ni// dpa' bo yum gyi lhums
350b4(dkon brtsegs): su gshegs par gda' ba mdzad// thub chen nam mkha' lta bur thams cad rjes su zhugs// bcom ldan phyogs gar bltam pa ston pa'ang mdzad pa ste// sa 'gar dag tu gom pa bdun
350b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dor gda' ba mdzad// nga'i lha mir bcas 'gro nang gtso shin tu lha// 'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho las gdon ces gsung yang phyug/ thub khyod chos gang la yang the tsom mi mnga' yang //
350b6(dkon brtsegs): yi ge shes pa slob ltar 'jig rten dag na ga da'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin zhi ba spr-i de yal zhi ba spyod yul zhi ba brnyes gyur kya// kha cig tu ni bud med nang na bzhugs par gda'// yab dang
350b7(dkon brtsegs): yum dang sa dang bud med rnams kyang btang // gnyen rnams mya ngan non te rnam par brgyal zhing du// sems can dam pa bye ba brgya lngas yongs bskor nas// nags gnas gnas gcig po
350b8(dkon brtsegs): nas 'byung bar gda' ba'ang mdzad// khyod kyi bdud bzhi pham par mdzad nas yun ring yang // zhing na bdud 'dul ba yang gda' ba ston pa mdzad// sngon chad 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab
351a1(dkon brtsegs): bskor gyur kyang // khyod ni thugs rjes 'khor lo bskor bar gda' ba mdzad// rtag tu rtag lta 'du shes ldan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// mya ngan bzla zhes 'khor
351a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi nang gyi nang du tshig tu gsungs// rtag tu 'khor bar dga' ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni// khyod kyi bsod nams ye shes shes rab thabs mtshungs med// thub pa khyod sku 'od kyis zhing mang
351a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par 'gengs// phyogs rnams dag na 'dren pa khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung // kun tu spyod yul thub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid ma lus brnyes par gyur la phyag 'tshal
351a4(dkon brtsegs): lo// chos nyid ma lus brnyes par gyir la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can kun gyi bgyi ba sgyu ma ltar gda' yang // thub pa khyod ni gang du bzhud pa 'am byon ma lags// sgyu ma'i chos tshul gan
351a5(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i don tu gang gis byang chub mchog thob pa// lam mchog mi'i dpa' bo khyod legs gsung // bdag gis chos nyid 'di ni myur du sangs rgyas nas/
351a6(dkon brtsegs): mi dga' 'gro ba'i don tu chos nyid bshad par bgyi// mi'i dpa' bo thub pa kun mkhyen rims bral ba// srid gsum mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa ga la zhig/ bdag gis 'dir bstod
351a7(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams gang bsgrubs des// 'jig rten byang chub bla mod zhi mchog thob par shog/ yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo ngas// rgyal po 'od gzer ldan de'i
351a8(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bresam pa mkhyen nas ci nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to// yul 'khor skyong / de nas
351b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gyis// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gis grong khyer
351b2(dkon brtsegs): du gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer la thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bar gyur
351b3(dkon brtsegs): pas gnang ngo // yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gyis pa ma de gnyis dang grogs de dag dang bud med dag la smras pa// khyed cag thams cad
351b4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig/ ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul du rung bar gyis shig/ de dag sgra skad gcig tu rjes su yid rang
351b5(dkon brtsegs): ngo// yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gyis ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te// ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo// ro bro ba bkod
351b6(dkon brtsegs): pa lnga brgya pa'i zhal zas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag la gsol to// dge slong de dag thams cad kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyis g.yogs pa'i
351b7(dkon brtsegs): gtsug lag khang nor bu'i 'chag bshams pa/ steng du rin po che'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/ g.yas g.yo me tog gi shing ljon pa legs par yongs su grub par byas pa/ me tog gi shing
351b8(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa legs par yongs su grub par byas pa/ me tog pad ma dkar po'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa/ ras bcos bu mu gnyis dri ma med pa brgya stong gting ba'i mal bshams pa/
352a1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong re re la gos kha na ma tho ba med pa gang yin pa de/ phyid nyid mi sbyin gyi nyin cig bzhin gos gzhan dang gzhan sbyin par 'gyur ba byas so// de lo
352a2(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag gsum gyi bar du rmugs pa dang / gnyid gyis non par ma gyur/ bdag la dga' ba ma byas// sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir gzhan yid ma byas so// bar skabs der 'dod pa
352a3(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'che ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur/ rgyal srid la sred par ma gyur te/ lus dang srog la yang mi lta na/
352a4(dkon brtsegs): dngos po gzhan lta la smos kyang ci dgos/ bar skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa de thams cad kun tu bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gnyis su ma zhus so// /
352a5(dkon brtsegs): bar skabs der khrus ma byas/ mar dang 'bru mar gyis lus ma bskas/ rkang pa ma bkrus/ ngal ba'i 'du shes ma bskyed do// zan za ba dang / bshang gci byed pa ma gtogs par nam yang
352a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dug par ma gyur/ gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/ tsan dan dmar po'i zhugs la bzhen pa byas so// gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de zhugs
352a7(dkon brtsegs): la ba zhen pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams cad dang / 'phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / rol mo'i sgra thams cad kyis lo brgya stong/
352a8(dkon brtsegs): du ring bsrel la mchod pa byas par gyur pa nas/ rgyu rkyen thams cad bstsogs te phyis mchod rten bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi'i bar du byas so// mchod rten de dag la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi
352b1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs so// mu tig gi dra ba'i bla re dag bres so// mchod rten re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya lnga brgya bul lo// mchod rten thams cad la yang
352b2(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan brgya stong bul lo// 'dzam bu gling kho ra khor yug tu me tog gi shing ljon pa bskrun to// mchod rten re re la yang mar me'i rdza bo brgya stong nas mar me bus so// mar me'i rdza
352b3(dkon brtsegs): bo re re nas kyang mer ma bse spos kyi 'bru mar drug cu rtsa bzhi pa stong gis mar me bus so// spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis kyang mchod pa byas so// tshul de lta bus lo bye ba'i
352b4(dkon brtsegs): bar du mchod pa byas te/ phyis rab tu byung ngo // de rab tu byung nas kyang / chos gos gsum par gyur cing / rtag tu bsod snyoms spyod par dang / rtag tu cog pu pa ste/ nam yang glos ma phab
352b5(dkon brtsegs): po nam du yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to// de zung zing med pa'i sems kyis lo bye ba phrag bzhi'i bar du chos kyi sbyin pa byin te/ des gzhan la tha na legs so zhes
352b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba tsam yang re bar gyur na/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de chos mnyan pa 'am chos bshad pas kyang ngal bar ma gyur to// de la lha rnams kyang bsnyen bkur byed do//
352b7(dkon brtsegs): yul gyi mi thams cad dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / nang mi thams cad dang / grogs po thams cad kyang / de'i rjes su bslabs te rab tu byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong / de nas gan
352b8(dkon brtsegs): gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi rjes su slob cing / yul gyi mi thams cad rab tu byung gis/ bdag cag gis de la rim 'gro dang / bsnyen
353a1(dkon brtsegs): @bkur byas na/ dkon mchog gsum la rim 'gro byas par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang // dam
353a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du gnas te/ dge slong bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ thams cad yongs su bzung ngo // tshul 'di lta bus sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
353a3(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi la rnam par de lta bu'i mchod pa byas so// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod de
353a4(dkon brtsegs): lta dogs shing the tsom za 'am yid gnyis su gyur na de khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs 'od dpag med de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po 'od zer
353a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong / de tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhi yin pa snyam du// khyod de ltar dogs shing
353a6(dkon brtsegs): the tsom za 'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzho nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer ces bya bar gyur to//
353a7(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med
353a8(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'od pas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrub pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su spangs pa dang /
353b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ga yod pa'i spyod pas rgyal bu gzhon bsod nams kyi 'od zer de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// ngas bya dka' ba mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bus/ bla na med pa yang dag par
353b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo// de lta bas na de dag mi brtson pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkun sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhur len pa dang / shes kyi khe la chags pa dang /
353b3(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal gyis bcom pa dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus nyon mongs pa dag sha zang ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus bstan pa las ring du gyur pa dang / rab tu byung ba don med pa dang / dge sbyong sun
353b4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod dang / lus dang ngag dang sems mi drang ba dang / ltas lta ba dang // bas che ba nor ba dang / rang gi dam bcas pa las nyams
353b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gos dang zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i ched kyi sman dang / yo byad kyi mtshan ma la chags pa dang / ngo tsha mi shes pa dang / khrel med pa dang / cho ga nyams pa dang /
353b6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la 'jug pa dang / spyod yul dang bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las ring du gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang / rdzogs
353b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas/ sdig pa'i bshes nyen rigs pa med pa/ rnyed pa don
353b8(dkon brtsegs): tu gnyer ba/ mi bsten par shes par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i spyod pa dpag med na/
354a1(dkon brtsegs): snying ni shes dang thob kyi khe la song / byang chub yon tan brgyas khebs bor nas ni// de dag 'thob phyir gzhan gyi khyim la dga'// khwa 'dra sdang ba khrel dang
354a2(dkon brtsegs): mos blo bral// shes kyi khe phyir bdud kyi dbang du song // nyon mongs rag lus srid pa'i 'gro ba gzhol// bdag 'dir yon tan ldan zhes de skad smra// lus ni dgon na dran pa grong khyer du/
354a3(dkon brtsegs): 'thob phyir de dag rnam par rtog pas spyod// gnam dang sa ltar thar las ring ba ste// de 'dra de dag sprul 'drar ring du spang // de dag sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin du// dge 'dun yon
354a4(dkon brtsegs): tan brgyas gang dga' ma yin// mtho ris bor nas ngan pa'i lam du song // sdug pas phongs nas srid pa'i 'gro bar 'khyams// nga'i spyod pa nye bar bstan pa 'di thos nas// yang dag lhag
354a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pa'i bsgrub pas 'di la sbyor// bskal ba bye ba mang pos rnyed dka' dal rnyed kyis// de ltas ji skad bstan pa'i chos nyid 'dir brtson gyis// gang zhig theg mchog byang chub
354a6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa 'tshang rgya 'dod// de yis rgyal po de'i yon tan dran par bya// bsams te yang dag ji bzhin tshul bzhin gnas par bya// de ltas bder gshegs rnams kyi byang chub chags med
354a7(dkon brtsegs): 'grub// yon tan 'di dag rtogs pas 'phags pa'i rigs la bsten// rang gis 'dir ni kun tu shes pa bskyed par bya// bstan pa yon tan snying po 'di 'dra ma spang shig/ byis pa lta
354a8(dkon brtsegs): bur 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyams sa re// 'dir ni ri dang dgon pa bug du gnas par bya// der gnas na ni bdag mi bsnyengs shing gzhan mi smad// sngon chad bye ba phrag brgya mnyes ma byas/
354b1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran nas rtag par rgyun tu bdag la spos// lus dang srog la sred pa ma chags spang bar bya// gus pa drag po bskyed nas chos la brtson par gyis// nga'i mdo' 'dir bsgrub pa bshad
354b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dir gnas na// de dag rnams kyis byi nas byang chub rnyed mi dka'// gang dag rgyal ba'i theg pa 'di la dga' brtson pa// thos nas phyir zhing yid ni 'jig par bya ba'i rigs// de lta ba
354b3(dkon brtsegs): na bstan la mos pa bskyed par bya// rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe na phyis 'gyod gyur ta re// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyod la// yang gang zhig
354b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'di la slob bo// bdag sdom pa 'di la gnas par bya'o snyam du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan gyis sgrub na bsod nams kyi phung po de/ bsod nams kyi phung po'i 'di'i gan
354b5(dkon brtsegs): na brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi cha dang brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang dpe' dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bcom ldan
354b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na// sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu khrag khrig brag sum cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
354b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// dge slong bdun stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems
354b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags// 'di ji ltar gzung
355a1(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong de bas
355a2(dkon brtsegs): na khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam bcas pa don yod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba bzung shig/ skyes bu dam pa rnam par rol pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par nges pa zhes
355a3(dkon brtsegs): bya bar yang zung shig/ don yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang / lha dang mi dang
355a4(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog
355a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las// yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste// / 'dus pa bcwo brgyad pa rdzogs
355a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / da na shi la dang / mu ni bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo rtsa ba ban de ye shes sde bsgyur
355a7(dkon brtsegs): cing zhus ste/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
355a8(dkon brtsegs): rgya ga sa du// a r+ya sug za ba de bring tsanam ma hA yan su dra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong
355b1(dkon brtsegs): khrag brgya pa las/ drag shul can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
355b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po
355b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / ngan song spong ba dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob las stsogs pa
355b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ tshangs pa
355b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang
355b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu ston to// de nas khyim bdag drag shul can g.yog lnga pa brgya dang / mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
355b7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bis phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lanA gsum bskor
355b8(dkon brtsegs): ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de bzhin du khyim bdag gzhan rnams kyang 'di lta ste/ khyim bdag dga' 'dod dang / khyim bdag grags 'dod dang / khyim bdag leg
356a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang / khyim bdag dga' byed dang / khyim bdag grags byin dang / khyim bdag nor bzangs dang / khyim bdag tshul dga' dang / khyim bdag
356a2(dkon brtsegs): mgon med zas byin dang / khyim bdag klu dpal dang / khyim bdag bden dga' dang / de dag dang gzhan yang khyim bdag rab tu mang po rnams g.yog lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / mnyan
356a3(dkon brtsegs): yod kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas byin gyi kun dga' ra ba la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan
356a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// khyim bdag de dag thams cad phal cher ni g.yog
356a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas te/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par byas pa sha stag go// de nas khyim
356a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag drag shul can gyis khyim bdag gi 'khor chen po de 'dus par shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bus mo// g.yas
356a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan
356a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs bye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga'
356b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drag shul can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs/
356b2(dkon brtsegs): ba la dris shig dang / de ltar dris pa de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag drag shul can gyi
356b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen po la
356b4(dkon brtsegs): mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la rab tu gnas pa dang / theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub par 'tshal ba dang / theg pa chen po la 'jug par 'tshal ba dang / theg pa chen po la
356b5(dkon brtsegs): dam bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad gnyer ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin pa dang / sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i slad du go cha 'tshal ba dang /
356b6(dkon brtsegs): margal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzlan
356b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes/ sems can thams cad kyi don du khur chen po len pa dang / 'jug pa rlabs po che chen po la rab tu gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dpag tu mchis pa thos nas ye shes de
356b8(dkon brtsegs): de yang dag par bsgrub pa'i slad du go cha 'tshal ba dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi skon mang po du ma 'tshal kyang yongs su mi skyo zhing bskal pa grangs ma mchis par 'khor yang sems
357a1(dkon brtsegs): zhum par mi 'gyur ba de dag dang / bcom ldan 'das de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang dag khyim gyi gnas
357a2(dkon brtsegs): nas mngon par byung ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub cing / khyim na mi gnas pa dag dang / gang yang khyim na gnas shing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
357a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par sgrub ste/ khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par mi 'byung ba dag kyang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /
357a4(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po 'di rjes su bzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par bgyi ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom
357a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rnams kyi bslab pa'i yon tan rnam par gzhag pa de legs par bshad du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim gyi sa la gnas nas/
357a6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin bgyid cing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las mi nyams/ yongs su mi nyams te/ tshe 'di la yang las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis
357a7(dkon brtsegs): shing che gzhan du yang bye brag tu mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ste/ sdug pa dang mi sdug pa spangs nas/
357a8(dkon brtsegs): skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ yang dag par dad pas/ khyim nas khyim ma lags par rab tu byung ba de dag ji tsam du gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa gnyis kyis
357b1(dkon brtsegs): chos spyod pa dang / dge ba spyod pa yang dag par rab tu bshad du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung bas ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de skad
357b2(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drag shul can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag legs so legs so// khyod nga la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni khyod
357b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul dang mthun no// de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung bas ji ltar bslab pa'i yon tan yang dag par bzung zhing /
357b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa mchog la gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ khyim bdag drag shul can bcom ldan 'das kyi
357b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro
357b6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// chos la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o// dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o// de gsum la skyabs su song ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
357b7(dkon brtsegs): du bsngo bar bya'o// khyim bdag ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems pa' khyim pa sangs rgyas
357b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ yongs su bsgrub par bya'o snyam du sems mngon par 'du byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis skyes bu chen
358a1(dkon brtsegs): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa de lta bu ni khyim
358a2(dkon brtsegs): bdage byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos la skyabs su song ba yin zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang
358a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos la gus pa dang bcas shing / ri mo byed pa dang bcas pa/ chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/ chos la
358a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhol ba/ chos la 'bab pa/ chos srung ba/ chos sbed cing gnas pa/ chos kyis grags pa dang / chos kyi spyod pa la gnas pa/ chos kyi dbang du gyur pa/ chos yongs su tshol ba/
358a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi stobs dang ldan pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa'i mtshon cha dang ldan pa/ chos kyis bya ba byed pa de 'di lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
358a6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la chos kyis/ chos bgo bsha' bya'o snyam du dran pa rab tu 'thob ste/ khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub
358a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khyim pa chos la skyabs su song ba yin// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems
358a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khyim pa dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba ni/ gal te dge slong rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'am dgra bcom pa 'am/ so so'i skye bo 'am/ nyan
358b1(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ theg pa chen po pa dag mthong na/ de de la gus pa dang bcas/ zhes dang bcas shing ldang bar brtson la/ bka' blo ba de zhing
358b2(dkon brtsegs): mthun par 'dzin pa yin te/ de yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa de dag la bsnyen bkur byas pas/ 'di ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
358b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / nyan thos kyi yon tan yongs su bsgrub pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su bsgrub pa'i byir/
358b4(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan to snyam du dran pa rab tu 'thob ste/ de dag la gus pa dang bcas shing / zhes dang bcas pa yin gyi de dag la dga' bar mi byed de/ de ltar na khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa'
358b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no// khyim bdag gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyasu la su song ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang
358b6(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang / dam bcas pa mi 'jig pa dang / snying rje chen po yongs su mi gtong ba dang / theg pa gzhan la mi dmigs pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa
358b7(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos la skyabs su song ba
358b8(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la brten cing bsten te/ bsnyen bkur byed cing / sti stang du byas nas/ chos nyan pa dang / chos thos nas tshul bzhin so//
359a1(dkon brtsegs): sor rtog pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams dang / ji ltar khong du chud pa rnams gzhan dag la yang ston cing / yang dag par rab tu 'chad pa dang / chos
359a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi po de dag dang
359a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan na chos la skabs su song ba yin no// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nyan
359a4(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi theg pa pa yang dag par skyon med pa la zhugs pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la 'dzud pa dang / gang zang zing gis sdud par byed pa de dag chos kyis bsdu ba la sbyor
359a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la rton gyi/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la rton pa ma yin pa dang / nyan thos kyi yon tan yongs su tshol la/ de'i rnam par grol ba
359a6(dkon brtsegs): la mos pa yang ma yin pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub
359a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khyim pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mthong nas// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa ni/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no// chos thos nas chos
359a8(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa ni/ chos la skyabs su song ba yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthong nas/ byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa ni/ dge 'dun la
359b1(dkon brtsegs): skyabs su song ba yin no// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa/ sangs rgyas dang 'grogs par smon cing / sbyin pa sbyin pa ni sangs rgyas la
359b2(dkon brtsegs): skyabs su song ba yin no// dam pa'i chos yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa sbyin pa ni chos la skyabs su song ba yin no// sbyin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
359b3(dkon brtsegs): tu yongs su bsngo ba ni/ dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no// sbyin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ni/ dge 'dun la skyabs sa su song ba yin
359b4(dkon brtsegs): no/ khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa ni/ skyes bu dam pa'i las rnams byed de/ skyes bu ngan pa'i las rnams byed do// khyim bdag skyes bu dam
359b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las yin gyi/ skyes bu ngan pa'i las ma yin pa rnams gang zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos kyis long spyod tshol gyi chos ma yin pas mi tshol lo//
359b6(dkon brtsegs): mthun pas tshol gyi mi mthun pas ma yin no// yang dag pas 'tsho ba yin gyi log pas 'tsho ba ma yin te/ de chos kyi long spyod thob pa de dag gis gzhan la 'tshe bar mi byed de/ mi
359b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom pa mang zhig snying po len to// 'di lta ste/ ba ma la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / bu dang chung ma dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho
359b8(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams yang dag pa'i long spyod pa dang / 'dza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams la bkur bsti dang / gong du yang chos la 'dzud pas gtong
360a1(dkon brtsegs): ba 'phel bar byed do// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi phung po lnga'i khur khyer bas
360a2(dkon brtsegs): khung blangs pa bkur ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo// 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 'dor bas khur blangs pa bkur ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sem
360a3(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba/ bdag bde ba la mi chags pa/ sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa/ rnyed pa dang ma snyed pa dang / grags pa dang /
360a4(dkon brtsegs): ma grags dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis mi bskyod pa de/ 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / rnyed pa dang / long spyod phun
360a5(dkon brtsegs): su ma tshogs pas mi snyams pa dang / rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / brjod pa'i sgra'i snyan pa byed pa la yi mi chad pa dang / shin tu brtags te las byed pa dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa
360a6(dkon brtsegs): kun tu srung ba dang / log par sgrub pa la yid mi mos pa dang / mi gnas pa'i blos 'byung ba mthong ba dang / shing bal gyi 'dam ma lta bu'i sems med de/ ji ltar dam bcas pa yongs
360a7(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gzhan gyi bya ba byed pa dang / rung gi bya ba yongs su 'khor ba dang / rang gi bya ba yongs su 'dor ba dang / gzhan la bya ba la lan phan 'dogs par mi re ba dang
360a8(dkon brtsegs): gnod par byas pa la sha mi ljon pa dang / byas pa bzo ba dang / byas tshor ba dang / legs par bya ba'i las byed pa dang / dbul po rnams la longs spyod yang dag par bged pa dang /
360b1(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang ldan pa rnams la nga rgyal bcag pa dang / 'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs par dbugs 'byin pa dang / mya ngan gyis nyam thag pa rnams la mya ngan gyi zug rngu sel ba dang /
360b2(dkon brtsegs): mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing dang du len pa dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal rnams par spong ba dang / bla ma rnams la gus pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams la sten pa dang / mkhas
360b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la kun 'dri ba dang / lta ba drang ba dang / g.yo myed par spyod pa dang / sgyu med pa dang / bcos ma med par sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / dge ba gang yin zhes chos
360b4(dkon brtsegs): bas mi ngoms pa dang / mang du thos pa la chog mi shes par byas pa dang / brtsam pa rnams la yi dam brtan pa dang / 'phags pa'i skye bo dang 'grogs pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin
360b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i skye bo rnams la cher snying rje ba dang / 'ja' ba bstan pa dang / mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba la sems snyoms pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud
360b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams rab tu ston pa dang / thos pa'i don rjes su sgom pa dang / 'dod pa la dga' zhing rtse ba thams cad mi rtag par 'du shes pa dang / lus la mi lta
360b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'du shes pa dang / srog la zil pa'i thigs pa ltar 'du shes pa dang / longs spyod la sgyu ma dang / smyig rgyu lta bur 'du shes pa dang bu dang chung ma la sems can dmyal ba mnar med
360b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'du shes pa dang / zhing dang khyim gyi las kyi mtha' dang / gos rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa la phongs pa'i sdug par 'du shes pa dang / yongs su tshol ba la dge ba'i rtsa
361a1(dkon brtsegs): @ba rnam par 'jig par 'du shes pa dang / khyim gyi gnas la gshed ma lta bur 'du shes pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang snag gi gnyen
361a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshams rnams la sems can dmyal ba'i srungs mar 'du shes pa dang / nyin dang mtshan du bye brag du gyur pa ci yod ces yongs su 'jal bar 'du shes pa dang / nyi ni snying po med pa'i
361a3(dkon brtsegs): lus las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa dang / snying po med pa'i srog las snying po bla bar 'du shes pa dang / snying po med pa'i longs spyod rnams las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa yin no//
361a4(dkon brtsegs): de la snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa gang zhe na/ gang gzhan gyi bya'o cog bya bar spro ba dang / bla ma rnams la gus par smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang ldang ba dang /
361a5(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyor ba dang / 'dud pa'i las byed pa ste/ 'di ni snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa zhes bya'o// de la snying po med pa'i srog las snying po blang bar 'du shes
361a6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhe na/ gang sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa rnams yongs su mi nyams la gong du yang rnam par 'phel ba ste/ 'di ni snying po med pa'i srog las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa zhes
361a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de la snying po med pa'i longs spyod rnams las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa gang zhe na/ gang ser sna'i sems char bcod cing gtong ba chen po'i sems 'phel bar byed cing sbyin
361a8(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dgu bar bged pa ste/ 'di ni snying po med pa'i longs spong rnams las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa zhes bya'o// khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems da ba' khyim pa gang
361b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu'i skyes bu dam pa'i las 'di dag byed kyi/ skyes bu ngan pa'i las ni ma yin no// de ltar byed na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nyes par brjod pa ma yin te/ rigs pa
361b2(dkon brtsegs): smra ba yin/ chos smra ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ sngon bla na med pa yang dag dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dam bcas pa yang mi nyams yongs su mi nyams pa yin no// khyim bdag
361b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad yongs su bzung ba yin te/ 'di lta ste/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su bzung nas/ des srog gcod
361b4(dkon brtsegs): pa spang bar bya ste/ dbyig pa dor ba dang / mtshon cha dor ba dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / srog chags 'byung po thams cad la mi 'tshe ba'i rang bzhin can dang /
361b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / rtag tu byams pa la gnas par bya'o// des ma byin par len pa spang bar bya ba ste/ bdag gis longs spyod kyis cho ga shes pa
361b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzhan gyi longs spyod la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang / chags pa dang brnab sems myed pa dang / gzhan gyi nor la 'dod pa med pa dang / tha na rtsa dang lo ma tsam yang
361b7(dkon brtsegs): ma tsum yang ma byin par mi blang bar bya'o// des 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spang bar bya ste/ rang gi chung mas cho ga par 'dzin pa dang / gzhan gyi chung ma la 'dod pa med pa
361b8(dkon brtsegs): dang ma chags pa'i mig gis lta ba dang / yid byung ba'i yid dang / 'dod pa dag ni shin tu sdug bsngal ba'o snyam du ma chags pa yid la byed pa la brtson par bya ste/ gang gi
362a1(dkon brtsegs): @tshe rang gi chung ma la 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa byung ba de'i tshe yang / nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pa na/ des rang gi chung ma la mi sdug par rjes su lta ba dang /
362a2(dkon brtsegs): skrag pa'i yid kyis 'dod pa sten par bya'i zhen pas zin bzhin du ni ma yin pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa raM dang / mi gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang / des
362a3(dkon brtsegs): ci nas bdag gis yid kyi dgu la yang 'dod pa spyad par mi bya na/ mtshan gnyis sprod pa 'am/ yan lan ma yin par 'jug pa lta ci smos te/ bdag gis de ltar bya'o snyam mo// des
362a4(dkon brtsegs): brdzun du smra ba spang bar bya ste/ bden par smra ba dang yang dag par smra ba dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / mi slu ba dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dran pa dang /
362a5(dkon brtsegs): shes bzhin dang ldan par bya ste/ ji ltar mthong ba dang / thos pa smra ba dang / chos rjes su srung bar gyur pa des/ lus dang srog gi phyir yang shes bzhin du brdzun smra bar mi bya'o// des
362a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bru'i chang dang sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spang bar bya ste/ der ro ba med pa dang / myos pa med pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa dang / tshig ma 'chal ba dang / mi 'phyar ba dang /
362a7(dkon brtsegs): mi rgod pa dang / mi g.yeng ba dang / dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan par bya ste/ de nam bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i blo 'jug cing / zas 'dod pa
362a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams la zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la skom/ sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o snyam pa na/ des gzhan dag la chang yang sbyin te/ 'di snyam du 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus yin te/
362b1(dkon brtsegs): gang ci 'dod pa de la de sbyin pa'i dus la bab kyis/ bdag gis 'di ltar bya ste/ gang dang gang la 'di ltar chang yang byin na/ gang 'di 'khrul ba med pa'i spyod pa la de dang de dag dran
362b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / shes bzhin yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug go snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems
362b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su spyod pa yin no// khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gzhan dag la chang byin na yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nyes par brjod
362b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin no// khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa des slab pa'i gzhi lnga bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//
362b5(dkon brtsegs): des sleb pa'i gzhi lnga po de dag kyang shin tu bsrung bar bya'o// gong du yang des phra ma mi bya zhing bye ba rnams kyi sdu mas bya'o// des ngag rtsub po yang mi slu bar bya zhing des ngag 'jam por smra ba/
362b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshig gnyen pa dang / gsong por smra bar bya'o// tshig khyal ba yang smra bar mi bya zhing dus su smra ba dang / yang dag par smra ba dang / don smra ba dang / chos smra ba dang / rigs pa smra
362b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'dul ba smra ba dang / lan legs par 'debs pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed par bya'o// des brnab sems su mi bya zhing / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
362b8(dkon brtsegs): bde bar bsam par bya'o// gnod sems su mi bya zhing rtag tu bzod pa'i stobs kyi go ca bgo bar bya'o// des yang dag par blta bar bya zhing log pa phyin ci log tu lta ba thams/
363a1(dkon brtsegs): cad dang bral bar bya'o// lhar sangs rgyas la bsam pa rjes su song zhing lnga gzhan mi 'dzin par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim
363a2(dkon brtsegs): pa grong ngam// grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas pa der/ des sems can rnams la chos kyi gtam brjod par bya ste/ gang dag ma
363a3(dkon brtsegs): dad pa de dag ni dad pa la gzud par bya/ sems can gang dag mi gus cing bar mi 'dzin pa/ mar mi 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ rigs kyi gartso
363a4(dkon brtsegs): bo la rim 'gro mi byed pa/ tshul dang mi ldan zhing mtshams las 'das pa de dag/ bla ma la gusra ba dang / chos spyod pa la gzud par bya'o// sems can gang dag thos pa nyung ba de
363a5(dkon brtsegs): dag mang du thos pa la sbyar bar bya'o// ser sna can rnams ni gtong ba la/ tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams ni tshul khrims dang / gA nod sems can rnams ni bzod pa dang / des
363a6(dkon brtsegs): ba la le lo can rnams ni brtson 'grus brtsom pa la brjed ngas pa rnams ni dran pa dang shes bzhin la/ 'chal ba'i shes rab la gzud par bya'o// sems can dbul po rnams
363a7(dkon brtsegs): la longs spyod yang dag par bgo bar bya'o// sems can nad pa rnams la sman sbyin par bya'o// sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon bya'o// skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs
363a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / dpung nyen med pa rnams kyi dpung nyen bya'o// des ljongs dang ljongs kyi phyogs de dag thams cad dang ji ltar mthun par sems can 'ga' yang log par lhung bar mi 'gro ba
363b1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar chos kyis bsrung bar bya'o// khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas lan gsum nas/ lan bdun gyis bar du rjes su bstan pas/ sems can rnams yon tan
363b2(dkon brtsegs): dag bkod pa las yon tan gang yang rung ba la gnas par ma gyur na/ khyim bdag de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa des/ sems can de dag la snying rje chen po bskyed de// des tham
363b3(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha sra ba yang bgo zhing tshigs 'di skad ces ji srid du sems can gdul dka' ba dmu rgod de dag yongs su smin par ma gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag
363b4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis de dag gi phyir go ca bgos te/ sems can drang po rnams kyi phyir ma
363b5(dkon brtsegs): yin/ g.yo med pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ sgyu med pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin te/ yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyi phyir bdag gis go cha ma
363b6(dkon brtsegs): bgos kyis ji nas bdagra gi rtsol ba don yod par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyis bdag mthong ma thag tu dga' ba dang / dad pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o// de ltar bsgrub
363b7(dkon brtsegs): po/ de ltar brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o snyam mo// khyim bdag gal te grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas pa'i byang chub sems
363b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' des phyogs der ma bskal tam/ dran par ma byas te/ sems can rnams ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba zhig tu skyes par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
364a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis smad pa yin no// khyim bdag 'di lta ste/ dper na grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ljongs kyi phyogs gang na sman pa mkha
364a2(dkon brtsegs): pa zhig gnas pa des/ tha na sems can 'ga' zhig gi dug zhi bar ma nus te/ 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur na sman de skye bo mang pos smad par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag de bzhin du grong ngam/
364a3(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ljongs kyis phyogs gang na/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa des/ de'i phyogs su tha na sems can 'ga' tsam la yang ma bskal tam/ dran
364a4(dkon brtsegs): par ma byas te/ ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis smad pa yin no// khyim bdag de bas na 'di la byang chub sems
364a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khyim pas ci nas grong ngam// grong khyer ram/ grong rdal la/ ljongs sam/ ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas pa des/ bdag gis sems can 'ga' yang log par ltung bar
364a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o// de ltar bsgrub bo// de ltar brtson 'grus brtsam mo snyam pa'i go cha de lta bu bgo bar bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa/
364a7(dkon brtsegs): khyim na gnas pas/ khyim na gnas pa'i nyes pa la mkhas par bya'o// des 'di ltar so sor bslab par bya ste/ khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'joms par byed pa/ 'byung
364a8(dkon brtsegs): ba sun 'byin pa/ dge ba'i sdong po 'gyel bar byed pa ste/ de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o// khyim na gnas pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gnas/ myi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rnam par
364b1(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa rnams kyi gnas/ byis pa so so'i skye bo ma dul ba/ ma sbas pa rnams kyi gnas mi dge ba spyod pa rnams kyi gnas/ skye bo ngan pa 'dus pa yin te/ de'i phyir khyim na gnas pa zhes
364b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// khyim na gnas pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi chos thams cad kyi gnas zhes brjod pa'o// 'di ni sngon goms par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams nyams par byed pa ste/ de'i
364b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir khyim na gnas pa zhes bya'o// khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni der gnas nas bya ba'i mi rigs pa byed pa'o// der gnas nas pa dang ma dang / dge slong dang / bram ze la mi gus par 'gyur ba
364b4(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o// khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni srid pa'i khri shing la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
364b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o// khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni gsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / gtse ba dang / mi snyan pa dang / gshe
364b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ngan tu brjod pa dang ngan tu bya ba'i tshig gi lam rnams 'du ba ste/ de'i phyir khyim zhes bya ba'o// khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma byas pa mi 'dzugs pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba
364b7(dkon brtsegs): byas pa rnams rnam par 'jig pa'o// mkhas pa rnams dang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos thams cad kyis smad pa'o// 'di la gnas pa ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro//
364b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di la gnas pa ni 'dod chags kyis 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro'o// zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba ste/ de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o// 'di ni
365a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi phung po kun mi srung ba'o// ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po 'dor ba'o// shes rab kyi phung po la mi 'jug pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i
365a2(dkon brtsegs): phung po mi 'thob pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po mi skyed pa ste/ de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o// 'di la gnas pa ni pha ma dang bu dang / chung ma dang / bran pa
365a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dang / g.yog yongs su 'dzin pa la
365a4(dkon brtsegs): sred pa yin no// khyim ni gnas pa 'di ni rgya mtsho la chu bran ltar dgang dka' ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni me la shing ltar cho ga mi shes pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni thug pa
365a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i tshul gyis rlung mar ltar thug pa med par rnam par rtog pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni 'jig pas bye ma yi grong khyer ltar 'jig pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni kha
365a6(dkon brtsegs): zas bzang po dug dang 'dres pa ltar 'dres pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni mi mdza' ba bzhin du mthun pa yang ma yin pas/ rtag tu sdug bsngal ba'o// khyim na gnas pa
365a7(dkon brtsegs): ni 'phags pa'i chos bsgrub pa la bar chad byed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni phan tshun gyi rkyen kyis 'thab pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni gcig la gcig gnod par sems
365a8(dkon brtsegs): bas rtag tu mi mthun pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' las sbyor bas gnod pa mang ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni las
365b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtha' thug pa med pas rtag tu brtson pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni yun ring po nas bsags pa rnams par 'jigs pa'i chos can gyi phyir mi rtag pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni dngos
365b2(dkon brtsegs): po kun tu tshol zhing yongs su srung bas sdug bsngal ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni dgra ltar mi mdza' bas rtag tu bag tsha ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni rang gi dpyod pas rnam par
365b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs te/ ngo bo nyid ston pas gar mkhan gyi tshon dang 'dra'o// khyim na gnas pa ni myur du phan tshun 'gyes pas mthar rgud cing 'gyur pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni skye bo glo bur
365b4(dkon brtsegs): du 'dus pas rtag tu ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir sgyu ma la lta ba dang mtshungs so// khyim na gnas pa ni phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang mthar rgud par 'gyur bas rmi lam dang
365b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs so// khyim na gnas pa ni myur du 'bral bas zil pa'i thigs pa dang mtshungs so// khyim na gnas pa ni ro bro ba chung ngu yongs su 'jal bas sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa dang
365b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs so// khyim na gnas pa ni nas pa de gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyis yongs su gzir bas tsher ma'i dra ba dang mtshungs so// khyim
365b7(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa ni mi dge ba la rnam par rtog pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i phyir// kha khab tsam gyi srog chags dang mtshungs so// khyim na gnas pa ni glacig 'drid pas/ srog
365b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'jig pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni sems rnyog pa can du byed pas rtag tu 'khrug pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni rgyal po dang / chom kun dang / me dang chung dang / ba go skal
366a1(dkon brtsegs): la spyod pas rnam par 'jom pa'i phyir thun mo bya'o// khyim na gnas pa ni nyes dmigs mang bas ro bro ba chung ba'o// khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems
366a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas/ khyim na gnas pa'i nyes pa la mkhas par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas/ sbyin pa dang /
366a3(dkon brtsegs): dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa mang du bya'o// des yang 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ gang byin pa de ni bdag gi yin no// khyim na bzhag pa de ni bdag gi ma yin
366a4(dkon brtsegs): no// gang byin pa de ni snying po can no// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni snying po med pa'o// gang byin pa de ni gzhan la bde ba'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni da ltar byung ba na bde ba'o//
366a5(dkon brtsegs): gang byin pa de ni yang bsrung bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni bsrung bar bya ba'o// gang byin pa de ni sred pa zad par 'gyur ba'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa
366a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni srid pa rnam par 'phel ba'o// gang byin pa de ni bdag gis pa med pa'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni bdag gi dang bcas pa'o// gang byin pa de ni yongs su mi 'dzin
366a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'o// gang byin pa de ni 'jigs pa med pa'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'o// gang byin
366a8(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni byang chub kyi lam nye bar rton pa'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni bdud kyi phyogs nye bar rton pa'o// gang byin pa de ni zad mi shes pa'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni zad
366b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'o// gang byin pa de ni bde ba'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni kun srung dgos pas sdug bsngal ba'o// gang byin pa de ni nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ba'o//
366b2(dkon brtsegs): gang khyim na yod pa de ni nyon mongs pa 'phel bar byed pa'o// gang byin pa de ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni longs spyod chen por mi 'gyur
366b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// gang byin pa de ni skyes bu dag pa'i las so// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni skyes bu ngan pa'i las so// gang byin pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags
366b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni byis pa'i skye bos bsngags pa'o snyam du brtag par bya'o// khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas snying po blang bar bya'o//
366b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa dag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes nyen du 'du shes pa dang /
366b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe rjes nas longs spyod chen por 'gyur bar 'du shes pa dang / byang chub kyi lam nye bar rton par 'du shes pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mtho
366b7(dkon brtsegs): na 'du shes gsum po de dag skyed par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/
366b8(dkon brtsegs): ser sna tshar gcad pa'i 'du shes dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i 'du shes dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes lta ba'i 'du shes te/ khyim bdag byang chub
367a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khyim pas spong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong
367a2(dkon brtsegs): na 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin du bya ba'i 'du shes dang / bdud tshar gcad pa'i du shes dang / rnam par smin pa la
367a3(dkon brtsegs): re ba med pa'i 'du shes te/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems
367a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ slong ba la g.yog tu 'du shes pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos pos mi btang bar 'du
367a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / dam pa ma yin pa'i yongs su 'dzin pas las 'byung bar 'du shes pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum po de
367a6(dkon brtsegs): dag bskyed par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang
367a7(dkon brtsegs): bral ba'i 'du shes dang / byams pa bsgom pa'i 'du shes dang / gAti mug la mi 'jug pa'i 'du shes te/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na
367a8(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas slong ba mthong na/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug srab mor
367b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas spong ba mthong na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug srab mor 'gyur zhe na/ gang de'i dngos po la btang
367b2(dkon brtsegs): snyoms shing yongs su gtong ba 'di ni de'i 'dod chags srab pa'o// gang slong ba de dag la byams pa nye bar bsgrub pa 'di ni de'i zhe sdang srab pa'o// gang dngos po byin nas bla na med pa yang
367b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du bsngo ba 'di ni de'i gti mug srab pa'o// khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug
367b4(dkon brtsegs): srab mor 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ khyim bdag 'di la
367b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas dngos po gang yang rung ba zhig bslangs ma thag tu dngos po de la sems kyis 'dzin par mi byed de/ de ltar na de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs
367b6(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang byang chub kyi sems la brten nas yongs su gtong ste/ de ltar na de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang slong ba de
367b7(dkon brtsegs): dag la byams pa nye bar bsgrubs te/ mi khro zhing gnod sems mi byed de/ de ltar na de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gal te byin na ci spyang snyam du 'di lta/
367b8(dkon brtsegs): sems g.yo bas zhum pa med de/ de ltar na de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang slong ba la byin te byin nas kyang gdung ba med cing 'gyod
368a1(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa yin/ gong du yang dga' zhing rab tu mgu ste bde ba dang / yid bde ba skye zhing gang byang chub kyi sems la gnas nas gtong ste/ de ltar na de'i bsam gtan
368a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byin nas kyang gang chos thams cad mi dmigs shing rnam par smin pa la mi re ste/ ji ltar mkhas pa de dag chos gang la yang
368a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par ma zhen pa de ltar mngon par zhen pa med pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ de ltar na de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs
368a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na/ pha rol du byin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub
368a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pas 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad la mnyam pa nyid thob par bya'o// de nas longs spyod rnyed dam chung ma rnyed dam/ bu rnyed
368a6(dkon brtsegs): dam/ nor rnyed dam/ 'bru rnyed kyang khengs par yang mi bya/ dga' bar yang mi bya/ thams cad ma 'byor kyang des zhum par yang mi bya// yid dmug par yang mi bya yi// des 'di ltar brtan par bya
368a7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'dus byas thams cad ni sgyu ma byas rnams par bsgrubs pas so sor nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do// 'di lta ste/ pha ma dang / bu dang chung ma dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed
368a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams de dag ni las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa yin te/ de dag kyang bdag gi ma yin/
368b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de dag gi ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pha ma las stsogs pa de dag ni bdag gi mgon nam/ skyabs sam/ dpung nyen nam/ gnas sam/ gling ngam/ bdag gam/ bdag gis
368b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin no// gang dag gi zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag kyang bdag gi ma yin/ bdag gi ma yin na gang bdag gi pha ma la stsogs pa de dag dang bdag dang / bdag gir
368b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dang / bdag kyang de dag gi yin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag kyang las bdag gir bya ba/ las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa yin te/ las dge ba'am/ sdig pa 'am/
368b4(dkon brtsegs): grang dang gang byas pa de dang / de nyid kyi bgo skal la spyod par 'gyur/ de dang de nyid kyi 'bras bu so sor myong ngo // de dang de nyid kyi rnam par smin pa la spyod do// 'di dag kyang las bdag gir bya
368b5(dkon brtsegs): ba las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa yin te/ las dge ba dang / sdig pa 'am/ gang dang gang byas pa de dang de nyid kyi bgo skal la spyod par 'gyur// de dang de nyid kyi rnam par smin pa so sor myong bar
368b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// de dang de nyid kyi 'bras bu so sor myong bar 'gyur ro// de dag gi phyir bdag mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin te/ 'di dag ni tshe 'di la bde ba'i bdag gis bya/
368b7(dkon brtsegs): ba yin gyi/ tshe gzhan la bde ba bdag gir bya ba ni ma yin no// bdag gi nga yin pa de la bdag 'jug par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / bzod pa dang /
368b8(dkon brtsegs): des pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bag yod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag sdud cing mngon par bsgrub pa'i dge ba de ni bdag gi yin te/ gang du bdag 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i lam der 'di dag
369a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'gro bar 'gyur rogam ste/ de srog gi phyir ram/ bu dang chung ma'i phyir yang sdig pa'i las mngon par 'du mi byed do// khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim nargan
369a2(dkon brtsegs): ba des/ rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / mi brtan pa'i 'du shes dang / 'gyur ba'i 'dushes ste/ khyim bdag byang chub
369a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed
369a4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ni dga' zhing rtse ba'i grogs yin gyi/ 'di 'jig rten pha rol gyi grogs ni ma yin no// 'di ni bza' ba dang btung ba'i grogs yin gyi/ 'di las
369a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam par smin pa myong ba'i grogs ni ma yin no// 'di ni bde ba'i grogs yin gyi/ 'di sdug bsngal gyi grogs ma yin no snyam pa lta/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi
369a6(dkon brtsegs): chung ma la 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mi
369a7(dkon brtsegs): gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang / dri nga bar 'du shes pa dang / mi 'thun par 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed
369a8(dkon brtsegs): par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ dgrar 'du shes pa dang / gshed mar 'du shes pa dang / phyir rgol bar 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung/
369b1(dkon brtsegs): ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par byaste/ gsum gang zhe na/ sha ba mor 'du shes pa dang / srin mor 'du shes pa dang gzugs mi sdug par 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan
369b2(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ dgang dka' bar 'du shes pa dang / gti mug tu 'du shes pa dang / byas pa
369b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gzo bar 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro
369b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'du shes pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'gro bar 'du shes pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang
